analyzed: om
viṣvaksenasaṃhitā
prathamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
viṣvaksenaḥ
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi bhū parīkṣā vidhim param
karṣayet śodhayet bhūmim prāc udak pravaṇām śubhām
asthi keśa ādi rahitām kapāla aṅgara varjitām

original: sarīsṛpādyā vyāghrādyā ye cānye duṣṭajantavaḥ // Vis_1.2 //
analyzed: sarīsṛpa ādyāḥ vyāghra ādyāḥ ye ca anye duṣṭa jantavaḥ

original: yasyāṃ bhūmau pradṛśyante tāṃ bhūmiṃ varjayet sadā /
analyzed: yasyām bhūmau pradṛśyante tām bhūmim varjayet sadā
ārambhe śva śṛgālaiḥ ca saṃkīrṇā bandhu nāśinī
purīṣa bhūmiḥ sarveṣām kartuḥ duḥkha pradā sadā
tuṣa bhasma asthi keśaiḥ ca kāṣṭha loṣṭa kapālakaiḥ
krimi kīṭa pataṅgaiḥ ca śarkaraiḥ ca samanvitā
aśubha aśrī karī bhūmiḥ tasmāt yatnāt parīkṣayet
evam durlakṣaṇaiḥ ca anyaiḥ yuktām yatnena varjayet

original: brāhmaṇasya sitā bhūmiḥ raktā vai kṣatriyasya tu // Vis_1.6 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇasya sitā bhūmiḥ raktā vai kṣatriyasya tu

original: pītavarṇā tu vaiśyasya kṛṣṇā śūdrasya kīrtitā /
analyzed: pīta varṇā tu vaiśyasya kṛṣṇā śūdrasya kīrtitā

original: brāhmaṇī ghṛtagandhā syāt kṣatriyā raktagandhinī // Vis_1.7 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇī ghṛta gandhā syāt kṣatriyā rakta gandhinī

original: mūtragandhā tu yā veśyā śūdrā viṣṭhānugandhinī /
analyzed: mūtra gandhā tu yā veśyā śūdrā viṣṭhā anugandhinī

original: madhurā brāhmaṇī proktā kaṣāyā kṣatriyā smṛtā // Vis_1.8 //
analyzed: madhurā brāhmaṇī proktā kaṣāyā kṣatriyā smṛtā

original: ri(ti?)ktā vaiśyā tu kaṭukā śūdrā ceti prakīrtitā /
analyzed: vaiśyā tu kaṭukā śūdrā ca iti prakīrtitā
evam parīkṣya yatnena varṇa gandha rasa ādibhiḥ
khātayet ratni mātram tu pāṃsum uddhṛtya pūrayet

original: pāṃsurapyadhiko yatra sā bhūmiḥ sarvakāmadā // Vis_1.10 //
analyzed: pāṃsuḥ api adhikaḥ yatra sā bhūmiḥ sarva kāma dā

original: uttamā yatra vai pāṃsuḥ samo hyardhaphalapradā /
analyzed: uttamā yatra vai pāṃsuḥ samaḥ hi ardha phala pradā

original: madhyā pāṃsuryatra nṛna sāriṣṭā phaladādhamā // Vis_1.11 //
analyzed: madhyā pāṃsuḥ yatra sā ariṣṭā phala dā adhamā

original: tṛ(u?)ptāni sarvabījāni prarohanti hi yatra vai /
analyzed: sarva bījāni prarohanti hi yatra vai
tri rātra abhyantareṇa eva sā bhūmiḥ ca uttamā matā
madhyamā pañca rātreṇa adhamā sapta rātrikā

original: yasyāṃ tu na prarohanti tāṃ prayatnena varjayet // Vis_1.13 //
analyzed: yasyām tu na prarohanti tām prayatnena varjayet

original: sasyānāṃ phalakāle tu gavāṃ tṛptiṃ ca kārayet /
analyzed: sasyānām phala kāle tu gavām tṛptim ca kārayet
tatas tu lokapālān tu pūjayet sādhaka uttamaḥ
annaiḥ apūpaiḥ lājaiḥ tu madhyarātre śacīpate

original: evaṃ baliṃ prakurvīta pṛthagvā samayogataḥ // Vis_1.15 //
analyzed: evam balim prakurvīta pṛthak vā sama yogataḥ
tat kṣetram khātayet paścāt caturaśram samantataḥ

original: puruṣadvayaṃ khanitvā tu tadardhaṃ vāpi khātayet // Vis_1.16 //
analyzed: puruṣa dvayam khanitvā tu tad ardham vā api khātayet
puruṣa ardha pramāṇam vā khaḍga māna pramāṇataḥ

original: evaṃ kṣitiṃ khanitvā tu tanmadhye se ca(pūra?)
analyzed: evam kṣitim khanitvā tu tad madhye se capūra
yet jalam

original: tanmadhye tu vidhiṃ pūjya brahmabījena mantravit /
analyzed: tad madhye tu vidhim pūjya brahma bījena mantra vid
gandha puṣpaiḥ alaṃkṛtya ghaṇṭā śabda samanvitam
śaṅkha ādi ghoṣa saṃyuktam vīṇā veṇu samanvitam
evam vidhim samabhyarcya adhivāsanam ārabhet

original: tasya dakṣiṇapārśve tu paścime cottare 'pi vā /
analyzed: tasya dakṣiṇa pārśve tu paścime ca uttare vā

original: vasvādīnāṃ tu tanmadhye maṇḍapaṃ kalpya sādhakaḥ // Vis_1.20 //
analyzed: vasu ādīnām tu tad madhye maṇḍapam kalpya sādhakaḥ
droṇa dvayena saṃpūrṇam tri sūtraiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
gandha toyena saṃpūrya gandha puṣpa samanvitam
droṇa aṣṭa śālīn āstīrya padmam aṣṭa dalam likhat
karṇikāyām nyaset kumbham vastra yugmena veṣṭitam
nava ratna samāyuktam sauvarṇa āyudha pañca yuj
vāsudevasya mantreṇa sthāpayet deśika uttamaḥ
sarva āyudha samāyuktam sarva deva āvṛtam tatas
hiraṇyam sarva bhūta jñam sarva bhūta hṛdi sthitam
ātmānam antarātmānam paramātmānam avyayam
nārāyaṇa maṇīyāṃsam sṛṣṭi saṃhāra vikramam kāraṇam

original: evaṃ hi puruṣaṃ viṣṇuṃ dhyāyet kumbhodamadhyame // Vis_1.26 //
analyzed: evam hi puruṣam viṣṇum dhyāyet kumbhoda madhyame
evam dhyātvā samabhyarcya gandha ādyaiḥ su manoramaiḥ

original: pratyekaṃ droṇaśālyūrdhve vidyeśān parito nyaset // Vis_1.27 //
analyzed: pratyekam droṇa śāli ūrdhve vidyeśān paritas nyaset
pūrvavat dravya saṃyuktān ghaṭeṣu abhyarcya sādhakaḥ
svaiḥ svaiḥ mantraiḥ ca gandha ādyaiḥ upacāraiḥ manoharaiḥ
evam saṃpūjya vidyeśān homa saṃskāra karma samārabhet

original: kumbhasya pūrvadigdeśe kuṇḍaṃ ca caturaśrakam // Vis_1.29 //
analyzed: kumbhasya pūrva diś deśe kuṇḍam ca caturaśrakam

original: vṛttaṃ vā śilpinā kuryāt sthaṇḍile vā samācaret /
analyzed: vṛttam vā śilpinā kuryāt sthaṇḍile vā samācaret
prāsāda ārambha kāle tu madhyarātre śacīpate
śaṅkha tūrya ādi saṃyuktam svasti sūkta samanvitam
sarva vighna upaśamanam pālāśam gṛhya deśikaḥ
aṣṭottarasahasram vai aṣṭottaraśatam tu vā

original: nārasiṃhena mantreṇa madhyame juhuyāt sakṛt // Vis_1.32 //
analyzed: nārasiṃhena mantreṇa madhyame juhuyāt sakṛt
odumbara samidbhiḥ vā api aṭ aṣṭāviṃśati saṃkhyayā
pratyekam mūlamantreṇa tathā eva ājyam samācaret
carum puruṣasūktena ṣoḍaśa āhutim uttamām
juhuyāt kuṇḍa madhye tu sarva saṃpad sukha āvaham
evam kṛtvā vidhānena pūrṇāhutim atha ācaret
srucā mūlena mantra jñaḥ dvādaśa akṣara saṃjñayā

original: kuḍubaṃ vā tadardhaṃ vā tasyārdhaṃ vā śacīpate /
analyzed: kuḍubam vā tad ardham vā tasya ardham vā śacīpate

original: kapilājyamathājyaṃ vā saṃgṛhya juhuyāt kriyām(kramāt?) // Vis_1.36 //
analyzed: kapila ājyam atha ājyam vā saṃgṛhya juhuyāt kriyām kramāt
paridhi prabhṛtīn dagdhvā dakṣiṇām ādadet tatas
dakṣiṇa ante śacī nātha śaṅkha ādyaiḥ ghoṣayet kramāt
nṛtta gīta ādi saṃyuktam su puṇya aha puraḥsaram
veda adhyayana saṃyuktam adhivāsanam ācaret
evam samāpya homa antam pūrva rātre dhivāsayet

original: prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ snātvācāryaḥ samāhitaḥ // Vis_1.39 //
analyzed: prabhātāyām tu śarvaryām snātvā ācāryaḥ samāhitaḥ
pūrvavat pūjayet kumbhān prokṣayet kṣiti madhyame

original: svaiḥ svairmantraistu matimān sīmāyāṃ sarvadikṣu ca // Vis_1.40 //
analyzed: svaiḥ svaiḥ mantraiḥ tu matimān sīmāyām sarva dikṣu ca
bhūta krūra balim dadyāt aṣṭa dikṣu samantataḥ

original: digbandhaṃ kārayet paścāt astramantreṇa mantravit // Vis_1.41 //
analyzed: digbandham kārayet paścāt astramantreṇa mantra vid
kumbha udakāt aśeṣam tu kṣiti madhye nayet kramāt

original: tato 'vaṭaṃ kramāt pūrya mṛdbhiḥ sikatasaṃyutam // Vis_1.42 //
analyzed: tatas vaṭam kramāt pūrya mṛdbhiḥ sikata saṃyutam
kārayena mudgaraiḥ samyak vaiṣṇavaiḥ vedapāragaiḥ

original: sūtraśaṅkūn khanitvā tu caitre māse śubhe dine // Vis_1.43 //
analyzed: sūtra śaṅkūn khanitvā tu caitre māse śubhe dine
sūtreṇa sūtrayet paścāt śilpinā kuśalena vai

original: prāsādaṃ kārayet paścāt ācāryaḥ śilpibhiḥ saha // Vis_1.44 //
analyzed: prāsādam kārayet paścāt ācāryaḥ śilpibhiḥ saha
sādhakaḥ mantra yogyaḥ tu sthapatiḥ karma yogyataḥ kaḥ

original: yadidaṃ bhūmiśuddhyarthaṃ prokṣaṇaṃ paramaṃ śubham // Vis_1.45 //
analyzed: yat idam bhūmi śuddhi artham prokṣaṇam paramam śubham
evam saṃkṣepataḥ proktam prāsāda artham śacīpate

original: anenaiva vidhānena yaḥ kuryāt puṇyakarmabhāk // Vis_1.46 //
analyzed: anena eva vidhānena yaḥ kuryāt puṇya karma bhāj
sarva pāpa vinirmuktaḥ sa yāti paramām gatim
rāṣṭra vṛddhi karam puṇyam āyuḥ ārogya vardhanam
dhana dhānyāni vardhante rāja rāṣṭra ādi vardhate
ācāryam pūjayet paścāt vastraiḥ ābharaṇaiḥ api
śilpinam pūjayet tatra vastraiḥ kanaka kuṇḍalaiḥ
daiva jñam pūjayet paścāt nava vastra aṅgulīyakaiḥ
sadasyān pūjayet paścāt mukha vāsana pūrvakam
evaṃkrameṇa saṃpūjya vastra ābharaṇa saṃyutam
tatas tu kārayet geham śilpinā kuśalena tu
su muhūrte su lagne tu bālasthānam atha ārabhet
bālasthānam purā ākalpya paścāt mūla ālayam kramāt
kārayet tu viśeṣeṇa ratna nyāsa samanvitam
hasta mātram khanitvā tu brahma sthāne śacīpate

original: sahasraṃ śataniṣkaṃ vā tasyārdhaṃ vārdhameva ca // Vis_1.53 //
analyzed: sahasram śata niṣkam vā tasya ardham vā ardham eva ca
vinyaset kṣiti madhye tu tapta kāñcanam uttamam
marakata ādīni ratnāni saṃgṛhya astreṇa sādhakaḥ
brahma ādi īśa avasānam tu vinyaset sva sva mantrataḥ
madhyarātre su guptena yajamānena saṃyutaḥ
śaṅkha ādi ghāṣa saṃyuktam garbhādhānam samācaret
tāmreṇa phelakām kṛtvā avaṭam ācchādya pūrayet
śilābhiḥ iṣṭakābhiḥ vā tu pracchādya avaṭam kramāt
gandha puṣpa ādinā abhyarcya ghaṇṭā śabda samanvitam
brahmabījena tat sarvam sādhayet sādhaka uttamaḥ

original: paścāddevīṃ samabhyarcya śriyārthaṃ paramāṃ śubhām // Vis_1.58 //
analyzed: paścāt devīm samabhyarcya śriyā artham paramām śubhām
vāsudevasya vam sva
mantreṇa paścāt saṃpūjayet kramāt

original: evaṃ saṃkṣepataḥ proktā bhūparīkṣā hyanuttamā // Vis_1.59 //
analyzed: evam saṃkṣepataḥ proktā bhū parīkṣā hi anuttamā
iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām bhūparīkṣāvidhiḥ nāma prathamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
dvitīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ
dvitīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ viṣvaksenaḥ
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi maṇḍapa ādi kriyām
maṇḍapaḥ ca eva kuṇḍāni sruc sruvaṃvau
ca aṣṭamaṅgalam

original: toraṇaṃ caiva tannāma teṣāṃ pūjāvidhiṃ kramāt /
analyzed: toraṇam ca eva tad nāma teṣām pūjā vidhim kramāt
dvārapāla patākāḥ ca teṣām nyāsa vidhim kramāt
śacīpate viviktena guhyāt guhya vidhim kramāt
maṇḍapam pūrva digbhāge puṣṭi śrī vardhanam bhavet
sarva vighna upaśamanam yāmye ca eva yaśaskaram

original: jayadaṃ vāruṇe bhāge dhanadaṃ cottare diśi // Vis_2.4 //
analyzed: jaya dam vāruṇe bhāge dhana dam ca uttare diśi
āgneye naiṛte vā api vāyavya aiśāśa iśacīpate
kalpayet maṇḍapam ca evam pūrva pūrvā garīyasī
yajamāna icchayā kuryāt anya deśe na kārayet

original: maṇḍapaṃ trividhaṃ proktaṃ hīnaṃ madhyamamuttamam // Vis_2.6 //
analyzed: maṇḍapam trividham proktam hīnam madhyamam uttamam

original: hīne hīnaṃ tu kartavyaṃ madhyame madhyamaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: hīne hīnam tu kartavyam madhyame madhyamam punar

original: uttame cottamaṃ caiva maṇḍapaṃ vidhinā punaḥ // Vis_2.7 //
analyzed: uttame ca uttamam ca eva maṇḍapam vidhinā punar
pañca uttaradaśam
vā api daśa hastam atha api vā
ṣoḍaśa staṃbha saṃyuktam maṇḍapam kārayet kramāt
adhamam tat vijānīyāt madhyamam śṛṇu suvrata
ṣoḍaśam dvādaśam
vā api madhyamam maṇḍapam viduḥ
caturviṃśati hastāt ca viṃśat hasta antam eva vā
uttamam tat vijñānīyāt sūtra pāta vidhim śṛṇu
prāsāda maṇḍapāt vā api prākārāt vā

original: ekahastaṃ dvihastaṃ vā trihastaṃ vā śacīpate // Vis_2.11 //
analyzed: eka hastam dvi hastam vā tri hastam vā śacīpate
visṛjya deśikaḥ kuryāt pratiṣṭhā maṇḍapam śubham
sarva lakṣaṇa saṃyuktam ācārya icchā anurūpataḥ
pātayet brahmasūtram tu yāvat maṇḍapa gocaram
tri bhāgīkṛtya sūtreṇa rekhāḥ catvāri kārayet
pūrva paścimataḥ ca eva tathā vai dakṣiṇa uttaram

original: trikūṭaṃ kārayitvā tu bhāgaṃ tatra tu kārayet // Vis_2.14 //
analyzed: tri kūṭam kārayitvā tu bhāgam tatra tu kārayet
koṇeṣu ca eva sarveṣu koṇa staṃbhān prakalpayet
sūtra sandhiṣu sarveṣu stambhān anyān prakalpayet
maṇḍapa aṅgāni sarvāṇi ca anyāni tu śacīpate
yuktyā yukti viśeṣeṇa kārayet tu yathāvidhi
catur dvāra samāyuktam vitāna ādyaiḥ vibhūṣitam

original: evaṃ tu maṇḍapaṃ kṛtvā saptāhātpūrvameva tu // Vis_2.17 //
analyzed: evam tu maṇḍapam kṛtvā sapta ahāt pūrvam eva tu
maṇḍapasya anurūpeṇa madhye vedim tu kārayet

original: āmeṣṭakābhiḥ pakvābhiḥ vedikāṃ kārayet kramāt // Vis_2.18 //
analyzed: āma iṣṭakābhiḥ pakvābhiḥ vedikām kārayet kramāt
uttame pi uttamām kuryāt madhyame madhyamām kuru
adhame pi adhamām kṛtvā tad māne puṭa mānataḥ
dvitāka ucchrāya saṃyuktām darpaṇa udara saṃnibhām

original: vedikāṃ kramaśaḥ kṛtvā kuṇḍāni parikalpayet // Vis_2.20 //
analyzed: vedikām kramaśas kṛtvā kuṇḍāni parikalpayet
tri tālam vedikāyām tu dūrībhūtāni sarvaśas

original: catustālaṃ dvitālaṃ vā visṛjya paritaḥ kramāt // Vis_2.21 //
analyzed: catur tālam dvi tālam vā visṛjya paritas kramāt
tri tālam vedikāyāḥ tu visṛjya paritas kramāt

original: catustālaṃ dvitālaṃ vā dūrībhūtāni savarśaḥ?) // Vis_2.21* //
analyzed: catur tālam dvi tālam vā dūrībhūtāni savarśaḥ
kārayet vahnikuṇḍāni sādhakaḥ
prāk pūrvam pratyak saṃsthitam antatas
tasyām āsphālayet paścāt āyatam dakṣiṇa uttaram

original: ekahastaṃ dvihastaṃ vā jñātvā mānaṃ tu lāñchayet // Vis_2.23 //
analyzed: eka hastam dvi hastam vā jñātvā mānam tu lāñchayet
dvābhyām dvābhyām atha ekaikam lāñchayet koṇamatsyakam
diś sūtrāṇi kramāt teṣu prasārya āsphālya yatnataḥ
caturaśrīkṛtam kṣetram catuṣkoṇa samam śubham
catur abhyadhikam viṃśat aṅgulam caturaśrakam

original: sūtreṇa sūtrayitvā tu kṣetraṃ tāvat khanet kṣitim /
analyzed: sūtreṇa sūtrayitvā tu kṣetram tāvat khanet kṣitim

original: tasyārdhaṃ vā khanitvā tu śilpinā kuśalena tu // Vis_2.26 //
analyzed: tasya ardham vā khanitvā tu śilpinā kuśalena tu
kārayet caturaśra ādi kuṇḍāni vidhivat kramāt

original: tālamānena sarvatra kuṇḍāni paritaḥ kramāt // Vis_2.27 //
analyzed: tāla mānena sarvatra kuṇḍāni paritas kramāt
kārayet caturaśra ādi vistāra āyāma tādṛśam samam

original: sūtreṇa sūtrayitvā tu kṣetraṃ tāvat khanet kṣitima // Vis_2.28 //
analyzed: sūtreṇa sūtrayitvā tu kṣetram tāvat khanet kṣitima
khātasya mekhalāḥ kāryāḥ tyaktvā ca eva aṅguli dvayam

original: prathamā sātvikī proktā dvitīyā rājasī matā // Vis_2.29 //
analyzed: prathamā sātvikī proktā dvitīyā rājasī matā
tṛtīyā tāmasī pūrvā dvādaśa aṅgulam ucchritā

original: aṣṭāṅgulā dvitīyā tu tṛtīyā caturaṅgulā // Vis_2.30 //
analyzed: aṣṭa aṅgulā dvitīyā tu tṛtīyā catur aṅgulā
catur aṅgula vistārāḥ sarvāḥ kāryāḥ tu santatam
yoniḥ daśa aṅgulā ramyā ṣaṣ catur dvarī aṅgula agrakā
yoniḥ yoniḥ iva asamā
kārā gaja uṣṭha sadṛśā āpiśī tuvā
kramāt nimnā tu kartavyā catur aṅgulam āyatā

original: mūlaṃ tu tryaṅgulaṃ jñeyamagraṃ tasya ṣaḍaṅgulam /
analyzed: mūlam tu tri aṅgulam jñeyam agram tasya ṣaṣ aṅgulam
eka hasta ādiḥ tasya
kuṇḍasya lakṣaṇam kathitam tu idam

original: dvihaste dviguṇaṃ proktaṃ nābhiścaiva tu mekhalā /
analyzed: dvi haste dviguṇam proktam nābhiḥ ca eva tu mekhalā
eka mekhalakam vā api kuṇḍam saṃkṣepa karmaṇi
kuṇḍa ardham koṇa bhāga ardham diśi ca uttaratas bahis

original: pūrvapaścimato yatnāt lāñchayitvā tu madhyataḥ // Vis_2.35 //
analyzed: pūrva paścimataḥ yatnāt lāñchayitvā tu madhyataḥ
sarvatas bhrāmitam kuṇḍam ardhacandram bhavet sphuṭam
tat kuṇḍam sarva siddhi artham sarva saṃpad vivardhanam
sarva vighna upaśamanam dakṣiṇe kārayet budhaḥ
kuṇḍa ādi evaṃdyava
sthitam sūtram koṇe yat atiricyate

original: tadarthaṃ diśi saṃsthāpya bhrāmitaṃ vartulaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: tad artham diśi saṃsthāpya bhrāmitam vartulam bhavet

original: vṛttaṃ tu paramaṃ jñeyaṃ sarvaduḥkhanivāraṇam // Vis_2.38 //
analyzed: vṛttam tu paramam jñeyam sarva duḥkha nivāraṇam
anāvṛṣṭi bhayam na asti ati vṛṣṭi bhayam tathā

original: padmākāraṃ tu sarvatra mekhalāyāṃ tu vartulam // Vis_2.39 //
analyzed: padma ākāram tu sarvatra mekhalāyām tu vartulam
pratyeka ekam śacī nātha mekhalā upari sādhakaḥ

original: dvādaśaṃ vā dalaṃ likhya cāṣṭapatraṃ sakarṇikam // Vis_2.40 //
analyzed: dvādaśam vā dalam likhya ca aṣṭa patram sa karṇikam
tat kuṇḍam padmam iti uktam sarva śāstra viśāradaiḥ
brahma vṛddhi karam jñeyam yajña svādhyāya vṛddhi dam

original: tathaiva caturaśraṃ tu iti śāstrasya niścayaḥ /
analyzed: tathā eva catur aśram tu iti śāstrasya niścayaḥ
tri koṇam vā abja kuṇḍam vā sādhaka icchā anurūpataḥ
some tu kārayet dhīmān sarva vighna upanāśanam
pañcatriṃśa aṅgulam vā api dvādaśa aṅgulam eva vā
saṃgṛhya ācāryataḥ sūtram prasārya āsphālya yatnataḥ

original: naiṛte hyanile caiva lāñchayet koṇamatsyakam // Vis_2.44 //
analyzed: naiṛte hi anile ca eva lāñchayet koṇamatsyakam
tathā eva lāñchayet aindre tat trikoṇam bhavet śubham

original: kārayedavaṭaṃ dhīmān śilpinā kuśalena tu // Vis_2.45 //
analyzed: kārayet avaṭam dhīmān śilpinā kuśalena tu
kuṇḍeṣu mekhalām paritas kramāt
kārayet tu śacī nātha sādhakaḥ parama artha vid
etat trikoṇam uddiṣṭam śeṣam sādhāraṇam bhavet
kuṇḍa paṅktiḥ samākhyātā prakṛtiḥ triguṇa ātmikā

original: sā yoniḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ siddhyarthaṃ tu śacīpate /
analyzed: sā yoniḥ sarva bhūtānām siddhi artham tu śacīpate
vidyā mantra gaṇānām tu vimukteḥ ca eva kāraṇam
prācyām śiraḥ samākhyātam bāhū koṇe vyavasthitau
aiśānī āgneya saṃjñe tu yaṅghā vāyavya naiṛte
udaram kuṇḍam iti uktam yoniḥ yoniḥ vidhīyate
mekhalā tritayam ca eva guṇatrayam udāhṛtam

original: evaṃ saṃkṣepataḥ proktaṃ kuṇḍānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kramāt /
analyzed: evam saṃkṣepataḥ proktam kuṇḍānām lakṣaṇam kramāt
sruc sruvau maṅgalān ca eva lāni aṣṭau
toraṇāni tathā eva ca
pravakṣyāmi adhunā ca eva teṣām lakṣaṇam ucyate
aśvattha khadira ādyaiḥ vā caturviṃśadbhiḥ
raṅgulaiḥ
pratiṣṭhā ādi utsave ca eva homa artham kārayet sruvam
sapta pañca aṅgulam vā api vistāram caturaśrakam
tri bhāgena bhavet gartam madhye vṛttam su śobhanam

original: tiryagūrdhvaṃ samaṃ vāpi tadardhaṃ vā khanet sruvam (cam?) // Vis_2.54 //
analyzed: tiryak ūrdhvam samam vā api tad ardham vā khanet sruvam
aṅgulasya caturtha aṃśam vyapohya ante vaṭasya tu

original: tasyānte mekhalāṃ samyak gartaṃ vai paritaḥ kramāt // Vis_2.55 //
analyzed: tasya ante mekhalām samyak gartam vai paritas kramāt
kārayet mekhalām ekām utsedham tu tathā eva ca
mekhalāyāḥ tu paritas likhet abja dala ākṛtim
dvādaśa aṣṭa dalam vā api kārayet mekhalā dhare
karṇikām garta madhye tu likhet śilpa pramāṇataḥ
dala ante valayam kuryāt caturaśram samantataḥ
tad aṅgula ardha vistāram kalā bindu vibhūṣitam
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam dvi rekhā yuj samācaret

original: dvādaśāṣṭakamevaṃ vā yathāruci lekhit kramāt // Vis_2.59 //
analyzed: dvādaśa aṣṭakam evam vā yathāruci lekhit kramāt
kaṇṭham tri bhāga vistāram sārdha aṅgula samāyatam

original: dviraṅgulāyataṃ vāpi tadagre tu mukhaṃ bhavet // Vis_2.60 //
analyzed: dvis aṅgula āyatam vā api tad agre tu mukham bhavet
catur aṅgula vistāram pañca aṅgulam atha api vā

original: trikaṃ dvyaṅgulamātraṃ syānmadhye dhārāṃ suśobhanām // Vis_2.61 //
analyzed: trikam dvi aṅgula mātram syāt madhye dhārām su śobhanām
suṣiram kaṇṭha deśe syāt praviśet śibika yathā

original: dhārāyā dakṣiṇe vāme mukhe vṛttaṃ samālikhet // Vis_2.62 //
analyzed: dhārāyāḥ dakṣiṇe vāme mukhe vṛttam samālikhet
kaṇṭha ūrdhve tu likhet āsyam su śobhanam atas param
nāsikā mukham ekam vā varāha ānanam eva ca
vyāghragomukham eva syāt yathāruci samācaret

original: srukpṛṣṭhaṃ śodhayitvā tu parito 'ṣṭadalaṃ likhet // Vis_2.64 //
analyzed: sruc pṛṣṭham śodhayitvā tu ṣṭa dalam likhet
tatas bāhye nyaset dvi aṅgulam eva tu

original: tathaiva daṇḍamūle tu padanyāsaṃ yathāvidhi // Vis_2.65 //
analyzed: tathā eva daṇḍamūle tu pada nyāsam yathāvidhi
aṅguṣṭha aṅgula mānena tad vṛtta aṅghrim samācaret
daṇḍa dvitīya madhya ante tṛtīyasya adhare mbujam
aṣṭa patra samāyuktam ālikhet phalaka āyutam

original: ghṛtādimadhyame bhāge kārayet paritaḥ kramāt // Vis_2.67 //
analyzed: ghṛta ādi madhyame bhāge kārayet paritas kramāt
daṇḍa mūle bja mukulam tri lekhā yuj samācaret
catur abhyadhikam viṃśat aṅgulam tat śacīpate
sruvam tu kārayet paścāt ānanena samanvitam

original: cara(ṣa?)kaṃ dvyaṅgulaṃ vṛttaṃ kartavyaṃ tu suśobhanam // Vis_2.69 //
analyzed: caraṣakam dvi aṅgulam vṛttam kartavyam tu su śobhanam
goṣpadam tu yathā magnam alpa paṅke tathā bhavet
sruva srucaḥ

original: mūle mukhādye ca trirekhā yavamānataḥ // Vis_2.70 //
analyzed: mūle mukha ādye ca tri rekhāḥ yava mānataḥ

original: kārayettu śacīnātha sā ca sruk sarvasiddhidā /
analyzed: kārayet tu śacī nātha sā ca sruc sarva siddhi dā
mukha ādi tri aṅgulam hitvā tad ante ṅghrim samācaret
vṛttam su śobhanam pṛṣṭhe tad deha aṅgula mānataḥ
tathā eva sruva mūle ṅghrim vistāra āyāma tādṛśam
padmasya mukula ākāram sruva mūle kārayet
parasya akṣi aṅghri hīnena
kārayet vā atha sruc sruvau
etat sruc sruvam ākhyātam maṅgala aṣṭakam ucyate

original: lohajānyeva kurvīta alābhe kāṣṭhajāni ca // Vis_2.74 //
analyzed: loha jāni eva kurvīta alābhe kāṣṭha jāni ca

original: aśvatthaṃ vā palāśaṃ vā khadiraṃ vaṭameva vā /
analyzed: aśvattham vā palāśam vā khadiram vaṭam eva vā
pañcaviṃśa aṅgula āyāmam dvādaśa aṅgula vistṛtam

original: dvyaṅgulaṃ tu ghanaṃ jñeyaṃ pīṭhaṃ tu caturaṅgulam /
analyzed: dvi aṅgulam tu ghanam jñeyam pīṭham tu catur aṅgulam
tasya upari likhet padmam aṣṭa patram sa karṇikam

original: śaṅkhaṃ cakraṃ patākaṃ ca śrīvatsaṃ darpaṇaṃ vṛṣam /
analyzed: śaṅkham cakram patākam ca śrīvatsam darpaṇam vṛṣam

original: matsyayugmaṃ ca kumbhaṃ ca maṅgalāṣṭakamiṣyate // Vis_2.77 //
analyzed: matsya yugmam ca kumbham ca maṅgala aṣṭakam iṣyate
dvādaśa aṅgulam āyāmam śaṅkha ādīnām pracakṣate
tad tad rūpa anusāreṇa vistāram kārayet budhaḥ

original: cāmare ca mahādīpe teṣāṃ pārśveṣu kalpayet /
analyzed: cāmare ca mahā dīpe teṣām pārśveṣu kalpayet

original: śaṅkhādimaṅgalānāṃ tu chatraṃ copari vinyaset // Vis_2.79 //
analyzed: śaṅkha ādi maṅgalānām tu chatram ca upari vinyaset

original: adhunā toraṇānāṃ tu vakṣyate lakṣaṇa kramāt /
analyzed: adhunā toraṇānām tu vakṣyate kramāt
aśvattha toraṇam prācyām ṛgvedaḥ ca aindra daivataḥ
audumbaram tathā yāmye yajuḥ ca yama daivatam
nyagrodham tu pratīcyām vai sāmam
varuṇa daivatam
uttare soma daivatyaḥ plakṣaḥ ca ātharvaṇaḥ bhavet

original: aśvatthaṃ vāpyabhāve tu pūrvādi caturodiśi // Vis_2.82 //
analyzed: aśvattham vā api abhāve tu pūrva ādi caturaḥ diśi
kalpayet sva sva nāmnā tu tad tad vṛkṣa svarūpakam
sapta hasta samāyuktam pañca hastam atha api vā
catur hasta āyatam vā api yathāruci samācaret
tad ardham paṭṭikā tiryak tri triśūla samanvitam

original: śūlāyāmaṃ dvitālaṃ vā pādonaṃ vā śacīpate /
analyzed: śūla āyāmam dvi tālam vā pāda ūnam vā śacīpate
pāda śūlam mayā proktam na aham ekādaśa aṅgulam
nava aṅgulam vā deva indra yathāruci samācaret

original: pādau tau paṭṭikā tiryak dvābhyāṃ dvāviṃśadaṅgulam // Vis_2.86 //
analyzed: pādau tau paṭṭikā tiryak dvābhyām dvāviṃśat aṅgulam

original: vattaṃ vā caturaśraṃ vā yuktyā kuryādyathāvidhi /
analyzed: vattam vā caturaśram vā yuktyā kuryāt yathāvidhi

original: toraṇān sthāpayeddvāre svasthāne ca svavṛkṣajān // Vis_2.87 //
analyzed: toraṇān sthāpayet dvāre sva sthāne ca sva vṛkṣa jān

original: khātvā bhūmau dvitālaṃ tu maṇḍape mūlavidyayā /
analyzed: khātvā bhūmau dvi tālam tu maṇḍape mūlavidyayā
atha eka tāla mānam vā khātayet avaṭam dharām
tad tad garteṣu saṃsthāpya toraṇāni yathākramam

original: suśobhanaṃ tu pūrvaṃ syāt subhadraṃ nāma dakṣiṇe // Vis_2.89 //
analyzed: su śobhanam tu pūrvam syāt subhadram nāma dakṣiṇe

original: subandhuṃ vāruṇe caiva suhotraṃ nāma cottare /
analyzed: subandhum vāruṇe ca eva suhotram nāma ca uttare
etad sva nāma mantreṇa pūjayet deśika uttamaḥ
kumudaḥ kumudākṣaḥ ca prācyām dauvārikau smṛtau
dakṣiṇa dvārapāla ākhyau vāmanaḥ
śaṅkukarṇaḥ sarpanetraḥ pratīcyām dvārapālakau
uttara dvārapālau tu sumukhaḥ su pratiṣṭhitaḥ
toraṇa abhyantare sthāpya yathā aṣṭau ca yathādiśi

original: rakte patāke pūrvasyāṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ tu pītake // Vis_2.93 //
analyzed: rakte patāke pūrvasyām dakṣiṇasyām tu pītake
paścime ñjana saṃkāśe śukla varṇe tathā uttare
kumuda ādyān ca bhūta īśān dhvajeṣu parikīrtitān

original: evaṃ saṃkṣepataḥ proktaṃ maṇḍapādi ca sruksruvam /
analyzed: evam saṃkṣepataḥ proktam maṇḍapa ādi ca sruc sruvam
patākā antam śacī nātha dāru saṃgrahaṇam śṛṇu
iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām maṇḍapādilakṣaṇavidhiḥ nāma dvitīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ
tṛtīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ
tṛtīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ viṣvaksenaḥ
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi dāru saṃgrahaṇam param
brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā tu ācāryaḥ śuddha mānasaḥ
ācāryaḥ samalaṃkṛtya nava vastra aṅgulīyakaiḥ
yajamānaḥ śacī nātha śuddha antaḥkaraṇaḥ śuciḥ
śilpinam pūjayitvā tu gandha puṣpa ambara ādibhiḥ
vaiṣṇavān samalaṃkṛtya bhojana ācchādana ādibhiḥ
kuṭhāra ādīni saṃgṛhya vaiṣṇavaiḥ saha mantra vid
śuciḥ nava ambara dharaḥ
ṣṇīṣavān kramāt
nirgacchet vṛkṣam āsādya śilpibhiḥ saha sādhakaḥ

original: aṣṭākṣaraṃ mahāmantraṃ japtvā cāṣṭottaraṃ śatam // Vis_3.5 //
analyzed: aṣṭa akṣaram mahā mantram japtvā ca aṣṭa uttaram śatam
kuśa hastaḥ praṇamya atha dārum paśyet samāhitaḥ

original: śucau tale vivikte tu keśāṅgāravivarjite // Vis_3.6 //
analyzed: śucau tale vivikte tu keśa aṅgāra vivarjite

original: sthāpitaṃ vṛkṣamudvīkṣya taṃ praṇamya hariṃ smaran /
analyzed: sthāpitam vṛkṣam udvīkṣya tam praṇamya harim smaran

original: tadvṛkṣaṃ manasā gṛhya kaṇṭakaṃ parivarjayet // Vis_3.7 //
analyzed: tad vṛkṣam manasā gṛhya kaṇṭakam parivarjayet
kārtikya ādi aṣṭa māseṣu dāru saṃgraham uttamam
ukta kāle mahā prājñaḥ nirīkṣya śubha vṛkṣakam
kaṇṭakāt khadiram grāhyam asāram parivarjayet
vṛkṣānukramaṇam vakṣye saṃkṣepāt sāram uttamam
khadiraḥ devadāruḥ ca badarī candana dvayam
śiṃśupā rājavṛkṣaḥ ca bilvayūpavanaḥ tathā
madhukaḥ lohitaḥ ca eva svandanasvandakaḥ tathā

original: tumbakaṃ caiva śāmalyaṃ śālavṛkṣastathaiva ca // Vis_3.11 //
analyzed: tumbakam ca eva śāmalyam śālavṛkṣaḥ tathā eva ca
asanaḥ vakulaḥ ca eva śirīṣa āmalakaḥ tathā

original: sarve ca yājñikā vṛkṣāḥ pratimārthamudāhṛtāḥ // Vis_3.12 //
analyzed: sarve ca yājñikāḥ vṛkṣāḥ pratimā artham udāhṛtāḥ
sāravantaḥ ca ye ca anye kṛmi kīṭa vivarjitāḥ

original: dagdho 'gninā svayaṃ śuṣkaḥ patitaśca svayaṃ tathā // Vis_3.13 //
analyzed: dagdhaḥ agninā svayam śuṣkaḥ patitaḥ ca svayam tathā

original: tathā cāśaninār dadhaḥ sphuṭito bhinna eva ca /
analyzed: tathā sphuṭitaḥ bhinnaḥ eva ca
dakṣiṇa pravaṇaḥ ca eva varjitāḥ anya deśa jāḥ

original: saṃkalpya pratimāmekāṃ śilāyāṃ vṛkṣa eva vā /
analyzed: saṃkalpya pratimām ekām śilāyām vṛkṣe eva vā
krameṇa parigṛhṇīyāt kartavyā ekā evam atra tu

original: nānyatra pratimāṃ kuryāt kriyā bhavati niṣphalā /
analyzed: na anyatra pratimām kuryāt kriyā bhavati niṣphalā
śilā dārvoḥ tu vakṣyāmi adhivāsa bali kramam
tasya adhastāt dharām paścāt āśāyām maṇḍalam kuru
saṃprokṣya gandha toyena viṣṇugāyatriyā budhaḥ
tad vṛkṣa mūle parigṛhya nava ambaram
ācāryaḥ ca catur dikṣu patākāḥ tatra lambayet
tatra viṣṇum samāvāhya ravi madhya gatam harim
sūktena puruṣeṇa eva pūjayet puruṣottamam
śilā grahaṇa deśe gomayena anulepayet
pūrvavat samalaṃkṛtya chādayet nava vastrakaiḥ
atra pūrva ukta mārgeṇa pūjayet harim avyayam
tad pūrva bhāge tantra jñaḥ sāyāhne ca adhivāsayet
catur dikṣu mahā dīpam prajvālya akṣata dhūpakaiḥ
alaṃkṛtya janān sarvān ūrdhva puṇḍra dhara unmukhān
ācāryaḥ kumbham ādāya sūtra veṣṭitam
aśvattha pallavaiḥ yuktam sa ratnam toya saṃyutam
vastra yugmena saṃveṣṭya dhānya rāśau vinikṣipet
tasmin brahmāṇam abhyarcya nyaset
sa apidhānān sa vastrān ca dhānya rāśau pṛthak nyaset
indra ādi īśāna paryantam dikpatīn arcayet kramāt
pūrva ādi soma paryantam homa karma samācaret
vāsudeva ādi mūrtīnām sva nāmnā ca pṛthak pṛtham
samidh ājya carūn ca eva aṣṭāttaraśatam kramāt
juhuyāt vahni jihvāyām vāsudeva ādi vidyayā
pūrṇāhutim tatas hutvā śeṣam asmin na vidyate
uttare smin mahā mantretantre
vaiṣṇavīkaraṇam kramāt
saṃproktam nāradasya eva tadvat utpādayet iha

original: utpādya vaiṣṇavāgniṃ tu tadagnau homamācaret // Vis_3.29 //
analyzed: utpādya vaiṣṇava agnim tu tad agnau homam ācaret
athavā pūrva bhāge tu caturmūrtim anusmaran
kārayet homa karmāṇi pūrva agnau pūrvavat kramāt
paritas bali dānam tu bhūta krūra balim kṣipet

original: puṇyāhaṃ vācayitvā tu ādāvante tu ca kramāt /
analyzed: puṇyāham vācayitvā tu ādau ante tu ca kramāt
kuṭhāram nava vastra ādyaiḥ alaṃkṛtya adhivāsayet
droṇa taṇḍula madhye tu padma aṣṭadalam likhet
tad madhye śāyayet astramantreṇa aṣṭa akṣareṇa vā
nava vastreṇa saṃchādya sādhakaḥ mantra vittamaḥ
gandha puṣpa ādinā abhyarcya mantreṇa astreṇa mantra vid
ācāryaḥ susthitaḥ bhūtvā imam mantram udīrayet

original: oṃ namaḥ sarvalokāya viṣṇave prabhaviṣṇave // Vis_3.35 //
analyzed: om namaḥ sarva lokāya viṣṇave prabhaviṣṇave
viśvāya viśvarūpāya svapna adhipataye namaḥ

original: rakṣaḥ piśācā nāgāśca ye 'tra tiṣṭhanti nityaśaḥ // Vis_3.36 //
analyzed: rakṣaḥ piśācāḥ nāgāḥ ca ye tra tiṣṭhanti nityaśas

original: vyapagacchantu te sarve sannidhattāṃ sadā hariḥ /
analyzed: vyapagacchantu te sarve sannidhattām sadā hariḥ
hati uktvā svapnam ākāṅkṣan paścime śāyayet niśi
śubha aśubham nirīkṣya atra svapnādhyāye prakīrtitam
adarśane pi gṛhṇīyāt viparīte nivartayet
ācāryaḥ prātar utthāya vidhivat snānam ācaret

original: vṛkṣamūle śilāyāṃ vā kumbhamādāya mantravit // Vis_3.39 //
analyzed: vṛkṣa mūle śilāyām vā kumbham ādāya mantra vid
abhiṣicya astra mantreṇa sudarśanam anuttamam
sahasrāra iti saṃkīrtya huṃkāram tad anantaram
phaṭkāra antam mahā hetim sudarśanam akhaṇḍitam
astrarājasya mantraḥ yam śrī kīrti jaya dam param
abhiṣicya tris ācamya paridhāya āyapya
nava ambaraiḥ
arcayet gandha puṣpa ādyaiḥ sāntvanam tu samācaret

original: vṛkṣa lokasya śāntyarthaṃ gaccha devālayaṃ śubham /
analyzed: vṛkṣa lokasya śānti artham gaccha devālayam śubham
deva tvam yāsyate tatra dāha cheda vivarjitaḥ
jala puṣpa pradānena su dhūpaiḥ balibhiḥ tathā

original: lokāstvāṃ pūjayiṣyanti tato yāsyasi nirvṛtim // Vis_3.44 //
analyzed: lokāḥ tvām pūjayiṣyanti tatas yāsyasi nirvṛtim

original: evaṃ tu sāntvanaṃ kṛtvā vṛkṣamūlasthito mukhaḥ(?) /
analyzed: evam tu sāntvanam kṛtvā vṛkṣa mūla sthitaḥ mukhaḥ

original: śilāyāmapi kartavyaṃ sāntvanaṃ tu śacīpate // Vis_3.45 //
analyzed: śilāyām api kartavyam sāntvanam tu śacīpate

original: śilānāma samuccārya sāntvanaṃ tu śilā bhavet (?) /
analyzed: śilā nāma samuccārya sāntvanam tu śilā bhavet

original: kuṭhāraṃ tu namaskṛtya mantreṇāstreṇa sādhakaḥ // Vis_3.46 //
analyzed: kuṭhāram tu namaskṛtya mantreṇa astreṇa sādhakaḥ
tam samādāya hastābhyām vṛkṣam
punar punar

original: evaṃ dārumayaṃ gṛhya vane vanacaraiḥ saha // Vis_3.47 //
analyzed: evam dāru mayam gṛhya vane vana caraiḥ saha
śaṅkha tūrya ādi nādaiḥ tu paṭahaiḥ tāla nisvanaiḥ
geya nṛtta samāyuktam ālayam tu vrajet kramāt

original: yadā dārumayaṃ gṛhya tadā prabhṛti nityaśaḥ /
analyzed: yadā dāru mayam gṛhya tadā prabhṛti nityaśas
pratimām kārayet tatra tad karmāntam haviṣya bhuj
karma antaram na kurvīta yajamānaḥ samāhitaḥ
śilpa ācāryasya vaṃśyaḥ ca śāstra prāmāṇya kovidaḥ
sāra asāram parīkṣya atra śilpinā kuśalena tu
tasya abhāve śacī nātha dāru saṃgrahaṇam śṛṇu

original: brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vāpi vaiśyo vā śūdra eva vā /
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyaḥ vā api vaiśyaḥ vā śūdraḥ eva vā

original: tān samānīya mantrajño mūlavidyāḥ pradāpayet // Vis_3.52 //
analyzed: tān samānīya mantra jñaḥ mūlavidyāḥ pradāpayet

original: taṃ gṛhītvā racīnātha vṛkṣārthaṃ tu vrajedvane /
analyzed: tam gṛhītvā racīnā atha vṛkṣa artham tu vrajet vane
vaiṣṇavān bhagavat bhaktān balinaḥ karma tatparān
nirgacchet vanam āsādya chitvā vṛkṣam harim smaran

original: tadvṛkṣaṃ śirasi sthāpya smarannārāyaṇaṃ prabhum // Vis_3.54 //
analyzed: tad vṛkṣam śirasi sthāpya smaran nārāyaṇam prabhum
tatas yāga gṛham gacchet śaṅkha tūrya ādibhiḥ saha

original: mūlālayasya pūrve tu pūrṇakumbhaṃ nidhāpayet // Vis_3.55 //
analyzed: mūla ālayasya pūrve tu pūrṇa kumbham nidhāpayet
aśvattha pallavaiḥ yuktam sa apidhānam sa vastrakam
sa toyam ratna saṃyuktam sthāpayet dhānya rāśiṣu
tad kumbhe ca ānayet mantrān mūlamantra ādikān kramāt

original: tathā puraṣasūktaṃ tu japedvai vaiṣṇavaiḥ saha /
analyzed: tathā puraṣa sūktam tu japet vai vaiṣṇavaiḥ saha
kumbha antara gata aṃbhaḥsu viṣṇum sakalam avyayam
dhyātvā gandha ādinā abhyarcya sūktena puruṣeṇa ca
kumbhasya pūrva bhāge tu gomayena anulepayet
droṇa dvayam tad ardham vā vikiret taṇḍulān kramāt
tad madhye ṣṭadalam padmam likhya anāmikayā api ca
aṣṭa akṣaram mahā mantram karṇikā ādiṣu yojayet

original: tatra madhye tu kuṃbhasya saṃprokṣyāstreṇa mantrataḥ // Vis_3.61 //
analyzed: tatra madhye tu kuṃbhasya saṃprokṣya astreṇa mantrataḥ
prokṣayet mūlamantreṇa kambu udara jalaiḥ punar
punar punar tridhā prokṣya viṣṇu rūpam anusmaran
pañca upaniṣadaiḥ mantraiḥ punar prokṣya samāhitaḥ
saṃprokṣya mūlamantrābhyām sādhakaḥ
pūrva adhivāsitaiḥ mantraiḥ snāpayet dārum uttamam
su dhūpa gandha puṣpa ādyaiḥ arcayet pūrvavat kramāt
nava vastreṇa saṃchādya paritas balim ācaret
sudarśanena mantreṇa pūrva ādi krama yogataḥ
haviṣā bali dānam tu sarva śānti artham eva ca
tat balim śubha dam ṛddhim viddhi
tasmāt sarva prayatnena balim asmin samācaret

original: prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāmālayaṃ tu paribhramet // Vis_3.67 //
analyzed: prabhātāyām tu śarvaryām ālayam tu paribhramet
śaṅkha tūrya ādi saṃyuktam gṛhītvā vṛkṣam uttamam
vaiṣṇavaiḥ saha śiṣyaiḥ tu ācāryaḥ mantra vittamaḥ

original: garbhagehe tu saṃsthāpya kavāṭaṃ bandhayet punaḥ /
analyzed: garbha gehe tu saṃsthāpya kavāṭam bandhayet punar

original: trirātraṃ pañcarātraṃ vā saptarātramathāpi vā // Vis_3.69 //
analyzed: tri rātram pañca rātram vā sapta rātram atha api vā

original: navarātraṃ tu vā cāsmin kavāṭaṃ na vimocayet /
analyzed: nava rātram tu vā ca asmin kavāṭam na vimocayet
aṅkura arpaṇam ārabhya tad rātrau tu śacīpate
ālaya īśāna bhāge tu dakṣiṇe ca uttare vā

original: maṇḍapaṃ vātha kūṭaṃ vā prapāṃ vākalpya sādhakaḥ // Vis_3.71 //
analyzed: maṇḍapam vā atha kūṭam vā prapām vā ā kalpya sādhakaḥ
vitāna vastra saṃchannam alaṃkāraiḥ alaṃkṛtam
muktā dāma samāyuktam puṣpa mālyaiḥ alaṃkṛtam
pālikā ca aṅkura uṅkurakaḥ
nālikerulaiḥ yuktam cāmaraiḥ upaśobhitam
evam lakṣaṇa saṃyuktam maṇḍapam ca ānayet tarum
aparāhṇe śacī nātha vaiṣṇavaiḥ saha mantra vid
śaṅkha tūrya ādi saṃyuktam nṛtta geya samanvitam
garbhageham samāsādya kavāṭam pravimocayet
dārum abhyarcya gandha ādyaiḥ mūlamantram anusmaran

original: saṃprokṣya gandhatoyena puṇyāhaṃ kārayet sudhīḥ // Vis_3.76 //
analyzed: saṃprokṣya gandha toyena puṇyāham kārayet sudhīḥ
maṇḍape madhya bhāge tu kramāt

original: dvihastaṃ vā tadardhaṃ vā tasyārdhaṃ vā śacīpate // Vis_3.77 //
analyzed: dvi hastam vā tad ardham vā tasya ardham vā śacīpate
pradhāna tarum ādāya mantreṇa astreṇa sādhakaḥ

original: sthāpayenmūlamantreṇa dakṣiṇe tu śriyaṃ nyaset // Vis_3.78 //
analyzed: sthāpayet mūlamantreṇa dakṣiṇe tu śriyam nyaset

original: uttare tu nyaset puṣṭiṃ tattanmūlaṃ yathākramam /
analyzed: uttare tu nyaset puṣṭim tad tad mūlam yathākramam
saṃvatsara sahasra āyuḥ gatam smṛtya tarum param
tad mūle salilam nyasya puṇḍarīkākṣa vidyayā
tad tad mūlena vā paścāt jala dānam yathāruci
sita puṣpaiḥ samārādhya tasmāt sakalam avyayam

original: mantrahīnaṃ kriyāhīnaṃ sarvaṃ vai kṣantumarhasi // Vis_3.81 //
analyzed: mantra hīnam kriyā hīnam sarvam vai kṣantum arhasi
evam uktvā namaskṛtya dāru mūlam tu mantra vid

original: evaṃ kṛtvā tato dārusaṃgrahaṃ punarārabhet // Vis_3.82 //
analyzed: evam kṛtvā tatas dāru saṃgraham punar ārabhet
adhivāsa ādi sarvāṇi ca asmin pūrvavat ācaret
śilpinam pūjayitvā tu dārum chidya tvā
panuḥ punar
tena eva taiḥ eva
vaiṣṇavaiḥ yuktaḥ mūlamūrtim anusmaran
anyathā phalam āpnoti grāma nāśaḥ dhana kṣayaḥ
sthāna nāśaḥ bhavet tatra saṃbhavet na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: evaṃ dārumayaṃ gṛhya punaḥsaṃskāravat kramāt // Vis_3.85 //
analyzed: evam dāru mayam gṛhya punar saṃskāra vat kramāt
śilpa śāstra anusāreṇa kārayet mūlam uttamam
ācāryam pūjayet paścāt hema vastra aṅgulīyakaiḥ
tathā eva śilpinam pūjya śilā grahaṇam ārabhet
iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām dārusaṃgrahaṇavidhiḥ nāma tṛtīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ
caturthaḥ dhyāyaḥ
caturthaḥ dhyāyaḥ viṣvaksenaḥ
atas param pravakṣyāmi śilā grahaṇam uttamam

original: dvividhā tu śilā grāhyā parvateṣu dharāsu ca // Vis_4.1 //
analyzed: dvividhā tu śilā grāhyā parvateṣu dharāsu ca

original: parvatān prathamaṃ vakṣye yeṣu śaileṣu gṛhyate /
analyzed: parvatān prathamam vakṣye yeṣu śaileṣu gṛhyate
trikūṭaḥ hemakūṭaḥ ca kailāsaḥ giri sattamaḥ
mandaraḥ mālyavān ca eva niṣadhaḥ nīlaparvataḥ

original: meruḥ sahyaśca vindhyaśca kiṣkindho girisattamaḥ // Vis_4.3 //
analyzed: meruḥ sahyaḥ ca vindhyaḥ ca kiṣkindhaḥ giri sattamaḥ
veṅkaṭaḥ dardaraḥ ca eva śrīgiriḥ citrakūṭakaḥ

original: evaṃbhūtān samanvīkṣya purataḥ praṇamet sadā // Vis_4.4 //
analyzed: evaṃbhūtān samanvīkṣya puratas praṇamet sadā
patram puṣpam samādāya nikṣipet giri mūlake

original: namaskṛtya hariṃ dhyātvā parvataṃ pāpanāśanam // Vis_4.5 //
analyzed: namaskṛtya harim dhyātvā parvatam pāpa nāśanam
adhivāsanāni sarvāṇi karmāṇi
asmin pūrvavat ācaret

original: bhūgatā yāḥ śilāḥ proktāḥ tāsāṃ lakṣaṇamucyate // Vis_4.6 //
analyzed: bhū gatāḥ yāḥ śilāḥ proktāḥ tāsām lakṣaṇam ucyate

original: vāruṇī caiva māhendrī āgneyī vāyavī tathā /
analyzed: vāruṇī ca eva māhendrī āgneyī vāyavī tathā
catura catasra
stu śilāḥ proktāḥ tāsām lakṣaṇam ucyate
yā puṣpa vana saṃkīrṇā jalāśaya samāyu vṛtā

original: sā kṣitirvāruṇī jñeyā śilā tatra tu vāruṇī // Vis_4.8 //
analyzed: sā kṣitiḥ vāruṇī jñeyā śilā tatra tu vāruṇī
yasyāḥ ca uttara saṃsthāyāḥ vrīhi kṣetram tu dakṣiṇe

original: paścime kṣīravṛkṣāśca sā māhendrī prakīrtitā // Vis_4.9 //
analyzed: paścime kṣīravṛkṣāḥ ca sā māhendrī prakīrtitā
palāśāḥ khadirāḥ vṛkṣāḥ kāśmaryaḥ puṣparyaḥ ca eva dakṣiṇe
tittiryaḥ ca kapotāḥ ca gṛdhrāḥ ca eva vasā aśanāḥ
bhramarāḥ ca varāhāḥ ca dṛśyante yatra santatam adm
toyam antargata antam
su alpa aṃlpam
tām āgneyīm pracakṣate
bilva śleṣmātaka ākīrṇā tathā snuhi vibhītake

original: sṛgālā yatra dṛśyante tathaiva mṛgatṛṣṇikā // Vis_4.12 //
analyzed: sṛgālāḥ yatra dṛśyante tathā eva mṛgatṛṣṇikā
tṛṇa udaka vihīnā ca śarkarā ūṣara saṃyutā

original: vāyavī sā kṣitiḥ proktā śilāṃ tatra tu varjayet // Vis_4.13 //
analyzed: vāyavī sā kṣitiḥ proktā śilām tatra tu varjayet
nadī tīre hrada taṭe lavaṇa uda pariplute

original: grāmamadhye śmaśāne ca tathā caiva catuṣpathe // Vis_4.14 //
analyzed: grāma madhye śmaśāne ca tathā ca eva catuṣpathe
amedhya bhūmau valmīke ūṣare śava dūṣite

original: vāyusūryāgnidagdhe ca na grāhyāstu śilāḥsadā // Vis_4.15 //
analyzed: vāyu sūrya agni dagdhe ca na grāhyāḥ tu śilāḥ sadā
varjitābhiḥ śilābhiḥ yaḥ pratimām lobha mohitaḥ
kuryāt vā kārayet vā api tasya syāt ābhicārikam
tu nirgacchet ācāryaḥ śilpibhiḥ saha

original: brāhmaṇān bhojayitvādau taiḥ kṛtvā svastivācanam // Vis_4.17 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā ādau taiḥ kṛtvā svastivācanam
ayaḥ kuṭha ādi saṃgṛhya prāc mukhaḥ vā api udak mukhaḥ

original: nirgatastu śilāṃ paśyet tadā prabhṛti nityaśaḥ // Vis_4.18 //
analyzed: nirgataḥ tu śilām paśyet tadā prabhṛti nityaśas
pratimā karma kurvīta tad karma antam haviṣya bhuj
dāru saṃgrahaṇa adhyāye saṃproktam ca adhivāsanam

original: tasmin sarvaṃ prayoktavyaṃ viśeṣaṃ kathayāmi te /
analyzed: tasmin sarvam prayoktavyam viśeṣam kathayāmi te

original: śilpibhiśca bhuvaṃ khātvā śilāṃ paśyet samāhitaḥ // Vis_4.20 //
analyzed: śilpibhiḥ ca bhuvam khātvā śilām paśyet samāhitaḥ
dakṣiṇa uttaram āyāmam tathā vai pūrva paścimam
śānti dā dakṣiṇa grīvā pūrva grīvā ajaya pradā
śrī karī paścima grīvā kartuḥ bhavati nityadā

original: puṣṭidā cottaragrīvā koṇaṃ tu parivarjayet // Vis_4.22 //
analyzed: puṣṭi dā ca uttara grīvā koṇam tu parivarjayet
utpāṭyamāne dṛśyante sphuliṅgāḥ yatra ca agni vat
nādāḥ ca kāṃsya ghaṇṭā vat śilāyāḥ ca śiraḥ matam
kāṃsya vat madhya bhāge tu mūle vai kāṃsya tāla vat

original: dhvaniryasyāḥ śilāyāstu sā pumāniti kīrtitā // Vis_4.24 //
analyzed: dhvaniḥ yasyāḥ śilāyāḥ tu sā pumān iti kīrtitā
tasmāt kiñcid vihīnā tu chidrāyāḥ ca dhvaniḥ bhavet

original: sā śilā strīti vijñeyā taddhīnā syānnapuṃsakam // Vis_4.25 //
analyzed: sā śilā strī iti vijñeyā tad hīnā syāt napuṃsakam
ratna nyāsāt adhastāt tu napuṃsakam udāhṛtam

original: tatra garbhaṃ parīkṣeta chedane bhedane 'pi ca /
analyzed: tatra garbham parīkṣeta chedane bhedane ca

original: maṇḍalā yatra dṛśyante tatra garbhaṃ vinirdiśet // Vis_4.27 //
analyzed: maṇḍalāḥ yatra dṛśyante tatra garbham vinirdiśet
māñjiṣṭha varṇa sadṛśe darduraḥ tatra saṃbhave
pītake maṇḍale goṣṇā godhā
kṛṣṇe kṛṣṇa ahiḥ eva ca
kapile mūṣikaḥ proktaḥ kṛkalāsaḥ tathā aruṇe
gula varṇe tu pāṣāṇaḥ
kuambhaḥ kṛpāṇa sadṛśe vālukāḥ padma saṃnibhe

original: vicitre vṛściko jñeyo nīlapīte pataṅgakaḥ // Vis_4.30 //

analyzed: madhu varṇe tu khadyotaḥ maṇḍale nirdiśet budhaḥ
garbha darśana doṣān tu punar vakṣye yathātatham
dardure syāt anārogyam godhāyām durgata ūtiḥ bhavet

original: viṣeṇa mriyate sarpe anapatyastu mūṣike // Vis_4.32 //
analyzed: viṣeṇa mriyate sarpe anapatyaḥ tu mūṣike
kṛkalāse yata
pāṣāṇe śaninā vadhaḥ

original: gaulikāyāṃ dhanāpāyo jale vai garbhanāśanam // Vis_4.33 //
analyzed: gaulikāyām dhana apāyaḥ jale vai garbha nāśanam
sikātāsu jala abhāvaḥ vṛścike kalahaḥ tathā

original: śalabhe rāṣṭranāśaḥ syāt khadyote ca kulakṣayaḥ // Vis_4.34 //
analyzed: śalabhe rāṣṭra nāśaḥ syāt khadyote ca kula kṣayaḥ
tasmāt yatnāt parīkṣeta nityam garbham atandritaḥ

original: garbheṇa sahitāṃ lobhāt pratimāṃ kurute yadi // Vis_4.35 //
analyzed: garbheṇa sahitām lobhāt pratimām kurute yadi
tad maṇḍala adhipaḥ rājā kārakaḥ sthāpakaḥ tathā
unmūmilāḥ bhavanti ete tasmāt garbham viśodhayet
maṇi jāḥ loha jāḥ ca eva dāru jāḥ vā śacīpate
garbhāgarbham avekṣeta nityam vṛddhi śubha pradā
asmin tantra uttare bhāge pramimā lakṣaṇam kramāt
nāradasya dāya
mayā proktam guhyāt guhyam anuttamam
tasmāt pūrva uttaram jñātvā pramimām kārayet kramāt

original: evaṃ śailavidhiḥ proktaḥ sārātsāra anuttamaḥ // Vis_4.39 //
analyzed: evam śaila vidhiḥ proktaḥ sārāt sāraḥ anuttamaḥ
iti śrī pāñcarātra viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām śilāsaṃgrahaṇavidhiḥ nāma caturthaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pañcamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pañcamaḥ dhyāyaḥ viṣvaksenaḥ
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi śūla sthāpanam uttamam
sthāpayet pratimā śūlam ratna nyāsasya coḥ tathā upari
khadira ādīni gṛhṇīyāt yājñikāni viśeṣataḥ

original: tallakṣaṇaṃ pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu pūrvaṃ śacīpate // Vis_5.2 //
analyzed: tad lakṣaṇam pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu pūrvam śacīpate
pañca uttara dvipañcāśat sa pādam aṅgulam
śūlam ucpate
rahitam vṛkṣa doṣaiḥ tu mitam aṅgulibhiḥ kramāt
dvi ṣaṭka dvi aṅgula yutam mukham proktam pramāṇataḥ

original: bhāgaḥ sapādakaṃ vā syādadhastāt saptaviṃśatiḥ // Vis_5.4 //
analyzed: bhāgaḥ sa pādakam vā syāt adhastāt saptaviṃśatiḥ
nābheḥ adhomukham proktam ardha aṅguli samāyutam
ūrudaṇḍasya ca āyāmaḥ pañcaviṃśa aṅgulaḥ bhavet
bhāgaḥ sapādam jānuḥ syāt jaṅghā ca ūru samāyutā
golaka dvayam uddiṣṭam adhastāt dvi antaram tathā
vakṣaḥ daṇḍasya vistāraḥ pañcaviṃśa aṅgulaḥ bhavet
kaṭidaṇḍasya vistāraḥ ṣoḍaśa aṅgulaḥ ucyate
āyāmaḥ bāhu daṇḍasya pañcaviṃśa aṅgulaḥ bhavet
para bāhvoḥ tu bhavet saptadaśa aṅgulam
maṇibandhaḥ kalāyāmaḥ bandhakān pratimaskaram

original: āyāmo madhyamāṅgulyāṃ pañcāṅgula iti smṛtaḥ // Vis_5.9 //
analyzed: āyāmaḥ madhyama aṅgulyām pañca aṅgulaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
etad pramāṇam śūlam syāt uktam anyat nirīkṣyate tu

original: devīnāṃ tu śacīnātha śūlānuktān prayojayet // Vis_5.10 //
analyzed: devīnām tu śacīn atha śūlān uktān prayojayet
śilpa śāstra anusāreṇa kārayet śūla lakṣaṇam uttamam
śūla mṛd paṭa raju ādi jīrṇam ced tu śacīpate
punar anyat samutpādya pūrva uktena eva kārayet
hīna adhikam na kartavyam jīrṇa daṇḍa vat ācaret
evam etat mayā proktam
jīrṇa uddhāraṇa karmaṇi
yuktyā yukti viśeṣeṇa kriyate smin atandritaiḥ
śūla adhivāsana ādīni pravakṣyāmi śacīpate
śṛṇuṣva ekāgra cittena viviktena mayā adhunā
prāsādasya agratas kuryāt maṇḍapam caturaśrakam
catur dvāra samāyuktam catur toraṇa bhūṣitam
vitāna vastra saṃchannam alaṃkāraiḥ alaṃkṛtam

original: pañcottaraśataṃ hastaṃ vistāraṃ tāvadeva tu // Vis_5.16 //
analyzed: pañcottaraśatam hastam vistāram tāvat eva tu
tad madhye vedikām kṛtvā daśa tāla pramāṇataḥ

original: daśahastaṃ bhavedvāpi dvādaśaṃ vā śacīpate // Vis_5.17 //
analyzed: daśa hastam bhavet vā api dvādaśam vā śacīpate
tad maṇḍapam dvedikām

original: tridhā kṛtvā madhye vediṃ tu kārayet /
analyzed: tridhā kṛtvā madhye vedim tu kārayet
daśa tāla vihīnena pramāṇena
kārayet vedim uttamām
tāla dvaya ucchritām vedim darpaṇa udara saṃnibhām

original: vedikāṃ kramaśaḥ kṛtvā samyakkuṇḍāni kalpayet // Vis_5.19 //
analyzed: vedikām kramaśas kṛtvā samyak kuṇḍāni kalpayet
catur tālam tri tālam vā dūrībhūtāni sarvaśas

original: vedikāyāṃ tu paritaḥ caturaśrādi kalpayet // Vis_5.20 //
analyzed: vedikāyām tu paritas caturaśra ādi kalpayet
sthaṇḍile vā prakartavyam śūla sthāpana karmaṇi

original: kṛtvaivaṃ maṇḍapaṃ samyak prapāṃ vāsmin samācaret // Vis_5.21 //
analyzed: kṛtvā evam maṇḍapam samyak prapām vā asmin samācaret
aṅkura arpaṇa pūrvam tu sthāpayet śūlam uttamam

original: śulādi devadevītvāpyūhaṃ kṛtvā krameṇa tu // Vis_5.22 //
analyzed: śula ādi devadevī tvā api ūham kṛtvā krameṇa tu
tri rātram eka rātram vā jala vāsam prakalpayet

original: jalādhivāsanaṃ guhyaṃ śṛṇu śakra śacīpate // Vis_5.23 //
analyzed: jala adhivāsanam guhyam śṛṇu śakra śacīpate

original: nadyāṃ vātha taṭāke vā nirjhare vā śacīpate /
analyzed: nadyām vā atha taṭāke vā nirjhare vā śacīpate
samudra gāminī nadyām
jala vāsam samācaret
tasmin manorame tīre saṃsthāpya harim avyayam

original: śūlamadhye hariṃ dhyātvā sādhakaḥ paramārthavit // Vis_5.25 //
analyzed: śūla madhye harim dhyātvā sādhakaḥ parama artha vid
kevalam loha bimbam vā sthāpayet sādhaka uttamaḥ
arghya pādya ādinā abhyarcya nyāsa karma samārabhet
aṣṭa akṣaram mahā mantram jñātvā mantra vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: nyāsaṃ kṛtvā svadehe tu paścāddeve nyaset kramāt // Vis_5.27 //
analyzed: nyāsam kṛtvā sva dehe tu paścāt deve nyaset kramāt
sṛṣṭi nyāsam nyaset tasmin saṃhāram na smaret iha

original: ṣaḍakṣaraṃ nyaseddhīmān sthitinyāsaṃ nyaset kramāt // Vis_5.28 //
analyzed: ṣaḍakṣaram nyaset dhīmān sthiti nyāsam nyaset kramāt
deva agre tu tatas bhūmim gomayena anulepayet
tad madhye śālīn āstīrya ca aṣṭa patra abjakam likhet
pañcagavyam nyaset madhye karṇikāyām śacīpate

original: pūrve gandhodakaṃ nyasya dakṣiṇe puṣpatoyakam // Vis_5.30 //
analyzed: pūrve gandha udakam nyasya dakṣiṇe puṣpa toyakam
paścime nālikera ambhaḥ ca uttare tu kuśa udakam

original: āgneyyāṃ dadhi vinyasya naiṛte kṣīrameva ca // Vis_5.31 //
analyzed: āgneyyām dadhi vinyasya naiṛte kṣīram eva ca

original: vāyavye maṅgalodaṃ tu aiśāne tu yavodakam /
analyzed: vāyavye maṅgala udam tu aiśāne tu yava udakam

original: evaṃ tu navakaṃ cābjamadhye saṃsthāpayet kramāt // Vis_5.32 //
analyzed: evam tu navakam ca abja madhye saṃsthāpayet kramāt
padmasya paritas ca aṣṭau lokapālān prakalpayet
pratyekam kalaśasya antar toyam saṃsthāpayet kramāt
nava vastraiḥ ca saṃchādya kalaśānām tathā upari
pratyeka ekam tribhiḥ vā api nava vastram śacīpate
puṇyāham vācayitvā tu svasti sūktam tathā uccaret
gandha puṣpa ādinā abhyarcya sva nāmnā mantra vittamaḥ
smaran nārāyaṇam paścāt snāpayet krama yogataḥ
pañcagavya ādi kalaśān pūrvavat parameṣṭhinā
puṣpa mālyaiḥ alaṃkṛtya citra vastraiḥ tu veṣṭayet
gandha puṣpa ādinā abhyarcya smaran nārāyaṇam prabhum
jala madhye prapām kṛtvā vitānaiḥ upaśobhitām

original: saptahastasamāṃ vāpi pañcahastasamāṃ tu vā // Vis_5.38 //
analyzed: sapta hasta samām vā api pañca hasta samām tu vā
darbha sūtraiḥ tu saṃveṣṭya punar mālyaiḥ tu veṣṭayet

original: caturhastaṃ tu devendra vistārāyāmatādṛśam(taḥ samam?) // Vis_5.39 //
analyzed: catur hastam tu deva indra samam
darbha mālā samāyuktam muktā dāmaiḥ anvitam
puṣpa mālyaiḥ alaṃkṛtya patākaiḥ upaśasā ubhitam
evam prapām alaṃkṛtya tad madhye ca āsanam nyaset
catuṣpāda samāyuktam kāṣṭha āsanam anuttamam
tad madhye devam āvāhya kṣīrārṇavam anusmaran
śāyayet tu śacī nātha mūrtimantreṇa mantra vid
prāc śīrṣam dakṣiṇe vā atha śāyayet
pañca upaniṣadam jñātvā ācāryaḥ tantra pāragaḥ
puruṣeṇa tatas gandha puṣpa ādyaiḥ arcayet harim
lokapāla aṣṭa kalaśān devasya paritas nyaset
sva nāmnā pūjayet sarvān indra ādi krama yogataḥ
praṇava ādi namaḥ ntena ghaṇṭā śabda samanvitam
gandhā arghyā
didīpa paryantam sādhakaḥ parama artha vid

original: tāṃ prapāṃ paritaścāṣṭadigbaliṃ kārayet kramāt // Vis_5.46 //
analyzed: tām prapām paritas ca aṣṭa diś balim kārayet kramāt
anena lokapālān tu smaran tantra vidām varaḥ
gandha puṣpa ādinā abhyarcya uktam anyena
śacīpate mayā proktaḥ jala vāsa vidhiḥ kramāt
apare hani devendra aparāhṇe samāhitaḥ
jalāt uttīrya tantra jñaḥ śaṅkha bherī ādibhiḥ saha
saṃpūjayet tayaḥ devam alaṃkṛtya sraj ādibhiḥ
maṇḍapa īśāna bhāge tu sthāpayet snāna maṇḍape

original: snapanaṃ vidhivat kṛtvā gandhādyairarcayet kramāt // Vis_5.50 //
analyzed: snapanam vidhivat kṛtvā gandha ādyaiḥ arcayet kramāt

original: uttare 'smin mayā proktaṃ tantre tu snapanaṃ kramāt /
analyzed: uttare smin mayā proktam tantre tu snapanam kramāt

original: tatkramaṃ snāpayitvā tu kalpayecchayanaṃ kramāt // Vis_5.51 //
analyzed: tad kramam snāpayitvā tu kalpayet śayanam kramāt
śayanam kalpayitvā tu śāyayet śūla saṃcayam

original: tanmadhye devaśūlaṃ tu devīśūlaṃ tu pārśvayoḥ // Vis_5.52 //
analyzed: tad madhye deva śūlam tu devī śūlam tu pārśvayoḥ
vastraiḥ saṃchādayet śūlān gandha puṣpaiḥ samarcayet
sūktena pupau
ruṣeṇa eva sṛṣṭinyāsam tatas nyaset
saṃhāraḥ na iṣyate tasmin tatvāni viniyojaye
mūlaprakṛti mahat ahaṅkāra ākāśa vāyu vahṇi vāri vasundharā vāc pāṇi pāda pāyu upastha śrotra tvac cakṣuḥ jihvā ghrāṇa manaḥ prāṇa apāna vyāna udāna samāna jīvāḥ pañcaviṃśati tattvāni

original: evaṃ tattvāni vinyasya tannāmāni niyojayet // Vis_5.54 //
analyzed: evam tattvāni vinyasya tad nāmāni niyojayet
tatas tu vedikāyām tu pūrva ādi krama yogataḥ
sthāpayet pūrṇa kumbhān tu dhānya rāśau samāhitaḥ
varāha ādīn samabhyarcya sva nāmnā aṣṭadale ghaṭe ca
na iṣyate vedikāyām tu brahmakumbha adhivāsanam
nyāsa bhedāni sarvāṇi anuktam na smaret iha
arghya pādya ādinā abhyarcya smaran nārāyaṇam harim
vāsudeva ādi mūrtīnām pūrva ādi krama yogataḥ

original: kuṇḍe vā sthaṇḍile vāpi juhuyurmūrtipāḥ pṛthak // Vis_5.58 //
analyzed: kuṇḍe vā sthaṇḍile vā api juhuyuḥ mūrtipāḥ pṛthak
samidh ājyena caruṇā aṣṭottaraśatam kramāt
madhunā payasā dadhnā hūyatena juhuyāt ca
ghṛtena ca
sūktena pauruṣaṇā eva pūrva ādi krama yogataḥ
kuṇḍe kuṇḍe tu kartavyam kuryāt ca
pratyekam ṣoḍaśa āhutīḥ
pūrṇāhutim tatas hutvā homam asmin samāpayet

original: pāyasaṃ kṛsaraṃ gauḷyaṃ deveśāya nivedayet // Vis_5.61 //
analyzed: pāyasam kṛsaram gauḷyam deveśāya nivedayet
śaṅkha dundubhi nirghoṣam tasmin kāle niyojayet
rakṣā artham haviṣā astreṇa ca aṣṭa diś balim ācaret
ghaṇṭā śabda samopetam śaṅkha dundubhi ghoṣayet
tatas tu nava vastraiḥ ca veṣṭayet upari kramāt
gandha puṣpam vinikṣipya praṇamya añjali mudrayā
nayet
prabhātāyām tu śarvaryām ācāryaḥ snānam ācaret
ūrdhva puṇḍram kramāt kṛtvā vastra alaṃkāra bhūṣitaḥ
mūrtipaiḥ saha ca utthāya śūla mūlam anusmaran
arghya pādya ādinā abhyarcya hāviḥ asmin na smaipra dāpa iyat
veśvam a pradakṣiṇam kurvan garbhāgāram praveśayet
ācāryaḥ sthāpayet śūlam tatas tu parameṣṭhinā
devī śūlam tu saṃsthāpya sva nāmnā asmin śriyādinā

original: vedān sasvaramuddhṛtya kāle tasmin samuccaret // Vis_5.68 //
analyzed: vedān sa svaram uddhṛtya kāle tasmin samuccaret
vārāha ādīni ca āvāhya śūla agre secayet kramāt

original: āsanaṃ ca tataḥ puṃsā viśvena śayanaṃ tataḥ // Vis_5.69 //
analyzed: āsanam ca tatas puṃsā viśvena śayanam tatas
nivṛtyā yānakam ca api siñcet tad mūrdhni ṛti dhārakaḥ
mūrdha ādi pāda paryantam vārāha ādīn anukramāt
vinyaset śūla laṃ
dehe tu sva nāmnā ca pṛthak pṛtham
saha eva sthāpayet śūlam śrī puṣṭyoḥ deva pārśvayoḥ
citrārdham śela dārubhyām sa aṅga upāṅga samāyutam

original: kārayet pratimāṃ tatra sthāpayecchūlavat purā // Vis_5.72 //
analyzed: kārayet pratimām tatra sthāpayet śūla vat purā
vastram tatra navam snigdham nīla roma ādi varjitam
saṃgṛhya praṇavena eva chādayet pratimā upari
varṇam tat kārayet vidvān yat yat pūrva anurūpataḥ
punar saṃsthāpanam kṛtvā sthāpanā śāstrataḥ kramāt
śūlam asthim avet tasmin rajjuḥ tatra sirā bhavet

original: mṛṇmāsaṃ tvakpaṭaṃ tatra śarīravadidaṃ smṛtam // Vis_5.75 //
analyzed: mṛṇ māsam tvac paṭam tatra śarīra vat idam smṛtam
yathā śarīre saṃkalpya catuṣṣaṣṭi sirāḥ tathā
nārikela ila
tvacaḥ sāram gṛhṇīyāt rajju karmaṇi
śūle pāśāḥ prakartavyāḥ tad karma kaśalaiḥ śubhaiḥ

original: evaṃ rajjumayaṃ kṛtvā sarvāṅgeṣu suveṣṭayet // Vis_5.77 //
analyzed: evam rajju mayam kṛtvā sarva aṅgeṣu su veṣṭayet
saṃkṣepāt kathitam rajjubandhanam paramam śubham
evam kṛtvā yathānyāyam śūla sthāpanam uttamam
ācāryam pūjayet paścāt dhanaiḥ kanaka kuṇḍalaiḥ

original: śilpinaṃ pūjayet paścāt tathaiva navavastrakaiḥ // Vis_5.79 //
analyzed: śilpinam pūjayet paścāt tathā eva nava vastrakaiḥ
daiva jñam pūjayet pūrvam vastra hema aṅgulīyakaiḥ

original: brāhmaṇān bhojayet paścāt vaiṣṇavān vedapāragān // Vis_5.80 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇān bhojayet paścāt vaiṣṇavān vedapāragān
evam saṃsthāpanam proktam saṃkṣepāt śūlam uttamam

original: iti śrīpāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyāṃ śūlasthāpana- vidhirnāma pañcamo 'dhyāyaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām śūlasthāpana vidhiḥ nāma pañcamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
ṣaṣṭhaḥ dhyāyaḥ
ṣaṣṭhaḥ dhyāyaḥ viṣvaksenaḥ
mṛd saṃskāram atho vakṣye śṛṇuṣva eka
pakva apakva ikvā
dvidhā proktāḥ bhūsura ādīn anukramāt
sarva lokāḥ na śaṃsanti pratimām dagdha mṛṇmayīm

original: apakvā pratimā śastā saiva kāryā vicakṣaṇaiḥ // Vis_6.2 //
analyzed: apakvā pratimā śastā sā eva kāryā vicakṣaṇaiḥ
sudhayā nā eva kuryāt vā nā aśma cūrṇaiḥ kadācana
mṛdā eva mṛṇmayam kuryāt yathā varṇa anurūpataḥ
brāhmaṇasya sitā mṛd vai kṣatriyasya aruṇā smṛtā

original: viśāṃ pītā bhavenmṛdvai kṛṣṇā śūdrasya kīrtitā // Vis_6.4 //
analyzed: viśām pītā bhavet mṛd vai kṛṣṇā śūdrasya kīrtitā
mṛdam varṇa ānupūrvyeṇa gṛhṇīyāt kṣetra saṃbhavām
dadhi sarpiḥ payobhiḥ ca atasī sneha saṃyutaiḥ
śarkarā arām
sama bhāgāni cūrṇāni mṛttikāyām niyojayet
khādireṇa kaṣāyeṇa arjunena ca peṣayet

original: śrīveṣṭakaṃ sajjarasaṃ kuṅkumaṃ koṣṭhameva ca // Vis_6.7 //
analyzed: śrīveṣṭakam sajjarasam kuṅkumam koṣṭham eva ca
kunduruḥ ca rasāḥ hi ete sarve sarva rasa anvitāḥ
nadī saṅgama tīreṣu puṇya udyāneṣu vai punar
ādāya mṛttikām tatra sneha cūrṇa samāyutām

original: māsaṃ paryuṣitaṃ kṛtvā kārayet pratimāṃ tataḥ // Vis_6.9 //
analyzed: māsam paryuṣitam kṛtvā kārayet pratimām tatas
tri rātram peṣitā ā coṣitā
sā tu śilā maya samā bhavet

original: mṛtsaṃskāraṃ mayā proktaṃ tenaiva pratimāṃ kramāt // Vis_6.10 //
analyzed: mṛd saṃskāram mayā proktam tena eva pratimām kramāt

original: kārayet sudṛḍhaṃ samyak śāstradṛṣṭyā ca śilpinā /
analyzed: kārayet su dṛḍham samyak śāstra dṛṣṭyā ca śilpinā
sa aṅga upāṅga samāyuktām pratimām su manoramām
nava ambaram tu su snigdham pratimā upari veṣṭayet

original: tasyopari likhet snigadhaṃ varṇānukramaṇena tu // Vis_6.12 //
analyzed: tasya upari likhet varṇa anukramaṇena tu
atas tat saṃpravakṣyāmi varṇa anukramaṇa kramāt

original: śvetaṃ pītaṃ tathā raktaṃ haritaṃ kṛṣṇameva ca // Vis_6.13 //
analyzed: śvetam pītam tathā raktam haritam kṛṣṇam eva ca
pañca varṇāḥ ime proktāḥ pṛthivī ādi adhidevatāḥ

original: uttamā dhātujā proktā madhyamā vṛkṣasaṃbhavā // Vis_6.14 //
analyzed: uttamā dhātu jā proktā madhyamā vṛkṣa saṃbhavā
saṃyoga jā avarā jñeyā trividhaḥ varṇa saṃgrahaḥ

original: varṇaṃ cāpyanuvarṇaṃ ca saṃkaraṃ ca tathaiva ca // Vis_6.15 //
analyzed: varṇam ca api anuvarṇam ca saṃkaram ca tathā eva ca
trividhaḥ varṇa saṃyogaḥ śāstre smin ucyate mayā
varṇāḥ iti ucyate śuddhāḥ rāja vārttā ādinā akarot
anā akakāreṣu ye varṇāḥ prāyas śuddhi vivarjitāḥ

original: anuvarṇā ime proktāḥ saṃkarān kathayāmyaham // Vis_6.17 //
analyzed: anuvarṇāḥ ime proktāḥ saṃkarān kathayāmi aham
śuklaḥ raktaḥ ca kṛṣṇaḥ ca nīlaḥ ca iti caturvidhaḥ
śaṅkha go kṣīra varṇa ābhaḥ śuklaḥ iti abhidhīyate
haritaḥ ca eva pītaḥ ca pīta varṇaḥ dvidhā bhavet
haridrā kuṅkuma ābhaḥ tu pītaḥ iti abhidhīyate

original: tatastu śyāmavarṇaśca kṛṣṇavarṇo dvidhā mataḥ // Vis_6.20 //
analyzed: tatas tu śyāma varṇaḥ ca kṛṣṇa varṇaḥ dvidhā mataḥ
dūrvā marakata ābhaḥ tu paraḥ
śuklena miśritaḥ raktaḥ hariḥ iti abhisaṃjñitaḥ
śuklena miśritaḥ pītaḥ gauraḥ iti abhidhīyate
raktena miśritam api kapilam paribhāśitam
śuklena miśritaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ dhūmraḥ iti abhisaṃjñitaḥ

original: pītena miritaḥ kṛṣṇa kāla ityabhisaṃjñitaḥ // Vis_6.23 //
analyzed: pītena kṛṣṇa kālaḥ iti abhisaṃjñitaḥ
pīta kṛṣṇa yutaḥ śuklaḥ gauraḥ iti abhidhīyate
pīta rakta yutaḥ śuklaḥ karburaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ
pīta kṛṣṇa yutaḥ varṇaḥ harivarṇaḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: evaṃ saṃkarato varṇaḥ tatkālaṃ sthīyate dṛḍham // Vis_6.25 //
analyzed: evam saṃkarataḥ varṇaḥ tad kālam sthīyate dṛḍham
yad nibhā kathitā mūrtiḥ tad nibham varṇa yojanam
adṛṣṭa deśa saṃbhūtā madhyamā kāla saṃbhavā
evam varṇa vibhāgaḥ tu kramaśas parikīrtitaḥ
vāsudevam saṃkarṣaṇam pradyumnam ca niruddhakam
kalau yuge śacī nātha śyāma varṇena kārayet
tat bimbam śubha dam ṛddhim viddhi
rāja rāṣṭra vivardhanam
tasmāt sarva prayatnena kalau śyāmena
anyathā śubham āpnoti rāja rāṣṭra vināśa kṛt
iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām mṛtsaṃskāravidhiḥ nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ dhyāyaḥ
saptamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
saptamaḥ dhyāyaḥ viṣvaksenaḥ
atas param pravakṣyāmi svapnādhyāyam śacīpate

original: viviktena paraṃ guhyaṃ kramācchṛṇu śacīpate // Vis_7.1 //
analyzed: viviktena param guhyam kramāt śṛṇu śacīpate
svapnaḥ tu prathame yāme saṃvatsara vipāka daḥ
dvitīye ca aṣṭa māse tu tribhiḥ māsaiḥ tri yāmake
aruṇa udaya vedālāyām daśa ahena phalam bhavet

original: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi puṇyāpuṇyaṃ tu vai śṛṇu // Vis_7.3 //
analyzed: atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi puṇya apuṇyam tu vai śṛṇu
ārohaṇe go vṛṣa kuñjarāṇam prāsāda śaila agra vanaspatīnām

original: jāmadagnyaśca rāmaśca balaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ surārcitaḥ // Vis_10.5 //
analyzed: jāmadagnyaḥ ca rāmaḥ ca balaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sura arcitaḥ
kalkiḥ vi lkī vi
ṣṇuḥ iti proktaḥ daśamūrti kramaḥ tava
bhedam dvādaśa mūrtīnām kathayāmi tava anagha
keśavaḥ prathamaḥ teṣām mune nārāyaṇaḥ param
mādhavaḥ govindaḥ viṣṇuḥ syāt madhusūdanaḥ
trivikramaḥ bhavet nāmnā vāmanaḥ śrīdharaḥ tathā
hṛṣīkeśaḥ bhavet anyaḥ padmanābhaḥ tatas param
atas smṛtam param
bhavet brahma mūrtiḥ asmin mahā mune

original: dāmodara imaṃ tatvaṃ śrīmūrtiṃ vadataḥ śṛṇu // Vis_10.9 //
analyzed: dāmodaraḥ imam śrī mūrtim vadataḥ śṛṇu
viśvarūpaḥ bhavet ekaḥ yajñamūrtiḥ dvitīyakaḥ

original: tṛtīyo vedamūrtiḥ syāditi mūrtitrayaṃ bhavet // Vis_10.10 //
analyzed: tṛtīyaḥ vedamūrtiḥ syāt iti mūrti trayam bhavet
śriyā ādi mūrti bhedam te vakṣyāmi muni sattama
śrī mūrtiḥ prathama uddiṣṭā puṣṭi mūrtiḥ tatas param
medhā sarasvatī durgā vighneśāḥ ca śriyā ādi ṣaṭ
śriyā ādi bhedam evam syāt vakṣyāmi aṅguli mānataḥ
tila aṣṭakam yavaḥ proktaḥ yava aṣṭau aṅgulī smṛtā

original: vrīhitrayocchritaṃ vāpi yavāṣṭau tiryageva vā // Vis_10.14 //
analyzed: vrīhi traya ucchritam vā api yava aṣṭau tiryak eva vā
athavā aṅguli mānam tu śṛṇu mattaḥ tapodhana
deśika aṅguli madhyasya madhya rekhā samā mune
madhyam madhya karasya atha kara madhya aṅguleḥ tatas
madhya parva samāvṛttiḥ mune mātrā aṅgulam ca tat
iti tridhā ṅguliḥ proktā tāsu iṣṭa aṅgulinā mune

original: vimānasyāpi berasya mānaṃ kāryaṃ tathādhunā // Vis_10.17 //
analyzed: vimānasya api berasya mānam kāryam tathā adhunā
atha aṣṭam aṅgralānām ca sruc sruvayoḥ toraṇasya vā
vedyām aṇḍapa kuṇḍasya vidhāne samidhaḥ ca vai
snapanasya ca evam āda etān vidhau deśikaḥ su pari
śuddha mātrā aṅgula pramāṇaiḥ medhāḥ vidhinā prayatnataḥ matimān
athavā vai hi deva ṛṣe māna mārga vidhānataḥ
aṣṭamaṅgalaka ādīnām māna artham vadataḥ mune
ācārya hastasya kaniṣṭhikā ādyaiḥ caturbhiḥ eva aṅgulibhiḥ mahā ṛṣe
madhyama aṅguleḥ madhyama parva bhāge tiryak visarpadbhiḥ iha iva mā iyam
dvādaśa aṅgula mānam hi tālam iti abhidhīyate
tāla dvayam bhavet hastam iti māna vidaḥ viduḥ
iti uktam trividham mānam aṅgulīnām prabhedataḥ
pratimā lakṣaṇam vakṣye śṛṇuṣva avahitaḥ sadā
bera mānam vimānāt vā dvāra mānena vā punar
garbha mānena vā jñeyam mūlabera pramāṇataḥ
mūlaprāsāda vistāram yat bāhyeṣu pramāṇataḥ

original: tasyārdhaṃ śreṣṭhamityuktaṃ tadardhaṃ madhyamaṃ smṛtam // Vis_10.25 //
analyzed: tasya ardham śreṣṭham iti uktam tad ardham madhyamam smṛtam
tad ardham adhamam prāhuḥ pratimā utsedham atra vai

original: evaṃ prāsādamānaṃ tu dvāramānamataḥ śṛṇu // Vis_10.26 //
analyzed: evam prāsāda mānam tu dvāra mānam atas śṛṇu

original: dvārāt pādādhikaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ dvāramānaṃ tu madhyamam /
analyzed: dvārāt pāda adhikam śreṣṭham dvāra mānam tu madhyamam
dvārasya pāda hīnam yat adhamam pratimā ucchrayam

tri pāda dvaya dīrgha ṛ ṃ ghā
vā pratimā sā uttamā smṛtā
pañca bhāga sama uttuṅgaṃṅgā
pratimā madhyamā tu sā
garbha geha ardha tuṅgā yā sā avarā pratimā ucchrayā
garbha mānam iti proktam citram ca api ardhacitrakam
citra ābhāsa vidhiḥ ca iti śṛṇu nārada sāṃpratam
kāla yoga pramāṇena kartavyā pratimā śubhā

original: citraṃ cāpyardhacitraṃ ca citrābhāsaṃ tathaiva ca // Vis_10.31 //
analyzed: citram ca api ardhacitram ca citrābhāsam tathā eva ca
trividham pratimā karma śāstra jñāḥ saṃpracakṣate
dṛśyate vayavāḥ yatra pratimāyām samantataḥ
māna unmāna pramāṇābhiḥ yaiḥ
tat citram iti paṭhyate

original: śilāgatāyā yasyāstu pṛṣṭhabhāgo na dṛśyate // Vis_10.33 //
analyzed: śilā gatāyāḥ yasyāḥ tu pṛṣṭha bhāgaḥ na dṛśyate
māna pramāṇa saṃyuktā sārdha citram iti smṛtā
yā sthitā ālekhya rūpeṇa
śilpibhiḥ
māna pramāṇa saṃyuktā sā citra ābhāsaḥ ucyate

original: uttamaṃ tu phalaṃ citraṃ madhyamaṃ cārdhacitrakam // Vis_10.35 //
analyzed: uttamam tu phalam citram madhyamam ca ardhacitrakam
ālekhyam adhamam proktam pratiṣṭhā amā
karmaṇi kramāt

original: ityuktaṃ pratimākarma śṛṇu pīṭhavidhiṃ mune // Vis_10.36 //
analyzed: iti uktam pratimā karma śṛṇu pīṭha vidhim mune
bera ucchrāyam tridhā kṛtvā bhāga ekam pīṭhikā ucchrayam

original: athavā pīṭhamevaṃ vā śṛṇu nārada sāṃpratam /

pāda padmam bhavet phullam aṣṭa patram sa karṇikam

original: tasya nālaṃ bhavedvṛttaṃ caturaśraṃ tu vā punaḥ // Vis_10.39 //

original: vṛttaṃ śiva iti proktaṃ caturaśraṃ pitāmahaḥ /
analyzed: vṛttam śivaḥ iti proktam caturaśram pitāmahaḥ

original: hastamātraṃ tadāyāmaṃ tanmānaṃ nāha ucyate // Vis_10.40 //
analyzed: hasta mātram tat āyāmam tad mānam na ahaḥ ucyate
sthānakasya idam ākhyātam āsanasya adhunā ucyate
garbha dvāra yuga aṃśam tu pāda padma ucchrayam bhavet

original: etadyāne na śayane kāryaṃ naiva kadācana // Vis_10.42 //
analyzed: etat yāne na śayane kāryam na eva kadācana
iti uktam mūlabera ādi bimbānām lakṣaṇam mune

original: mūlaberasya dīrghasya tribhāgaikaṃ tu kautukam // Vis_10.44 //
analyzed: mūlaberasya dīrghasya tri bhāga ekam tu kautukam

original: śreṣṭhamadhyamahīnaṃ tu trividhaṃ kautukaṃ bhavet // Vis_10.45 //
analyzed: śreṣṭha madhyama hīnam tu trividham kautukam bhavet
veda bhāga eka bhāgam vā bhūta bhāga eka bhāgakam

original: śreṣṭhamadhyamahīnaṃ tu trividhaṃ kautukaṃ bhavet // Vis_10.45 //
analyzed: śreṣṭha madhyama hīnam tu trividham kautukam bhavet
athavā kuru karma arcām mūlaberasya sāṃpratam
utsava pratimā āyāmam snapanasya tathā bhavet

original: karmārcāyāḥ pramāṇaṃ vā kuryādvā lakṣaṇaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: karma arcāyāḥ pramāṇam vā kuryāt vā lakṣaṇam bhavet
uktaiḥ lohaiḥ kṛtā puṇyā anuktaiḥ lohaiḥ kṛtā aśubhā

ṣoḍaśa aṅgulakam vā api dvādaśa aṅgulam eva vā
athavā aṣṭa aṅgula utsedham balibimbam athā ucyate

dvis aṭa ṣṭa aṅgulinā mune
bali bimba ucchrayam kṛtvā ca uttamam parikīrtitam
ekādaśa aṅgula utsedham madhyamam bali kautukam
aṣṭa aṅgulam vā kurvīta balibimba adhamam smṛtam

original: tīrthabimbaṃ tathaiva syāditi śāstrasya niścayaḥ // Vis_10.52 //
analyzed: tīrtha bimbam tathā eva syāt iti śāstrasya niścayaḥ

original: ṣaḍaṅgulāyatā caiva naiva kāryā vijānatā // Vis_10.53 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ aṅgula āyatā ca eva na eva kāryā vijānatā
mūla bera tri bhāga ekam utsava pratimā
utsava pratimā āyāmām snapana arcām tu kārayet
iti karma arcana ādīnām vividhi mānam īritam
vidhi ācāra vidhānena yathāyogam samācaret
atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi svārtha arcāyāḥ tu lakṣaṇam

original: lohajā maṇijā vāpi rājatā tāmranirmitā // Vis_10.56 //
analyzed: loha jā maṇi jā vā api rājatā tāmra nirmitā

original: rājatā vāpi vaiśyasya rājatā tāmrakā śubhā // Vis_10.57 //

original: śūdrasya tāmrakairvā syāt sarveṣāṃ vāpi tāmrajā /
analyzed: śūdrasya tāmrakaiḥ vā syāt sarveṣām vā api tāmra jā

original: lohajāḥ pratimāḥ proktāḥ nirdeṣāḥ samudāhṛtāḥ // Vis_10.58 //
analyzed: loha jāḥ pratimāḥ proktāḥ nirdeṣāḥ samudāhṛtāḥ
ratna jāḥ trividhāḥ proktāḥ saumya āgneyī samā iti ca
śaśi kānta mayī saumyā sūryakānta mayī parā

evam ātma artha bimbānām lakṣaṇam viddhi pūrvakam

original: uktaṃ hi lakṣaṇaṃ tena cātmārthe 'pi bhavedvidhiḥ // Vis_10.62 //

original: phalakāyāṃ paṭe kuḍye likhitānāṃ tu lakṣaṇam /

atra
dvi śeṣaḥ sti kramuka ādyena vā punar

original: prāsādasya tu garbhāṃśe saptabhāgaṃ gī?) kṛte mune /

original: brāhme syādarcanaṃ pīṭhamiti beraṃ (mekabere?) tathā mune /

analyzed: durbhikṣam jāyate ghoram sarvam rāṣṭram vinaśyati

original: asya bimbasya vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇaṃ śṛṇu nārada /

analyzed: bāla ādīnām tu bimbānām lakṣaṇam vā ca syāt ca turbhujam

original: mahotsavasya bimbasya dvibhujaṃ vā caturbhujam // Vis_10.109 //
analyzed: mahā utsavasya bimbasya dvi bhujam vā catur bhujam
śayanasya mayā proktaḥ viśeṣaḥ muni sattama
evam ukta prakāreṇa pratimām kārayet kramāt
mūla arcā ca aṣṭa bāhuḥ ced karma arcā ādi catur bhujam
dvi bhujam yadi ced tatra sarva saṃhāra kāraṇam
tasmāt sarva prayatnena dvi bhujam na prakalpayet

original: aṣṭabāhvostu bimbasya śayanaṃ na prakalpayet // Vis_10.112 //
analyzed: aṣṭa bāhvoḥ tu bimbasya śayanam na prakalpayet

original: tathā matsyādimūrtīnāṃ śayanaṃ tu na kārayet /
analyzed: tathā matsya ādi mūrtīnām śayanam tu na kārayet
śriyā ādi vighna paryanta mūrtīnām ca tathāvidhi

original: idaṃ tu tava vakṣyāmi guhyādguhyataraṃ mune /
analyzed: idam tu tava vakṣyāmi guhyāt guhyataram mune

original: yo 'sau nārāyaṇaḥ sākṣāt sa hi vighneśa ucyate // Vis_10.114 //
analyzed: yaḥ sau nārāyaṇaḥ sākṣāt sa hi vighneśaḥ ucyate

original: yo 'sau vighneśa ityuktaḥ so hi nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ sau vighneśaḥ iti uktaḥ saḥ hi nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
vāsudeva maya tvāt ca hi āvṛta tvāt mahā mune
na eva jānanti tad bhedam munayaḥ tatva darśinaḥ

original: idaṃ tu nāvamaṃ manye guhyādekaṃ tu nārada // Vis_10.116 //
analyzed: idam tu na avamam manye guhyāt ekam tu nārada
devaiḥ abhihita jñānam tava snehāt pradarśitam

original: tasmāt śriyaṃ ca durgāṃ ca vāṇīṃ vighneśameva ca // Vis_10.117 //
analyzed: tasmāt śriyam ca durgām ca vāṇīm vighneśam eva ca
svātantryeṇa arcayet dhīmān sarva kāma artha siddhaye

original: śriyādīnāṃ tu boddhavyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tantravittamaiḥ // Vis_10.118 //
analyzed: śriyā ādīnām tu boddhavyam lakṣaṇam tantra vittamaiḥ
tasmāt śriyā ādi mūrtīnām svātantrye tu parārthake
uktam ātma artha pūjāyām pūrvavat lakṣaṇam bhavet
mūlaberasya bāhu antaḥ utsedhaḥ lakṣmaṇasya tu

original: bharatasya tathotsedha iti tantre vidurbudhāḥ // Vis_10.120 //
analyzed: bharatasya tathā utsedhaḥ iti tantre viduḥ budhāḥ
lakṣmaṇasya api bāhu antaḥ śatrughnasya ucchrayaḥ bhavet

original: ātmārthayajanaṃ vakṣye śṛṇu nārada tatvataḥ // Vis_10.121 //
analyzed: ātma artha yajanam vakṣye śṛṇu nārada tatvataḥ
ṣoḍaśa aṅgulam kaḥ
tsedhe uttamam saṃpracakṣate

original: madhyamaṃ tu tadardhaṃ syāt dvyaṅgulaṃ tu kanīyasam // Vis_10.122 //
analyzed: madhyamam tu tad ardham syāt dvi aṅgulam tu kanīyasam
suvarṇa ādi kṛtānām ca vā
lekhyānām phalaka ādiṣu
mānam evam vijānīyāt ātma artham iti kīrtitam
ukta utsedha anurūpeṇa kāryam vistāra lakṣaṇam

original: suvarṇādīni vastūni śṛṇuṣvaiṣāṃ phalāni ca // Vis_10.124 //
analyzed: suvarṇa ādīni vastūni śṛṇuṣva eṣām phalāni ca

original: hemarūpyaśca tāmraṃ ca rītiśailaṃ ca dhātavaḥ /
analyzed: hema rūpyaḥ ca tāmram ca rītiśailam ca dhātavaḥ
dāruḥ ca praśstāni pratimā pratipādane
dadyāt suvarṇa jāpi āsām puṣṭi kīrti sukham nṛṇām

original: raupyalohamayī sā tu sukhaṃ sarvatra yacchati // Vis_10.126 //
analyzed: raupya loha mayī sā tu sukham sarvatra yacchati

original: tāmrajā pratimā dadyāt putrapautradhanaṃ tu ve /
analyzed: tāmra jā pratimā dadyāt putra pautra dhanam tu
rājata akhila pāpāni kleśa duḥkhāni nirdahet

original: śailajā pratimā sākṣāt saubhāgyāyuḥ sukhāni ca /
analyzed: śailajā pratimā sākṣāt saubhāgya āyuḥ sukhāni ca

original: dārujā pratimā dadyāt balārogyayaśāṃsi ca // Vis_10.128 //
analyzed: dāru jā pratimāḥ dadyāt bala ārogya yaśāṃsi ca
mṛṇmayī sarva kāmānām phala dātrī viśeṣataḥ

original: iti bhedāni vastūni phalānyeṣāṃ ca nārada // Vis_10.129 //
analyzed: iti bhedāni vastūni phalāni eṣām ca nārada
pratimā karaṇe proktam ṇa uktāni
tava snehāt mahā mune

original: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi śilāsaṃgrahaṇaṃ tava // Vis_10.130 //
analyzed: atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi śilā saṃgrahaṇam tava
dāru saṃgrahaṇam ca eva śūlasya sthāpanam mune
mṛd saṃskāra ādi yat sarvam evam ādyam mahā mune

original: pūrvabhāge yathoddiṣṭaṃ tathā vai pañca(?) kārayet /
analyzed: pūrva bhāge yathā uddiṣṭam tathā vai pañca kārayet
athavā muni śārdūla śruṇuṣva pratimā vidhim
śilā grahaṇa pūrvam yat mṛd saṃskāra antam eva tat ca
viśvakarma vidhāna uktam śilpa lakṣaṇa lakṣitam

original: sādhakasyājñayā śilpī karma kuryāt samāhitaḥ // Vis_10.134 //
analyzed: sādhakasya ājñayā śilpī karma kuryāt samāhitaḥ
sarva lakṣaṇa saṃyuktam sarva avayava śobhitam
sarva ābharaṇa saṃyuktam prabhā maṇḍala maṇḍitam
pāda ādi avayava saṃyuktam vaiḥ yuktam
bhūṣaṇaiḥ makuṭena ca

original: virājamānaṃ kurvīta sādhakaḥ śilpinā saha // Vis_10.136 //
analyzed: virājamānam kurvīta sādhakaḥ śilpinā saha
kriyate darśana artham yat bhaktānām bimbam uttamam
tat tasya lakṣaṇam brūhi vipra
vaktum sarvam na śakyate
nāradaḥ
devadeva jagannātha jñātam sarvam tvayā uditam

original: chindhi saṃśayamadya tvaṃ yanme manasi vartate // Vis_10.138 //
analyzed: chindhi saṃśayam adya tvam yat me manasi vartate

original: ekatra sthāpitaṃ bimbaṃ kimanyatrocitaṃ na vā /
analyzed: ekatra sthāpitam bimbam kim anyatra ucitam na vā

original: etat kathaya me tena kṛtārthāḥ smo vayaṃ prabho // Vis_10.139 //
analyzed: etat kathaya me tena kṛtārthāḥ smaḥ vayam prabho
viṣvaksenaḥ

original: śṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi sādhūktaṃ yat tvayādhunā /
analyzed: śṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi sādhu uktam yat tvayā adhunā

original: guhyādguhyataraṃ caiva na prakāśyaṃ tapodhana // Vis_10.140 //
analyzed: guhyāt guhyataram ca eva na prakāśyam tapodhana
pañca rātreṇa yat pūrvam vidhinā
vimāne naṃ
yat pratiṣṭhitam
tatra arcā yā arcanā hīnā sā syāt tad śāstra nirmite
an anyatra anyatantra
kṛte dhāmni tatra arcā mandira antare

original: anyatantrakṛte na syāditi śāstrasya niścayaḥ // Vis_10.142 //
analyzed: anya tantra kṛte na syāt iti śāstrasya niścayaḥ
yatra yatra vimāne vai eka tantra pratiṣṭhite

original: tatra tatra bhavedarcā na tantrāntarasaṃbhavā // Vis_10.143 //
analyzed: tatra tatra bhavet arcā na tantra antara saṃbhavā
eka tantra arcite bimbe mandire vā kadācana
tantra antara arcanā na syāt yadi kuryāt mahat bhayam
yatra yatra mune na atrā ca arcā
tantra saṃkara saṃbhavā

original: tatra tatra mahān doṣo rājā rāṣṭraṃ ca naśyati // Vis_10.145 //
analyzed: tatra tatra mahān doṣaḥ rājā rāṣṭram ca naśyati
tasmāt sarva prayatnena sarva loka hita eṣiṇā

original: yena na syāttathā kuryāt tantradoṣasamudbhavaḥ // Vis_10.146 //
analyzed: yena na syāt tathā kuryāt tantra doṣa samudbhavaḥ
nāradaḥ

original: etāni varjitaiḥ sarvaiḥ kṛtaṃ cet tatphalaṃ prabho /
analyzed: etāni varjitaiḥ sarvaiḥ kṛtam ced tat phalam prabho
varjya bimba arciteḥ cane

original: kiṃ vā vadasva vadatāṃ vara // Vis_10.147 //
analyzed: kim vā vadasva vadatām vara
viṣvaksenaḥ
mohāt vā atha bhayāt lobhāt
tābhiḥ śilā ādibhiḥ
nirmitena eva bimba ādīn arcayet na uditaiḥ api
śilā ādyābhiḥ niṣiddhābhiḥ kuryāt vā kārayet yadi

original: utsannaṃ yāti tadgrāmaṃ bimbaṃ tadyāvadāsthitam // Vis_10.149 //
analyzed: utsannam yāti tat grāmam bimbam tat yāvat āsthitam
rājye kalaham brūyāt rājā api atra vinaśyati

original: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena niṣiddhaṃ varjayet sudhīḥ // Vis_10.150 //
analyzed: tasmāt sarva prayatnena niṣiddham varjayet sudhīḥ
iti saṃkṣepataḥ proktam pratimā lakṣaṇam tava
atas ūrghvam pravakṣyāmi paramātma ādi bhedanam
iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām pratimālakṣaṇādividhiḥ nāma daśamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
ekādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
ekādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ viṣvaksenaḥ
varṇa ādīn ca āyudhānām tu vinyāsam muni sattama
paramātma ātma bhāva artham prathamam śṛṇu nārada

original: śvetaparvatasaṃnibhaṃ tridaśaṃ garutmati saṃsthitam sarvadevanamaskṛtaṃ kamalāsanādyabhipūjitam /
analyzed: śveta parvata saṃnibham tridaśam garutmati saṃsthitam sarva deva namaskṛtam kamalāsana ādi abhipūjitam

original: sarvabhūṣaṇabhūṣitaṃ dvicaturbhujaṃ dvipadaṃ mune svātmadehavirājitaṃ kanakaprabhamaṃ(prabhāṃ?)
analyzed: sarva bhūṣaṇa bhūṣitam dvi catur bhujam dvipadam mune sva ātma deha virājitam kanaka prabha maṃprabhām
baram ādadhat
iti dhyāyet muni śreṣṭha sarva deva mayam tatas

original: dhyāyannutpadyate tasya samyagjñānaṃ tu nārada // Vis_11.3 //
analyzed: dhyāyan utpadyate tasya samyak jñānam tu nārada

original: iti te darśitaṃ sākṣāt mūrtaṃ tu paramātmanaḥ /
analyzed: iti te darśitam sākṣāt mūrtam tu paramātmanaḥ

original: asya mūrtasya vakṣyāmi vinyāsaṃ cāyudhasya ca // Vis_11.4 //
analyzed: asya mūrtasya vakṣyāmi vinyāsam ca āyudhasya ca

original: asya dakṣiṇahastāgre cakraṃ cādhaḥ sthitasya tu /
analyzed: asya dakṣiṇa hasta agre cakram ca adhas sthitasya tu

original: svāgatāvasthito hasta padmaṃ vā hari nārada // Vis_11.5 //
analyzed: svāgata avasthitaḥ hasta padmam vā hari nārada
adhas sthitasya hasta agre ca akṣamālām tu vinyaset
evam dakṣiṇa hastānām vāma pārśvasya ca ucyate
vāma pārśvasya hastānām ca ūrdhve śaṅkham vara pradam

original: sagadākaṭihastaṃ syāt itthaṃ tu paramātmanaḥ // Vis_11.7 //
analyzed: sa gadā kaṭi hastam syāt ittham tu parama ātmanaḥ

original: vāsudevasya vakṣyāmi rūpaṃ vai cāyudhāni te /
analyzed: vāsudevasya vakṣyāmi rūpam vai ca āyudhāni te
go kṣīra sphaṭika ākāram śyāma ākṛtim atha api vā
pīta vastra dharam vā api rakta ambara dharam tu vā
śaṅkha cakra gadā hastam sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
sarva avayava saṃpūrṇam catur bāhu virājitam
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam vāsadevam vicintayet

original: vakṣyāmyasya tu hetīnāṃ vinyāsaṃ te mahāmune /
analyzed: vakṣyāmi asya tu hetīnām vinyāsam te mahā mune
asya dakṣiṇa hasta agre cakram ca adhas sthite mbujam
vāma ūrdhve śaṅkham anyasmin gadā ca asya api adhomukham

original: śriyaṃ tu dakṣiṇe pārśve vāme puṣṭiṃ tu vinyaset // Vis_11.12 //
analyzed: śriyam tu dakṣiṇe pārśve vāme puṣṭim tu vinyaset
tuṣṭim vā vāma pārśve tu kārayet muni sattama

original: evaṃ janārdanasyāpi mūrtaṃ kartavyameva tu // Vis_11.13 //
analyzed: evam janārdanasya api mūrtam kartavyam eva tu
iti uktam vāsudevasya śṛṇu saṃkarṣaṇasya tu
pīta vastra dharaḥ sākṣāt catur bāhu virājitaḥ
sarva avayava saṃyuktaḥ sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitaḥ
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktaḥ śaṅkha cakra dharaḥ sadā
iti saṃkarṣaṇaṃṇe
rūpam asya vai dakṣiṇe kare

original: ūrdhve cakraṃ tvadho haste musalaṃ vinyaset sudhīḥ /
analyzed: ūrdhve cakram tu adhas haste musalam vinyaset sudhīḥ

original: vāmordhve śaṅkhamityuktaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ tvadhaḥ kare // Vis_11.17 //
analyzed: vāma ūrdhve śaṅkham iti uktam puṇḍarīkam tu adhas kare

original: dakṣiṇe tu śriyaṃ vāme puṣṭiṃ saṃsthāpayedbudhaḥ /
analyzed: dakṣiṇe tu śriyam vāme puṣṭim saṃsthāpayet budhaḥ

original: iti saṃkarṣaṇaścoktaḥ pradyumnaṃ śṛṇu nārada // Vis_11.18 //
analyzed: iti saṃkarṣaṇaḥ ca uktaḥ pradyumnam śṛṇu nārada
pīta ambaram catur bāhum sarva avayava saṃyutam
śaṅkha cakra gadā pāṇim sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam ittham pradyumna rūpakam
dakṣiṇa ūrdhva kare padmam adhas kaumodakīm nyaset

original: vāmordhvādhaḥ sthite haste śaṅkhacakraṃ tu vinyaset /
analyzed: vāma ūrdhva adhas sthite haste śaṅkha cakram tu vinyaset

original: itthaṃ pradyumnamūrtaṃ te devarṣe varṇito 'dhunā (taṃ mayā?) // Vis_11.21 //
analyzed: ittham pradyumna mūrtam te deva ṛṣe varṇitaḥ dhunā tam mayā
aniruddham vadāmaḥ tra mi atra
śṛṇu nārada tattvataḥ
nīla jīmūta saṃkāśam kālāñjana caya upamam
śaṅkha cakra dharam devam pīta vastram caturbhujam
sarva ābharaṇa saṃyuktam sarva avayava śobhitam
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam aniruddham iti īritam

original: asya vāmakare cordhve śaṅkhamanyakare gadām // Vis_11.24 //
analyzed: asya vāma kare ca ūrdhve śaṅkham anya kare gadām
dakṣiṇa ūrdhve nyaset cakram anyatra abhayam iṣyate
aniruddham jagannātham ananta upari śāyinam

original: śriyaṃ dakṣiṇataḥ pārśve puṣṭiṃ vāme 'sya vinyaset /
analyzed: śriyam dakṣiṇatas pārśve puṣṭim vāme vinyaset

original: śayane sati mūlārcā dvibhujaṃ vā caturbhujam // Vis_11.26 //
analyzed: śayane sati mūla arcā dvi bhujam vā catur bhujam
kalpayet muni śārdūla sarva saṃpad sukha āvaham

original: devasya pādapārśve tu śriyaṃ puṣṭiṃ tu vinyaset // Vis_11.27 //
analyzed: devasya pāda pārśve tu śriyam puṣṭim tu vinyaset
atha vā kalpayet deva mauli pārśve śriyam mune

original: citraṃ vāpyardhacitraṃ vā citrābhāsaṃ tu vā mune // Vis_11.28 //
analyzed: citram vā api ardhacitram vā citra ābhāsam tu vā mune
kuryāt
ittham śriyā ādi mūrtīnām pūrva pūrvā garīyasī

original: aniruddha iti prokto matsyādīn śṛṇu nārada /
analyzed: aniruddhaḥ iti proktaḥ matsya ādīn śṛṇu nārada
śatapatra mayasya atha puṇḍarīkasya madhyame

original: triṇetraṃ dvibhujaṃ caiva prāṅmukhaṃ padmadhāriṇam // Vis_11.31 //
analyzed: trinetram dvi bhujam ca eva prāc mukham padma dhāriṇam
sarva avayava saṃpūrṇam sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
