mūrrtiṃtam
ittham uktam ca nārada

original: āgneyadigdale matsyaṃ rājataṃ cātha vinyaset // Vis_11.33 //
analyzed: āgneya diś dale matsyam rājatam ca atha vinyaset

original: naiṛtyadigdale matsyaṃ kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ tu vinyaset // Vis_11.34 //
analyzed: tu vinyaset

original: vāruṇe digdale matsyaṃ raktavarṇaṃ tu vinyaset /
analyzed: vāruṇe diś dale matsyam rakta varṇam tu vinyaset

original: vāyavyadigdale matsyaṃ śyāmavarṇaṃ tu vinyaset // Vis_11.35 //
analyzed: tu vinyaset
saumya diś dala matsyam tu dhūmra varṇam tu vinyaset
īśāna diś dale matsyam agni varṇam tu vinyaset
iti aṣṭa diś dala sthaiḥ tu matsyaiḥ abhimṛkhīkṛtam
matsya abhimāninam no
mūrtam tava snehāt pradarśitam

original: asya dakṣiṇapārśve tu śriyaṃ puṣṭiṃ paratra ca /
analyzed: asya dakṣiṇa pārśve tu śriyam puṣṭim paratra ca

original: vinyasenmatsyarūpaṃ vai kūrmarūpaṃ tataḥ śṛṇu // Vis_11.38 //
analyzed: vinyaset matsya rūpam vai kūrma rūpam tatas śṛṇu
kālāñjana giri prakhyam trinetram sva aṅga śobhitam
catur bāhu yutam ca eva sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
añjana mṛd saṃnibha mūrtiḥ dvādaśa patre vartitam abje
padma samākhya sva āsana yuktaḥ kūrma śarīrī viṣṇuḥ iha āste
prāk kramataḥ bja dvādaśa patra ārūḍha śarīraiḥ dvādaśa kūrmaiḥ
añjana varṇa prakhya śarīreḥ āvṛta mūrtiḥ sva abhimukha sthaiḥ
śaṅkha cakra dharaḥ ca eva padma hastaḥ tathā eva ca
tatas dvādaśa kūrmāḥ hi kūrmaiḥ hi
devaḥ pi abhimukhīkṛtaḥ
asya dakṣiṇa hasta ūrdhve cakra padmaḥ cakram padmaṃkara antare

original: vāmordhve śaṅkhamityuktaṃ padmaṃ cādhaḥsthite kare // Vis_11.43 //
analyzed: vāma ūrdhve śaṅkham iti uktam padmam ca adhas sthite kare

original: asya dakṣiṇapārśve tu śriyaṃ vinyasya buddhimān /
analyzed: asya dakṣiṇa pārśve tu śriyam vinyasya buddhimān
puṣṭim vāme nyaset evam kūrma mūrtiḥ udāhṛtā
vārāham śṛṇu vakṣyāmi rāja āvarta nibham mune

original: śaṅkhavarṇaṃ tu vā śyāmaṃ sarvalakṣaṇalakṣitam // Vis_11.45 //
analyzed: śaṅkha varṇam tu vā śyāmam sarva lakṣaṇa lakṣitam
nava yauvana saṃpūrṇām sarva avayava sundarīm
nārīṇām uttamām devīm su keśām paṅkaja ānanām
vidyut latā prabhām vā api śyāmām vā api kṛtāñjalim
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktām nimagnām jagatīm śubhām
vāma doṣṇā samāliṅgya proddhṛtya āliṅgya susthitām

original: vāmena bāhunāśliṣya jighran devīmukhaṃ prabhuḥ // Vis_11.48 //
analyzed: vāmena bāhunā āśliṣya jighran devī mukham prabhuḥ
vāmena āliṅgya hastena tasyāḥ skandham taponidhe

original: gṛhītvoruṃ dṛḍhaṃ tasyāḥ dakṣiṇena kareṇa ca // Vis_11.49 //
analyzed: gṛhītvā ūrum dṛḍham tasyāḥ dakṣiṇena kareṇa ca
sūkara aṅgam catur bāhum śaṅkha cakra dharam prabhum

original: dakṣiṇe tu nyaset cakraṃ vāme śaṅkhaṃ tu vinyaset // Vis_11.50 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇe tu nyaset cakram vāme śaṅkham tu vinyaset
ittham varāha rūpam te prathamam paripaṭhyate

original: atha vā kroḍavaktraṃ ca mahākāyaṃ sudaṃṣṭrakam // Vis_11.51 //
analyzed: atha vā kroḍa vaktram ca mahā kāyam su daṃṣṭrakam
sarva lakṣaṇa saṃpannam śrīvatsa aṅkita vakṣasam

original: tiryaksaṃsthitasūtraṃ ca rūpaṃ vai yanmahātmanaḥ // Vis_11.52 //
analyzed: tiryak saṃsthita sūtram ca rūpam vai yat mahātmanaḥ
vārāham madhyamam proktam saṃkṣepāt tu taponidhe

original: atha vā śṛṇu vakṣyāmi rūpaṃ vārāharūpiṇaḥ // Vis_11.53 //
analyzed: atha vā śṛṇu vakṣyāmi rūpam vārāha rūpiṇaḥ
uddhṛtya nāsikā tulyam vāma hastasya kokūrparam
vāma pārśva ardha bhāge tu nirīkṣan kokūḥ
param sadā
kaṭi pradeśam ālambya pāṇinā dakṣiṇena tu

original: evaṃ rūpaṃ mahāviṣṇoḥ śaṅkhacakradharasya ca // Vis_11.55 //
analyzed: evam rūpam mahā viṣṇoḥ śaṅkha cakra dharasya ca

original: asya dakṣiṇahastāgre cakraṃ śaṅkhaṃ pare ca hi /
analyzed: asya dakṣiṇa hasta agre cakram śaṅkham pare ca hi

original: iti vārāhamūrtasya tridhā rūpaṃ tu darśitam // Vis_11.56 //
analyzed: iti vārāha mūrtasya tridhā rūpam tu darśitam
evam uktasya rūpasya tridhākārasya nārada

original: itthaṃ rūpaṃ tu kartavyaṃ nṛsiṃhasya tataḥ śṛṇu // Vis_11.57 //
analyzed: ittham rūpam tu kartavyam nṛsiṃhasya tatas śṛṇu
galāt adhastāt nara rūpa dhārī paratra siṃha ānana bhṛt svarūpaḥ

original: bibharti netrāṇi hutāśanārkaprabhā- ñcitānyeva vibhīṣaṇāni // Vis_11.58 //
analyzed: bibharti netrāṇi hutāśana arka prabhā ñcitāni eva vibhīṣaṇāni
śaṅkha cakra dharaḥ ca eva sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitaḥ
sarva avayava saṃpūrṇaḥ sarva siddhi karaḥ śubhaḥ

original: cakraṃ ca dakṣiṇe haste śaṅkhaṃ vāme nyasedbudhaḥ /
analyzed: cakram ca dakṣiṇe haste śaṅkham vāme nyaset budhaḥ
śveta parvata saṃkāśam sarva duḥkha vināśanam
raktacandana digdha aṅgam kāla abhra uddāma niḥ svanam
śarad indu kalā daṃṣṭram kruddham hāṭaka tāṭakam
suphulla vadanam śaśvat duṣṭānām ati bhīṣaṇam

original: evaṃ rūpaṃ nṛsiṃhasya kṛtvā pūrvaṃ mṛdā (mudā?) mune // Vis_11.62 //
analyzed: evam rūpam nṛsiṃhasya kṛtvā pūrvam mṛdā mudā mune
paryaṅka kalpitam kṛtvā āsīnam viṣṭare śubhe
hastayoḥ kokūḥ
pare tasya jānvoḥ upari vinyaset
ittham nṛsiṃha rūpam te varṇitam vaṇa tā ucitam
vāmanasya vadāmaḥ u tra mi atra
rūpam śruṇu mahā mune
su smitam padmanābhena
vāmanam vāmana ākṛtim
bāla kuñjara saṃkāśam bṛhat skandham mahā bhujam
śyāmalam nīraja akṣam tu āyata amala locanam
kṣoṇī talam pada nyāsaiḥ ḍolayan iva nārada
jaṭā aṭavī samāyuktam sarveṣām ca manoharam
dvi bhujam savya hastena muṣṭinā daṇḍa dhāriṇam
ākuñcitam vāma pādam svāgatam dakṣiṇam bhujam
hāra kuṇḍala keyūra bhūṣaṇaiḥ bhūṣitam mune
lamba yajñopavītena mekhalānām trayeṇa ca

original: saṃyuktaṃ yuktarūpaṃ tu kāśyapaṃ brahmacāriṇam // Vis_11.69 //
analyzed: saṃyuktam yukta rūpam tu kāśyapam brahmacāriṇam
kaupīna dhāriṇam vā api pīta vāsasam eva ca
rakṣā artham viṣṭāpānām tu vāmana tvam upāgatam
evam su lakṣaṇa upetam rūpam kāryam mahā mune

original: jāmadagnyasya rāmasya rūpaṃ vakṣyāmyataḥ param // Vis_11.71 //
analyzed: jāmadagnyasya rāmasya rūpam vakṣyāmi atas param
tasya varṇam suvarṇa ābham dvi bhujam śveta raktakam
āsīnam tu prasanna āsyam brahma lakṣmī samāvṛtam
sarva lakṣaṇa saṃpūrṇam sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam jaṭā maṇḍala maṇḍitam

original: paraśuṃ dakṣiṇe haste vāme cāpaṃ sapatriṇam /
analyzed: paraśum dakṣiṇe haste vāme cāpam sa patriṇam

original: vāme kamaṇḍaluṃ vāpi cākṣasūtraṃ tu dakṣiṇe // Vis_11.74 //
analyzed: vāme kamaṇḍalum vā api ca akṣa sūtram tu dakṣiṇe

original: itthaṃ rūpaṃ mune tubhyaṃ jāmadagnyasya varṇitam /
analyzed: ittham rūpam mune tubhyam jāmadagnyasya varṇitam
rāmasya atha
rūpam dāśaratheḥ tava
atīva rūpa saṃpannau nīla vellita mūrdhajau
vyūḍha uraskau nata aṃsau ca keyūra aṅgada citritau
dīrgha bāhū śriyā upetau saumyau prahasita ānanau

original: karṇāntalocanau sākṣāt prathame vayasi sthitau // Vis_11.77 //
analyzed: karṇa anta locanau sākṣāt prathame vayasi sthitau
saundarya amṛta toyaiḥ ca siñcantau iva viśvatas
khaṅga hastau dhanuṣpāṇī bhuja vikhyāta vikramau
baddha godhā aṅguli trāṇau mune vaiśravaṇa upamau
audārya rūpa saṃpadbhiḥ nṛṇām citta apahāriṇau
kausalyāyāḥ sumitrāyāḥ prīti dau vīryavattarau
rākṣasa dhvānta tigmāṃśū śūrau daśaratha ātmajau
nara nārāyaṇa ākhyātau tau ubhau raghunandanau
jagatām pālana arthāya manuṣya tvam upāgatau
puṇḍarīka viśāla akṣau tau ubhau pīta vāsasau
bhuja ante baddha tūṇīrau bāṇa pāṇī mahā mune
nivasantau śriyā sākam vālmīkeḥ kavi kāvya sāgare
rakṣasām mṛtyu saṃkāśau rāvaṇasya ati rāvaṇau
nṛpa sūnū raghu śreṣṭhau bhrātarau rāma lakṣmaṇau
sarvaiḥ ca lakṣaṇaiḥ yuktau sthāpayet tantra vittamaiḥ
samasta lakṣaṇa upetām sītām rāmasya vallabhām
naiṛtānām vināśāya jātām śuddhām ayoni jām
triguṇa ātma mayīm māyām mūlaprakṛti saṃsthitām
vyakta rūpeṇa saṃjñā api sākṣāt avyakta rūpiṇīm
pativratām mahābhāgām strīṇām api uttamām śriyam
rakta padma karām devīm padmām padma upama ānanām
yauvana uddāma divya aṅgīm sītām janaka nandinīm
pātivratya guṇa upetām sītām rāmasya vallabhām
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktām nīla alaka śiroruhām
mālā nibaddha dhammillām mada vibhrānta locanām
kāla pīta ambara dharā sthāpayet rāma pārśvatas
savya muṣṭiṃṣṭau
lalāṭa antam kṛta ūrdhva mukham antaram
tasmin tri avanatam cāpam
vāsava astram vāma bāhau kārayena muni sattama
sāyakam kaṭi sūtre tu vāma pāṇim tu dakṣiṇe
kālāgni sadṛśam bāṇam paulastya anta karam dṛḍham

original: antare 'sya mukhaṃ kṛtvā golakaṃ colbaṇaṃ bhavet (?) /
analyzed: antare sya mukham kṛtvā golakam ca ulbaṇam bhavet
mardantam rāvaṇapuram sva balam sa balam
ca āyuṣam tathā
nihatya rāma hasta stham
sthāpayet dakṣiṇe kare

original: vasutālena vā vidvān navatālakrameṇa vā // Vis_11.94 //
analyzed: vasu tālena vā vidvān nava tāla krameṇa vā
berasya ca anurūpeṇa caret sarva āyudhāni vai

original: kuñcitaṃ vāmapādaṃ tu susthitaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ padam // Vis_11.95 //
analyzed: kuñcitam vāma pādam tu susthitam dakṣiṇam padam
kaniṣṭhikā aṅkita sthāne tu aṅguṣṭhasya sthitiḥ bhavet
stoka kuñcita jānuḥ ca pādaḥ vāma sthitaḥ bhavet

original: mukhe śarīre kaṭyāṃ ca triṣvaṅgeṣveṣu nārada /
analyzed: mukhe śarīre kaṭyām ca triṣu aṅgeṣu eṣu nārada
tri bhaṅgi tvāt muni śreṣṭha tri bhaṅgī iti prapaṭhyate

original: mukhaṃ dakṣiṇato bhaṅgaṃ tanumadhyaṃ tu vāmataḥ /
analyzed: mukham dakṣiṇatas bhaṅgam tanumadhyam tu vāmatas
dakṣiṇe kaṭi bhaṅgaḥ tu bhaṅga trayam udāhṛtam
vāma hastaḥ sa cāpaḥ syāt dakṣiṇaḥ sa śilīmukhaḥ

original: lakṣmaṇasya bhavedevaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ bharatasya tu // Vis_11.99 //
analyzed: lakṣmaṇasya bhavet evam lakṣaṇam bharatasya tu
śatrughnasya api athā evam syāt iti tantreṣu niścitam

original: saṃsthāpya madhyame rāmaṃ vāmapārśve 'sya lakṣmaṇam // Vis_11.100 //
analyzed: saṃsthāpya madhyame rāmam vāma pārśve lakṣmaṇam
dakṣiṇe sthāpayet devīm sītām janakanandinīm
śatrughna bharatau kāryau uttare dakṣiṇe kramāt
cāmara āsakta bāhū tau parivāra vidhau api

original: iti svatantre nirdiṣṭaṃ paratantre vadāmyaham // Vis_11.102 //
analyzed: iti svatantre nirdiṣṭam paratantre vadāmi aham
lohaiḥ ca nirmite bere ca uttama ādi kramaiḥ mune
lalāṭa paṭṭa paryantam pādāṅguṣṭhāt samucchrayam
dvātriṃśat aṅgulam viddhi uttamam kautukam dvija
asmāt sapta aṅgulaiḥ hīnam madhyamam beram ucchrayam
asmāt nava aṅgulaiḥ hīnam adhamam parikīrtitam
iti dāśaratheḥ mūrtam utsedham muni sattama
sītā lakṣmaṇayoḥ ca api bharatasya api sāmpratam
śatrughnasya api deva ṛṣe vadāmi āyāmam adya te
devasya bāhumūla antam devī utsedham pracakṣate
lakṣmaṇasya ucchrayaḥ ca api rāmasya asya antam īritam
lakṣmaṇasya bhuja antam syāt śatrughnasya ucchrayaḥ bhavet
iti dīrgha pramāṇa uktam śeṣam pūrvavat ācaret

original: svatantre paratantre ca lakṣaṇaṃ tava bhāṣitam /
analyzed: svatantre paratantre ca lakṣaṇam tava bhāṣitam

original: balarāmasya vakṣyāmi śṛṇu nārada lakṣaṇam // Vis_11.109 //
analyzed: balarāmasya vakṣyāmi śṛṇu nārada lakṣaṇam
balabhadraḥ nibhā sitā
paṅkaja akṣaḥ ṅganā vaktraḥ sarva avayava śobhitaḥ
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktaḥ sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitaḥ
sarva avayava saṃpūrṇaḥ prabhā maṇḍala maṇḍitaḥ

original: asya dakṣiṇabāhau tu musalaṃ vāmake kare /
analyzed: asya dakṣiṇa bāhau tu musalam vāmake kare

original: halaṃ tu vinyaseddhīmān balarāmasya mantravit // Vis_11.112 //
analyzed: halam tu vinyaset dhīmān balarāmasya mantra vid

original: dakṣiṇe tu śriyaṃ devīṃ saumye tu garuḍaṃ nyaset /
analyzed: dakṣiṇe tu śriyam devīm saumye tu garuḍam nyaset
pītam kṛtāñjalim tu evam balarāmaḥ tu atha īritaḥ
atas param pravakṣyāmi kṛṣṇam kṛṣṇa añjana prabham

original: sthāpanaṃ kāryamasyaiva sthānakaṃ tu viśeṣataḥ // Vis_11.114 //
analyzed: sthāpanam kāryam asya eva sthānakam tu viśeṣataḥ

original: tribhaṅgyā saṃmitaṃ taṃ tu sthitaṃ pīṭhe mahāmune /
analyzed: tri bhaṅgyā saṃmitam tam tu sthitam pīṭhe mahā mune

original: krīḍāyaṣṭisamāyuktaṃ devyā ca paramaṃ harim // Vis_11.115 //
analyzed: krīḍā yaṣṭi samāyuktam devyā ca paramam harim
sthāpayet daivike sthāne sarvajñam sarva kāraṇam

original: evaṃ saṃkṣepataḥ proktaṃ viviktenādhunā mune // Vis_11.116 //
analyzed: evam saṃkṣepataḥ proktam viviktena adhunā mune
atas śyāma nibham vā api pīta ambara samanvitam
vāsudevam guḍākeśam sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
krīḍā yaṣṭi dharam devam tri bhaṅga sthiti saṃyutam

original: susthitaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ pādaṃ vāmapādaṃ tu kuñcitam // Vis_11.118 //
analyzed: susthitam dakṣiṇam pādam vāma pādam tu kuñcitam
vāma pāda talam tiryak krameṇa eva tu kārayet
tad kaniṣṭhā aṅguli sthāne ca aṅguṣṭha sthitim ācaret
kiñcid kuñcita jānuḥ ca vāma pāda sthitiḥ bhavet

original: vaktre caiva tathā gātre kaṭiyantre tathaiva ca // Vis_11.120 //
analyzed: vaktre ca eva tathā gātre kaṭi yantre tathā eva ca
triṣu
bhaṅgi tvāt tri bhaṅgi tvam vidhīyate

original: vaktraṃ dakṣiṇato bhaṅge madhyakāyaṃ tu vāmataḥ // Vis_11.121 //
analyzed: vaktram dakṣiṇatas bhaṅge madhyakāyam tu vāmatas
kaṭi dakṣiṇatas bhaṅge bhaṅga trayam udāhṛtam
kārayet dakṣiṇam hastam su yaṣṭim kaṭaka anvitam
vāmam devī bhuja āsaktam vāma hastam adhomukham

original: vāmaṃ karatalaṃ caiva nābhisūtreṇa yojayet // Vis_11.123 //
analyzed: vāmam kara talam ca eva nābhi sūtreṇa yojayet
dakṣiṇam kaṭi hastam tu vaktra sūtreṇa yojayet
tri bhāga mānam āyāmam mukham mūrdhni tri golakam
hanugrīvam tri mātra ardham ardha mātram galam smṛtam
hikkā na abhimukhe ca eva madhyakāyam pratiṣṭhitam
meḍhram nābhimukham nāhaḥ tasmāt ūrū mukha dvayam

original: mānaṃ saṃkṣepataḥ proktaṃ śeṣaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ smṛtam // Vis_11.126 //
analyzed: mānam saṃkṣepataḥ proktam śeṣam sādhāraṇam smṛtam
devyau tad pārśvayoḥ ca eva sthāpayet krama yogataḥ

original: devasya dakṣiṇe kuryāt rukmiṇoṃ rukmasaṃnibhām // Vis_11.127 //
analyzed: devasya dakṣiṇe kuryāt rukmiṇīm om rukma saṃnibhām

original: pūrvavat kamalaṃ gṛhyaṃ sātvikena samāyutam // Vis_11.128 //
analyzed: pūrvavat kamalam gṛhyam sātvikena samāyutam

original: svatantre caivamuktaṃ tu paratantre vadāmi te /
analyzed: svatantre ca evam uktam tu paratantre vadāmi te
lohena muni śārdūlaḥ uttama ādi krameṇa tu
saṃproktam rāghavasya evam tadvat utpādayet iha
lakṣaṇam yādava indrasya utsedha ādi kramam mune
navanīta artha nṛttam ca sarpa nṛttam atha api vā
iti evamādi mūrtīnām lakṣaṇam muni sattama
yajamāna icchayā tasmin kārayet sva sva līlayā

original: yuktyā yuktiviśeṣeṇa pratimāṃ kārayet kramāt // Vis_11.132 //
analyzed: yuktyā yukti viśeṣeṇa pratimām kārayet kramāt
iti yādava siṃhasya lakṣaṇam parikīrtitam
saṃkṣepeṇa muni śreṣṭha kalkilkī
viṣṇoḥ atas śṛṇu
ati śoṇa vaṇita
saṃkāśaḥ tri netraḥ bhīma rūpavān
śaṅkha cakra gadā pāṇiḥ catur bāhuḥ kirīṭa dhṛk
vanamālā samāyuktaḥ sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitaḥ
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktaḥ pīta vastra samanvitaḥ

original: evaṃ kalkirmayā prokto hetinyāsaṃ vadāmi te /
analyzed: evam kalkiḥ mayā proktaḥ heti nyāsam vadāmi te

original: dakṣiṇorghvakare cakraṃ vāmordhve śaṅkhameva tu // Vis_11.136 //
analyzed: cakram vāma ūrdhve śaṅkham eva tu
vāmasya adhara haste tu pāśam kṛṣṇa nibham nyaset
kārayet dakṣiṇe haste kāladaṇḍam tu adhomukham

original: śriyaṃ dakṣiṇapārśve tu vāme puṣṭiṃ nyasedbudhaḥ /
analyzed: śriyam dakṣiṇa pārśve tu vāme puṣṭim nyaset budhaḥ
dbitīya āvaraṇe ca aṣṭa parivāra samanvitam

original: evaṃ saṃcintya kalkiṃ tu pūjayettu vidhānataḥ /
analyzed: evam saṃcintya kalkim tu pūjayet tu vidhānataḥ

original: kalau yuge viśeṣeṇa kalkiṃ saṃpūjayed dvija // Vis_11.139 //
analyzed: kalau yuge viśeṣeṇa kalkim saṃpūjayet dvija

original: nṛpo vā nṛpamātro vā pūjayettu dine dine /
analyzed: nṛpaḥ vā nṛpa mātraḥ vā pūjayet tu dine dine

original: sarvān kāmānavāpnoti jayalakṣmīṃ sa gacchati // Vis_11.140 //
analyzed: sarvān kāmān avāpnoti jaya lakṣmīm sa gacchati
viśeṣam cāṣaḥ ca
tra saṃ proktam ktaḥ
śeṣam sādhāraṇam smṛtam

original: evaṃ kalkermayā proktaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sarvasiddhidam // Vis_11.141 //
analyzed: evam kalkeḥ mayā proktam lakṣaṇam sarva siddhi dam
mūrtīnām lakṣaṇam vakṣye śāstra bhedena cihnitam

original: adimūrtiḥ paro devo vāsudevaḥ sanātanaḥ // Vis_11.142 //
analyzed: adi mūrtiḥ paraḥ devaḥ vāsudevaḥ sanātanaḥ

original: dvitīyā tu parā mūrtiḥ saṃkarṣaṇa iti smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: dvitīyā tu parā mūrtiḥ saṃkarṣaṇaḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: pradyumnākhyā tṛtīyā tu mūrtireṣā sanātanī // Vis_11.143 //
analyzed: pradyumna ākhyā tṛtīyā tu mūrtiḥ eṣā sanātanī
caturthī tu bhavet mūrtiḥ aniruddha iti saṃjñitā

original: catasro mūrtayastvetāḥ pratiṣṭhāyāḥ pṛthak pṛthak // Vis_11.144 //
analyzed: catasraḥ mūrtayaḥ tu etāḥ pratiṣṭhāyāḥ pṛthak pṛthak
vāsudevaḥ parā mūrtiḥ sthāpanīyā dvijottamaiḥ
dvitīyā sthāpyate mūrtiḥ kṣatriyaiḥ mokṣa kāṃkṣibhiḥ

original: pradyumnākhyā tu viprendra vaiśyaiḥ sthāpyā mumukṣubhiḥ /
analyzed: pradyumna ākhyā tu vipra indra vaiśyaiḥ sthāpyā mumukṣubhiḥ
śūdraiḥ saṃsthāpyate mūrtiḥ aniruddhaḥ jagadguruḥ
bhedaiḥ tribhiḥ tribhiḥ vipraḥ ekaikā bhidyate punar
varṇa astra nyāsa bhedena bhedāḥ ca parikīrtitāḥ
mūrtīnām keśava ādīnām viviktena śṛṇu kramāt

original: śaṅkhakundanibhaṃ vāpi hyathavā śyāmameva ca // Vis_11.148 //
analyzed: śaṅkha kunda nibham vā api hi athavā śyāmam eva ca
śaṅkha cakra gadā pāṇim śrīvatsa aṅkita vakṣasam
sarva avayava saṃpūrṇam sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
pīta ambara samāyuktam catur bāhum kirīṭinam
evam dhyāyet muni śreṣṭha bhukti mukti pradam harim
astra vinyāsa bhedam ca pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu kramāt
dakṣiṇa ūrdhva kare cakram vāma ūrdhve śaṅkham udvahan
gadām vāma adhare haste nīrajam dakṣiṇa adhare

original: ādimūrtestu bhedo 'yaṃ keśavākhyaṃ mune śṛṇu // Vis_11.152 //
analyzed: ādi mūrteḥ tu bhedaḥ yam keśava ākhyam mune śṛṇu
nārāyaṇam atho vakṣye śṛṇu nārada sattama

original: kundapuṣpanibhaṃ vāpi śyāmaṃ vā raktameva vā // Vis_11.153 //
analyzed: kunda puṣpa nibham vā api śyāmam vā raktam eva vā
śaṅkha cakra gadā pāṇim catur bāhum kirīṭinam
pīta ambara samāyuktam sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
sarva avayava saṃyuktam sarva alaṃkāra śobhitam
sarva deva mayam sūkṣmam trailokya adhipatim harim

original: evaṃ rūpaṃ tu saṃcintya hetinyāsamatho śṛṇu /
analyzed: evam rūpam tu saṃcintya heti nyāsam atho śṛṇu

original: dakṣiṇe tu kare cordhve padmaṃ mukulakaṃ nyaset // Vis_11.156 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇe tu kare ca ūrdhve padmam mukulakam nyaset

original: asyādhare tu cakraṃ syāt kālāgnisadṛśaṃ mune /
analyzed: asya adhare tu cakram syāt kālāgni sadṛśam mune

original: vāmordhve tu gadāṃ nyasya hyadhohaste 'mbujaṃ nyaset // Vis_11.157 //
analyzed: vāma ūrdhve tu gadām nyasya hi adhas haste mbujam nyaset
evam ca āyudha vinyāsaḥ mādhavam ca adhunā śṛṇu
śaṅkha puṣpa dala prakhyam śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam
sarva avayava saṃpūrṇam sarva alaṃkāra śobhitam
sarva ābharaṇa saṃpūrṇam catur bāhum kirīṭinam
mādhavaḥ tu adhunā proktaḥ madhu kaiṭabha nāśanaḥ

original: astravinyāsabhedaṃ tu śṛṇu cāsya mahāmune // Vis_11.160 //
analyzed: astra vinyāsa bhedam tu śṛṇu ca asya mahā mune
vāma pārśva ūrdhva haste tu śaṅkham dhavalakam nyaset

original: adhohaste nyasedraktaṃ padmaṃ ca daśapatrakam // Vis_11.161 //
analyzed: adhas haste nyaset raktam padmam ca daśa patrakam
dakṣiṇa ūrdhva kare cakram adhastāt lakuṭam nyaset

original: tṛtīyā tu bhavenmūrtiḥ mādhavākhyā tu nārada // Vis_11.162 //
analyzed: tṛtīyā tu bhavet mūrtiḥ mādhava ākhyā tu nārada
vāsudevasya bhedaḥ yam vakṣye saṃkarṣaṇasya te

original: taruṇārkanibhaṃ vāpi śyāmaṃ vābhranibhaṃ tu vā // Vis_11.163 //
analyzed: taruṇa arka nibham vā api śyāmam vā abhra nibham tu vā
pīta vastram catur bāhum sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
sarva avayava saṃyuktam govindam
evam dhyāyet muni śreṣṭha sarva kāma pradam harim

original: asyāstranyāsabhedaṃ tu śruṇu nārada sattama // Vis_11.165 //
analyzed: asya astra nyāsa bhedam tu śruṇu nārada sattama
dakṣiṇa ūrdhva kare tasya gadām cakram adhas nyaset
vāma pārśva ūrdhva haste bjam śaṅkham anye tu vinyaset
govindaḥ evam saṃproktaḥ viṣṇu ākhyam adhunā śṛṇu

original: raktapadmadalaprakhyaṃ śyāmaṃ vā raktameva vā // Vis_11.167 //
analyzed: rakta padma dala prakhyam śyāmam vā raktam eva vā
kṛṣṇam vā muni śārdūla sarva lakṣaṇa saṃyutam
sarva avayava saṃpūrṇam sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
śaṅkha cakra gadā pāṇim pīta vastram catur bhujam
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam dhyāyet viṣṇum sanātanam

original: prathame tu kare padmaṃ hyadhastāt kārayedgadām /
analyzed: prathame tu kare padmam hi adhastāt kārayet gadām

original: vāme śaṅkhaṃ nyasettasya hyadhaścakraṃ virājitam // Vis_11.170 //
analyzed: vāme śaṅkham nyaset tasya hi adhas cakram virājitam

original: atha vā muniśārdūla śṛṇu viṣṇuṃ sanātanam /
analyzed: atha vā muni śārdūla śṛṇu viṣṇum sanātanam
ṛju sthitam su saumyam yat kaṭi hasta samanvitam
śaṅkha cakra abhaya upetam pīta ambara samanvitam
sarva avayava saṃpūrṇam sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam dhyāyet viṣṇum anuttamam

original: dviprakāraṃ mayā proktaṃ viṣṇuṃ sakalamavyayam // Vis_11.173 //
analyzed: dvi prakāram mayā proktam viṣṇum sakalam avyayam
evam dhyāyet muni śreṣṭha kartuḥ icchā vaśāt kuru
rakta utpala dala prakhyam pīta vastram catur bhujam
śaṅkha cakra gadā pāṇim sarva avayava śobhitam
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
sarva avayava saṃpūrṇam sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam sarva siddhi pradam param
prathame tu kare śaṅgam adhastāt cakrakam nyaset

original: padmaṃ vāmordhvahaste tu gadāṃ cādhaḥ kare nyaset // Vis_11.177 //
analyzed: padmam vāma ūrdhva haste tu gadām ca adhas kare nyaset
madhusūdana mūrtasya lakṣaṇam viddhi nārada
saṃkarṣaṇasya bhedaḥ yam trivikramam atha śṛṇu
tapta hāṭaka saṃkāśam śyāmam vagni nibham tu vā
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam sarva avayava śobhitam
sarva ābharaṇa saṃyuktam pīta vastram catur bhujam
śaṅkha cakra gadā pāṇim sarva devaiḥ namaskṛtam
trivikramasya saṃproktam lakṣaṇam ca samṛddhi dam
gadām prathama haste tu hi adhastāt cakram udvahan
vāme padmam adhas śaṅkham dṛśyate yatra kutracid

original: yathākāmaṃ tu vā cāstravinyāsaṃ munisattama // Vis_11.182 //
analyzed: yathākāmam tu vā ca astra vinyāsam muni sattama
evam proktaḥ vāmanaḥ ucyate
karṇikāra dala prakhyam rakta varṇam catur bhujam
sarva avayava saṃpūrṇam sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam sarva siddhi pradam param

original: prathame tu kare cakraṃ adhaḥśaṅkhaśca dṛśyate /
analyzed: prathame tu kare cakram adhas śaṅkhaḥ ca dṛśyate

original: gadā ca vāmahaste tu hyadhaḥ padmaṃ ca śobhate // Vis_11.185 //
analyzed: gadā ca vāma haste tu hi adhas padmam ca śobhate
vāmana ākhyaḥ tu vipra indra vijñeyaḥ śubha lakṣaṇaḥ
tapta jāmbūnada prakhyam śrīvatsa aṅkita vakṣasam
sarva avayava saṃpūrṇam sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
pīta vastram catur bāhum śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam
śrīdharasya mayā proktam lakṣaṇam bhukti mukti dam

original: ūrdhve cakramadhaḥ padmaṃ dakṣiṇe tu kare nyaset // Vis_11.188 //
analyzed: ūrdhve cakram adhas padmam dakṣiṇe tu kare nyaset

original: vāme caiva gadā jñeyā hyadhaḥśaṅkhaṃ virājitam /
analyzed: vāme ca eva gadā jñeyā hi adhas śaṅkham virājitam
tathā śrīdhara mūrtiḥ tu vijñeyā deśika uttamaiḥ
evam pradyumna bhedaḥ tu aniruddha ākhyaḥ ucyate
nīlotpala dala prakhyam catur bāhum kirīṭinam
śaṅkha cakra gadā pāṇim sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
śrīvatsa vakṣasā upetam hṛṣīkeśam sanātanam
dakṣiṇe sya mahā cakra gadām ca tad adhas sthitām
vāma haste mahāpadmam adhastāt śaṅkham eva ca
sā mūrtiḥ tu tadā jñeyā hṛṣīkeśa iti śasya nārada
padmanābhasya vakṣye haṃ lakṣaṇam bhukti mukti dam
nīla varṇa nibham vā atha śyāmam vā muni sattama

original: saṃjñātvā lakṣaṇaṃ tatra sarvajñaṃ sarvakāraṇam // Vis_11.194 //
analyzed: saṃjñātvā lakṣaṇam tatra sarvajñam sarva kāraṇam
kārayet muni śārdūla śilpibhiḥ saha sādhakaḥ
sarva lakṣaṇa saṃpannam sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
sarva avayava saṃpūrṇam catur bāhum kirīṭinam
śaṅkha cakra gadā pāṇim pīta ambara samanvitam
śrīvatsa vakṣasā upetam padmanābham avaive hi tam

original: prathame 'sya kare padmamadhastācchaṅkha eva tu // Vis_11.197 //
analyzed: prathame kare padmam adhastāt śaṅkhaḥ eva tu

original: vāme ca dṛśyate cakraṃ gadā ca tadadhaḥ sthitā /
analyzed: vāme ca dṛśyate cakram gadā ca tad adhas sthitā

original: sā mūrtiḥ padmanābheti namaskāryā vicakṣaṇaiḥ // Vis_11.198 //
analyzed: sā mūrtiḥ padmanābha iti namaskāryā vicakṣaṇaiḥ
vinyaset vā yathākāmam śastra vinyāsam atra tu

original: atha vā padmanābhasya lakṣaṇaṃ śṛṇu suvrata // Vis_11.199 //
analyzed: atha vā padmanābhasya lakṣaṇam śṛṇu suvrata

original: dvibhujaṃ paṅkajākṣaṃ tu śyāmaṃ vāgninibhaṃ tu vā /
analyzed: dvi bhujam paṅkaja akṣam tu śyāmam vā agni nibham tu vā
dhyāyet tasmin muni śreṣṭha kārayet lakṣaṇaiḥ yutam
śayane sati saṃproktam padmanābhasya nārada
atra karma arcana ādīnām lakṣaṇam vakṣyate dhunā
yoga mudrā samāyuktam śaṅkha cakra samanvitam

original: kārayettu muniśreṣṭha karmārcāṃ pūrvavattu vā // Vis_11.202 //
analyzed: kārayet tu muni śreṣṭha karma arcām pūrvavat tu vā
iti evam padmanābhasya lakṣaṇam parikīrtitam
bhitti pārśve nābhi ūrdhve rakta padmam su nālakam
kārayet su manaḥ ramyam śata patram sa karṇikam

original: tadardhaṃ vārdhakaṃ vāpi dalaṃ padmasya nārada // Vis_11.204 //
analyzed: tad ardham vā ardhakam vā api dalam padmasya nārada
karṇikā agre vidhim dhyāyet lakṣaṇaiḥ saha nārada
tad lakṣaṇam pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu bhukti śubha pradam
padmāsana samāyuktam vidhim kanaka saṃnibham
catur bhujam samāsīnam catur vaktram sanātanam
sarva avayava saṃpūrṇam sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
sarva deva mayam sūkṣmam sṛṣṭi sthiti laya ātmakam

original: evaṃ rūpaṃ tato dhyāyet brahmāṇaṃ kamalodbhavam /
analyzed: evam rūpam tatas dhyāyet brahmāṇam kamalodbhavam

original: brahmaṇo dakṣiṇe haste sruksruvākṣāṃśca vinyaset // Vis_11.208 //
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ dakṣiṇe haste sruc sruva akṣān ca vinyaset

original: vāmahaste nyaset padmaṃ ūrdhve caiva kamaṇḍalum /
analyzed: vāma haste nyaset padmam ūrdhve ca eva kamaṇḍalum

original: abhayaṃ varadaṃ vāpi vāmahastādharaṃ mune // Vis_11.209 //
analyzed: abhayam vara dam vā api vāma hasta adharam mune

original: evaṃ rūpaṃ tu saṃcintya brahmāṇaṃ kamalāsanam /
analyzed: evam rūpam tu saṃcintya brahmāṇam kamalāsanam

original: atha vā kārayennyāsaṃ śṛṇu guhyopari kramāt // Vis_11.210 //
analyzed: atha vā kārayet nyāsam śṛṇu guhya upari kramāt
viparītena hastābhyām ūru mūle tu saṃspṛśet
aṅguli agre muni śreṣṭha yogamudre yam ucyate
yogamudrā mayā proktā sarva yogeṣu yojayet

original: asya dakṣiṇapārśve tu medhāṃ vāme sarasvatīm // Vis_11.212 //
analyzed: asya dakṣiṇa pārśve tu medhām vāme sarasvatīm
vinyaset ca svatantre tu paratantre tayoḥ vinā

original: evaṃ kṛtvā vidhānena brahmāṇaṃ kamalāsanam // Vis_11.213 //
analyzed: evam kṛtvā vidhānena brahmāṇam kamalāsanam
padmanābhasya mūrta aṅgam paratantram iti smṛtam

original: svatantre muniśārdūla śilpibhiḥ saha mantravit // Vis_11.214 //
analyzed: sva tantre muni śārdūla śilpibhiḥ saha mantra vid
kalpayet vidhivat padmam saṃsthāpya kamalāsanam

original: brahmasthāne 'thavā pūrve dakṣiṇe paścime 'tha vā // Vis_11.215 //
analyzed: brahmasthāne pūrve dakṣiṇe paścime tha vā
grāmasya uttara pārśve vā kalpayet āspadam kramāt

original: nadītīre taṭākasya tīre vā munisattama // Vis_11.216 //
analyzed: nadī tīre taṭākasya tīre vā muni sattama
yajamāna icchayā prāsādaḥ vidhivat kramāt

original: tadbrāhme daivike vāpi kārayet kamalāsanam // Vis_11.217 //
analyzed: tat brāhme daivike vā api kārayet kamalāsanam

original: ṣaṅberaṃ vā triberaṃ vā sthāpayettu vidhānataḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṅberam vā triberam vā sthāpayet tu vidhānataḥ
saṃpūjayet tatas bhaktyā vaiṣṇavaiḥ vedapāragaiḥ
pañcarātra samāyuktaiḥ ūha apoha samarthakaiḥ

original: svatantreṇaiva vā tatra brahmasūktena vā mune // Vis_11.219 //
analyzed: svatantreṇa eva vā tatra brahmasūktena vā mune
puruṣa nara
sūktena vā brahman pūjayet tu vidhānataḥ

original: evaṃ saṃpūjayettatra śeṣaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ smṛtam // Vis_11.220 //
analyzed: evam saṃpūjayet tatra śeṣam sādhāraṇam smṛtam

original: brahmaṇo 'gre vimāne ca haṃsaṃ tasya pade mune /
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ gre vimāne ca haṃsam tasya pade mune
kārayet vāhana artham vā yathākāmam vicitritam
garbhāgāre pravakṣyāmi parivāra viśeṣakam

original: paiśāce dvāradeśe ca śṛṇu guhyamanuttamam // Vis_11.222 //
analyzed: paiśāce dvāra deśe ca śṛṇu guhyam anuttamam
kapilaḥ kāśyapaḥ dakṣaḥ dakṣiṇam pakṣam āśritaḥ
rudraḥ vahniḥ marut ca api vāma pārśvam samāśritāḥ
bhṛguḥ ca nāradaḥ ca api vimāna dvārapālakau
candra ādityau muni śreṣṭha dvitīya dvārapālakau
śaṅkha padma nidhī ca eva tṛtīya dvārapālakau
tad pūjā muni śārdūla yajña svādhyāya karma kṛt
brahma ṛddhi karam puṃsām sarva saṃpad sukha āvaham
sarva duḥkha vināśam tat rāja rāṣṭa vivṛddhi dam
tasmāt sarva prayatnena vidhim vidhivat arcayet

original: viśeṣaścātra saṃproktaḥ śeṣaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ smṛtam // Vis_11.227 //
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ ca atra saṃproktaḥ śeṣam sādhāraṇam smṛtam
evam saṃkṣepataḥ proktam svatantra arcā vidhānakam
brahmaṇaḥ muni śārdūla dāmodaram atho śṛṇu
nīla jīmūta saṃkāśam pīta vastram catur bhujam
sarva avayava saṃpūrṇam sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam śrīvatsa aṅkita vakṣasam
śaṅkha cakra gadā pāṇim vanamālā virājitam
evam dhyāyet sva rūpam tu domodaram anāmayam

original: prathame 'sya kare śaṅkha adhastāt padmameva hi // Vis_11.231 //
analyzed: prathame sya kare śaṅkha adhastāt padmam eva hi

original: vāme caiva gadā tasya hyadhastāccakrameva hi /
analyzed: vāme ca eva gadā tasya hi adhastāt cakram eva hi

original: aniruddhasya bhedo 'yaṃ dāmodara iti smṛtaḥ // Vis_11.232 //
analyzed: aniruddhasya bhedaḥ yam dāmodaraḥ iti smṛtaḥ
catasṛṇām ca mūrtīnām bhedāḥ saṃparikīrtitāḥ

original: ādimūrti pratiṣṭhākhyā nityamarcā yuge yuge // Vis_11.233 //
analyzed: ādi mūrti pratiṣṭhā ākhyā nityam arcā yuge yuge

original: tretāyāṃ tu dvitīyā tu tṛtīyā dvāpare tathā /
analyzed: tretāyām tu dvitīyā tu tṛtīyā dvāpare tathā

original: kalau yuge 'niruddhastu sarve sarveṣu vā punaḥ // Vis_11.234 //
analyzed: kalau yuge niruddhaḥ tu sarve sarveṣu vā punar
parameṣṭhī ādi mantraiḥ tu sthāpayet tu yathākramam
evam dvādaśa mūrtīnām lakṣaṇam paripaṭhyate
kiṃśukāram
sama prakhyam trinetram bhīma rūpiṇam

original: sahasraṃ vā tadardhaṃ vā hyaṣṭottaraśataṃ tu vā // Vis_11.236 //
analyzed: sahasram vā tad ardham vā hi aṣṭottaraśatam tu vā
atha vā aṣṭa bhujam vā api kārayet su manoramam
pīta ambara samāyuktam sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam sarva praharaṇa anvitam

original: evaṃ rūpaṃ tu saṃcintya viśvarūpamayaṃ harim // Vis_11.238 //
analyzed: evam rūpam tu saṃcintya viśva rūpa mayam harim
dakṣiṇa ūrdhva kare cakram musalam ca apare bhujekare

original: tasyādhare tu pāśaḥsyāt aṅkuśaṃ cāpare nyaset // Vis_11.239 //
analyzed: tasya adhare tu pāśaḥ syāt aṅkuśam ca apare nyaset

original: cakraṃ vāmādhare haste tasyordhve lakuṭaṃ nyaset /
analyzed: cakram vāma adhare haste tasya ūrdhve lakuṭam nyaset
lakuṭasya ūrdhva haste tu śaṅkham go kṣīra saṃnibham
śaṅkha ūrdhve sa śaram cāpam evam praharaṇam nyaset

original: śeṣāṇyastrāṇi sarvāṇi yathākāmaṃ nyaset kare // Vis_11.241 //
analyzed: śeṣāṇi astrāṇi sarvāṇi yathākāmam nyaset kare
viśvarūpasya saṃproktam lakṣaṇam jaya vṛddhi dam
śuddha sphaṭika saṃkāśam tri pādam sapta hastakam
veda śṛṅgam dvi vadanam tri netram pīta vāsasam
śaṅkha cakra gadā pāṇim sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
sarva avayava saṃpūrṇam sarva alaṃkāra śobhitam

original: evaṃ saṃkṣepato proktaṃ yajñeśaṃ cāghanāśanam // Vis_11.244 //
analyzed: evam proktam yajñeśam ca agha nāśanam
dakṣiṇe kare ca ūrdhve cakram kālāgni saṃnibham

original: lakuṭaṃ cāpare nyasya vāmordhve śaṅkhamudvahan // Vis_11.245 //
analyzed: lakuṭam ca apare nyasya vāma ūrdhve śaṅkham udvahan
asya adhare bhayam hastam vara dam vā smaret mune
haviḥ bhāga grahītāram tri hastena samāhitam
evam dhyāyeta tri sandhyāyām yajñeśam paramam harim

original: trisandhyamekasandhyaṃ vā yajñeśaṃ pūjayed dvijaḥ // Vis_11.247 //
analyzed: trisandhyam ekasandhyam vā yajñeśam pūjayet dvijaḥ
sarvān kāmān avāpnoti sarva yajña phalam labhet
dhyānena utpadyamānena samyak jñānam avāpyate
tasmāt sarva prayatnena yajñeśam pūjayet dvijaḥ
yajñeśaḥ tu adhunā proktaḥ vedamūrtim atho śṛṇu
śyāmam parvata saṃkāśam catur bāhum kirīṭinam
sarva avayava saṃpūrṇam sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
śaṅkha cakra gadā pāṇim trinetram bhīma rūpiṇam
pīta ambara samāyuktam sarva apalaṃkāra saṃyutam
sarva veda mayam sūkṣmam guhyāt guhyam anuttamam
vedamūrtiḥ mayā proktā heti nyāsam atho śṛṇu
asya dakṣiṇa hasta ūrdhve cakram kāla anala prabham

original: cāpaṃ cādharahaste tu vinyasettu mahāmune // Vis_11.253 //
analyzed: cāpam ca adhara haste tu vinyaset tu mahā mune
savya pārśva ūrdhva haste tu pāñcajanyam adhas gadām
evam ca āyudha vinyāsam śriyā ādīnām atha śṛṇu
tapta jāmbūnada mayīm catur hasta samanvitām
sarva avayava saṃpūrṇām sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitām
sarva śakti samopetām makuṭa ādi virājitām
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktām sarva ratna virājitām
rakta padma dharām devīm rakta ambara samanvitām
padmāsana samāyuktām sākṣāt devīm haripriyām
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktām sarva ratna virājitām
śaṅkha cakra ambuja dharām lakṣmīm evam tu cintayet
dakṣiṇa ūrdhva kare cakram adhas padmam virājitam

original: vāme śaṅkhamadhaḥ padmaṃ varadaṃ vābhayaṃ tu vā // Vis_11.259 //
analyzed: vāme śaṅkham adhas padmam vara dam vā abhayam tu vā
evam dhyāyet muni śreṣṭha sva tantra arcā vidhānake

original: paratantre tu vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇaṃ puṣṭisaṃyutam // Vis_11.260 //
analyzed: paratantre tu vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam puṣṭi saṃyutam

original: śaṅkhacakraṃ vyapohyaiva śriyaṃ puṣṭiṃ tu kalpayet /
analyzed: śaṅkha cakram vyapohya eva śriyam puṣṭim tu kalpayet

original: dvibhujāṃ kanakābhāsāṃ śriyaṃ vinyasya dakṣiṇe // Vis_11.261 //
analyzed: dvi bhujām kanaka ābhāsām śriyam vinyasya dakṣiṇe

original: puṣṭiṃ vāme nyasettasyāḥ lakṣaṇaṃ śṛṇu nārada /
analyzed: puṣṭim vāme nyaset tasyāḥ lakṣaṇam śṛṇu nārada

original: dūrvāśyāmāṃ suraktāṃ vā dvibhujāṃ paṅkajānanām // Vis_11.262 //
analyzed: dūrvā śyāmām su raktām vā dvi bhujām paṅkaja ānanām
sarva avayava saṃpūrṇām makuṭa ādi virājitām
rakta padma ūrdhva gām devīm sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitām
divya mālya ambara dharām divya ratna virājitām

original: raktapadmakarāṃ devīṃ dhyāyet puṣṭiṃ haripriyām // Vis_11.264 //
analyzed: rakta padma karām devīm dhyāyet puṣṭim haripriyām
evam dhyātvā muni śreṣṭha kārayet su manoramām

original: evaṃ puṣṭiṃ tu saṃcintya sarvaduḥkhāghanāśinīm // Vis_11.265 //
analyzed: evam puṣṭim tu saṃcintya sarva duḥkha agha nāśinīm
medhāmūrtim atho vakṣye sarva vidyā pradāyinīm
rakta padma dala prakhyām padmāsana gatām śubhām
sarva lakṣaṇa saṃpannām sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitām
dvi bhujām dvi dṛśā aṃśam
devīm medhām makuṭa dhāriṇīm

original: medhā caiva mayā proktā vāgdevīmadhunā śṛṇu /
analyzed: medhā ca eva mayā proktā vāgdevīm adhunā śṛṇu
śuddha sphaṭika saṃkāśām śveta padma gatām śubhām
padmāsana samopetām catur hasta samanvitām
śveta ambara samāyuktām muktā ābharaṇa bhūṣitām
tridṛśāṃśam
dvi dṛśā aṃśam
vā api hi akṣa mālā dharām śubhām
vyākhyāna pustaka āyuktām vāgdevīm makuṭa anvitām
evam sarasvatīm dhyāyet sarva devī mayīm parām
para tantra vidhānam ced pravakṣyāmi sarasvatīm
sarva lakṣaṇa saṃpannām sarva avayava śābhitām
sarva ābharaṇa saṃyuktām dvi bhujām dvi dṛśā aṃśam parām
viśeṣaḥ ca atra saṃproktaḥ śeṣam pūrvavat ācaret

original: ityevaṃ paratantre tu lakṣaṇaṃ paripaṭhyate // Vis_11.273 //
analyzed: iti evam paratantre tu lakṣaṇam paripaṭhyate
gaṇanā valayam ca ūrdhve vāmasya ūrdhve kamaṇḍalum
pustakam ca adhare haste sarva vidyā arṇava amṛtam
pratipādana mudrām ca dakṣiṇa adhara hastake
paratantre muni śreṣṭa padma hastām śubha ānanām
aṅghri pārśva iṃśukam gṛhya evam vāṇīm prakalpayet

original: evaṃ saṃkṣepataḥ proktaṃ durgāmūrtimatho śṛṇu // Vis_11.276 //
analyzed: evam saṃkṣepataḥ proktam durgā mūrtim atho śṛṇu
śyāmā adri śikhara ākārām trinetrām paṅkaja ānanām

original: dvinetrāṃ vā muniśreṣṭha caturhastāṣṭakaṃ tu vā // Vis_11.277 //
analyzed: dvi netrām vā muni śreṣṭha catur hasta aṣṭakam tu vā
sarva avayava saṃpūrṇām makuṭa ādi virājitām
śaṅkha cakra abhaya bhujām karām
padmasya upari saṃsthitām

original: durgāṃ caivaṃ mayā proktāṃ hetinyāsamatho śṛṇu /
analyzed: durgām ca evam mayā proktām heti nyāsam atho śṛṇu
dakṣiṇa ūrdhva kare cakram abhayam ca apare kare
vāma ūrdhve kambu vinyasya hi adhastāt kaṭi hastakam

original: evaṃ caturbhuje prokta aṣṭahaste tvatho śṛṇu // Vis_11.280 //
analyzed: evam catur bhuje prokta aṣṭa haste tu atho śṛṇu
tasya dakṣiṇa hasta ūrdhve cakram kālāgni saṃnibham

original: asyādhare tu śaṅkhaḥ syāt khaṅgaṃ cādharadoṣṇi tu // Vis_11.281 //
analyzed: asya adhare tu śaṅkhaḥ syāt khaṅgam ca adhara doṣṇi tu
śūlam vidruma prakhyam vinyaset apare śubhekare

original: evaṃ dakṣiṇapārśve tu proktaṃ vāme tvatha śṛṇu // Vis_11.282 //
analyzed: evam dakṣiṇa pārśve tu proktam vāme tu atha śṛṇu

original: cāpo vāmordhvahaste syāt hyadhastācchaṅkha eva tu /
analyzed: cāpaḥ vāma ūrdhva haste syāt hi adhastāt śaṅkhaḥ eva tu

original: parighopyadhare haste gadā caivāpare kare // Vis_11.283 //
analyzed: parighā upya adhare haste gadā ca eva apare kare
evam saṃkṣepataḥ proktām mahiṣa anta karī śubhā
atra kaścid viśeṣaḥ sti durgā pūjā vidhi krame
saṃhitām tu kare gṛhya pūjayet vidhi coditam

original: viśeṣaścātra saṃproktaḥ śeṣaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ smṛtam // Vis_11.285 //
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ ca atra saṃproktaḥ śeṣam sādhāraṇam smṛtam
vighneśam vaiṣṇavam vakṣye sarva vighna upanāśanam
utpatti lakṣaṇam ca asya saṃkṣepāt śṛṇu nārada
nārāyaṇa aṃśakam sākṣāt ākāśa ātmakam avyayam
hasti vaktra samāyuktam līlayā agnau samudbhavam
duṣṭa pradhvaṃsana arthāya yāga agnau paramam

original: atastallakṣaṇaṃ vakṣye viviktena śṛṇu kramāt // Vis_11.288 //
analyzed: atas tad lakṣaṇam vakṣye viviktena śṛṇu kramāt

original: śvetaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ tathā śyāmaṃ raktaṃ vā munisattama /
analyzed: śvetam kṛṣṇam tathā śyāmam raktam vā muni sattama
saṃjñātvā lakṣaṇa upetam kārayet hastivaktrakam
sarva avayava saṃpūrṇam sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam

original: caturbāhuṃ dvinetraṃ ca triṇetraṃ vātra kārayet // Vis_11.290 //
analyzed: catur bāhum dvi netram ca tri netram vā atra kārayet
nāga yajñopavīta aṅgam śveta ambara samanvitam
śaṅkha cakra samāyuktam vara dam raśanā aṅkuśam
vinyaset muni śārdūla kartuḥ icchā vaśāt kramāt
kārayet yāga vighnasya nāśa artham vighnanāyakam
dakṣiṇe nyaset cakram abhayam tu apare bhujekare

original: vāme śaṅkhaṃ nyasedūrdhve hyadhastāllakuṭaṃ nyaset // Vis_11.293 //
analyzed: vāme śaṅkham nyaset ūrdhve hi adhastāt lakuṭam nyaset
evam cakra ādi saṃproktam aparam ca adhunā śṛṇu

original: dakṣiṇe paraśuṃ nyasya hyadhaḥ pāśāṅkuśaṃ nyaset // Vis_11.294 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇe paraśum nyasya hi adhas pāśa aṅkuśam nyaset
akṣamālām nyaset vāme pāśam ca adhara doṣaṇi
vinyaset muni śārdūla hasti vaktra agrake phalam
dvi prakāram mayā proktam vighneśa āyudhakam bhavet
vinyaset muni śārdūla sādhaka icchā anurūpataḥ

original: svatantre paratantre ca rūpamevaṃ tu cintayet /
analyzed: svatantre paratantre ca rūpam evam tu cintayet

original: ākhustadvāhanaṃ proktaṃ garuḍaṃ vāgrataḥ smaret // Vis_11.297 //
analyzed: ākhuḥ tat vāhanam proktam garuḍam vā agratas smaret
nārāyaṇa aṃśaka tvāt ca proktaḥ tatra khageśvaraḥ

original: gaṇānāṃ tu tryṛcā tatra vighneśaṃ yor'cayed dvijaḥ // Vis_11.298 //
analyzed: gaṇānām tu tryṛcā tatra vighneśam yaḥ urcayet dvijaḥ
sarvān kāmān avāpnoti rājñaḥ tu vijayaḥ bhavet

original: atra kaścidviśeṣo 'sti śṛṇu tvaṃ munipuṅgava // Vis_11.299 //
analyzed: atra kaścid viśeṣaḥ sti śṛṇu tvam muni puṅgava
vimāna lakṣaṇam ca eva pratimā dravyam eva ca
pratimā lakṣaṇam ca eva parivārasya lakṣaṇam
pūjana ādīni sarvāṇi mūrtīnām muni puṅgava
sādhāraṇa kramam jñātvā ādi mūrti vat ācaret
paramātma ādi mūrtīnām vighneśa antam mahā mune

original: svatantre paratantre ca pūjayet svasvavidyayā // Vis_11.302 //
analyzed: svatantre paratantre ca pūjayet sva sva vidyayā
vāmanam vighnarājam ca svatantram ced muni īśvara

original: ś ekaberaṃ tu saṃsthāpya pūjayettu dine dine // Vis_11.303 //
analyzed: eka beram tu saṃsthāpya pūjayet tu dine dine

original: ṣaṅberaṃ vā triberaṃ vā saṃsthāpya vidhinā mune /
analyzed: ṣaṅberam vā triberam vā saṃsthāpya vidhinā mune
na iṣyante śriyā ādīni śakti sthāpanakam param
viśeṣaḥ ca atra saṃproktaḥ śeṣam sādhāraṇam bhavet

original: lakṣmīṃ puṣṭiṃ ca vāgdevīṃ medhāṃ durgāṃ ca tatra vai(?) // Vis_11.305 //
analyzed: lakṣmīm puṣṭim ca vāgdevīm medhām durgām ca tatra vai
svatantre paratantre ca pūjayet sva sva vidyayā
viśeṣaḥ ca atra saṃproktaḥ pūjā bhedam atas śṛṇu
mūrtīnām tu pravakṣyāmi prāsāda ādīni pūrvavat
paramātma ādi mūrtīnām pūjā bheda viśeṣakam

original: śayane sati mūlārcā karmārcā cāsanaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: śayane sati mūla arcā karma arcā ca āsanam bhavet

original: sthānakaṃ vāpi kurvīta tadberaṃ tu caturbhujam // Vis_11.308 //
analyzed: sthānakam vā api kurvīta tat beram tu catur bhujam
baliberam tathā kuryāt utsava iva
snapanenam tathā

original: sthānakasyaivameva syāt yānakaṃ vāpi kārayet // Vis_11.309 //
analyzed: sthānakasya evam eva syāt yānakam vā api kārayet
āsīne tu mahābere sarvam āsīnam eva vā

original: sthānakaṃ vāpi kurvīta sarvamevaṃ caturbhujam // Vis_11.310 //
analyzed: sthānakam vā api kurvīta sarvam evam catur bhujam
matsya ādi daśa mūrtīnām pūjā bimbam caturbhujam
mūlabere tu yati athā
proktam tathā eva muni sattama
avatāre vā kuryāt arcanā beram atra vai

original: atra kaścidviśeṣo 'sti matsyādīnāṃ tu nārada // Vis_11.312 //
analyzed: atra kaścid viśeṣaḥ sti matsya ādīnām tu nārada
pravakṣyāmi muni śreṣṭha śṛṇu matsya ādikān kramāt
bahis āvaraṇe kuryāt avatāra ālayam budhaḥ

original: maṇḍape gopure vāpi prākāre vā svatantrake /
analyzed: maṇḍape gopure vā api prākāre vā svatantrake
sarva kāma pradam puṇyam āyuḥ ārogya vardhanam
jaya lakṣmī vivṛddhi artham svatantra paratantrayoḥ
avatāra arcana phalam lokeṣu paripaṭhyate

original: parvate vā vane vāpi grāme vā nagare 'pi vā /
analyzed: parvate vā vane vā api grāme vā nagare vā
kārayet lakṣaṇa upetān yathāvat tad kramāt mune

original: svatantreṇaiva vā cāsmin paratantreṇa vā mune /
analyzed: svatantreṇa eva vā ca asmin paratantreṇa vā mune
kārayet pratimām tatra pūrva ukta dravya saṃyutam
saṃsthāpya vidhivat teṣām ttāḥ ca
pūjayet tu dine dine
sva tantra arcā vidhāne tu mūrti bheda vidhim śṛṇu
bali bimba utsava ādīn ca vāsudeva ādikān nayet nyaset
mūla mūrti anusāram tu na kuryāt vā avatārake
yajamāna icchayā ca asmin yathākāmam samācaret
parivārāṇi sarvāṇi pūrvavat krama yogataḥ
kalpayet avatārāṇam svatantra arcā vidhānake
dvāra ādi āvaraṇān sarvān kuryāt ca eva sva tantrake
yuktyā yukti viśeṣeṇa kriyate kuryāt vai
ca atra buddhimān
evam ukta prakāreṇa pratimām kurute yadi
sarvān kāmān avāpnoti viṣṇu lokam sa gacchati
iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām varṇāyudhavinyāsavidhiḥ nāma ekādeśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
dvādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
dvādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ viṣvaksenaḥ
śṛṇu deva muni śreṣṭha mantra anukramaṇam param

original: soddhāraṇaṃ ṛṣiśchando daivaṃ varṇādimeva ca // Vis_12.1 //
analyzed: sa uddhāraṇam ṛṣi śchandaḥ daivam varṇa ādim eva ca
saṃkṣepeṇa pravakṣyāmi yathāmati mahā mune
anyam tathāgata ādyam syāt agnim āyudha saṃhṛtiḥ
paramātmā dvitīyam tu tṛtīyam vāsudevakam

original: saṃkarṣaṇaṃ tato mantraṃ pradyumnasya tathaiva ca // Vis_12.3 //
analyzed: saṃkarṣaṇam tatas mantram pradyumnasya tathā eva ca
aniruddhasya vidyā ca matsya mantram anantaram

original: kūrmavidyā tataḥ kroḍaṃ daśamaṃ nārasiṃhakam // Vis_12.4 //
analyzed: kūrmavidyā tatas kroḍam daśamam nārasiṃhakam
paścāt vāmana mantram ca jāmadagnyam atas param
vidyā dāśaratheḥ ūrdhvam balarāmam anantaram

original: kṛṣṇaṃ ca kalkīviṣṇośca keśavasya punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: kṛṣṇam ca kalkī viṣṇoḥ ca keśavasya punar punar

original: nārāyaṇasya vidyāṃ tāṃ mādhavasya punaḥ kramāt // Vis_12.6 //
analyzed: nārāyaṇasya vidyām tām mādhavasya punar kramāt
govindasya api viṣṇoḥ ca madhusūdana vidyayā

original: traivikramaṃ vāmanaṃ ca śrīdharākhyamatho mune // Vis_12.7 //
analyzed: traivikramam vāmanam ca śrīdhara ākhyam atho mune

original: hṛṣīkeśaṃ ca mantraṃ ca padmanābhamataḥ param /
analyzed: hṛṣīkeśam ca mantram ca padmanābham atas param
brahma mantram tathā ca eva dāmodaram anukramāt
viśvarūpasya mantram ca yajñamūrteḥ atas param
vedamūrteḥ atho mudrā mantram śrīmantram eva ca
puṣṭi vidyā tathā medhā vidyā sarasvatī tathā
durgā vighneśayoḥ ca api vidyā yā parameṣṭhinaḥ

original: puruṣasya ca vidyā ca viśvamantramataḥ param /
analyzed: puruṣasya ca vidyā ca viśva mantram atas param
nivṛtti sarva aiśvaryayoḥ mantram mantra vidām vara
yathoktam uddhariṣyāmi bhaktānām hita kāmyayā
mantra uddhāram pravakṣyāmi yathāvat anupūrvaśas
śṛṇuṣva avahitaḥ bhūtvā guhyāt guhyataram mune
viṣṇupañcakam uddhṛtya bhānumantam atas param
yajuṣām ānta lāntam ca sa antam āntena yojayet

original: praṇavena puṭīkṛtya dvitīyaṃ bindunā yutam // Vis_12.14 //
analyzed: praṇavena puṭīkṛtya dvitīyam bindunā yutam
namasā bhagavān ekādaśa yuktam paraḥ param
ṇāntam ānta ātmane viśva īśa anta ṇāntam sa la antakam
ekādaśa dvitīyena vāsudevāt samuddharet
senā yuta ādi a la antena yana aṃghri maneḥ yutām
mantra ādyām uddharet vidvān guhyam guhya artha sādhakam

original: ādyantaṃ praṇavaṃ kṛtvā namaḥ śabdamanantaram // Vis_12.17 //
analyzed: ādi antam praṇavam kṛtvā namaḥ śabdam anantaram
prathama antam tathā ma ādi makāra antam kalā antakam
varga ādim an yakāreṇa tathā
mā antam ā antam tathā ākāram uddharet sādhaka uttamaḥ
am ityādi uparatam me kuryāt namaḥ śabdam anantaram
bhagavantam caturthī antam pañcama anilam āti yuj
caturthasya tṛtīyena vāyu pañcama bheditam
sa visarga makāram ca praṇavam ca namaḥ tathā

original: pañcamaṃ ca caturthaṃ ca prathamasya tṛtīyakam // Vis_12.22 //
analyzed: pañcamam ca caturtham ca prathamasya tṛtīyakam
la antam tu turya pūrvā ca svara ekādaśa saṃyutam

original: viṣṇuṃ ca turyavargāntaṃ tṛtīyaṃ svarabhūṣitam // Vis_12.23 //
analyzed: viṣṇum ca turya varga antam tṛtīyam svara bhūṣitam
pañcama svara yuktyā tu turīyam tri caturthakam
ā anta antam anilam paścāt ṣoḍaśa svaram uddharet
anilādim atha āddhṛtya analam aukāram eva ca

original: pibantaṃ tu namaḥ śabdaṃ svaiḥ pūrvaiḥ samasvaram // Vis_12.25 //
analyzed: pibantam tu namaḥ śabdam svaiḥ pūrvaiḥ sama svaram
ca yaṣatha ādi caturthakam
ekādaśam dvitīyena lāntam pañcama yojitam

original: tato vāyuṃ ca rūpāya mantrādīṃśca tatoddharet // Vis_12.27 //
analyzed: tatas vāyum ca rūpāya mantra ādīn ca tatas uddharet
dvitīyam binduśīrṣeṇa lāntaḥ nātha upari nyaset

original: namasā bhagavacchabdaṃ viṣṇuśabdaṃ ca pūrvavat // Vis_12.28 //
analyzed: namasā bhagavat śabdam viṣṇu śabdam ca pūrvavat

original: ṣaṭśikhaṃ kaṃ ca vahniṃ ca makāreṇātha kūrparam /
analyzed: ṣaṣ śikham kam ca vahnim ca makāreṇa atha kūrparam
ṣaṣṭha svaram ca pānteyam uddharet mantra vittamaḥ
nikāma ādi bakāra antam ṣaṣṭha svara vibhūṣitam
sa visargam namaḥ śabdam bhagavat śabdam uddharet
ekāra antam śakāra ādi makāra antam ca ya antakam

original: sāntaṃ dvitīyasaṃyuktaṃ vāyumāntaṃ ca bhūriti // Vis_12.31 //
analyzed: sa antam dvitīya saṃyuktam vāyumat antam ca bhūḥ iti
mukham uddhṛtya lāntam bindu caturdaśaiḥ

original: yathāmatau tathāntepi namo bhagavate tathā // Vis_12.32 //
analyzed: yathā matau tathā ante pi namaḥ bhagavate tathā
prathamena tu yā antāni viyat ādīni bindu yuj
dvitīyena viyat ca api vāyusādim atho mbare
anala ādi turīya antam bindu nāda vibhūṣitam

original: trayodaśāntaṃ svāntādi vāntaṃ gavamataḥ param // Vis_12.34 //
analyzed: trayodaśa antam svānta ādi vāntam param

original: ekādaśe ca ṇāntaṃ ca ṇāntaṃ śāntaṃ ca vai param /
analyzed: ekādaśe ca ṇa antam ca ṇa antam śāntam ca vai param
ekādaśa dvitīyena lāntam bhāntam anantaram

original: nāntaṃ māntaṃ samuddhṛtya carame prathamaṃ likhet /
analyzed: na antam ma antam samuddhṛtya carame prathamam likhet
mantrasya asya muni śreṣṭha jāmadagnyam atho śṛṇu
yāntam īśvara bindū ca ādau ante namaḥ tathā
bhagavat viṣṇu śabdau ca punar
vāntam bhūtalakā yuktam analam bhāskaram tathā
dvitīyayā prathamayā kalayā vāyum uddharet
pañcama antena sahitam ra antam sa maṇi yojitam

original: pāde ca śikhare caiva namaśca sakalaṃ tathā // Vis_12.39 //
analyzed: pāde ca śikhare ca eva namaḥ ca sakalam tathā
lokāya śriyāḥ rāmam anila anala la antakān
prathama dvitīya vādyena ṇa antam ka anta yakam tathā
rakṣā ātmajāyām sarvam ca rakṣaḥ ghnāya iti anantaram

original: tasya saṃdhāya viśvāpi śāṇāntena ve prabhāt // Vis_12.41 //
analyzed: tasya saṃdhāya viśvā api śāṇa antena veḥ prabhāt
paratas viṣata aṃghraḥ ca saha ekādaśa kalam tathā
lāntam nyaset muni śreṣṭha bala vidyā uddhṛtim śṛṇu

original: oṃ padaṃ prathamaṃ kṛtvā vidhāya tacchriyā punaḥ /
analyzed: om padam prathamam kṛtvā vidhāya tad śriyā punar

original: vābhraṃ tayādāvante ca namo bhagavate punaḥ // Vis_12.43 //
analyzed: vābhram tayā ādau ante ca namaḥ bhagavate punar

original: gānādyaṃ tu nādyena vahimānaṃ ca vāyuyuk /
analyzed: gāna ādyam tu nādyena vahimānam ca vāyu yuj
uddharet kṛṣṇa vidyāyāḥ saṃśṛṇutaḥ param
niya

original: oṃ āṃ oṃ namo bhagavate paramātmane viṣṇave vāsudevāya sarvātmane oṃ om /
analyzed: om āṃ om namaḥ bhagavate paramātmane viṣṇave vāsudevāya sarvātmane om om

original: aṃ oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya / Vis_12.44,3 /
analyzed: aṃ om namaḥ bhagavate vāsudevāya

original: oṃ āṃ oṃ namo bhagavate saṃkarṣaṇāya/ āṃ om / Vis_12.44,4 /
analyzed: om āṃ om namaḥ bhagavate saṃkarṣaṇāya āṃ om
om namaḥ bhagavate pradyumnāya

original: āṃ oṃ oṃ namo bhagavate aniruddhāya / Vis_12.44,6 /
analyzed: ām om om namaḥ bhagavate aniruddhāya

original: aṃ oṃ kaiṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya matsyāya matsya---
analyzed: aṃ om kaiṃ namaḥ bhagavate vāsudevāya matsyāya matsya
rūpāya krendo om

original: oṃ namo bhagavate viṣṇave kūrmarūpāya vāṃ om / Vis_12.44,8 /
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavate viṣṇave kūrma rūpāya vām om
om namaḥ bhagavate varāhāya

original: oṃ kṣaiṃ namo bhagavate nārasiṃhāya kṣaiṃ om / Vis_12.44,10 /
analyzed: om kṣaiṃ namaḥ bhagavate nārasiṃhāya kṣaiṃ om

original: oṃ īṣinamo bhagavate vāmanāya dhī om / Vis_12.44,11 /
analyzed: om bhagavate vāmanāya dhī om

original: riṃ namo bhagavate viṣṇave paraśurāmāya rīṃ om / Vis_12.44,12 /
analyzed: riṃ namaḥ bhagavate viṣṇave paraśurāmāya rīṃ om

original: oṃ lūṃ nāmaḥ sakalalokāya śrīrāmāya rāvaṇāntakāya daśarathātmajāya sarvarakṣoghnāyaya satyasandhāya viṣṇave prabhaviṣṇave / Vis_12.44,13 /
analyzed: om lūṃ nāmaḥ sakala lokāya śrī rāmāya rāvaṇa antakāya daśaratha ātmajāya sarva rakṣaḥ ghnāyaya satyasandhāya viṣṇave prabhaviṣṇave  /

original: oṃ hrīṃ namo bhagavate balīrāmāya hrīṃ om / Vis_12.44,14 /
analyzed: om   namaḥ bhagavate balīrāmāya

original: oṃ kṛtaṃ namo bhagavate viṣṇave vāsudevāya devakīputrāya kuṃ om/
analyzed: om kṛtam namaḥ bhagavate viṣṇave vāsudevāya devakīputrāya kuṃ om
trāyakam om

original: oṃ gaiṃ namaḥ puruṣottamā viṣṇave vāsudevāya kalkī---
analyzed: om gaiṃ namaḥ puruṣottamāḥ viṣṇave vāsudevāya kalkī
viṣṇave namaḥ   om

original: oṃ oṃ namo bhagavate keśavāya/ āṃ om / Vis_12.44,17 /
analyzed: om om namaḥ bhagavate keśavāya āṃ om

original: oṃ namo bhagavate nārāyaṇāya om / Vis_12.44,18 /
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavate nārāyaṇāya om

original: oṃ namaḥ puruṣāya mādhavāya viṣṇave vāsudevāya kṣuṃ om / Vis_12.44,19 /
analyzed: om namaḥ puruṣāya mādhavāya viṣṇave vāsudevāya kṣuṃ om

original: āṃ oṃ namo bhagavate govindāya āṃ om / Vis_12.44,20 /
analyzed: āṃ om namaḥ bhagavate govindāya āṃ om

original: namo bhagavate viṣṇave bhūṃ om / Vis_12.44,21 /
analyzed: namaḥ bhagavate viṣṇave bhūm om

original: āṃ oṃ namo bhagavate madhusūdanāya āṃ om / Vis_12.44,22 /
analyzed: āṃ om namaḥ bhagavate madhusūdanāya āṃ om

original: oṃ aṃ namo bhagavate...devāya itīda uparivratāya trivikramāya aṃ nama om / Vis_12.44,23 /
analyzed: om aṃ namaḥ bhagavatedevāya uparivratāya trivikramāya aṃ namaḥ om

original: oṃ aṃ namo bhagavate viṣṇave vāmanāya aṃ om / Vis_12.44,24 /
analyzed: om aṃ namaḥ bhagavate viṣṇave vāmanāya aṃ om

original: oṃ aṃ bhagavate viṣṇave vāsudevāya śrīdharāya aṃ om / Vis_12.44,25 /
analyzed: om aṃ bhagavate viṣṇave vāsudevāya śrīdharāya aṃ om

original: oṃ aḥ oṃ namo bhagavate viṣṇave hṛṣīkeśāya aṃ om / Vis_12.44,26 /
analyzed: om aḥ om namaḥ bhagavante viṣṇave hṛṣīkeśāya aṃ om

original: oṃ namo bhagavate viṣṇave padmanābhāya padmahastāya oṃ ām / Vis_12.44,27 /
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavate viṣṇave padmanābhāya padma hastāya om ām

original: aḥ oṃ namo bhagavate dāmodarāya aṃ om / Vis_12.44,28 /
analyzed: aḥ om namaḥ bhagavate dāmodarāya aṃ om

original: oṃ tatsat namo brahmaṇe tatsa om / Vis_12.44,29 /
analyzed: om tat sat namaḥ brahmaṇe tat sa om

original: oṃ khaṃ namo bhagavate viṣṇave vāsudevāya viśvarūpāya sarvāya sarva ane sarvabhūtavyavasthitāya om /30/
analyzed: om khaṃ namaḥ bhagavate viṣṇave vāsudevāya viśvarūpāya sarvāya sarva bhūta vyavasthitāya om

original: oṃ oṃ namo bhagavate viṣṇave vāsudevāya yajñāya yajñanetrāya yajñabhoktre namo namaḥ / Vis_12.44,31 /
analyzed: om om namaḥ bhagavate viṣṇave vāsudevāya yajñāya yajña netrāya yajña bhoktre namaḥ namaḥ

original: oṃ namastvanantāya sahasramūrtaye viṣṇave vāsudevāya vedāya mūrtaye namaḥ/ om / Vis_12.44,32 /
analyzed: om namaḥ tu anantāya sahasramūrtaye viṣṇave vāsudevāya vedāya mūrtaye namaḥ om
om namaḥ sarva mudrābhyaḥ
om kamala vāsinyai namaḥ
om bhuṃ puṣṭyai namaḥ

analyzed: om hrīṃ medhāyai namaḥ hrīṃ om

original: oṃ saṃ sarasvatyai namaḥ saṃ om / Vis_12.44,37 /
analyzed: om saṃ sarasvatyai namaḥ saṃ om

original: oṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ saṃ oṃ hrīṃ durgāyai namaḥ/
analyzed: om hrīṃ hrīṃ saṃ om hrīṃ durgāyai namaḥ

original: oṃ hrīṃ oṃ hrīṃ sande namaḥ om / Vis_12.44,38 /
analyzed: om hrīṃ om hrīṃ sande namaḥ om

original: oṃ gaṇapataye vighnanāyakāya namaḥ om / Vis_12.44,39 /
analyzed: om gaṇapataye vighnanāyakāya namaḥ om

original: oṃ kṣaiṃ namaḥ parāya parameṣṭhyātmane namaḥ / Vis_12.44,40 /
analyzed: om   namaḥ parāya parameṣṭhī ātmane namaḥ

original: oṃ yāṃ namaḥ parāya puruṣātmena namaḥ / Vis_12.44,41 /
analyzed: om yāṃ namaḥ parāya puruṣa ātmena namaḥ

original: oṃ rāṃ namaḥ parāya viśvātmena namaḥ / Vis_12.44,42 /
analyzed: om rāṃ namaḥ parāya viśvātmena namaḥ

original: oṃ vāṃ namaḥ parāya nivṛtyātmane namaḥ / Vis_12.44,43 /
analyzed: om vām namaḥ parāya nivṛti ātmane namaḥ

original: oṃ lāṃ namaḥ parāya sarvātmane namaḥ / Vis_12.44,44 /
analyzed: om lāṃ namaḥ parāya sarvātmane namaḥ
iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām mantrānukramaṇavidhiḥ nāma dvādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
trayodaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
viṣvaksenaḥ
mantrāṇām praṇava ādīnām sarva vidyā vidhānakam kān
ṛṣi chanda ādi
vakṣyāmi sarvam eva yathātatham
antaryāmī muniḥ chandaḥ devī gāyatram eva ca
paramātmā amaraḥ varṇaḥ veda ādyāsu asmitam smṛtaḥ
viśvāmitra muniḥ viṣṇuḥ devatā paramātmanaḥ

original: paramātmaiva chandastu varṇastasya sitaḥ smṛtaḥ // Vis_13.3 //
analyzed: paramātmā eva chandaḥ tu varṇaḥ tasya sitaḥ smṛtaḥ
jāmadagnya muniḥ chandaḥ vāsudevaḥ ca devatā
anuṣṭubh vāsudevasya sita varṇaḥ udāhṛtaḥ
chandaḥ nuṣṭubh bharadvājaḥ muniḥ saṃkarṣaṇaḥ mataḥ

original: saṃkarṣaṇasya vidyāyā rakto varṇa ihocyate // Vis_13.5 //
analyzed: saṃkarṣaṇasya vidyāyāḥ raktaḥ varṇaḥ iha ucyate
pradyumnasya muniḥ chandaḥ gautamaḥ paṅktiḥ eva ca

original: pradyumno devatā varṇaḥ kanakābha iti smṛtaḥ // Vis_13.6 //
analyzed: pradyumnaḥ devatā varṇaḥ kanaka ābhaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
aniruddhasya vidyāyāḥ muniḥ chandaḥ tris eva ca
triṣṭubh devaḥ niruddhaḥ tu nīla jīmūta varṇakaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ matsya mantrasya chandaḥ tu jagatī smṛtā

original: vāsudevastu devaḥ syāt nīlo varṇa ihocyate // Vis_13.8 //
analyzed: vāsudevaḥ tu devaḥ syāt nīlaḥ varṇaḥ iha ucyate
kūrmasya kāśyapam vidyāt munim chandaḥ virājate

original: devo nārāyaṇaḥ śyāmaḥ vidyāyā varṇa ucyate // Vis_13.9 //
analyzed: devaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ śyāmaḥ vidyāyāḥ varṇaḥ ucyate
agastyaḥ vārāha vidyāyāḥ devīgāyatram ucyate
muniḥ chandaḥ maraḥ viṣṇuḥ śyāma varṇam nigadyate
nāradaḥ nārasiṃhasya vidyāyāḥ tu hariḥ smṛtaḥ
ṛṣiḥ chandaḥ nṛsiṃhaḥ tu devatā sita varṇakaḥ
mane maṃkaṇam vidyāt ṛṣiḥ chandaḥ muniḥ tathā

original: mantre 'smin vāmanaṃ daivaṃ añjanaṃ varṇa ucyate // Vis_13.12 //
analyzed: mantre smin vāmanam daivam añjanam varṇaḥ ucyate
bhārgave bhārgavam vidyāt daivaḥ tu kathyate

original: muniṃ tu bhārgavaṃ devaṃ pītābho varṇa ucyate // Vis_13.13 //
analyzed: munim tu bhārgavam devam pīta ābhaḥ varṇaḥ ucyate
vālmīkīm rāma vidyāyāḥ
muniḥ chandaḥ tu devaḥ tu paramātmā payaḥ nibhaḥ
bṛhaspatiḥ balaṃle
vidyāt supratiṣṭhā muniḥ smṛtaḥ
chandaḥ tu vāyudevasya devaḥ kanaka varṇakaḥ
bhṛguḥ kṛṣṇasya vidyāyāḥ muniḥ chandaḥ tu daivatam

original: paramātmā pratiṣṭhā tu rajato varṇa ucyate // Vis_13.16 //
analyzed: paramātmā pratiṣṭhā tu rajataḥ varṇaḥ ucyate
kalki viṣṇoḥ tu munī yaḥ yājñavalkyaḥ muniḥ smṛtaḥ

original: chando devaṃ tu gāyatraṃ viṣṇostābhrastu varṇakam // Vis_13.17 //
analyzed: chandaḥ devam tu gāyatram varṇakam
śātātapaḥ muniḥ paṅktiḥ chandaḥ keśava daivatam

original: keśavasya tu vidyāyā rītikā varṇa ucyate // Vis_13.18 //
analyzed: keśavasya tu vidyāyāḥ rītikā varṇaḥ ucyate
nārāyaṇasya mantrasya devīgāyatram ucyate

original: antaryāminaḥ svātmā varṇe marakato bhavet // Vis_13.19 //
analyzed: antaryāminaḥ svātmā varṇe marakataḥ bhavet

original: mādhavasya tu saṃvarto mādhavo devatā smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: mādhavasya tu saṃvartaḥ mādhavaḥ devatā smṛtaḥ
muniḥ chandaḥ tu jagatī varṇaḥ sphaṭika saṃnibhaḥ
govindasya muniḥ vyāsaḥ virāj chandaḥ ca daivatam

original: govinda eva varṇastu vajrasaṃnibha ucyate // Vis_13.21 //
analyzed: govindaḥ eva varṇaḥ tu vajra saṃnibhaḥ ucyate
muniḥ sanatkumāraḥ syāt viṣṇu mantrasya devatā
viṣṇuḥ eva virāj chandaḥ padmarāgaḥ tu varṇakaḥ
madhusūdana vidyāyāḥ muniḥ dakṣaḥ tu daivatam
madhusūdanaḥ tu anuṣṭhubh chandaḥ varṇaḥ pravālakaḥ
trivikramasya māṇikyam
saṃvartaḥ muniḥ ucyate
chandaḥ tu bṛhatī varṇam
devatā tu trivikramaḥ
parāśaraḥ vāmanasya muniḥ triṣṭubh iti smṛtam

original: chandastu vāmano devo muktābho varṇa ucyate // Vis_13.25 //
analyzed: chandaḥ tu vāmanaḥ devaḥ muktā ābhaḥ varṇaḥ ucyate
śrīdharasya muniḥ kaṇvaḥ
devatā śrīdharaḥ tad jñaiḥ varṇaḥ vaiḍūrya saṃnibhaḥ
aṅgirāḥ tu hṛṣīkeśe muniḥ ca jagatī smṛtā
chandaḥ kaukiśi
nīlābhaḥ hṛṣīkeśaḥ tu daivatam
padmanābhasya tu muniḥ vaiśampāyanaḥ ucyate

original: chandaḥ triṣṭubiti jñeyaṃ varṇo rājatasaṃnibhaḥ // Vis_13.28 //
analyzed: chandaḥ triṣṭubh iti jñeyam varṇaḥ rājata saṃnibhaḥ
śukaḥ ca brahma vidyāyāḥ bṛhatī muniḥ ucyate

original: chando brahmādhidaivaṃ tu varṇa indusamaprabhaḥ // Vis_13.29 //
analyzed: chandaḥ brahma adhidaivam tu varṇaḥ indu sama prabhaḥ
dāmodarasya vidyāyāḥ mārkaṇḍeyaḥ muniḥ bhavet
anuṣṭubh padma saṃkāśaḥ varṇaḥ dāmodaraḥ maraḥ
viśvarūpasya varṇaḥ tu cyavanaḥ ravi saṃnibhaḥ
tisṛ āyatrika
chandaḥ vāsudevaḥ maraḥ muniḥ
yajñamūrteḥ pulastyaḥ syāt tisraḥ chandaḥ adhidaivatam

original: pītavarṇastu vidyāyā muniḥ saṃkarṣaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // Vis_13.32 //
analyzed: pīta varṇaḥ tu vidyāyāḥ muniḥ saṃkarṣaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
aitareyaḥ muniḥ veda mūrteḥ chandaḥ virāj smṛtam
śātakumbha nibhaḥ varṇaḥ pradyumnaḥ maraḥ ucyate
pippalādaḥ muniḥ mudrāvidyāyāḥ chandaḥ ucyate
pratiṣṭhā agni varṇaḥ syāt aniruddhaḥ dhidaivatam
ṛṣiḥ dakṣaḥ virāj chandaḥ kamalā devatā smṛtā
varṇaḥ dīpa nibhaḥ padma vidyāyāḥ muni sattama
kaṇvaḥ tu puṣṭi vidyāyāḥ chandaḥ gāyatram iṣyate

original: devatā puṣṭiruktā syāt munirvarṇaḥ sitaḥ smṛtaḥ // Vis_13.36 //
analyzed: devatā puṣṭiḥ uktā syāt muniḥ varṇaḥ sitaḥ smṛtaḥ
medhā mantrasya saṃvarta muniḥ triṣṭubh udīritam

original: chando medhādhidevaṃ tu śaṅkhavarṇa ihocyate // Vis_13.37 //
analyzed: chandaḥ medhā adhidevam tu śaṅkhavarṇaḥ iha ucyate
maitreyaḥ tu sarasvatyāḥ vidyāyāḥ jagatī smṛtā

original: chandaḥ sarasvatī daivaṃ varṇo gokṣīrasaṃnibhaḥ // Vis_13.38 //
analyzed: chandaḥ sarasvatī daivam varṇaḥ go kṣīra saṃnibhaḥ
kāśyapaḥ tu muniḥ chandaḥ triṣṭubh durgā eva daivatam

original: varṇastu śyāmalaḥproktaḥ vighneśasya tataḥ śṛṇu // Vis_13.39 //
analyzed: varṇaḥ tu śyāmalaḥ proktaḥ vighneśasya tatas śṛṇu
gāṇakaḥ tu muniḥ chandaḥ triṣṭubh gaṇapatiḥ smṛtaḥ

original: devatā dhavalo varṇaḥ vidyāyā gaṇapatestathā // Vis_13.40 //
analyzed: devatā dhavalaḥ varṇaḥ vidyāyāḥ gaṇapateḥ tathā
ā t itaḥ tyaḥ
syāt ṛṣiḥ nīlaḥ varṇaḥ gāyatram ucyate
sadā viṣṇuḥ tathā daivam chandaḥ tu parameṣṭhinaḥ

original: puruṣasya muniḥ sūtaḥ śveto varṇaśca daivatam /
analyzed: puruṣasya muniḥ sūtaḥ śvetaḥ varṇaḥ ca daivatam
vāsudevaḥ tathā chandaḥ gāyatram iti kathyate
raviḥ muniḥ syāt viśvasya taruṇa arka nibhaḥ tathā

original: saṃkarṣaṇastathā daivaṃ uṣṇik chando nigadyate // Vis_13.43 //
analyzed: saṃkarṣaṇaḥ tathā daivam uṣṇih chandaḥ nigadyate
nivṛtte rājataḥ varṇaḥ pradyumnaḥ maraḥ ucyate
muniḥ tathā anumān chandaḥ gāyatram iti paṭhyate
mārtaṇḍaḥ sarvavidyāyāḥ muniḥ nānī
rada varṇakaḥ
uṣṇih chandaḥ niruddhaḥ ca devatā iti abhibhāṣyate
yeṣām anukta mantre smin ṛṣi ādi muni sattama

original: teṣāṃ sāmānyato vidyāt ṛṣirāditya eva ca // Vis_13.46 //
analyzed: teṣām sāmānyatas vidyāt ṛṣiḥ ādityaḥ eva ca
gāyatram eva chandaḥ syāt sadā viṣṇuḥ ca daivatam

original: bījānāṃ bījavarṇaṃ ca chando daivatameva ca // Vis_13.47 //
analyzed: bījānām bīja varṇam ca chandaḥ daivatam eva ca
munim ca a jānatā arcāyām sā ced
kṛtā api akṛtā bhavet

original: tasmāt krameṇa vijñāya vidyādīn sādhakottamaḥ // Vis_13.48 //
analyzed: tasmāt krameṇa vijñāya vidyā ādīn sādhaka uttamaḥ
yathoktam arcayet nityam labdha vidyaḥ śuciḥ mune
anyathā arcati yaḥ mohāt aghat dhana
nāśam kula kṣayam

original: kurute nṛpanāśaṃ ca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
analyzed: kurute nṛpa nāśam ca na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
atas kleśena vijñāya mantra ādīn arcayet budhaḥ
vidyānām ati guhyānām sarva vrata vivṛddhaye

original: ataḥparaṃ pravakṣyāmi sūktasya puruṣasya ca // Vis_13.51 //
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi sūktasya puruṣasya ca
anuṣṭubhasya sūktasya triṣṭubh antasya devatā

original: chando munyādi saṃkṣepācchṛṇu nārada sattama // Vis_13.52 //
analyzed: chandaḥ muni ādi saṃkṣepāt śṛṇu nārada sattama
puruṣaḥ yaḥ jagat bījam ṛṣiḥ nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: uktaṃ hi samudāyasya pratyṛcaṃ śṛṇu nārada // Vis_13.53 //
analyzed: uktam hi samudāyasya pratyṛcam śṛṇu nārada
prathamasya muniḥ vāsudevaḥ uṣṇih chandaḥ ucyate
paramātmā amaraḥ varṇam śuklam iti abhidhīyate
saṃkarṣaṇaḥ muniḥ chandaḥ nuṣṭubh devaḥ sya matsyakaḥ

original: dvitīyasya muniśreṣṭha varṇo dhūmra udāhṛtaḥ // Vis_13.55 //
analyzed: dvitīyasya muni śreṣṭha varṇaḥ dhūmraḥ udāhṛtaḥ
tṛtīyaḥ devī gāyatram chandaḥ varṇaḥ smṛta ūruṇaḥ

original: pradyumna ṛṣirityāhuḥ devatā kūrma ucyate // Vis_13.56 //
analyzed: pradyumnaḥ ṛṣiḥ iti āhuḥ devatā kūrmaḥ ucyate
atiruddhaḥ turīyasya muniḥ chandaḥ virāj iti

original: devatāsya tu vārāho nīlo varṇa udāhṛtaḥ // Vis_13.57 //
analyzed: devatā asya tu vārāhaḥ nīlaḥ varṇaḥ udāhṛtaḥ
pañcamasya muniḥ chandaḥ uṣṇih keśavaḥ ucyate
devatā narasiṃhaḥ tu varṇaḥ go kṣīra saṃnibhaḥ
nārāyaṇaḥ ṛṣiḥ chandaḥ nicṛt gāyatraḥ ucyate
devatā mānadha

original: vo vidyāt ṣaṣṭhasyaiva tu dhūmrakaḥ // Vis_13.59 //
analyzed: vaḥ vidyāt ṣaṣṭhasya eva tu dhūmrakaḥ
saptamasya muniḥ varṇaḥ sitaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: rāmaṃ taddaivataṃ vidyāt uṣṇik chanda udāhṛtaḥ // Vis_13.60 //
analyzed: rāmam tad daivatam vidyāt uṣṇih chandaḥ udāhṛtaḥ
govindaḥ ca aṣṭamasya eva ṛṣiḥ chanda uṣṇih eva ca

original: daivaṃ dāśarathī rāmo varṇaḥ kālāgnisaṃnibhaḥ // Vis_13.61 //
analyzed: daivam dāśarathiḥ rāmaḥ varṇaḥ kālāgni saṃnibhaḥ
navamasya balarāmaḥ sya daivatam
gāyatrī chandasaḥ
varṇaḥ go kṣīra ākṛtiḥ ucyate
madhusūdanaḥ muniḥ syāt devīgāyatraḥ ucyate
daśamasya adhidaivam tat tu
kalkiḥ agni nibhaḥ bhavet
trivikramaḥ muniḥ chandaḥ virāj agni nibhaḥ bhavet

original: daivataṃ viśvarūpo 'yaṃ ekāntaṃ daśamasya tu // Vis_13.64 //
analyzed: daivatam viśvarūpaḥ yam ekāntam daśamasya tu
dvādaśasya munim vidyāt vāmanam vahni saṃnibham
virāj chandaḥ maraḥ yajñamūrtiḥ tu paripaṭhyate
trayodaśasya uṣṇih chandaḥ śrīdharaḥ muniḥ eva ca
vaikuṇṭhaḥ daivatam varṇaḥ tapta hāṭaka saṃnibhaḥ
caturdaśasya gāyatrī devī pūrva añjana ākṛtiḥ
hṛṣīkeśaḥ muniḥ devaḥ mahāviṣṇuḥ iti smṛtaḥ
pañca uttara daśasya eva padmanābhaḥ muniḥ smṛtaḥ

original: vedamūrtyadhidaivaṃ tu uṣṇikchando sitaḥ smṛtaḥ // Vis_13.68 //
analyzed: vedamūrti adhidaivam tu uṣṇih chandaḥ sitaḥ smṛtaḥ
ṣoḍaśasya ṛṣiḥ ca eva dāmodaraḥ iti smṛtaḥ
hayagrīvaḥ mahā ṛṣiḥ ca chandaḥ gniḥ deva saṃnibhaḥ
evam puruṣasūktasya ṛṣi ādi parikīrtitam

original: ṛcāṃ ṛṣiṃ ca varṇaṃ ca daivataṃ chanda eva ca // Vis_13.70 //
analyzed: ṛcām ṛṣim ca varṇam ca daivatam chandaḥ eva ca
ajñānāt arcayet mohāt pi akṛtaḥ bhavet
tasmāt sarva prayatnena ṛṣi ādīn jñāpayet kramāt
nārāyaṇaḥ ṛṣiḥ chandaḥ devī gāyatram eva ca
paramātmā amaraḥ varṇaḥ śuklaḥ iti abhidhīyate
yeṣām anukta mantre smin ṛṣi ādi muni sattama
teṣām sāmānyatas vidyāt ṛṣiḥ nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
gāyatram eva chandaḥ syāt paramātmā adhidaivatam
pītaḥ varṇaḥ ṛcām ca evam etat guhyam mayā uditam
ṛcām evam unaktānām ṛṣi ādi parikīrtitam

original: saṃkṣepāt kathitaṃ guhyaṃ sādhakānāṃ hitāya vai //
analyzed: saṃkṣepāt kathitam guhyam sādhakānām hitāya vai

original: iti śrīpāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyāṃ jhrmantrāṇāṃ ṛṣichanda- devatādikathanaṃ nāmaṭa trayodaśo 'dhyāyaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām ṛṣichanda devatādikathanam nāma ṭa trayodaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
caturdaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
caturdaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ viṣvaksenaḥ
atas param pravakṣyāmi caru pāka vidhim param

original: śṛṇu nārada sarvajña vrīhikṣetrādikān kramāt // Vis_14.1 //
analyzed: śṛṇu nārada sarvajña vrīhi kṣetra ādikān kramāt
na ca ūṣara dharāyām ca caṇḍāla ādi gṛha antike

original: na śmaśānāntike bhūmyāṃ dhānyasaṃgrahaṇaṃ bhavet // Vis_14.2 //
analyzed: na śmaśāna antike bhūmyām dhānya saṃgrahaṇam bhavet
śubha kṣetra udbhavam dhānyam tri aha abdam tri abdam vā
vatsaram tu vā

original: ṣaṇmāsaṃ vā trimāsaṃ vā samyak paryuṣitaṃ śubham // Vis_14.3 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ māsam vā tri māsam vā samyak paryuṣitam śubham
raktaśālim tu vā
śvetam kṛṣṇaśālim tathā eva ca
saṃgrahe smin muni śreṣṭha taṇḍulam śvetam uttamam
kunda indu muktā saṃkāśaiḥ tad kṛtaiḥ
śāli taṇḍulaiḥ
pācayet hariveśmasya gehasya
āgneyyām pacana ālaye
mantra jñaḥ vaṃśa saṃpannaḥ prātaḥsnāna parāyaṇaḥ
haviṣām pāka yogyaḥ tu balavān karma tatparaḥ
māna ādi ca adhunā vakṣye śṛṇu guhyam anuttamam
dviśataiḥ pañcaviṃśadbhiḥ vrīhibhiḥ ca eva pūritam
śukti mātram iti khyātam mānam tena eva kalpayet
tad dvayam talam iti uktam prakubjam ñ caḥ
syāt tala dvayam
prasṛti dvayam
añjaliḥ tad dvayam proktam prasthaḥ syāt añjali dvayam
pātram prastha dvayam proktam āḍhakam tad dvayam bhavet
tat dvayam śivam iti uktam droṇam vidyāt śiva dvayam

original: droṇadvayaṃ bhavet khārī bhāraṃ khāritrayaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: bhavet        bhavet

original: mānamevaṃ mayā proktaṃ pātraśuddhimatho śṛṇu // Vis_14.11 //
analyzed: mānam evam mayā proktam pātra śuddhim atho śṛṇu
caru pātra dvayam proktam tāmram mṛṇmayam eva vā

original: tāmrābhāve muniśreṣṭha mṛṇmayaṃ vātha kārayet // Vis_14.12 //
analyzed: tāmra abhāve muni śreṣṭha mṛṇmayam vā atha kārayet

original: dine dine navaṃ gṛhyaṃ sādhayet sādhakottamaḥ /
analyzed: dine dine navam gṛhyam sādhayet sādhaka uttamaḥ

original: pātrāṇi ca śarāvāṇi saṃgṛhya paricārakaḥ // Vis_14.13 //
analyzed: pātrāṇi ca śarāvāṇi saṃgṛhya paricārakaḥ
śuddha toyena saṃkṣālya viṣṇugāyatriyā punar
prokṣayet gandha toyena pañca upaniṣadaiḥ kramāt
pātra śuddhiḥ iha proktā haviḥ saṃkhyā
pracakṣate
uttama uttamam iti uktam aṣṭa droṇaiḥ tu pūritam
ṣaṣ droṇaiḥ taṇḍulaiḥ siddham bhavet uttama madhyamam
droṇa hīnam bhavet tatra uttama adhamam ucyate
madhyama uttamam iti uktam khāri dvaya samanvitam
madhyama adhamam iti uktam droṇa dvaya sama dvayam

original: droṇaṃ caiva tadardhaṃ ca tasyārdhamadhamatrayam // Vis_14.19 //
analyzed: droṇam ca eva tad ardham ca tasya ardham adhama trayam
taṇḍulaiḥ āḍhakaiḥ hīnam naivedyam na prakalpayet
caruḥ prastha dvayaḥ proktaḥ haviḥ āḍhakam ucyate
tasmin tat tu
śriyā ādi devīnām āḍhakam vā ardham eva vā
nivedayet muni śreṣṭha taṇḍulānām vidhim śṛṇu
dvitīya āvaraṇe ca eva tṛtīya āvaraṇe vā
kuryāt dhānya avaghātasya śālām īśāna gocare

original: dakṣiṇe vātha vāyavye nairṛte vāntare tathā /
analyzed: dakṣiṇe vā atha vāyavye nairṛte vā antare tathā

original: śālāṃ ca bhūṣayitvā tu vitānādyairmanoharaiḥ // Vis_14.23 //
analyzed: śālām ca bhūṣayitvā tu vitāna ādyaiḥ manoharaiḥ
gomayena samālipya śāli piṣṭaiḥ vicitrayet

original: brāhmaṇī tu suśīlā ca brāhmaṇyena samanvitā // Vis_14.24 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇī tu su śīlā ca brāhmaṇyena samanvitā
dhānya avaghātam tatra eva kuryāt āmam anuttamam
ulūkhala ādi saṃprokṣya hariḥ iti uccaran kramāt
ghātayet sarva dhānyāni paścāt taṇḍulam eva ca

original: āmaṃ vāpyathavā pakvamevameva dine dine // Vis_14.26 //
analyzed: āmam vā api athavā pakvam evam eva dine dine

original: saṃskṛtya taṇḍulān sarvān saṃgṛhya praṇavena tu /
analyzed: saṃskṛtya taṇḍulān sarvān saṃgṛhya praṇavena tu

original: nirīkṣya taṇḍulān paścāt śarkarādīni sarvaśaḥ // Vis_14.27 //
analyzed: nirīkṣya taṇḍulān paścāt śarkarā ādīni sarvaśas
hari smṛtyā krameṇa eva śuciḥ bhūtvā samahitaḥ

original: parārthe viṣṇupūjāyāṃ sacchūdro vaiṣṇavo mune // Vis_14.28 //
analyzed: para arthe viṣṇu pūjāyām sat śūdraḥ vaiṣṇavaḥ mune
na spṛśet pakvam āmam kuryāt yathāruci

original: tadabhāve muniśreṣṭha vaiṣṇavānāṃ gṛhe gṛhe // Vis_14.29 //
analyzed: tad abhāve muni śreṣṭha vaiṣṇavānām gṛhe gṛhe
dine dine tu kartavyāḥ taṇḍulāḥ śūdrakaiḥ vinā
asmin yaḥ tu
śudra gṛhe mohāt lebhāt vā muni sattama

original: taṇḍulaṃ kurute pūjā niṣphalā sā bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: taṇḍulam kurute pūjā niṣphalā sā bhaviṣyati
sarva nāśam avāpnoti tasmāt yatnena varjayet
sva artha arcane yathākāmam bhaktyā devāya dāpayet

original: abhinnāstaṇḍulā grāhyā akhinnāśca tathaiva ca // Vis_14.32 //
analyzed: abhinnāḥ taṇḍulāḥ grāhyāḥ akhinnāḥ ca tathā eva ca
a tuṣāḥ ca api a pāṣāṇāḥ kṛmi kīṭa vivarjitāḥ
a kaṇāḥ ca raja upetāḥ pāṃsu sparśana varjitā
apakvāḥ taṇḍulāḥ ca anyāḥ na nivedyāḥ kathaṃcana

original: pakvameva caruṃ dadyāt apakvaṃ tu vivarjayet // Vis_14.34 //
analyzed: pakvam eva carum dadyāt apakvam tu vivarjayet

original: varjitaṃ ca caruṃ mohāt nivedayati cenmune /
analyzed: varjitam ca carum mohāt nivedayati ced mune

original: rākṣasāśca piśācāśca hṛṣṭā gṛhṇānti taccarum // Vis_14.35 //
analyzed: rākṣasāḥ ca piśācāḥ ca hṛṣṭāḥ gṛhṇānti tat carum
kupyate tu hariḥ ca api na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena varjitaṃ varjayet sadā // Vis_14.36 //
analyzed: tasmāt sarva prayatnena varjitam varjayet sadā
uddharet sarva pātrāṇi praṇavena mahā mune

original: purā pātrāṇi prakṣālya pūrvoktena vidhānataḥ // Vis_14.37 //
analyzed: purā pātrāṇi prakṣālya pūrva uktena vidhānataḥ
aṣṭa akṣareṇa mantreṇa ājyena eva tu lepayet
spṛśet ca taṇḍulān paścāt dvādaśa akṣara vidyayā
kṣipet dvādaśa muṣṭim tu kramāt dvādaśa nāmabhiḥ

original: namaskārāntasaṃyuktaṃ dhyātvā tu hṛdaye harim // Vis_14.39 //
analyzed: namaskāra anta saṃyuktam dhyātvā tu hṛdaye harim
tatas ca caturaḥ muṣṭīn prakṣipet mūrti nāmabhiḥ
ṣaḍbhiḥ prakṣālanam kṛtvā bījena parameṣṭhinā
culyām āropayet paścāt bījena puruṣa ātmanā
agnim samedhayet paścāt viśva bījena sādhakaḥ
nivṛtyā abhighārya atha sarveṇa eva avatārayet

original: mūrtimantreṇa vā sarvān mūlamantreṇa vā mune // Vis_14.42 //
analyzed: mūrtimantreṇa vā sarvān mūlamantreṇa vā mune
kārayet muni śārdūla nitye naimittike kramāt
caru pāka vidhāne smin mantrān sarvān mahā mune
namaskāra vihīna inanān tu
yojayet mantra vittamaḥ
haviḥ ādiṣu vakṣyāmi varjya avarjya vidhim kramāt
nīlitam varjayet havyam atipakvam tathā eva ca
tathā api apāka saṃpūrṇam ardha taṇḍulam eva ca
varṇa antara gatam ca eva gandha duṣṭam ca dhūpitam
dvi pakvam sthāpitam ca eva āghrātam
apakṣutam śvāsa hatam mukha vāyu hatam tathā
para spṛṣṭam śunā adṛṣṭam adīkṣita nirīkṣitam
sveda bindu hatam ca api dhāma hasta gatam vāma hasta hatam tathā
laṅghitam śītam ati uṣṇam bhinna pātra gatam tathā
kṛmi keśa ādi sahitam koṣṭha kāṣṭha
mantra hīnam kriyā hīnam bhakti hīnam a toṣitam
arka pātra gatam ca api varjayet yatnatas carum
phalāni yatna pakvāni varjanīyāni sarvaśas
kadalī phalam ekam tu yatna pakveṣu gṛhyate
apakvam akvam tva
agni nāśaḥ tam phalam atra nivedayet
evam uktam tu śuddha annam pāyasam tu adhunā ucyate
yajamāna icchayā tasmin taṇḍulam gṛhya sādhakaḥ
bhavet

original: pācitaṃ pāyasaṃ proktaṃ śeṣaṃ pūrvavadācaret // Vis_14.53 //
analyzed: pācitam pāyasam proktam śeṣam pūrvavat ācaret
taṇḍulasya caturtha aṃśān tilān prakṣipya cūrṇitān

original: taccaturthaṃ ghṛtaṃ kṣiptvā pācayitvā yathāvidhi // Vis_14.54 //
analyzed: tad caturtham ghṛtam kṣiptvā pācayitvā yathāvidhi
kṛsarānnam iti proktam gaulyānnam tu adhunā śṛṇu

original: pāyasaṃ pūrvavat kṛtvā taṇḍulena samaṃ gulam // Vis_14.55 //
analyzed: pāyasam pūrvavat kṛtvā taṇḍulena samam gulam
gulānnam iti saṃproktam mudga annam adhunā ucyate
mudga annam iti saṃproktam haridrā annam iha ucyate

original: ucyate pācitaṃ hyetat haridrānnaṃ yathāvidhi // Vis_14.58 //
analyzed: ucyate pācitam hi etat haridrā annam yathāvidhi

original: tadvidhiṃ cādhunā vakṣye śṛṇu bhāgottaraṃ (pākakramaṃ?) mune /
analyzed: tad vidhim ca adhunā vakṣye śṛṇu bhāga uttaram pāka kramam mune
droṇa taṇḍulam ādāya kunda indu dhavala prabham
pūrvavat pācayitvā tu marīci ādīni vinyaset
marīcam prastha pādam ca
rajanīm kṣipet

original: sarṣapaṃ dviguṇaṃ caiva tadardhaṃ jīrakaṃ kṣipet /
analyzed: sarṣapam dviguṇam ca eva tad ardham jīrakam kṣipet

original: droṇasyaivaṃ mayā proktaṃ śeṣaṃ yuktyā prayojayet // Vis_14.61 //
analyzed: droṇasya evam mayā proktam śeṣam yuktyā prayojayet

original: iti bhāgottaraṃ proktaṃ haridrānnasya te mayā /
analyzed: iti bhāga uttaram proktam haridrā annasya te mayā
upadaṃśān pravakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣva muni sattama
gandha varṇa rasa upetam vastra pūtam ghṛtam navam
dvātriṃśat aṃśam ājyam syāt gṛhṇīyāt atra go ghṛtam
ṣoḍaśa aṃśam tu gul māṣam tad ardham gulam iṣyate
pakva yuj phala mūlam ca sarvam lavaṇa miśritam
ghṛtena pācayet samyak tapta kāñcana vat mune
marīcaiḥ rajanī miśraiḥ sarṣapaiḥ ca mahā mune
pācayitvā upadaṃśāni deveśāya nivedayet
śeṣa aṇim ca upadaṃśāni yajamāna icchayā pacet
dadhi khaṇḍa rasaiḥ yuktam aṣṭa aṃśakam udāhṛtam

original: sūpaṃ caiva tathā kuryāt yathāvittānusārataḥ(?) // Vis_14.67 //
analyzed: sūpam ca eva tathā kuryāt yathā vitta anusārataḥ
atas tat parimāṇam tu vakṣyāmi muni sattama

original: yajamānecchayā tasmin godadhi gṛhya sādhakaḥ // Vis_14.68 //
analyzed: yajamāna icchayā tasmin godadhi gṛhya sādhakaḥ

original: tadardhaṃ tu gulaṃ kṣiptvā tathā khaṇḍarasaṃ kṣipet /
analyzed: tad ardham tu gulam kṣiptvā tathā khaṇḍa rasam kṣipet

original: tasyābhāve tu sarpiḥ syāt marīcaṃ niśi(?)
analyzed: tasya abhāve tu sarpiḥ syāt marīcam niśi
cūrṇakam

original: vinyaset pācitaṃ hyetat sūpaṃ tatra yathāvidhi /
analyzed: vinyaset pācitam hi etat sūpam tatra yathāvidhi
kadalī panasa āmrāṇām paripakva phalāni ca
āmram ca eva upadaṃśam syāt śṛṇu pakva upadaṃśakān
kadalī panasam ca eva kāravallī dvayam tathā

original: bṛhatīṃ kṛṣṇabṛhatīṃ karavartaṃ tathaiva ca // Vis_14.72 //
analyzed: bṛhatīm kṛṣṇabṛhatīm karavartam tathā eva ca

original: tathā kṛṣṇālasantī ca grāhyāṇi madhurāṇi ca // Vis_14.73 //
analyzed: tathā kṛṣṇā āla santī ca grāhyāṇi madhurāṇi ca

original: madhureṣu ca sarveṣu tālamekaṃ tu varjayet /
analyzed: madhureṣu ca sarveṣu tālam ekam tu varjayet
kadalī panasa ādi iṣudyānām
sāram uddhṛtya nārada
pātre nikṣipya devāya dadyāt carma ādi varjayet
varjitam varjayet yatnāt nivedayati ced mune
tad pūjā niṣphalā yāti sarva roga vivṛddhi kṛt
tasmāt carma ādi yatnena varjayet varjitam sadā
kuluttha māṣa niṣpāvam varjayet dved dvi daleṣu ca

original: mudgadvayaṃ ca śībaṃ ca tathā kṛṣṇālasanti ca (-kām?) // Vis_14.77 //
analyzed: mudga dvayam ca śībam ca tathā kṛṣṇāla santi ca kām
anna upari vinikṣipya devadevam nivedayet
kośātakīm alābum ca patra jātīḥ ca varjayet

original: phalāni kathitānyatra mūlāni śṛṇu tatparam // Vis_14.79 //
analyzed: phalāni kathitāni atra mūlāni śṛṇu tat param

original: vallī caiva mahāvallī vanavallī tathaiva ca /
analyzed: vallī ca eva mahāvallī vanavallī tathā eva ca

original: piṇḍā caiva mahāpiṇḍā kṣudrapiṇḍā tathaiva ca // Vis_14.80 //
analyzed: piṇḍā ca eva mahāpiṇḍā kṣudrapiṇḍā tathā eva ca
sugandha utpala kandam ca deveśasya priyam śubham
grāhyāṇi mūlāni etāni devadevam nivedayet
alābhe śeṣa sarva
mūlāni nām
varjayet vana ūraṇam
tathā eva nitya pūjāyām sūraṇam muni sattama
lobhāt mohāt nivedyam ced
tad pūjā niṣphalā bhavet

original: tasmāt prayatnato varjyaṃ sūraṇaṃ parivarjayet // Vis_14.83 //
analyzed: tasmāt prayatnataḥ varjyam sūraṇam parivarjayet

original: kāmye mahotsave caiva mahānne tu mahāmune /
analyzed: kāmye mahā utsave ca eva mahā anne tu mahā mune
yajamāna icchayā tasmin
sūraṇam tu nivedayet
viṣṇuḥ ca eva mahā viṣṇuḥ tathā eva ca mahā mune
tṛpyatu antya

original: tra mahānnena hṛṣṭā gṛhṇanti taccarum // Vis_14.85 //
analyzed: mahā annena hṛṣṭāḥ gṛhṇanti tat carum
kaṭukāḥ ca tathā amlāḥ ca tiktāḥ ca iti viśeṣataḥ

original: marīciṃ niśicūrṇaṃ ca tanmadhye kuḍubaṃ kṣipet /
analyzed: kṣipet
āmlopadaṃśam iti āhuḥ sarva saṃpad sukha āvaham
kathitāni nivedyāni na anyāni tu kathaṃcana

original: pātrāṇi ca śarāvāṇi bāhyaśuddhiśca kārayet // Vis_14.88 //
analyzed: pātrāṇi ca śarāvāṇi bāhya śuddhiḥ ca kārayet
sarva pātreṣu bāhyeṣu ūrdhva puṇḍram ca bhasmanā
kārayet mūrtimantreṇa pūrva ādiṣu yathākramam
śarāve viṣṇumantreṇa pūrva pātre bhāge
tu
mahānasam samārabhya garbhageha avasānakam
