original: tena mantreṇa matimān sarvānutthāpayet kramāt // Vis_14.91 //
analyzed: tena mantreṇa matimān sarvān utthāpayet kramāt
etasmin eva kāle tu śaṅkham dadhmu
stribhiḥ pṛthak

original: dvārasyottarapārśve tu nyaset pātrāṇi sarvaśaḥ // Vis_14.92 //
analyzed: dvārasya uttara pārśve tu nyaset pātrāṇi sarvaśas
sauvarṇam rājatam tāmram athavā kadalī dalam

original: śuddhakāṃsyena vā kuryāt pātraṃ śatapalena tu // Vis_14.93 //
analyzed: śuddha kāṃsyena vā kuryāt pātram śata palena tu

original: tadardhaṃ vā muniśreṣṭha dvātriṃśat palena (-lakena?) vā /
analyzed: tad ardham vā muni śreṣṭha dvātriṃśat palena lakena vā
yathā vitta anusāreṇa
pātram saṃgṛhya sādhakaḥ
darvīghanam
samādāya ājyena eva abhighārayet

original: annena pūrayet pātraṃ gulmāṣeṇa guḍena ca // Vis_14.95 //
analyzed: annena pūrayet pātram gul māṣeṇa guḍena ca
palena ājyena dadhnā ca sa upadaṃśam nivedayet

original: caturdhāsmin vibhajyaikaṃ bhāgaṃ devāya kalpayet // Vis_14.96 //
analyzed: caturdhā asmin vibhajya ekam bhāgam devāya kalpayet
deva artham kalpitam bhāgam deveśāya nivedayet

original: nivedya kāle tantrajñaḥ arghyapādyādikaṃ dadet // Vis_14.97 //
analyzed: nivedya kāle tantra jñaḥ arghya pādya ādikam dadet

original: puṣpaṃ datvā namaskṛtya hareḥ pādau tu sādhakaḥ /
analyzed: puṣpam da tvā namaskṛtya hareḥ pādau tu sādhakaḥ
hasta prakṣālanam kṛtvā devasya astreṇa mantra vid
pariṣekam tatas kṛtvā pūrvavat sādhaka uttamaḥ
kṛtvā susva
pāṇī prakṣālya mūlamantreṇa saṃspṛśet

original: śeṣaṃ tu pūrvavat kṛtvā havirādyaṃ mahāmune /
analyzed: śeṣam tu pūrvavat kṛtvā haviḥ ādyam mahā mune
svastika āsana saṃyukte deśika upendrataḥ mukhaḥ
dakṣiṇe karaśākhāsu pañca upaniṣadam nyaset
nivedayet haviḥ tasmin pañcadhā parameṣṭhinā
namaskṛtya japet paścāt pañca upaniṣadā mune

original: pāṇiṃ prakṣālya yatnena pṛthak pātre nivedayet // Vis_14.102 //
analyzed: pāṇim prakṣālya yatnena pṛthak pātre nivedayet
nṛtta geya samanvitam

original: devadevasya devarṣe nitye naimittike punaḥ // Vis_14.103 //
analyzed: devadevasya deva ṛṣe nitye naimittike punar
dhūpam su dhūpitam bhaktyā punar dadhi nivedayet

original: pānīyaṃ ca punardatvā kelipātre 'male śubhe // Vis_14.104 //
analyzed: pānīyam ca punar datvā keli pātre male śubhe
tarpaṇam punar ācāmam da tvā tad tad pratigrahe
gandha piṣṭaiḥ samudvartya pāṇim su śveta vāsasā
ācchādya gandha kalkena punar ācamanam dadet

original: mukhavāsaṃ tato datvā vidhivat sādhakottamaḥ // Vis_14.106 //
analyzed: mukha vāsam tatas da tvā vidhivat sādhaka uttamaḥ
punar dvitīya bhāgena haviṣā mūlavidyayā
juhuyāt agnikuṇḍe tu samidh ājya puraḥsaram
tṛtīyena balim dadyāt prāc mukhaḥ vā api udak mukhaḥ

original: punardatvā jalaṃ samyak namaskṛtya pradakṣiṇam // Vis_14.108 //
analyzed: punar datvā jalam samyak namaskṛtya pradakṣiṇam
tad bali śeṣam tu bali pīṭhe vinikṣipet

original: turyabhāgaṃ tu saṃgṛhya ācāryo mantravittamaḥ // Vis_14.109 //
analyzed: turya bhāgam tu saṃgṛhya ācāryaḥ mantra vittamaḥ
prāśayet prāc mukhaḥ bhūtvā pātra śeṣam anuttamam
tad śeṣam sarva pāpa ghnam sarva roga nikṛntanam
sarva tīrtha pradam tasmāt bhakṣayet chedaṣam uttamam

original: ālayasyottare vāpi nairṛte vāpi mantravit // Vis_14.111 //
analyzed: ālayasya uttare vā api nairṛte vā api mantra vid
bhuktvā ca eva muni śreṣṭha śeṣam pūrvavat ācaret
nitya pūjā vidhau brahman caru pāka vidhau kramāt
evam ukta prakāreṇa kārayet tu dine dine
mahāhaviḥ vidhim vakṣye hi aṣṭa droṇam kanīyasam
dviguṇam madhyamam proktam triguṇam ca adhama uttamam

original: catuḥ pañcaguṇaṃ ṣaṭkaṃ madhyamasya trayaṃ viduḥ // Vis_14.114 //
analyzed: catuḥ pañcaguṇam ṣaṭkam madhyamasya trayam viduḥ
sapta aṣṭa navamam proktam uttamasya trayam viduḥ

original: pūrvavat pācayitvā tu sarvānutthāpayet pṛthak // Vis_14.115 //
analyzed: pūrvavat pācayitvā tu sarvān utthāpayet pṛthak
maṇḍapasya uttare bhāge nyaset bhāṇḍāni atha kramāt

original: nairṛte vāruṇe vāpi vinyasecca mahāhaviḥ // Vis_14.116 //
analyzed: nairṛte vāruṇe vā api vinyaset ca mahāhaviḥ
maṇḍapam catur aśram tu kṛtvā alaṃkṛtya ca akṣataiḥ
piṣṭa cūrṇaiḥ alaṃkṛtya padmam kuryāt sa karṇikam
paṭena ācchādya bhūmim tu rambhā patrāṇi ca upari
snāna ādi deva karmāṇi pūrvavat kārayet kramāt
puratas kṛtvā kāryam vijñāpayet śanais
pīṭhāt utthāpya deveśam pādukābhyām upāsakaḥ
śaṅkha dhvani samāyuktam ānayet bhojana āsanam
pādya arghya ācamanam da tvā gandha puṣpaiḥ prapūjayet
prokṣayitvā abhighārya atha caru pātrāṇi ca eva hi

original: pāyasaṃ kṛsaraṃ gaulyaṃ mudgānnaṃ ca yathākramam // Vis_14.121 //
analyzed: pāyasam kṛsaram gaulyam mudga annam ca yathākramam
śuddha annam ca eva sūpa annam
dhikam ca mahāhaviḥ

original: ājyaṃ ca guḍakhaṇḍaṃ ca kadalyādiphalatrayam // Vis_14.122 //
analyzed: ājyam ca guḍa khaṇḍam ca kadalyādi phalatrayam
ājya pakva upadaṃśam ca pātre sarvam nivedayet

original: pariṣekaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā hyannasūktena saṃspṛśet // Vis_14.123 //
analyzed: pariṣekam tatas kṛtvā hi anna sūktena saṃspṛśet
dadyāt tad dakṣiṇe haste haviḥ prāśana mudrayā

original: sugandhaṃ svādutoyaṃ ca datvā pānīyamuttamam // Vis_14.124 //
analyzed: sugandham svādu toyam ca da tvā pānīyam uttamam

original: gandhakalkena saṃmṛjya tataḥ pīṭhāntaraṃ nayet // Vis_14.125 //
analyzed: gandha kalkena saṃmṛjya tatas pīṭha antaram nayet
pūrva mālām vimuktvā tu
veṣṭayet mālayā punar

analyzed: punar ācamanam da tvā hastau saṃśodhya vāsasā
pṛthukāni upahārāṇi apūpa antam nivedayet

punar ācamanam da tvā mukha vāsam nivedayet

original: kramukastu phalaṃ bhinnamapakvaṃ pakvameva vā // Vis_14.128 //
analyzed: kramukaḥ tu phalam bhinnam apakvam pakvam eva vā
karpūra tailaiḥ saṃsiktam asiktam vā muni īśvara

elā kakkola jātīḥ ca karpūra sahitam kramāt
śilā sitā cūrṇena saṃyuktam karpūra sahitena ca
saṃskṛtam praṇavena eva mukha vāsam nivedayet

original: datvā ca rājavat samyak pitṛvat pūjayeddharim /
analyzed: da tvā ca rāja vat samyak pitṛ vat pūjayet harim

original: pīṭhādutthāpnaya deveśaṃ prāsādaṃ tu paribhramet // Vis_14.132 //
analyzed: pīṭhāt utthāpnaya deveśam prāsādam tu paribhramet

original: prāsādaṃ tu paribhrāmya garbhāgāraṃ praveśayet // Vis_14.133 //
analyzed: prāsādam tu paribhrāmya garbhāgāram praveśayet

original: viśeṣataḥ pravakṣyāmi mahānnasya vidhiṃ kramāt // Vis_14.134 //
analyzed: viśeṣataḥ pravakṣyāmi mahānnasya vidhim kramāt

original: siddhaṃ mahāhaviḥ syāttu tadardhaṃ madhyamaṃ smṛtam // Vis_14.136 //
analyzed: siddham mahāhaviḥ syāt tu tad ardham madhyamam smṛtam

original: dugdhānāṃ tu gavāṃ syādāḍhakaṣaṭakaṃ guṇaṃ catuṣṣaṣṭi // Vis_14.137 //
analyzed: dugdhānām tu gavām syāt āḍhaka ṣaṭakam guṇam catuṣṣaṣṭi
phalam sarpiḥ tathā āḍhakam syāt pañca prastha mudga annam

kaṃsa dvitayam
śālyāḥ taṇḍulam iṣṭam payaḥ gulā anna vidhau
etat varam asya ardham madhyamam asya ardham adhamam syāt

kakkolaiḥ jāti phalaiḥ pūga phalaiḥ śveta bhujaga patraiḥ

elā campaka ketakyā vāsitam tu pānīyam

original: siddhaṃ devagṛhe vā tatpārśve vā[pi]mantrayogyaṃ syāt /

original: yo mohādanyagṛhe siddhaṃ devāya mantreṇa // Vis_14.144 //

original: havirādyaṃ tu hi dadyāt sa kilbiṣī rāṣṭranāśī syāt /

original: bhaktairanyatrāpi kvāpi pakvaṃ samāgataṃ yadyat // Vis_14.145 //
analyzed: bhaktaiḥ anyatra api kvāpi pakvam samāgatam yat yat

original: etat kṛtvā samyaṅmahāhaviḥ priyatamaṃ tu hareḥ // Vis_14.146 //
analyzed: etat kṛtvā samyak mahāhaviḥ priyatamam tu hareḥ

original: sārūpyaṃ cādhamaṃ ca sālokyaṃ paramam // Vis_14.147 //
analyzed: sārūpyam ca adhamam ca sālokyam paramam
payaḥ digula annam nivedya bhaktyā hara eti śāntim

viśeṣaḥ ca atra saṃproktaḥ mahā anna ādi vidhau mune
śeṣam sādhāraṇam kuryā avidyā
diti śāstrasya niścayaḥ
mahāhavi vidhau ca atra dvividham mānam īritam

original: dviprakāraṃ tu tantrajño yathāyogaṃ samācaret // Vis_14.150 //
analyzed: dvi prakāram tu tantra jñaḥ yathāyogam samācaret
iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām carupākavidhiḥ nāma caturdaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pañcadaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
nāradaḥ
brūhi me harisena īśa mūlamantreṇa vistarāt
homa kramam kṛpā ādhāra śuśrūṣoḥ bhakta vatsala
viṣvaksenaḥ
śṛṇu nārada tattvena pūrva bhāge yathā mune
kuṇḍāni sruc sruvam vau
ca eva praspaṣṭam proktavān aham

original: tatkrameṇa vinā vāpi saha vā mūlavidyayā /
analyzed: tad krameṇa vinā vā api saha vā mūlavidyayā
homam kuryāt yathāśakti siddhaṃddhim
vindeta sarvathā
vaiṣṇavaiḥ karaṇaiḥ yuktam atas tam prathamam śṛṇu
pippalam ca śamīgarbham araṇim parikalpayet
mathitvā vaiṣṇavaiḥ agnim athavā ratna saṃbhavam
laukikam vā samānīya prokṣayet dvādaśa akṣaraiḥ
ācāryaḥ gnim samādāya sva ātmani eva upasaṃharet

original: tena bījena matimān tarjanyaṅguṣṭhayā mune // Vis_15.6 //
analyzed: tena bījena matimān tarjanī aṅguṣṭhayā mune
añjali mudrayā ca agnim namaskṛtya punar punar

original: kuṇḍaṃ vā sthaṇḍilaṃ vāpi caturaśraṃ tu kārayet // Vis_15.7 //
analyzed: kuṇḍam vā sthaṇḍilam vā api catur aśram tu kārayet
vaiṣṇavīkaraṇa arthāya
ma tandritaḥ
catur aṅgula mānena khānayet avaṭam dharām
khātāt hi dvi aṅgulam hitvā mekhalām parikalpayet
catur aṅgula vistāram utsedham tu tathā eva ca
mekhalā ekā samantataḥ
iti eka mekhalā kuṇḍam tantre smin parikīrtitam
yathākāmam prakartavyā yoniḥ pippala patra vat
karṣaṇa ādiṣu sarvāsu kriyāsu muni sattama
vaiṣṇavīkaraṇa arthāya saṃproktam kuṇḍa lakṣaṇam
saṃprokṣya abhyukṣma śācā
streṇa sādhakaḥ muna sittama
upalipya ullikhet rekhām argalām
yajñanāmikām

original: saumyāgrāṃ prathamāṃ tasyā rekhe pūrvāgrike tayoḥ /
analyzed: saumya agrām prathamām tasyāḥ rekhe pūrva āgrike tayoḥ
madhye tisraḥ tathārūpāḥ dakṣiṇa ādi krameṇa tu
evam ullikhya ca abhyukṣya praṇavena eva mantra vid

original: śayyāṃ tu cintayet pūrvaṃ kuṇḍamadhye tu deśikaḥ // Vis_15.15 //
analyzed: śayyām tu cintayet pūrvam kuṇḍa madhye tu deśikaḥ
dharma ādi pādaṃdān
vinyasya tathā adharma ādika trayam

original: anantaṃ vinyasenmadhye tataḥ pāśāstrayo guṇāḥ // Vis_15.16 //
analyzed: anantam vinyaset madhye tatas pāśāḥ trayaḥ guṇāḥ
tatas prokta vidhānena mūlamantreṇa sādhakaḥ
pṛthivī ādīni bhūtāni karaṇa ādīni kartṛke

original: dhyāyecca lakṣmīṃ tanmadhye prakṛtiṃ triguṇātmikām // Vis_15.18 //
analyzed: dhyāyet ca lakṣmīm tad madhye prakṛtim triguṇa ātmikām
tasmin śayana madhye tu saṃprāpta nava yauvanām
atīva rūpa saṃmpannām mada ghūrṇita locanām
sarga śakti samopetām vaiṣṇavīm śubha vigrahām
divya mālya ambara dharām divya ratna virājitām
divya gandha anulipta aṅgīm divya ābharaṇa bhūṣitām
sa abhilāṣām ṛtusnātām prārthayantīm harim prati

original: evaṃ rūpāṃ ca saṃcintya devīṃ paṅkajadhāriṇīm /
analyzed: evam rūpām ca saṃcintya devīm paṅkaja dhāriṇīm
gandha mālya udaka ādīni mukha vāsa antakāni ca
yāni krīḍā upacārāṇi tāni dhyātvā samantataḥ

original: atīva rūpasampannaṃ prathame vayasi sthitam // Vis_15.23 //
analyzed: atīva rūpa sampannam prathame vayasi sthitam
makuṭa aṅgada citra aṅgam nīla kuñcita mūrdhajam
divya mālya ambara dharam divya ratna virājitam
śrīvatsena aṅkita uraskam vanamālā virājitam
sarva ratna prabhā jāla kaustubhena virājitam
annata aṃsam mahā uraskam karṇa anta āyata locanam
ājānu bāhum śrīmantam saumyam prahasita ānanam
lāvaṇya amṛta toyena siñcantam iva sarvatas
caturbhujam anudhyāyet śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam

original: evaṃ rūpaṃ tato dhyātvā devīṃ devaṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: evam rūpam tatas dhyātvā devīm devam tathā eva ca
arcayet gandha puṣpa ādyaiḥ upacāraiḥ manoramaiḥ
saṃpūjayet tatas bhaktyā svayam tu vigata spṛhaḥ
eka śayyā gatau dhyātvā samāliṅgya vyavasthitau
paścāt tu grāmya dharmeṇa param harṣam upāgatau

original: devasya śuklamadhyasthaṃ vahnibījaṃ tu sādhakaḥ // Vis_15.30 //
analyzed: devasya śukla madhya stham vahnibījam tu sādhakaḥ
tena bījena matimān nyaset agnim anuttamam
garbhaśayyām pratiṣṭhāpya tad ratnena samanvitam

original: devaṃ visarjayet paścāt garbhādhāne kṛte sati /
analyzed: devam visarjayet paścāt garbhādhāne kṛte sati
agnim samedhayet paścāt śuṣka kāṣṭhaiḥ anantaram
prādeśa mātrāḥ samidhaḥ kṛtvā ādhānam tatas punar

original: parisamūhya tato darbhaiḥ paristīrya tridhā tridhā // Vis_15.33 //
analyzed: parisamūhya tatas darbhaiḥ paristīrya tridhā tridhā
agraiḥ ācchādayet yadvat mūlam pūrva āditaḥ kramāt
pātrāṇi āsādayet tasmin idhma barhi dvayam tathā
sruc sruvau ca praṇītena ca
kṣasthā
sādhakaḥ

original: prokṣaṇī ca praṇīte dve ājyasthālīmukhaṃ(dvayaṃ) tathā // Vis_15.35 //
analyzed: prokṣaṇī ca praṇīte dve ājya sthālī mukham dvayam tathā
yugmam yugmam vyavasthāpya anyat api upayogi yat

original: tatsarvaṃ prokṣāyitvā tu gṛhītvā prokṣaṇīṃ tataḥ // Vis_15.36 //
analyzed: tat sarvam prokṣāyitvā tu gṛhītvā prokṣaṇīm tatas
adbhiḥ saṃpūrya ca utpūya pavitra antarhite kare

original: avasthāpya ca tattoyaṃ prokṣayitvātra sādhakaḥ // Vis_15.37 //
analyzed: avasthāpya ca tat toyam prokṣayitvā atra sādhakaḥ
prokṣaṇyām eva tat kṛtvā dhyātvā jyotiṣam avyayam
pūrvavat sthāpayet agneḥ agnim
saṃskṛtya antar jalena tu
tris saṃprokṣya tatas sarvam idhmam visrasya sādhakaḥ
gandha puṣpa akṣata yutām pavitra antar jalena tu
praṇītām agratas kṛtvā tasyām sa aṅgam nyaset harim
gandha ādibhiḥ samabhyarcya sarva rakṣā karam prabhum
dhyātvā nītvā uttare bhāge sthāpayitvā arcayet budhaḥ
ājya sthālīm atha ājyena saṃpūrya agre nidhāya tu
saṃplava utplavanābhyām tu kuryāt ājyasya saṃskṛtim
ākhaṇḍita agrau nihatau kuśau prādeśa mātrakau
tābhyām uttāna pāṇibhyām aṅguṣṭha anāmikena tu
tān antayoḥ tu saṃgṛhya tris nītvā tris atha ānayet

original: sruksruvau cāpi saṃmṛjya punaḥ prakṣālya caiva hi /
analyzed: sruc sruvau ca api saṃmṛjya punar prakṣālya ca eva hi

original: niṣṭapya sthāpayitvā tu praṇavenaiva sādhakaḥ // Vis_15.44 //
analyzed: niṣṭapya sthāpayitvā tu praṇavena eva sādhakaḥ
tena bījena matimān garbhādhāna ādi homayet
garbhādhānam puṃsavanam sīmantonnayanam tathā
jātakarma nāmakaraṇa annaprāśanam eva ca

original: caulaṃ tathopanayanaṃ prājāpatyaṃ tu somakam // Vis_15.46 //
analyzed: caulam tathā upanayanam prājāpatyam tu somakam
vaiśvadevam ca śukriyam samāvartanam eva ca

original: vivāha iti vijñeyo mune 'taḥ parameva hi // Vis_15.47 //
analyzed: vivāhaḥ iti vijñeyaḥ mune taḥ param eva hi
saṃskāra anukramaḥ proktaḥ tad kriyā vakṣyate dhunā

original: agniṃ samarcya gandhādyaiḥ garbhādhānādi homayet // Vis_15.48 //
analyzed: agnim samarcya gandha ādyaiḥ garbhādhāna ādi homayet
ācāryaḥ nala jihvāsu saptasu eva ārabhet mune
anyathākṛta tulyam syāt viparīta phala pradam
nāradaḥ

original: brūhi yatkathitaṃ pūrvaṃ śravaṇīyaṃ mayā yadi /
analyzed: brūhi yat kathitam pūrvam śravaṇīyam mayā yadi

original: jihvā sapteti kiṃ nāma kiṃ padaṃ kiṃ guṇaṃ mune // Vis_15.50 //
analyzed: jihvā saptā iti kim nāma kim padam kim guṇam mune
viṣvaksenaḥ

original: śṛṇu vakṣyāmyahaṃ samyak rahasyaṃ paramaṃ mune /
analyzed: śṛṇu vakṣyāmi aham samyak rahasyam paramam mune

original: jihvākhyāṃ sthānarūpe ca viniyogamataḥ param // Vis_15.51 //
analyzed: jihvā ākhyām sthāna rūpe ca viniyogam atas param
jihvā agneḥ prathamā kālī karālī tad anantarā

original: manojavā yā tṛtīyā tu turyā lohitā bhavet // Vis_15.52 //
analyzed: manojavā yā tṛtīyā tu turyā lohitā bhavet
sudhūmrā pañcamī sphaliṅginī abhiśabditā
saptamī viśvarūpā ākhyā sapta jihvāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: kālyāstu madhyamaṃ sthānaṃ karālyāḥ pūrvadig bhavet /
analyzed: kālyāḥ tu madhyamam sthānam karālyāḥ pūrva diś bhavet
manojavāyāḥ kīnāśam vāruṇīṇam
lohitāpadam
sūdhūmrā soma nīlāya nilayā
sphuliṅginī anala ālayā
viśvarūpīpe
śavasatiḥ evam sthānam kramāt mune
āsām kālyām vivāha antam garbhādhāna ādi kārayet

original: vaiṣṇavānalarūpe tu praṇevana huned ghṛtam // Vis_15.56 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇava anala rūpe tu hunet ghṛtam
ekaikam aṣṭa āhutibhiḥ saṃskārāṇi viśeṣataḥ
smaran tad tad bhāvanayā sādhakaḥ prauḍha mānasaḥ
ṣoḍaśa idhmān samādāya sakṛt praṇavam uccaran

original: juhuyāt kuṇḍamadhye tu kālyāṃ cānnāvasānake(kam?) // Vis_15.58 //
analyzed: juhuyāt kuṇḍa madhye tu kālyām
punar ājya āhutim hutvā praṇavena aṣṭadhā atra tu
carum hutvā akṣa mātreṇa pratyeka eka āhutim kramāt
aṣṭa akṣareṇa mantreṇa
ṣṭāviṃśati saṃkhyayā

original: pūrṇāhutiṃ tato hutvā srucā mūlena sādhakaḥ // Vis_15.60 //
analyzed: pūrṇāhutim tatas hutvā srucā mūlena sādhakaḥ
vauṣaṭ antena mantreṇa plutam praṇavam uccaret
gandha puṣpa ādinā abhyarcya namaskṛtya agni mantrataḥ
kuṇḍāt agnim samādāya pūrva kuṇḍe niyojayet

original: tatastu dakṣiṇe nyasya paścime tadanantaram // Vis_15.62 //
analyzed: tatas tu dakṣiṇe nyasya paścime tad anantaram
uttare gnim vinikṣipya mūlamantreṇa sādhakaḥ

original: athavātra muniśreṣṭha sarvaṃ vai prathamena tu // Vis_15.63 //
analyzed: athavā atra muni śreṣṭha sarvam vai prathamena tu
kuṇḍe kuṇḍe vinikṣipya pāvakam parama artha vid

original: evaṃ saṃskṛtya vidhinā pāvakaṃ pāvanaṃ hareḥ // Vis_15.64 //
analyzed: evam saṃskṛtya vidhinā pāvakam pāvanam hareḥ
evam tathā agni saṃskāram sarva yāgeṣu kīrtitam
vaiṣṇavīkaraṇe ca evam vaiṣṇava agniḥ tatas bhavet
paridhi prabhṛtīn dagdhvā praṇavena tu sādhakaḥ

original: etatkrameṇa cotpādya vaiṣṇavāgniṃ tu nārada // Vis_15.66 //
analyzed: etad krameṇa ca utpādya vaiṣṇava agnim tu nārada
kārayet vidhivat sarvam karṣaṇa ādi kriyā ādiṣu

original: athavā muniśārdūla pūrvakuṇḍe tu kārayet // Vis_15.67 //
analyzed: athavā muni śārdūla pūrva kuṇḍe tu kārayet
vaiṣṇavīkaraṇam sarvam śeṣam sādhāraṇam bhavet

original: kuṇḍe vā sthaṇḍile vāpi vaiṣṇavīkaraṇaṃ kura1 // Vis_15.68 //
analyzed: kuṇḍe vā sthaṇḍile vā api vaiṣṇavīkaraṇam kura
anya deśe tu yaḥ mohāt agnim utpādayet yadi

original: tatkriyā niṣphalā jñeyā sasyādinidhanaṃ bhavet // Vis_15.69 //
analyzed: tad kriyā niṣphalā jñeyā sasya ādi nidhanam bhavet
tasmāt sarva prayatnena kārayet vidhi coditam
caturaśra ādi kuṇḍāni saṃprokṣya astreṇa mantrataḥ
vinyaset nyāsa mārgeṇa śaśāṅka ādi akṣaraiḥ kramāt

original: tatra nyāsakramaṃ vakṣye śṛṇu kuṇḍeṣu nārada // Vis_15.71 //
analyzed: tatra nyāsa kramam vakṣye śṛṇu kuṇḍeṣu nārada

original: kuṇḍe vā sthaṇḍile vāpi praṇavābhyukṣaṇe kṛte /
analyzed: kuṇḍe vā sthaṇḍile vā api praṇava abhyukṣaṇe kṛte
prokṣayet vasu sūtreṇa dakṣiṇa ādi uttara antakam
paścima ādi indra paryantam koṣṭham kṛtvā vibhajya ca

original: tanmadhyakoṣṭhaṃ prastīrya śālinā kuḍubena ca // Vis_15.73 //
analyzed: tad madhya koṣṭham prastīrya śālinā kuḍubena ca
taṇḍulena akṣatena atra candra maṇḍalam ālikhet
tad madhye bījam ālikhya pūrvāt aṣṭa akṣaram likhet
tad bahis vasu koṣṭheṣu āṛkāra antam ālikhet
indra ādi īśāna paryantam tad bahis svara koṣṭhake
pūrva ādi indra īśa paryantam ja antara prabhṛtīn nyaset
tad bahis tattva koṣṭheṣu jha ādi sa antam atho likhet
pūrva ādi uttara pūrva antam tatas vai mekhalāsu ca
pūrva ādi soma paryantam paṭhantam ca sudarśanam
yoni madhye tu vipra indra viṣṇubījam anuttamam

original: vinyaset pañcadhā tasminnanāmikyā tu sādhakaḥ // Vis_15.78 //
analyzed: vinyaset pañcadhā tasmin anāmikyā tu sādhakaḥ

original: evaṃ nyāsaṃ kramāt kṛtvā sādhakānāṃ hitāya tu /
analyzed: evam nyāsam kramāt kṛtvā sādhakānām hitāya tu

original: nyāsahīne 'gnikāryaṃ syāt tatkriyā niṣphalā bhavet // Vis_15.79 //
analyzed: nyāsa hīne gni kāryam syāt tad kriyā niṣphalā bhavet

original: tadgrāmo nidhanaṃ yāti tatsthānāṃ nidhanaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: tad grāmaḥ nidhanam yāti tat sthānām nidhanam bhavet
tasmāt sarva prayatnena nyāsam kuryāt vicakṣaṇaḥ
kuṇḍe kuṇḍe muni śreṣṭha sthaṇḍile vā api atandritaḥ
gandha ādi dīpa paryantam abhyarcya añjali mudrikām
darśayitvā yathānyāyam kuryāt pañcaśatam kramāt

original: tathaiva mekhalāyāṃ tu pūjayedyonimeva ca // Vis_15.82 //
analyzed: tathā eva mekhalāyām tu pūjayet yonim eva ca
atas param pravakṣyāmi homa anukramam uttamam
karṣaṇa ādiṣu sarvāsu kriyāsu muni sattama
ācāryaḥ prakramet homam barhiṃṣi samidhaḥ tathā

original: paridhisruksruvānnaṃ cāpyājyaṃ lājaṃ tilaṃ tathā // Vis_15.84 //
analyzed: paridhi sruc sruva annam ca api ājyam lājam tilam tathā
tad indhana bali dravyam gandham puṣpam su dhūpakam

original: dīpaṃ vardhanīṃ gandhodaṃ prokṣaṇīpātrakaṃ tathā // Vis_15.85 //
analyzed: dīpam vardhanīm gandhodam prokṣaṇī pātrakam tathā
praṇītā ājyam atha anyat ca hastam utsṛjya vinyaset
uttareṇa anila sthānāt yugmam yugmena sādhakaḥ
prokṣaṇyām vardhanī nīram āsicya prokṣya vidyayā
mūlayā sādhana dravyam āhūya agnim tatas mune
analam pūrvavat prokṣya a cā
gni mūrtim anusmaret

original: agniṃ prokṣyāvaṭasthaṃ taṃ sānusvāre tu bījake // Vis_15.88 //
analyzed: agnim prokṣya avaṭa stham tam sa anusvāre tu bījake
hastābhyām analam sthāpya pūrva uktena vidhānataḥ
edhāṃsi jvālayitvā ukṣya paristīrya agni madhyame
padmam aṣṭadalam dhyātvā tatra vai mūlaberataḥ
āvāhayitvā deveśam arcayet vidhi coditam
atra kaścid viśeṣaḥ sti homa karmaṇi nārada
devam śveta adri saṃkāśam tri pādam sapta bāhukam
veda śṛṅgam dvi vadanam pīta ambara dharam harim
śaṅkha cakra gadā pāṇim sapta jihvam subhūṣaṇam
saumyam ca sarva ābharaṇaiḥ divyaiḥ parivṛtam budhaḥ
agnau vahni sva rūpeṇa sthitam arcā mukham smaret
tasmāt ardhya ādi da tvā ca dakṣiṇe gneḥ vidhim nyaset

original: taṃ pūjya vidhivat paścāt homadravyāṇi madhyame // Vis_15.94 //
analyzed: tam pūjya vidhivat paścāt homa dravyāṇi madhyame
praṇītā bhājanam nyasya tatra sa aṅgam nyaset harim
devam abhyarcya gandha ādyaiḥ homa karma samācaret
nitye naimittike kāmye samidh ājyaiḥ yathākramam
samidh pālāśa khadira bilva udumbara pippalāḥ
sat vṛkṣāḥ viduṣā grāhyāḥ tad mānam dvādaśa aṅgulam
kaniṣṭhikā ghanāḥ vakra grandhi nyāsa anya vṛttataḥ
paridhiḥ hasta mātraḥ syāt sthaṇḍile kuṇḍe eva vā
madhya mekhalayā tulyam aṅguṣṭhānām ghanam viduḥ
devānām paridhīn dikṣu catasṛṣu api kārayet
viṣṇuyāge viśeṣeṇa dvijānām agnikarmaṇi

original: triṣveva tu mune buddhi homāntaṃ paścimādikam(?) /
analyzed: triṣu eva tu mune homa antam paścima ādikam
viṣṇoḥ makhe mahendra ādi darbhān sarvāsu ca ubhayoḥ
niśācarāṇām rakṣāyai viśeṣam muni sattama
mahendra prabhṛtīnām tu homa dravya apahāriṇām
evam jñātvā muni śreṣṭhaḥ idhma ādyaiḥ hemam ācaret

original: karālyāṃ samidho hutvā mūlamantreṇa mantravit // Vis_15.102 //
analyzed: karālyām samidhaḥ hutvā mūlamantreṇa mantra vid
manojavāyām ājyena veda ādyena eva deśikaḥ
lohitāyām tathā annena juhuyāt mūrti mantrataḥ
sudhūmrāyām tathā lājān vidhāya atha dvitīyayā

original: tṛtīyena tu mantreṇa sphuliṅginyāṃ tilaṃ tathā // Vis_15.104 //
analyzed: tṛtīyena tu mantreṇa sphuliṅginyām tilam tathā
viśvarūpyām caturthena tat tat dravyam dine dine
adhomukhā aṅguṣṭha sahitā anāmikā saha madhyamā
ā madhya parva gṛhṇāti kriyām tena eva kārayet

original: homadravyeṇa homaṃ tu sarpiṣā śuktikāhutim // Vis_15.106 //
analyzed: homa dravyeṇa homam tu sarpiṣā śuktikā āhutim
prāyaścitta āhutim pūrṇām paridhi ādi tathā tatas param

original: anuktasthānakaṃ sarvaṃ kālyāṃ tu juhuyāt punaḥ // Vis_15.107 //
analyzed: anukta sthānakam sarvam kālyām tu juhuyāt punar
samidh ādi tila antam ca dravyam aṣṭa uttaram śatam
prāyaścitta āhutim kuryāt ekām mūlena vidyayā

original: pūrṇāhutiṃ tato hutvā srucā mūlena sādhakaḥ /
analyzed: pūrṇāhutim tatas hutvā srucā mūlena sādhakaḥ
vauṣaṭ antena mantreṇa dvādaśa akṣara saṃjñayā
paridhi prabhṛtīn sarvān vauṣaṭ antam tathā hunet

original: svāhāntaṃ mūlamantreṇa muṣṭyājyena ca pūraṇam // Vis_15.110 //
analyzed: svāhā antam mūlamantreṇa muṣṭi ājyena ca pūraṇam
āhutīḥ ca yathāśāstram juhuyāt sādhaka uttamaḥ
pūrṇāhuti avasāne tu mūlena aṣṭa uttaram japet
paridhīn utsava ante ca dāhayet utsave mune

original: nityāgnau ca yathākāmaṃ sarvaṃ naimittikaṃ tathā // Vis_15.112 //
analyzed: nitya agnau ca yathākāmam sarvam naimittikam tathā
utsava an utsava agnau vā kuryāt naimittikam budhaḥ
ācāryebhyaḥ yathākāmam dakṣiṇām ādadet tatas
dakṣiṇā hīnam etat ced sarvam niṣphalam eva hi
tasmāt ācārya tṛpti artham rāja rāṣṭra vivṛddhaye
ācāryam pūjayet śiṣyam bhūṣaṇa ācchādanaiḥ api
dhānyaiḥ ca eva dhanaiḥ ca eva yajamānena satkṛtaḥ
dakṣiṇām gurave dadyāt yajamānaḥ yathābalam
anyathā kṛtam etat ced sarvam rāṣṭram vinaśyati
tasmāt sarva prayatnena vidhāna uktam samācaret
kuṇḍa stha pūjayet devam upacāreṇa yatnataḥ
anantaram praviśya atha mudrām añjali saṃjñitām
udvāsayet tatas kuṇḍāt mūlabere vidhāna vid
karṣaṇa ādi utsave kāle nitya utsava vidhau api
evam ukta prakāreṇa homam kuryāt vicakṣaṇaḥ
hareḥ ati priya aśeṣa lokān

original: nityahome tu paridhīn barhīṃṣi ca na dāhayet // Vis_15.120 //
analyzed: nitya home tu paridhīn barhīṃṣi ca na dāhayet
etat rahasyam kathitam mune homa vidhi kramam
hareḥ ati priya karam yaḥ kuryāt kārayet api
bhaktyā guroḥ aśeṣam
syāt sa hariḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ
iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām pañcadaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
ṣoḍaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
viṣvaksenaḥ
atas param pravakṣyāmi pratiṣṭhā lakṣaṇam param
sarva lakṣaṇa saṃyuktam alpa kāyam catur bhujam
tad tad mūrti anusāreṇa kārayet su manoharam

original: prathamaṃ ca dvitīyaṃ ca saṃkṣepācchṛṇu suvrata // Vis_16.2 //
analyzed: prathamam ca dvitīyam ca saṃkṣepāt śṛṇu suvrata

original: pratiṣṭhāyāḥ kramaṃ cāsmin sādhakānāṃ hitāya tu /
analyzed: pratiṣṭhāyāḥ kramam ca asmin sādhakānām hitāya tu
kṛtvā aṅkura arpaṇam samyak pañca sapta dināt purā

original: jalādhivāsanaṃ kṛtvā yathā vai tatra coditam /
analyzed: jala adhivāsanam kṛtvā yathā vai tatra ca uditam

original: pūrvoktamaṇḍape madhye vediṃ kṛtvā yathāvidhi // Vis_16.4 //
analyzed: pūrva ukta maṇḍape madhye vedim kṛtvā yathāvidhi
kārayet sarva karmāṇi śāstra dṛṣṭyā samāhitaḥ
tad alābhe muni śreṣṭha śṛṇu maṇḍapa lakṣaṇam
pañca uttaraśatam
vā api hasta dvādaśakam tu vā
catur dvāra samāyuktam catur toraṇa bhūṣitam
vitāna vastra saṃchannam alaṃkāraiḥ alaṃkṛtam
kārpāsakaiḥ navaiḥ vastraiḥ stambhān saṃpariveṣṭayet

original: toraṇān kalaśāṃścāpi madhye vediṃ tu kārayet /
analyzed: toraṇān kalaśān ca api madhye vedim tu kārayet
daśa tālaḥ tu vistāraḥ eka hasta samucchrayaḥ
vedikāyāḥ tu yām tu
paritas caturdikṣu yathāvidhi
kārayet agnikuṇḍāni caturaśra ādi nārada
sthaṇḍile vā api abhāve tu kārayet taruṇālaye
jala adhivāsāt utthāpya maṇḍape ca ānayet harim
suvarṇa sūcyā tatra eva netra unmīlanam ācaret

original: taccakṣuriti vāmaṃ ca citraṃ deveti dakṣiṇam // Vis_16.11 //
analyzed: tat cakṣuḥ iti vāmam ca citram deva iti dakṣiṇam
dhenu dvayam darśayitvā tatas snapanam ācaret
ekāśīti krameṇa eva snapanam tu adhama uttamam
kalaśaiḥ pañcaviṃśaiḥ vā tatas saptadaśaiḥ tu vā
dvādaśaiḥ navakaiḥ vā api yathāsaṃbhavam ācaret
puṇyāham vācayitvā eva śayanam kalpayet tatas
pañca bhāra pramāṇaiḥ ca śālīn tatra eva vikṣipet
tad ardham taṇḍulam ca eva śālyā upari vinikṣipet
tasya upari likhet padmam aṣṭa patram sa karṇikam

original: tasya madhye tu tantrajñaḥ chādayet kambalena tu /
analyzed: tasya madhye tu tantra jñaḥ chādayet kambalena tu

original: śayanaṃ trividhaṃ proktaṃ kṣaumaṃ kārpāsakaṃ tu vā // Vis_16.16 //
analyzed: śayanam trividham proktam kṣaumam kārpāsakam tu vā
ūrṇā mayam ca tat sarvam vyāghra carma uttaracchadam

original: citravastratrayaṃ vāpi navavastratrayaṃ tu vā // Vis_16.17 //
analyzed: citra vastra trayam vā api nava vastra trayam tu vā
yathā vitta anusāreṇa
mārgeṇa ekena kalpayet
śiraḥ upadhāna saṃyuktam pāda gaṇḍūla saṃyutam
vāma dakṣiṇa bhāgābhyām su kapola sthala dvayam
śayanam kalpayitvā evam gandha puṣpaiḥ samarcitam
vastraiḥ ābharaṇaiḥ mālyaiḥ alaṃkṛtya janārdanam
ācāryaḥ mūrtipaiḥ sārdham svasti vākya samanvitam
chatra cāmara saṃyuktam śayane saṃniveśayet
dvādaśa akṣara mantreṇa śāyayet dakṣiṇāśiraḥ
vaiṣṇavīkaraṇam kuryāt pūrvam mūrti dharaḥ mune

original: mantranyāsaṃ tataḥ kuryāt mūrtimantreṇa sādhakaḥ // Vis_16.22 //
analyzed: mantra nyāsam tatas kuryāt mūrti mantreṇa sādhakaḥ
nṛtta gīta samāyuktam veda adhyayana saṃyutam
prāc mukha udak mukhaḥ bhūtvā vedikā upari dakṣiṇe
prāṇāyāmān kramāt kṛtvā praṇavena eva deśikaḥ
sṛṣṭi nyāsam sthiti nyāsam saṃhṛti nyāsam eva ca
tad bimbe muni śārdūla yathātathyena vinyaset
pañcaviṃśati tattvāni pratimāyām nyaset tatas
pañca upaniṣadaiḥ nyasya praṇavaiḥ saha mantra vid

original: athavā devadevasya mantranyāsaṃ śṛṇu kramāt // Vis_16.26 //
analyzed: athavā devadevasya mantra nyāsam śṛṇu kramāt
catur abhyadhikam viṃśat sūktam nārāyaṇam kramāt

original: devasya pādau saṃspṛṣṭvā ācāryaḥ sūktamuccaran // Vis_16.27 //
analyzed: devasya pādau saṃspṛṣṭvā ācāryaḥ sūktam uccaran
tasya ante pauruṣam brahman ṣoḍaṣam sūktam uccaret
tatas tu atharvavede ca sṛṣṭi ādi pratipādakam
nārāyaṇa upaniṣadam tris paṭhet pada saṃspṛśet

original: ātmā yādi(?) namontaṃ yanmantramaṣṭaśataṃ japet // Vis_16.29 //
analyzed: ātmā ya ādi namaḥ ntam yat mantram aṣṭaśatam japet
pūjāyām adhivāse ca pratiṣṭhāyām ṣaḍakṣaram
nyāsameṣu prakurvīta tad bimba hṛdi deśikaḥ

original: anyathā niṣphalaṃ sarvaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
analyzed: anyathā niṣphalam sarvam na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
tasmāt sarva prayatnena ṣaṣ akṣara japa antarakam

original: yadyat proktaṃ muniśreṣṭha tattat kurvīta buddhimān /
analyzed: yat yat proktam muni śreṣṭha tat tat kurvīta buddhimān

original: evaṃ nyāsaṃ kramāt kṛtvā veṣṭayennavavastrakaiḥ // Vis_16.32 //
analyzed: evam nyāsam kramāt kṛtvā veṣṭayet nava vastrakaiḥ
puṣpa añjaliḥ namaskṛtya pūjayet puruṣottamam
śaṅkha dundubhi nirghoṣaiḥ nṛtta geyaiḥ ca pūjayet

original: āvāhayet tato devaṃ mūrdhni mūlena mantravit /
analyzed: āvāhayet tatas devam mūrdhni mūlena mantra vid
śaṅkha cakra gadā pāṇim pīta ambara vibhūṣitam
tad tad mūrti anusāreṇa dhyāyet devam sanātanam
pādya arghya ācamanīyam ca gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ kramāt
gaulyam pāyasa mudga annam sa upadaṃśam ghṛta āplutam

original: nivedayitvāṃ devasya dādhikaṃ tu nivedayet // Vis_16.36 //
analyzed: devasya dādhikam tu nivedayet
pānīya ācamanīyam ca mukha vāsam nivedayet

original: tatastu śāyayeddevaṃ namaskṛtya tu deśikaḥ // Vis_16.37 //
analyzed: tatas tu śāyayet devam namaskṛtya tu deśikaḥ
gandha toyena saṃpūrṇān sūtra traya su veṣṭitān
aśvattha pallavaiḥ yuktān droṇena paripūritān
pakva bimba phala ākārān mṛd ghaṭān lakṣaṇa anvitān
pañcaratna samāyuktān hema pañca āyudha anvitān
sauvarṇam ca api śrīvatsam sauvarṇa garuḍa anvitam

original: śaṅkhaṃ cakraṃ ca kūrmaṃ ca saṃsmarenmūlavidyayā // Vis_16.40 //
analyzed: śaṅkham cakram ca kūrmam ca saṃsmaret mūlavidyayā
sa kūrcam sa apidhānam ca vastra yugmena veṣṭitam
devasya dakṣiṇe pārśve vinyaset dhānya rāśiṣu
pradhāna kumbham ādāya prāc mukhaḥ vā api udak mukhaḥ
pañcamūrtim anudhyāyet tad kumbhe vāhya nārada
brahma bījena tad kumbham gandha puṣpaiḥ samarcayet

original: karmārcā cotsavaṃ snānaṃ baliryātrā ca pañcamam // Vis_16.43 //
analyzed: karma arcā ca utsavam snānam baliḥ yātrā ca pañcamam
snāne pratiṣṭhā adhivāse kālam ekam tu kārayet

original: devena saha saṃyojya devīnāṃ munisattama // Vis_16.44 //
analyzed: devena saha saṃyojya devīnām muni sattama
vidya śvara aṣṭa kuṃbhān ca aṣṭa dikṣu atha vinyaset
hema ratna yutān ca eva vastra saṃveṣṭitān śubhān
indra ādi īśāna paryantam vārāha ādīn ca vinyaset
sva nāmnā pūjayet tān ca śaṅkha ādīn maṅgalān nyaset
gandha puṣpa akṣatān ca eva vastreṇa pariveṣṭitān

original: evaṃ kṛtvā vidhānena mūrtihomaṃ samācaret // Vis_16.47 //
analyzed: evam kṛtvā vidhānena mūrti homam samācaret
ṛk ādi veda saṃyuktam dikṣu pūrva ādiṣu dvija
śaṅkha ādi ghoṣa saṃyuktam nṛtta gīta samanvitam
vīṇā veṇu samāyuktam homa karma samācaret
vaiṣṇava agnim samādāya kuṇḍeṣu agnim nidhāpayet
pālaśā khādiram ca eva bilvam audumbaram tathā

original: samidaṣṭaśataṃ proktaṃ pṛthak pūrvādi kalpayet // Vis_16.50 //
analyzed: samidh aṣṭaśatam proktam pṛthak pūrva ādi kalpayet
pālāśa khādira abhāve bilvaiḥ eva tu kārayet
bilva abhāve muni śreṣṭha audumbaram atha ācaret
pūrva ādi ca agnikuṇḍeṣu samidhaḥ parikīrtitāḥ

original: ājyaṃ caruvaduddiṣṭaṃ tatsaṃkhyā ca pṛthakpṛthak // Vis_16.52 //
analyzed: ājyam caru vat uddiṣṭam tad saṃkhyā ca pṛthak pṛthak
agni madhye tathā padmam dhyāyet kesara patrakam

original: tatrasthā devatā dhyātvā homaṃ kuryādvicakṣaṇaḥ // Vis_16.53 //
analyzed: tatrasthāḥ devatāḥ dhyātvā homam kuryāt vicakṣaṇaḥ
juhuyuḥ prāc mukhāḥ sarve sa uttarīyāḥ su alaṃkṛtāḥ

original: bhojayedbrāhmaṇān rātrau bhaktān dvādaśa pāyasam // Vis_16.54 //
analyzed: bhojayet brāhmaṇān rātrau bhaktān dvādaśa pāyasam
veda adhyayanam eva atra catur dikṣu ca kārayet

original: pāyasaṃ kṛsaraṃ gaulyaṃ haridrānnaṃ caturvidham // Vis_16.55 //
analyzed: pāyasam kṛsaram gaulyam haridrā annam caturvidham
pūrva ādi ca uttara antam tu yathāsaṃravyam prakalpayet

original: śāntihomaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā homānte ca yathākramam // Vis_16.56 //
analyzed: śānti homam tatas kṛtvā homa ante ca yathākramam

original: madhunā payasā dadhnā hūyatena (juhuyācca?) ghṛtena ca /
analyzed: madhunā payasā dadhnā juhuyāt ca ghṛtena ca

original: pauruṣeṇa ca sūktena pratyekaṃ ṣoḍaśāhutīḥ // Vis_16.57 //
analyzed: pauruṣeṇa ca sūktena pratyekam ṣoḍaśa āhutīḥ

original: pūrvādi cottarāntaṃ tu kuṇḍe caiva yathākramam /
analyzed: pūrva ādi ca uttara antam tu kuṇḍe ca eva yathākramam

original: hutvā hutvā spṛśeyuste pratimāṃ mūlavidyayā // Vis_16.58 //
analyzed: hutvā hutvā spṛśeyuḥ te pratimām mūlavidyayā

original: madhu hutvā spṛśet pādaṃ kṣīraṃ hutvodaraṃ spṛśet /
analyzed: madhu hutvā spṛśet pādam kṣīram hutvā udaram spṛśet

original: dadhi hutvā ca vadanaṃ hutvājyaṃ śirasi spṛśet // Vis_16.59 //
analyzed: dadhi hutvā ca vadanam hutvā ājyam śirasi spṛśet

original: dakṣiṇasyāṃ tataḥ siñcet khādirasya tu śākhayā // Vis_16.60 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇasyām tatas siñcet khādirasya tu śākhayā
siñcet tad mūrti dhāraḥ tu pratīcyām bilva śākhayā
udumbareṇa ca udīcyām siñcet tad mūrti dhārakaḥ
ācāryaḥ koṇa deśe tu siñcet vetasa śākhayā
puṣpa añjaliṃliḥ
namaskṛtya ācāryaḥ mūlavidyayā
uttara agnau tu juhuyāt ācāryaḥ madhura trayam
gula ājya madhu saṃmiśram madhuratrayam ucyate
mūlamantreṇa juhuyāt pratyeka aṣṭa āhutīḥ kramāt
nṛtta geyaiḥ ca vādyaiḥ ca veda adhyayana sat kathām saṃyutaiḥ
anirvāṇa pradīpaiḥ ca rātri śeṣam samāpayet

original: prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ snātvācāryaḥ prayatnavān // Vis_16.65 //
analyzed: prabhātāyām tu śarvaryām snātvā ācāryaḥ prayatnavān
dvārasya dakṣiṇe pārśve sthaṇḍile caturaśrake
kārayet vāstu homam tu samidh ājya carūn api
apāmārgasya samidhaḥ śamyāḥ ca khadirasya ca

original: yakṣarakṣaḥ piśācānāṃ śāntyarthaṃ juhuyāt pṛthak // Vis_16.67 //
analyzed: yakṣa rakṣaḥ piśācānām śānti artham juhuyāt pṛthak
praṇava ādi sva mantraiḥ ca juhuyāt mantra vittamaḥ
diśā homān ca kurvīta prāsādasya samantataḥ
sthaṇḍileṣu evam eva agnim juhuyāt dikpatīn kramāt

original: dhyātvā dhyātvā svamantreṇa samidādi yathākramam // Vis_16.69 //
analyzed: dhyātvā dhyātvā sva mantreṇa samidh ādi yathākramam
palāśa khadira aśvattha plakṣa nyagrodha bilva jāḥ
udumbaraḥ ca kāśmaryaḥ samidhaḥ ṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ
aindra ādi īśāna paryantam samidh ājya carūn api

original: evaṃ samāpya vidhivat vāstuhomādikān kramāt // Vis_16.71 //
analyzed: evam samāpya vidhivat vāstu homa ādikān kramāt
kārayet muni śārdvala paścāt pūrṇāhutim hunet
vauṣaṭ antena mantreṇa ācāryaḥ paścime nale
dvādaśa akṣara mantreṇa srucā pūrṇāhutim hunet
gandha puṣpa ādinā abhyarcya ghaṇṭā śabda samanvitam
pūrṇāhutim kramāt kṛtvā tridhā mantram anusmaran
gomayena samālipya bāla sthānam samantataḥ

original: mūlasthānaṃ tu vā tatra mūlamantreṇa mantravit /
analyzed: mūlasthānam tu vā tatra mūlamantreṇa mantra vid
aṣṭa dikṣu yathānyāyam kārayet yatnatas dhvajān
toraṇān śāstra vihitān catur dikṣu niveśayet
darbha mālā ādi saṃyuktam mādya
laṃkṛtam
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam puṣpa mālā vibhūṣitam

original: puṇyāhaṃ vācayitvā tu pūjanīyāṃśca pūjayet // Vis_16.77 //
analyzed: puṇyāham vācayitvā tu pūjanīyān ca pūjayet
vastra ābharaṇakam samyak ācāryaya pradāpayet
ācārya manasaḥ prīti rati saṃpatti kāriṇī
sauvarṇam brahmasūtram tu sauvarṇam karṇabhūṣaṇam
aṅgulī valayam ca eva prakoṣṭha valayam tathā
alaṃkṛtya evam ācāryam dakṣiṇām tasya dāpayet
pañcaviṃśati niṣkam tu suvarṇam dakṣiṇa uttamam
tad ardham madhyamam ca eva tad ardham adhamam bhavet

original: evameva tu kartavya utsave dakṣiṇākramaḥ // Vis_16.81 //
analyzed: evam eva tu kartavyaḥ utsave dakṣiṇā kramaḥ
uttama ādi kramāt proktā dakṣiṇā muni sattama
yathā dvaivitta anusāreṇa dadyāt vā advai
dakṣiṇām mune
atra upayuktam yat dravyam devatā alaṃkṛtim vinā
ācāryāya pradātavyam vastra vrīhi ādikam tathā
ācārya dakṣiṇā ardha aṃśa tulyā sthāpaka dakṣiṇā
tad ardham mūrtipānām tu vāstuśāntikṛtaḥ tathā

original: hotṝṇāṃ dakṣiṇārdhaṃ syād adhyetṝṇāṃ tu dakṣiṇā /
analyzed: hotṝṇām dakṣiṇa ardham syāt adhyetṝṇām tu dakṣiṇā

original: sarveṣāṃ caiva dātavyaṃ vastrayugmaṃ navaṃ śubham // Vis_16.85 //
analyzed: sarveṣām ca eva dātavyam vastra yugmam navam śubham

original: daivajñaṃ pūjayet paścāt sumuhūrtaprado hi saḥ /
analyzed: daiva jñam pūjayet paścāt su muhūrta pradaḥ hi saḥ
geya nṛtta karān ca eva pūjayet vaiṣṇavān tatas
mūhūrte śobhane prāpte brāhmaṇānām anujñayā
sūrya maṇḍala madhya stham devam nārāyaṇam prabhum

original: kumbhe pañcapratīke ca āvāhya praṇavena tu /
analyzed: kumbhe pañcapratīke ca āvāhya praṇavena tu
arghya pādya āpadinā abhyarcya eka mūrtim anusmaret
pūjayitvā muni śreṣṭha svayam tu vigata spṛhaḥ

original: śriyaṃ puṣṭiṃ tathā kumbhamadhye saṃpūjayettataḥ // Vis_16.89 //
analyzed: śriyam puṣṭim tathā kumbha madhye saṃpūjayet tatas
praṇava ādi sva nāmnā tu sādhakaḥ mantra vittamaḥ
tad kumbha antargatam devam sthāpayet sādhaka uttamaḥ
sthāpakaḥ ca uddharet kumbham ācāryaḥ vā muni īśvara
uttarya uṣṇīṣa saṃyuktam uddharet kumbham uttamam
tathā eva samalaṃkṛtya sthāpakam muni sattama
ācāryaḥ mūrtipaiḥ yuktaḥ pratimām uddharet kramāt
maṅgala anunyu
dhareyuḥ ca diśā homa karāḥ tathā
śaṅkha dundubhi ghoṣaiḥ ca svastivācana saṃyutam
nṛtta geya samāyuktam dhūpa dīpa samanvitam
puṣpa vṛṣṭi samāyuktam vitāna dhvaja saṃyutam
tatas tu samalaṃkṛtya deva agre vaiṣṇavān śubhān
gandha toyena saṃpūrṇān sūtra traya su veṣṭitān
aśvattha pallavaiḥ yuktān droṇena paripūritān
vardhanīm gṛhya tantra jñaḥ deva agre chinna dhārayā
geham pradakṣiṇam kṛtvā bālasthānam praveśayet
pratimām mūrtimantreṇa sthāpayet mantra vittamaḥ
tatas ca pañca mantrāṇām ntrān ca
sthāpayet vihitena ca
tasya agre sthāpayet kumbham ācāryaḥ tantra vittamaḥ
tat toyam pratimā mūrdhni mūlamantreṇa secayet
śriyā ādīnām
sva mantraiḥ tu secayet deva vat kramāt
karma arcana ādi mūrtīnām
secayet mūlabera vat

original: kumbhāccheṣodakaṃ gṛhya taccharāve niṣicya ca // Vis_16.100 //
analyzed: kumbhāt śeṣa udakam gṛhya tat śarāve niṣicya ca
śalāka mātrayā ca eva dhārayā ācchinnayā punar

original: paritaḥ pariṣekaṃ ca kuryānmūlena mantravit // Vis_16.101 //
analyzed: paritas pariṣekam ca kuryāt mūlena mantra vid
añjalim darśayitvā tu sarva mantrān ca mantram ca saṃsmaret
dvārasya uttara pārśve tu nyāsa homam sva mantrataḥ
sthaṇḍile muni śārdūla pañcarātra viśāradaiḥ
kārayet samidh ādyaiḥ tu pratyeka eka āhutim kramāt
mantra nyāsam tatas kuryāt pūrvavat sādhaka uttamaḥ
tathā eva kārayet tasmin sthāpakaḥ nyāsam uttamam
paścāt devam samālambya pūjayet sādhaka uttamaḥ
gandha puṣpa ādinā abhyarcya praṇamya ca janārdanam
saṃnidhānam kuruṣva iti praṇamet daṇḍa vat kṣitau
tasmin kāle mahā prājñaḥ veda adhyayanam ācaret
puṣpa añjaliḥ namaskṛtya ācāryaḥ mantram uccaret

original: sarvaṃ nyūnātiriktaṃ ca mayā pūrvaṃ ca yatkṛtam // Vis_16.107 //
analyzed: sarvam nyūna atiriktam ca mayā pūrvam ca yat kṛtam
tat sarvam devadeveśa kṣantum arhasi me prabho
tatas tu muni śārdūla prāsādam prokṣayet budhaḥ
kumbha udakāt aśeṣam tu bahis antar ca sarvaśas
pauruṣeṇa eva sūktena prokṣaṇāt eva śuddhi ati

original: pāyasaṃ kṛsaraṃ gaulyaṃ mudgānnaṃ ca nivedayet /
analyzed: pāyasam kṛsaram gaulyam mudga annam ca nivedayet
tāmbūlam mukha vāsam ca parivārān ca
kalpayet
homa pūrveṇa mantra jñaḥ hi antar bahis anukramāt
lokapālān muni śreṣṭha kalpayet tu yathākramam
anya āvaraṇa devān ca bāla gehe na kalpayet

original: dine dine tu kartavyo homūparvo balikramaḥ // Vis_16.112 //
analyzed: dine dine tu kartavyaḥ homū parvaḥ bali kramaḥ
caṇḍa ādi īśa avasānam tu balim dadyāt pṛthak pṛthak
mahā pīṭha ardha mānam tu vistara āyāma tādṛśam
bāla gehasya pūrve tu kalpayet pīṭham uttamam
pīṭha upari mune padmam aṣṭa patram sa karṇikam
pūrvavat pārṣadān sarvān tiṣṭhantau to
bali pīṭhakauke
bali śeṣam nyaset dhīmān pūrvavat mantra saṃyutam
utsava snapana ādīni kārayet śāstra coditam

original: śeṣaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kuryāt bālasthāne munīśvara // Vis_16.116 //
analyzed: śeṣam sādhāraṇam kuryāt bālasthāne muni īśvara

original: bālasthānaṃ vinā pūrvaṃ mūlasthānaṃ na kārayet /
analyzed: bālasthānam vinā pūrvam mūlasthānam na kārayet
yadi kuryāt mahā doṣaḥ kartṛ deśa vināśanaḥ
bāla geha arcanā bimbam mūlāgāre na pūjayet

original: pūjayedyadi tadbimbaṃ kartā rāṣṭraṃ ca naśyati // Vis_16.118 //
analyzed: pūjayet yadi tat bimbam kartā rāṣṭram ca naśyati
tasmāt sarva prayatnena mūlāgāre na pūjayet

original: pratiṣṭhānte muniśreṣṭha utsavaṃ kārayet kramāt // Vis_16.119 //
analyzed: pratiṣṭhā ante muni śreṣṭhaḥ utsavam kārayet kramāt
pañca sapta nava aham vā yathā vitta anusārataḥ

original: dhvajaṃ caivotsavāraṃbhe sadyaḥ kuryāttu taddine // Vis_16.120 //
analyzed: dhvajam ca eva utsava āraṃbhe sadyas kuryāt tu tad dine
tīrtha ante snapanam kuryāt pūrva uktena vidhānataḥ
puṣpa yāga vidhānam tu na iṣyate smin mahā mune
iti saṃkṣepataḥ proktaḥ bālasthāna vidhiḥ mune
evam eva dvitīyasya pratiṣṭhā lakṣaṇam param
viśeṣam ca atra vakṣya abhi dvitīyasya muhā mune
pratiṣṭhā ṛkṣasya pūrvedyus madhyarātre lpa gehake
sthaṇḍilam caturaśram ca hasta mātram samantataḥ
kārayitvā muni śreṣṭha paścāt devam nayet budhaḥ
bimba agre sthaṇḍile madhye mūlamantram anusmaran

original: kumbhaṃ saṃsthāpya vidhivat tatkumbhe kalpayeddharim // Vis_16.125 //
analyzed: kumbham saṃsthāpya vidhivat tad kumbhe kalpayet harim
ānayet mūrtimantreṇa gandha puṣpa ādinā arcayet

original: kumbhasyāntargataṃ devaṃ ravimadhye nayet kṣaṇāt // Vis_16.126 //
analyzed: kumbhasya antargatam devam ravi madhye nayet kṣaṇāt
paścāt devam samāvāhya mahā kumbhe mahā mune
tad kumbha antargatam devam mūlabere
pūrvavat prokṣayet mūlasthānam tantra vicakṣaṇaḥ
parivārān aśeṣān tu kalpayet śāstra coditam
digdevān vidhivat sthāpya pūjayet tat dine dine

original: viśeṣaścātra saṃproktaḥ śeṣaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ bhavet // Vis_16.129 //
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ ca atra saṃproktaḥ śeṣam sādhāraṇam bhavet
yuktyā yukti viśeṣeṇa kārayet iha nārada

original: prathame ca dvitīye ca kriyāsu munisattama // Vis_16.130 //
analyzed: prathame ca dvitīye ca kriyāsu muni sattama

original: evaṃ kṛte tu vidhivat tadrājño rāṣṭravāsinām /
analyzed: evam kṛte tu vidhivat tad rājñaḥ rāṣṭra vāsinām

original: kartuḥ kārayituścaiva āyuḥ śrīścāpi vardhate // Vis_16.131 //
analyzed: kartuḥ kārayituḥ ca eva āyuḥ śrīḥ ca api vardhate
iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām pratiṣṭhāvidhiḥ nāma ṣoḍaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
saptadaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
saptadaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ viṣvaksenaḥ
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi jaṅgama sthāpanam param

original: apradhānaṃ ca bimbaṃ tu jaṅgamaṃ bimbamuttamam // Vis_17.1 //
analyzed: apradhānam ca bimbam tu jaṅgamam bimbam uttamam
pṛthak ced sarva karmāṇi bimba śuddhi artham eva ca
kārayet muni śārdūla snāna ādi pratimā kriyām
snāna utsava ādi kārya artham kāle smin vartate sati

original: jalavāsaṃ kramāt kṛtvā maṇḍape cādhivāsanam // Vis_17.3 //
analyzed: jala vāsam kramāt kṛtvā maṇḍape ca adhivāsanam

original: kṛtvā tu pūrvavaddhomaṃ tilahomaṃ vinā dvija /
analyzed: kṛtvā tu pūrvavat homam tila homam vinā dvija

original: snapanaṃ vidhivat kṛtvā ratnanyāsaṃ vinā mune // Vis_17.4 //
analyzed: snapanam vidhivat kṛtvā ratna nyāsam vinā mune
mantra nyāsam vinā tasmin tattva nyāsam samācaret
madhya sūtram parityajya prāsāde parameṣṭhinā
pauruṣam sūktam uccārya sthāpayet matimān pṛthak
mūrtīnām sthāna bhedaḥ tu bimbādhyāye pradarśitaḥ
tad tad sthāne sva mantreṇa saṃsthāpya arcā ādi nārada
yat rupam mūlaberasya yat cihnaiḥ cihnitam purā

original: yā mūrtiḥ sthāpitā pūrvaṃ mūlārceti mahātmabhiḥ /
analyzed: yā mūrtiḥ sthāpitā pūrvam mūla arcā iti mahātmabhiḥ
yathā ca āyudha vinyāsaḥ kathaṃkṛtaḥ
buddhimatām varaiḥ
karma arcā ādiṣu bereṣu tat sarvam kārayet tathā

original: na vidhiḥ śayitasyaiṣaḥ sthāpanādi prakīrtitam // Vis_17.9 //
analyzed: na vidhiḥ śayitasya eṣaḥ sthāpana ādi prakīrtitam

original: śayitasya tu karmārcā sthānakaṃ tvāsanaṃ tu vā /
analyzed: śayitasya tu karma arcā sthānakam tu āsanam tu vā
saṃsthāpya vāsudeva ākhyam na saṃkarṣaṇam iṣyate

original: tathā saṃkarṣaṇaṃ sthāpya pradyumnaṃ nārcayet sudhīḥ /
analyzed: tathā saṃkarṣaṇam sthāpya pradyumnam na arcayet sudhīḥ
pradyumna sthāpana arcāyām karma arcā na aniruddhakā
karma arcā sarvathā kāryā mūla bimba anusāriṇī
viśeṣaḥ ca atra saṃproktaḥ śeṣam pūrvavat ācaret
evam saṃkṣepataḥ proktam jaṅgama sthāpanam mune
dhanyam yaśasyam āyuṣyam sarva kāma phala pradam
sthāpanam saṃpravakṣyāmi citra ābhāsa ardhacitrake

original: ābhāsaṃ trividhaṃ proktaṃ bhittau ca phalake paṭe // Vis_17.14 //
analyzed: ābhāsam trividham proktam bhittau ca phalake paṭe

original: ardhacitraṃ tathā bhittau śilāyāṃ dāruke 'pi ca(?) /
analyzed: ardhacitram tathā bhittau śilāyām dāruke ca
vidyate yadi karma arcā api eteṣām syāt eṣām
loha ja ākṛtiḥ

original: karmārcāyāṃ tu sakalāṃ kriyāṃ kṛtvā tu pūrvavat /
analyzed: karma arcāyām tu sakalām kriyām kṛtvā tu pūrvavat

original: mūlārcāyāṃ tu kartavyo mantranyāso dvijottama // Vis_17.16 //
analyzed: mūla arcāyām tu kartavyaḥ mantra nyāsaḥ dvijottama
adhivāsana kumbha stha toyena prokṣayet budhaḥ
tatas puruṣasūktena pañca upaniṣadaiḥ api
atrā eva ṣoḍaśa nyāsaḥ na iṣyate tantra pāragaiḥ

original: phalake ca paṭe caiva viśeṣaṃ kathayāmyaham // Vis_17.18 //
analyzed: phalake ca paṭe ca eva viśeṣam kathayāmi aham

original: maṇḍapaṃ pūrvavat kṛtvā vediṃ kṛtvā tu pūrvavat /
analyzed: maṇḍapam pūrvavat kṛtvā vedim kṛtvā tu pūrvavat

original: kṛtvā sulocane divye śayane saṃniveśayet // Vis_17.19 //
analyzed: kṛtvā su locane divye śayane saṃniveśayet
jala adhivāsanam ca eva na iṣyate snapanam budhaiḥ
mūrti homam tatas kṛtvā diśā homa vivarjitam
vidyeśān api saṃpūjya vedikā kalaśeṣu atha

original: pralayaṃ ca nisargaṃ ca kramāt kṛtvā tu deśikaḥ // Vis_17.21 //
analyzed: pralayam ca nisargam ca kramāt kṛtvā tu deśikaḥ
prokṣayet svena mantreṇa brahmakumbha stha vāriṇā
yuktyā yukti viśeṣeṇa śeṣam pūrvavat ācaret
bhitti stha pratimāyām tu sthānam kathayāmi aham
bhittau samyak paṭe citre varṇa alaṃkāra bhūṣite
ābhāse ca ardha citre vā paṭe samyak su locane

original: devasya purataḥ kṛtvā maṇḍapaṃ saparicchadam // Vis_17.24 //
analyzed: devasya puratas kṛtvā maṇḍapam sa paricchadam
vedikām tatra kurvīta pūrva uktena vidhānataḥ

original: dvikarāṃ trikarāṃ vāpi śilpinā kuśalena tu // Vis_17.25 //
analyzed: dvi karām tri karām vā api śilpinā kuśalena tu
tatas tu vedikā madhye vinyaset śāli saṃcayam
śāli madhye likhet padmam aṣṭa patram sa karṇikam
tatas tu droṇa saṃpūrṇam brahma kumbham su varcasam
vastra pūtaiḥ jalaiḥ pūrṇam sa kūrcam sa apidhānakam
sa sūtram vastra yugmena veṣṭitam ratna saṃyutam
aṣṭa śakti samopetam sauvarṇa āyudha pañca yuj
aśvattha pallavaiḥ yuktam gandha puṣpa akṣata arcitam

original: tatkumbhaṃ praṇavenaiva padmamadhye tu vinyaset // Vis_17.29 //
analyzed: tad kumbham praṇavena eva padma madhye tu vinyaset
tatas padma daleṣu aṣṭa ghaṭān tu paritas nyaset
pūrvavat toya saṃpūrṇān sa hiraṇyān sa vastrakān
sa pidhānān sa kūrcān tu mukhe ca aśvattha pallavān
arcayet gandha puṣpaiḥ ca dīpaiḥ anyaiḥ vicitrakaiḥ
arcayet mūlamantreṇa nārāyaṇam anāmayam
viśṇum akliṣṭa karmāṇam paramam madhyame ghaṭe

original: vāsudevaṃ nyaset pūrve saṃkarṣaṇaṃ tu dakṣiṇe /
analyzed: vāsudevam nyaset pūrve saṃkarṣaṇam tu dakṣiṇe

original: pradyumnaṃ paścime nyasya aniruddhaṃ tu cottare // Vis_17.33 //
analyzed: pradyumnam paścime nyasya aniruddham tu ca uttare
āgneyyām vinyaset lakṣmīm nairṛtyām tu sarasvatīm

original: vāyavye tu ratiṃ nyasya śāntimīśānagocare // Vis_17.34 //
analyzed: vāyavye tu ratim nyasya śāntim īśāna gocare
evam nyasya vidhānena gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ yajet

original: athavātra muniśreṣṭha paritaḥ kalaśān nyaset // Vis_17.35 //
analyzed: athavā atra muni śreṣṭha paritas kalaśān nyaset
tad madhye ca ānayet aṣṭa vidyeśān sādhaka uttamaḥ

original: vārāhaṃ pūrvabhāge tu nārasiṃhaṃ tu dakṣiṇe // Vis_17.36 //
analyzed: vārāham pūrva bhāge tu nārasiṃham tu dakṣiṇe
śrīdharam paścime deśe uttare hayaśīrṣakam

original: āgneye bhārgavaṃ rāmaṃ nairṛtyāṃ rāmameva ca // Vis_17.37 //
analyzed: āgneye bhārgavam rāmam nairṛtyām rāmam eva ca
vāmanam ca api vāyavye vāsudevam tathā īśake

original: svanāmnā pūjayitvaitān kalaśeṣu pṛthak pṛthak // Vis_17.38 //
analyzed: sva nāmnā pūjayitvā etān kalaśeṣu pṛthak pṛthak
evam saṃpūjayitvā tu homa karma samācaret

original: pūrvādi cottarāntaṃ tu kuṇḍāni parikalpayet // Vis_17.39 //
analyzed: pūrva ādi ca uttara antam tu kuṇḍāni parikalpayet

original: vāsudevaṃ yajet pūrvaṃ kuṇḍe tu caturaśrake /
analyzed: vāsudevam yajet pūrvam kuṇḍe tu caturaśrake

original: ardhacandrāgniduṇḍe tu yāmya saṃkarṣaṇaṃ yajet // Vis_17.40 //
analyzed: ardhacandra agni duṇḍe tu yāmya saṃkarṣaṇam yajet

original: vāruṇe vṛttakuṇḍe tu pradyumnaṃ tu yajedbudhaḥ /
analyzed: vāruṇe vṛttakuṇḍe tu pradyumnam tu yajet budhaḥ

original: uttare padmakuṇḍe tu aniruddhamatho yajet // Vis_17.41 //
analyzed: uttare padma kuṇḍe tu aniruddham atho yajet
pālāśam khādiram ca eva bailavam audumbaram tathā

original: aṣṭottaraśata hutvā pūrvādi ca pṛthak kramāt // Vis_17.42 //
analyzed: aṣṭottaraśata hutvā pūrva ādi ca pṛthak kramāt
samidh ājya carūn lājān juhuyuḥ mūrtipāḥ kramāt
athavā atra muni śreṣṭha pūrva agnau sādhakāt tamaḥ
samidh ājyena caruṇā homam ekena ca api alam

original: kuṇḍe vā sthaṇḍile vāpi ācāryo juhuyādbudhaḥ // Vis_17.44 //
analyzed: kuṇḍe vā sthaṇḍile vā api ācāryaḥ juhuyāt budhaḥ
rātrau homaḥ prakartavyaḥ jala saṃprokṣaṇam divā

original: na kuryāt prokṣaṇaṃ rātrau na divā homamācaret // Vis_17.45 //
analyzed: na kuryāt prokṣaṇam rātrau na divā homam ācaret

original: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena rātrau homaṃ tu kārayet /
analyzed: tasmāt sarva prayatnena rātrau homam tu kārayet
muhūrte samanuprāpte brāhmaṇānām anujñayā
kumbha sthitena toyena prokṣayet parameṣṭhinā
āvāhayet tatas devam nārāyaṇam anāmayam
śaṅkha cakra dharam devam pīta ambara dharam harim

original: yadrupaṃ cintitaṃ bhittau tathā dhyāyejjagadgurum // Vis_17.48 //
analyzed: yad rupam cintitam bhittau tathā dhyāyet jagadgurum
evam kṛtvā mahā viṣṇum prokṣayet gandha vāriṇā

original: tataḥ puruṣasūktena prokṣayet pratimāṃ punaḥ // Vis_17.49 //
analyzed: tatas puruṣasūktena prokṣayet pratimām punar
pūjayet arghya pādyaiḥ ca carubhiḥ vividhaiḥ api
yathā vitta anusāreṇa
dadyāt ācārya dakṣiṇām
evam saṃkṣepataḥ proktam sthāpanam bhitti saṃśritam
kṛtvā ca
paritaḥkramāt
saṃkalpya parivārān ca tatra āvāhya tu pūjayet

original: dine dine muniśreṣṭha trisandhyaikamathāpi vā // Vis_17.52 //
analyzed: dine dine muni śreṣṭha trisandhyā ekam atha api vā
evam saṃkṣepataḥ proktā u ktā
bhitti bimbasya saṃsthitiḥ
iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām jaṅgamabimbādisthāpanavidhiḥ nāma
saptadaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
aṣṭādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
viṣvaksenaḥ
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi devīnām sthāpanam param

original: tayorvivāhaṃ homaṃ ca śṛṇu guhyamanukramāt // Vis_18.1 //
analyzed: tayoḥ vivāham homam ca śṛṇu guhyam anukramāt
devam pūrvam pratiṣṭhāpya tad kāle prokṣayet mune
śriyā ādīnām
sva mantreṇa mahā kumbha stha vāriṇā
pṛthak ced muni śārdūla devī sthāpanam ācaret
maṇḍapam pūrvavat kṛtvā daśa hasta samanvitam
vedikām pūrvavat kṛtvā maṇḍapa stha anurūpataḥ

original: hastamātraṃ tadardhaṃ vā kuṇḍāni paritaḥ kramāt // Vis_18.4 //
analyzed: hasta mātram tad ardham vā kuṇḍāni paritas kramāt
kārayet tat vidhānena śilpibhiḥ saha sādhakaḥ

original: caturaśrāṇi sarvāṇi kīrtitāni śriyaḥ kramāt // Vis_18.5 //
analyzed: caturaśrāṇi sarvāṇi kīrtitāni śriyaḥ kramāt
bhūmeḥ vṛtāni
kuṇḍāni tad aṅgānām tathā eva ca

original: śāntiṃ lakṣmīṃ ca vāgdevīṃ ratiṃ pūrvādi cāgniṣu // Vis_18.6 //
analyzed: śāntim lakṣmīm ca vāgdevīm ratim pūrva ādi ca agniṣu

original: śvetāṃ padmotpalaśyāmāṃ dhyātvā tu juhuyāt kramāt /
analyzed: śvetām padma utpala śyāmām dhyātvā tu juhuyāt kramāt

original: lakṣmīṃ sarasvatī caiva ratiḥ prītisthathaiva ca // Vis_18.7 //
analyzed: lakṣmīm sarasvatī ca eva ratiḥ ca
kīrtiḥ śāntiḥ tathā tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭiḥ ca eva yathādiśam

original: pūrvādikalaśānāṃ tu vedikāyāṃ tu devatāḥ // Vis_18.8 //
analyzed: pūrva ādi kalaśānām tu vedikāyām tu devatāḥ

original: mahāmumbhaṃ tu saṃsthāpya tacchaktiṃ madhyame nayet /
analyzed: mahāmumbham tu saṃsthāpya tad śaktim madhyame nayet
sarva śakti samopetām sarva aṅgām sarva kāriṇīm
saṃpūjayet sva mantreṇa gandha ādyaiḥ su manoramaiḥ

original: dhvajānāṃ toraṇānāṃ ca kalaśānāṃ ca devatāḥ // Vis_18.10 //
analyzed: dhvajānām toraṇānām ca kalaśānām ca devatāḥ
pūrva uktāḥ pūjanīyāḥ ca krameṇa eva atra ca eva hi
toraṇa dvāra kalaśān vedikā kalaśān api
pālikā vedikāyām tu tathā ca eva aṣṭa maṅgalān

original: vastraiḥ krameṇa saṃchādya gandhapuṣpaiśca pūjayet // Vis_18.12 //
analyzed: vastraiḥ krameṇa saṃchādya gandha puṣpaiḥ ca pūjayet
tat tat svarūpam sauvarṇam kalaśeṣu vinikṣipet

original: snapanaṃ śayanaṃ caiva adhivāsanameva ca // Vis_18.13 //
analyzed: snapanam śayanam ca eva adhivāsanam eva ca
pūrva uktam sakalam kuryāt devīm āvāhya yatnatas

original: pūjāṃ ca mahatīṃ kuryāt kāle prāpte suśobhane // Vis_18.14 //
analyzed: pūjām ca mahatīm kuryāt kāle prāpte su śobhane
viśeṣam atra vakṣyāmi sarva loka śubha pradam
sarveṣām bhakti jananam āyuḥ śrī kīrti vadhanam
kartṝṇām puṣṭi jananam grāmasya eva viśeṣataḥ
kramāt vaivāhikam homam kārayet tantra pāragaḥ

original: vaiṣṇavyaḥ śaktayaḥ proktā mānuṣyo yāśca śaktayaḥ // Vis_18.17 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavyaḥ śaktayaḥ proktāḥ mānuṣyaḥ yāḥ ca śaktayaḥ

original: tāsāṃ vai yatra śaktīnāṃ pūrvā lakṣmyāḥparā kṣitiḥ(teḥ?) /
analyzed: tāsām vai yatra śaktīnām pūrvā lakṣmyāḥ parā
bhūmeḥ aṃśa avatāram tatra astu
puṣṭiḥ nāma mahā mune

original: kṣitiṃ vāpyathavā puṣṭiṃ savyapārśve tu yojayet /
analyzed: kṣitim vā api athavā puṣṭim savya pārśve tu yojayet
devyoḥ vivāham ekasmin kāle tu samupasthite

original: lakṣmyāḥ pūrvaṃ tato bhūmeḥ kārayitvā vicakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: lakṣmyāḥ pūrvam tatas bhūmeḥ kārayitvā vicakṣaṇaḥ
lagnasya atikrame kṛtvā jala dānam yathāvidhi

original: tasmin krameṇa śeṣaṃ tu sādhakaḥ sādhayet punaḥ /
analyzed: tasmin krameṇa śeṣam tu sādhakaḥ sādhayet punar

original: kārayet kramayogena caikasmin sthaṇḍile punaḥ // Vis_18.21 //
analyzed: kārayet krama yogena ca ekasmin sthaṇḍile punar
vastra yugmena deveśam devīm ca eva yathākramam
bhūṣaṇaiḥ ca eva vividhaiḥ alaṃkṛtya prayatnataḥ
devīm devāsane nītvā homa karma samārabhet

original: puṇyāhaṃ kārayitvā tu brāhmaṇaiḥ svastisaṃyutam // Vis_18.23 //
analyzed: puṇyāham kārayitvā tu brāhmaṇaiḥ svasti saṃyutam
sarva upacāra saṃyuktam jala dānam tu kārayet

original: sthaṇḍilaṃ purataḥ kṛtvā devasya purataḥ sthitaḥ // Vis_18.24 //
analyzed: sthaṇḍilam puratas kṛtvā devasya puratas sthitaḥ
vijñāpya evam kṛta anujñaḥ homam kuryāt vicakṣaṇaḥ
pañcaviṃśatim ādāya samidhaḥ ktāḥ tu sarpiṣā
aṣṭa akṣareṇa mantreṇa svāhā antena sakṛt kṣipet
ājya āhuti śatam hutvā gāyatryā viṣṇu saṃjñayā
ācāryaḥ gnim parikramya yathā rājñām purohitaḥ
tathā lājaiḥ tu juhuyāt praṇavena āhuti trayam

original: madhye madhye parikramya pāvakaṃ pāvanaṃ hareḥ /
analyzed: madhye madhye parikramya pāvakam pāvanam hareḥ

original: śāntihomaṃ tu kurvīta sarpiṣāṃ praṇavena tu // Vis_18.28 //
analyzed: śānti homam tu kurvīta sarpiṣām praṇavena tu
pratyeka ekam muni śreṣṭha ṣoḍaśa āhutim uttamam

original: homaṃ samāpya vidhivat nṛttageyādi kārayet // Vis_18.29 //
analyzed: homam samāpya vidhivat nṛtta geya ādi kārayet
evam vaivāhikam kṛtvā pūjayet puruṣottamam
anena eva vidhānena pratiṣṭhā mātrayā api vā
devena saha saṃyojya pūjayet tantra vittamaḥ
lohabimbasya devīnām saṃproktam muni sattama
lakṣmī ādi krama yogena pūjayet tu dine dine

original: sarvāsāmeva devīnāṃ eṣa eva vidhirbhavet // Vis_18.32 //
analyzed: sarvāsām eva devīnām eṣaḥ eva vidhiḥ bhavet
mūlaberasya devīnām pratiṣṭhā mātrayāma pi alam
vivāha ādi kramaḥ tatra na iṣyate muni sattama
sva bījaiḥ eva kartavyam sthāpanam muni sattama
medhā sarasvatī durgā iti evamādiṣu mūrtiṣu
evamāduṣu kartavyaḥ pratiṣṭhā ādi kramaḥ mune
prokṣayet sva sva mantraiḥ tu brahmakumbha stha vāriṇā
svaiḥ svaiḥ mantraiḥ tu saṃsthāpya pūjayet tu vidhānataḥ

original: evaṃ saṃkṣepataḥ proktaḥ devīnāṃ sthāpanakramaḥ // Vis_18.36 //
analyzed: evam saṃkṣepataḥ proktaḥ devīnām sthāpana kramaḥ

original: evaṃ yaḥ kārayedbhaktyā śaktīnāṃ sthāpanaṃ param /
analyzed: evam yaḥ kārayet bhaktyā śaktīnām sthāpanam param
āyuḥ aiśvarya putra ādīn sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt

original: iha loke sukhaṃ labdhvā paraloke tathaiva ca /
analyzed: iha loke sukham labdhvā para loke tathā eva ca

original: rājyalakṣmīṃ parāṃ prāpya punaḥ prājño bhaviṣyati // Vis_18.38 //
analyzed: rājya lakṣmīm parām prāpya punar prājñaḥ bhaviṣyati
atra kaścid viśeṣaḥ sti śrīvatsasya haripriyam

original: lakṣaṇaṃ sthānabhedaṃ ca mantramārādhanaṃ tathā // Vis_18.39 //
analyzed: lakṣaṇam sthāna bhedam ca mantram ārādhanam tathā
evamādīni ca anyāni viśeṣāṇi mahā mune
saṃkṣepataḥ pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu guhyam anuttamam
sarva saṃpad samṛddhi artham sarva kāma śubha pradam
suvarṇa rajatena api tathā tāmra mayena tu
kārayet phalaka āspadam

original: ṣaḍaṅgulaṃ tathāyāmaṃ tasya vistārameva ca // Vis_18.42 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ aṅgulam tathā āyāmam tasya vistāram eva ca
pañca aṅgula āyatam vā api tad madhye tad samam bhavet

original: dvyaṅgulaṃ tasya vistāraṃ maulerekāṅgulaṃ tu vā // Vis_18.43 //
analyzed: dvi aṅgulam tasya vistāram mauleḥ eka aṅgulam tu vā
evam jñātvā muni śreṣṭha kuryāt āspadam uttamam

original: evaṃ hi lakṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ uttamaṃ phalakākṛteḥ // Vis_18.44 //
analyzed: evam hi lakṣaṇam proktam uttamam phalaka ākṛteḥ
eka aṅgula vihīnam tu madhyamam paripaṭhyate
dvi aṅgulam tat vihīnam tu kanīyasam udāhṛtam
tri aṅgulalena
vihīnam tat kuryāt tasya adhama adhamam
madhyama adhama kārye smin adhama adhamam eva ca
tasya anurūpatas kuryāt vistāram muni sattama

original: tanmadhye cintacitvā tu sādhakaḥ paramārthavit // Vis_18.47 //
analyzed: tad madhye cinta citvā tu sādhakaḥ parama artha vid
sādhayet kamalām devīm tapta kāñcana saṃnibhām
sarva lakṣaṇa saṃyuktām padmāsana samanvitām
padma hastām śriyam devīm padmanābha priyām śubhām
maṇi mauktika saṃyuktām sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitām

original: evaṃ saṃcintya tāṃ devīṃ śriyaṃ trailokyanāyakīm /
analyzed: evam saṃcintya tām devīm śriyam trailokya nāyakīm

original: harervakṣasi pārśve tu dakṣiṇe munisattama // Vis_18.50 //
analyzed: hareḥ vakṣasi pārśve tu dakṣiṇe muni sattama
sthāpayet tām śriyam devīm jagat saṃrakṣaṇa arthakam
sarva saṃpad samṛddhi artham iti śāstrasya niścayaḥ
jala adhivāsane ca asmin viśeṣam kathayāmi te
bhāra dvayena saṃpūrṇam jala bhājanam uttamam
saṃgṛhya muni śārdūla tasmin pātre dhivāsayet
pūrva ukta jalam ānīya pūrayitvā tu bhājanam
gandha puṣpaiḥ tu saṃpūjya saṃsmaret amṛtārṇavam

original: tanmadhye pūrvavat kuryāt jalavāsaṃ vidhānataḥ // Vis_18.54 //
analyzed: tad madhye pūrvavat kuryāt jala vāsam vidhānataḥ

original: etat krameṇa vā kuryāt acyutasya mahāmune /
analyzed: etat krameṇa vā kuryāt acyutasya mahā mune

original: darpaṇe saṃsthite bere citrādīnāṃ viśeṣataḥ // Vis_18.55 //
analyzed: darpaṇe saṃsthite bere citra ādīnām viśeṣataḥ
hrastam loha ja bimbasya mune sva artha para arthayoḥ
kārayet jala vāsam tat kanīyasam udāhṛtam
jala adhivāsane proktaḥ viśeṣaḥ muni sattama

original: dviprakāraṃ mayā proktaṃ yathāyogaṃ samācaret // Vis_18.57 //
analyzed: dvi prakāram mayā proktam yathāyogam samācaret
mūlaberāt tu tām devīm āvāhya atra eva yojayet
mūlamantreṇa matimān kumbha toyena hastayoḥ
saṃyojya atrā eva mantreṇa sādhakaḥ parama artha vid
mantrakośe mayā proktaḥ tantre smin muni sattama
saṃproktam paramam mantram guhyat guhyam vara pradam
tena eva prokṣayet devīm mahā kumbha stha vāriṇā
tad dehe nyāsa mārgeṇa vinyaset tantra vittamaḥ
pañcaviṃśati tattvāni tat pañcākṣaram eva ca
śaṅkha cakra abja mudrām tu darśayet tantra vittamaḥ
tatas tu ārādhayet devīm ardhya ādi aṣṭa upacārakaiḥ

original: arghyaṃ pādyaṃ tathācāmaṃ gandhapuṣpaṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: arghyam pādyam tathā ācāmam gandha puṣpam tathā eva ca

original: dhūpadīpaṃ nivedyaṃ ca pāyasaṃ gulasaṃyutam // Vis_18.63 //
analyzed: dhūpa dīpam nivedyam ca pāyasam gula saṃyutam
evam ukta prakāreṇa ghaṇṭā dundubhi saṃyutam

original: kārayed balidānaṃ tu sarvakāmapradaṃ śubham // Vis_18.64 //
analyzed: kārayet bali dānam tu sarva kāma pradam śubham
bilva patra akṣataiḥ yuktam padmam pālāśam utpalam
dine dine muni śreṣṭhaḥ evam eva samarcayet
bilva patra aṅkuraiḥ yutam
candana udaka saṃyuktam bali dravyam iha ucyate
evam ukta prakāreṇa ghaṇṭā dundubhi saṃyutam
kārayet bali dānam tu sarva karma kāma
pradam śubham

original: bilvamūlasya pālāśaṃ mūlāśvatthasya vā mune // Vis_18.68 //
analyzed: bilva mūlasya pālāśam mūla aśvatthasya vā mune

original: caturaśraṃ tu vṛttaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ kṛtvā tu mantravit /
analyzed: caturaśram tu vṛttam vā pīṭham kṛtvā tu mantra vid

original: tanmadhye pūjayellakṣmīṃ lakṣmayai nama iti bruvan // Vis_18.69 //
analyzed: tad madhye pūjayet lakṣmīm lakṣmayai namaḥ iti bruvan
praṇava ādi samāyuktam pañcākṣaram iti smṛtam

original: tasyāgre tu baliṃ kuryāt pūvoktena vidhānataḥ // Vis_18.70 //
analyzed: tasya agre tu balim kuryāt pūva uktena vidhānataḥ
gandha puṣpa samāyuktam dhūpa dīpa samanvitam

original: evaṃ saṃpūjayitvā tu mukhavāsaṃ pradāpeyat // Vis_18.71 //
analyzed: evam saṃpūjayitvā tu mukha vāsam

original: balyante tu muniśreṣṭha śrīsūktaṃ tu paṭhet tridhā /
analyzed: bali ante tu muni śreṣṭha śrīsūktam tu paṭhet tridhā
śrī mantram tad stutim vā api paṭhet tantra vicakṣaṇaḥ
tatas pañca mahā śabdam ghoṣayet ca punar punar
pūrvavat pūjayet devīm sāyāhne muni sattama
pūjā ante kārayet homam samidh ājya carūn api
bilva ādi anyatamasya atha padma kuṇḍe yathā icchayā
saṃkalpya ekam muni śreṣṭha tad madhye homam ācaret
bilva pālāśa samidhaḥ pratyekam ṣoḍaśa āhutīḥ
juhuyāt mūlamantreṇa kapila ājyena homayet

original: tathaiva pāyasaṃ brahman juhuyāt ṣoḍaśāhutīḥ // Vis_18.76 //
analyzed: tathā eva pāyasam brahman juhuyāt ṣoḍaśa āhutīḥ
tathā eva bilva patraiḥ ca padmaiḥ eka dalaiḥ api

original: sākṣataiḥ karavīraistu juhuyāttu punaḥ punaḥ // Vis_18.77 //
analyzed: sa akṣataiḥ karavīraiḥ tu juhuyāt tu punar punar

original: homaṃ kṛtvā tu vidhivat kuṇḍāddevīṃ samuddharet /
analyzed: homam kṛtvā tu vidhivat kuṇḍāt devīm samuddharet
tad homaḥ paramaḥ guhyaḥ grāma rājñoḥ vivṛddhi kṛt
sarva roga vinirmukta ṛṃma uktā
sarva kāma pradaḥ śubhaḥ

original: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena rātrau homaṃ samācaret // Vis_18.79 //
analyzed: tasmāt sarva prayatnena rātrau homam samācaret
homa ante dakṣiṇām dadyāt yathāvittāmusārataḥ
ācāryam pūjayet paścāt hema vastra aṅgulīyakaiḥ
brāhmaṇān pūjayet paścāt daivajñam anupūjayet
ukta lakṣaṇa hīnena yadi kuryāt pramādataḥ
grāma rājñoḥ ca rāṣṭrasya yajamānasya nāśanam

original: na phalanti kriyāstatra nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // Vis_18.82 //
analyzed: na phalanti kriyāḥ tatra na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
tasmāt sarva prayatnena kārayet vidhi coditam

original: iti saṃkṣepataḥ proktamātmārthasya parasya ca // Vis_18.83 //
analyzed: iti saṃkṣepataḥ proktam ātma arthasya parasya ca
viśeṣaḥ ca atra saṃproktaḥ śeṣam pūrvāvat ācaret
iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām devīsthāpanādividhiḥ nāma ṭa aṣṭādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
ekonaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
viṣvaksenaḥ
atas param pravakṣyāmi ca aṅganyāsa ādi lakṣaṇam

original: śṛṇu guhyamanā bhūtvā sādhakānāṃ hitāya vai // Vis_19.1 //
analyzed: śṛṇu guhya manāḥ bhūtvā sādhakānām hitāya vai
aṅganyāsa kramam ca eva mudrāyāḥ lakṣaṇam tathā
phalāni vividhāni atra sarva vidyā prakāśakam
ācāryaḥ prayataḥ bhūtvā prāc mukhaḥ vā api udak mukhaḥ

original: paṅkajaṃ vāsanaṃ baddhvā svastikaṃ vā yathecchayā // Vis_19.3 //
analyzed: paṅkajam vā āsanam baddhvā svastikam vā yathā icchayā
pūjā ārambhe ñjalim kṛtvā namaskṛtya yathāvidhi
uttāne vāma hasta agre tiryak dakṣiṇam añjasā
maṇḍala ākṛti saṃspṛśya
vāma antam itareṇa tu

original: vāmāṅguṣṭhaṃ tato baddhvā muṣṭyordhvāṅguṣṭhayā mune // Vis_19.5 //
analyzed: vāma aṅguṣṭham tatas baddhvā muṣṭyā ūrdhva aṅguṣṭhayā mune

original: muṣṭiṃ kṛtvā gato dhāma dhyātvā mantraṃ samāhitaḥ /
analyzed: muṣṭim kṛtvā gataḥ dhāma dhyātvā mantram samāhitaḥ

original: saṃspṛśya hṛdayaṃ devaṃ trimātre śirasā tathā // Vis_19.6 //
analyzed: saṃspṛśya hṛdayam devam tri mātre śirasā tathā

original: praṇamya pāṇivyatyāsaṃ baddhvā mudrāṃ tathā punaḥ /
analyzed: praṇamya pāṇi vyatyāsam baddhvā mudrām tathā punar
praviśya añjali mudrām tu pūjāmantreṇa mantra vid

original: namo 'ntaṃ hṛdayaṃ mūrdhni śikhāyāṃ kavace tathā /
analyzed: namaḥ ntam hṛdayam mūrdhni śikhāyām kavace tathā

original: astre netre tato dhyātvā taccihnena nyasedbudhaḥ // Vis_19.8 //
analyzed: astre netre tatas dhyātvā tad cihnena nyaset budhaḥ

original: mudrāyā lakṣaṇaṃ cāpi niruktaṃ ca tataḥ śṛṇu /
analyzed: mudrāyāḥ lakṣaṇam ca api niruktam ca tatas śṛṇu

original: labdhayā tu yayā yasmāt sādhako devavairiṇām // Vis_19.9 //
analyzed: labdhayā tu yayā yasmāt sādhakaḥ deva vairiṇām

original: drāvayīta mudaṃ tasmāt mudrā tallakṣaṇaṃ śṛṇu /
analyzed: drāvayīta mudam tasmāt mudrā tad lakṣaṇam śṛṇu
baddhāyāḥ tu bahis muṣṭyāḥ ṛjum aṅguṣṭham āyatam

original: kṛtvāto madhyamāyāṃ tu tanmūlaṃ hṛdaye spṛśet /
analyzed: kṛtvā atas madhyamāyām tu tad mūlam hṛdaye spṛśet

original: āhṛtya tarjanīṃ samyak baddhvāṅguṣṭhena muṣṭikam // Vis_19.11 //
analyzed: āhṛtya tarjanīm samyak baddhvā aṅguṣṭhena muṣṭikam
atha aṅguṣṭha lalāṭa ante śikhā ūrdhva mahatīm tathā
bṛhat agra dvayena eva kṣudramudrasya
bandhanam
hastābhyām ūrdhvam āyamya kṛtvā ca a nābhi maṇḍalam

original: kavacasya dhiyā nyasya kavacasya tu mudrikā // Vis_19.13 //
analyzed: kavacasya dhiyā nyasya kavacasya tu mudrikā
aparā astrasya mudrā eṣā kathyate dakṣiṇa agrakam
muṣṭim baddhvā tatas tarjanī agram aṅguṣṭha rekhayā
spṛṣṭvā sphoṭam uda kṣepaḥ pūrva ādi daśa dikṣu api
kaniṣṭhā anāmike baddhvā na hatā tala madhya ge

original: madhyamutthāpitaṃ kṛtvā hastaṃ saṃkocya yatnataḥ // Vis_19.16 //
analyzed: madhyam utthāpitam kṛtvā hastam saṃkocya yatnataḥ
kanīyasam tu saṃhṛtya śeṣayoḥ ubhayoḥ api

original: atho vaktramukhāṃ śeṣāṅgulinā vāmakena tu (?) // Vis_19.17 //
analyzed: atho vaktra mukhām śeṣa aṅgulinā vāmakena tu
kareṇa dakṣiṇam spṛṣṭvā bhrāmayet dīpa mudrikā

original: lalāṭe hṛdi vā samyak saṃpuṭo 'ñjalirūrdhvagaḥ // Vis_19.18 //
analyzed: lalāṭe hṛdi vā samyak saṃpuṭaḥ ñjaliḥ ūrdhva gaḥ
nāmnā mudrā iyam vijñeyā praṇāme ñjalimudrikā
uktānām iha vā anyeṣu api anuktānām prayatnataḥ
pradarśane pi aśaktaḥ san añjalim tu pradarśayet
añjaliḥ nāma mudrā iyam sarva mudrā mayā priyā
viṣṇoḥ praṇāma mudrā eṣā sarva kāmān pradāpayet
etābhiḥ nyasta sarva aṅgaḥ japa homa ādikān mune
yaḥ karoti sva rakṣām ca dīrgham āyuḥ yaśaskaram

original: sukhamaiśvaryabalatāṃ kalpyatāṃ ca labhet parām // Vis_19.22 //
analyzed: sukham aiśvarya bala tām kalpya tām ca labhet parām

original: vidyā hi vividhāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ bhuktimuktistathaiva ca /
analyzed: vidyā hi vividhām śreṣṭhām bhukti muktiḥ tathā eva ca

original: rāṣṭro yasyoditānāṃ tu vidyānāmekayā mune // Vis_19.23 //
analyzed: rāṣṭraḥ yasya uditānām tu vidyānām ekayā mune
mūrti mantra prakāreṇa sādhakaḥ sakṛt arcayet

original: tasya sarvamabhiprāyaṃ siddhyatyeva na saṃśayaḥ // Vis_19.24 //
analyzed: tasya sarvam abhiprāyam siddhi ati eva na saṃśayaḥ
anāvṛṣṭi bhayam na asti ati vṛṣṭi bhayam tathā
vyādhi durbhikṣa cora ādi pīḍā kāla mṛtiḥ tathā
bahunā atra pralāpena kim sarvān sādhayiṣyati

original: yadyat kāmayate svasya samṛddhaṃ puruṣo bhuvi // Vis_19.26 //
analyzed: yat yat kāmayate svasya samṛddham puruṣaḥ bhuvi
tat tat eva labhet samyak hareḥ tasya nivedayet

original: sādhakaścāpi vā bhaktyā prayataḥ samyagarcayet // Vis_19.27 //
analyzed: sādhakaḥ ca api vā bhaktyā prayataḥ samyak arcayet
tat tat sarvam labhet evam mṛṣṭānnam na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: nṛpo vā nṛpamātro vā vedamantraistathā mune // Vis_19.28 //
analyzed: nṛpaḥ vā nṛpa mātraḥ vā veda mantraiḥ tathā mune
mūrti mantraiḥ aśaktaḥ vā sva dravyaiḥ arcana ādikān
kārayīta muni śreṣṭha sādhakena yathāvidhi
saphalam sukṛtam prāpya viṣṇu sārūpyam ṛcchati
iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām aṅganyāsādi vidhiḥ nāma ekonaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
viṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
viṣvaksenaḥ

original: śṛṇu nārada tattvena sādhakānāṃ hitāya vai /
analyzed: śṛṇu nārada tattvena sādhakānām hitāya vai
pūjā bhedam pravakṣyāmi paramātma ādi mūrtiṣu

original: pūte manorame deśe vane puṇyatame 'pi vā /
analyzed: pūte manorame deśe vane puṇyatame vā

original: tīrthe vā kṣetravarye vā grāme vā nagare 'pi vā // Vis_20.2 //
analyzed: tīrthe vā kṣetravarye vā grāme vā nagare vā

original: kharvaṭe kheṭake vāpi pattane vā taṭe taṭe(?) /
analyzed: kharvaṭe kheṭake vā api pattane vā taṭe taṭe

original: mahāgrāme viśeṣeṇa paścime madhyame 'pi vā // Vis_20.3 //
analyzed: mahāgrāme viśeṣeṇa paścime madhyame vā
kārayet mandiram samyak saumyam sumanasām prabhoḥ
viṣṇoḥ pūrva ukta mārgeṇa kalpayet bahu berakam
lakṣaṇam pūrvam uktena tatra yadi eka berakam
rāma traya ādikānām tu kalyayet bahu berakam
ātma artha beram ekam vā svatantra paratantrayoḥ
pūjā bhedaḥ sura mune
tat ucyate

original: āvāhanaṃ visargaṃ ca svatantre triṣu sandhiṣu /
analyzed: āvāhanam visargam ca svatantre triṣu sandhiṣu

original: agnikāryaṃ baliṃ caiva paratantreṣu tairvinā // Vis_20.7 //
analyzed: agni kāryam balim ca eva paratantreṣu taiḥ vinā

original: ātmarthe phalakāyāṃ vā paṭe vālikhya yatnataḥ /
analyzed: ātma arthe phalakāyām vā paṭe vā ālikhya yatnataḥ
pūrva ukta lakṣaṇa upetam pratiṣṭhāyāḥ krameṇa ca
saṃprokṣya navaratnān vā āvāhya abhyarcayeta vā
sthaṇḍile pratimāyām vā lauhyām icchā anurūpataḥ
indranīlam maratakam sphaṭikam vajram eva ca

original: padmarāgaṃ pravālaṃ ca vaiḍūryaṃ muktameva ca // Vis_20.10 //
analyzed: padmarāgam pravālam ca vaiḍūryam muktam eva ca
māṇikkam iti ratnāni nava teṣām yathākramam

original: kālaṃ vakṣye tathārcāyāḥ prātarmadhyāhna eva ca // Vis_20.11 //
analyzed: kālam vakṣye tathā arcāyāḥ prātar madhyāhnaḥ eva ca
sāyāhnaḥ ca pradoṣaḥ ca api ardharātram uṣaḥ tathā

original: iti ṣaṭkaṃ parārthe tu pūjāyāmuttamaṃ smṛtam // Vis_20.12 //
analyzed: iti ṣaṭkam parārthe tu pūjāyām uttamam smṛtam
madhyama ārādhane sāyamuṣaḥ ca parivarjayet

original: adhame cārdharātraṃ ca sāyāhnaṃ ca vivarjayet // Vis_20.13 //
analyzed: adhame ca ardharātram ca sāyāhnam ca vivarjayet
prātar madhya pradoṣeṣu bali bhramaṇam ācaret
na anyeṣu uttama pūjāyām api vā madhyama arcane

original: balihīne tu kāle tu pūjābhedamatho śṛṇu /
analyzed: bali hīne tu kāle tu pūjā bhedam atho śṛṇu
āhvānam arghya pādyam ca ācāmam gandha puṣpakam
dhūpaḥ dīpaḥ nivedyam ca mukha vāsa visarjane
iti karma uttama ādīnām nāḍī kālaḥ pravakṣyate
prathamā sapta nāḍī syāt madhyamā pañca nāḍikā

original: kanīyasī trināḍī syāt iti śāstrasya niścayaḥ // Vis_20.17 //
analyzed: kanīyasī trināḍī syāt iti śāstrasya niścayaḥ
divākara udayāt pūrvam ācāryaḥ snānam ācaret
arka udaye muni śreṣṭha pūjā karma samācaret
snāna pūrvāḥ kriyāḥ sarvāḥ phala saṃsiddhi hetavaḥ
atas tān tat

original: prathamaṃ vakṣye sādhakānāṃ hitāya vai // Vis_20.19 //
analyzed: prathamam vakṣye sādhakānām hitāya vai
samudra gāminyaḥ vā api hrade nadyām jala ādiṣu

original: taṭāke nirjhare vāpi snānaṃ kurvīta sādhakaḥ // Vis_20.20 //
analyzed: taṭāke nirjhare vā api snānam kurvīta sādhakaḥ
brāhme muhūrte ca utthāya dharma mokṣa artha cintakaḥ
prāc udak diśam āsādya sādhakaḥ snānam ācaret
prācī uttare nīra rāśau snānam kuryāt vicakṣaṇaḥ
vāyavye nairṛta āgneyyām varuṇāyām visarjayet

original: varjite deśanīre tu yo mohāt snānamācaret /
analyzed: varjite deśa nīre tu yaḥ mohāt snānam ācaret

original: tat snānaṃ niṣphalaṃ yāti punaḥsnānaṃ samācaret // Vis_20.23 //
analyzed: tat snānam niṣphalam yāti punaḥsnānam samācaret
prātar utthāya mūrtīnām yām mūrtim svayam arcati
tad mūrti arcana mantreṇa sādhakaḥ snānam ācaret
viṣṇumantreṇa vā sāṅgam athavā mūlavidyayā

original: avagāhya jale madhye trirācamya ca mantrataḥ // Vis_20.25 //
analyzed: avagāhya jale madhye tris ācamya ca mantrataḥ
visṛjya ārdra ambaram ca anyat vastra yugmena veṣṭayet
sa pavitra kareṇa eva mantra ācamanam ācaret
suvar arṇa ādi aṅgulīyā eva ayam vā
dhārayet dakṣiṇe bhuje kare
āpohiṣṭhā iti mantreṇa prokṣayet sva śira upari
tarpayet sva sva mantreṇa snāna karma samācaret
aśaktaḥ punar ācamya proktām vidyām anusmaran
saṃprokṣya snāna kāryāṇi kṛtvā kāryam viśet budhaḥ
praviśya kṛta sat śaucaḥ pūjā mantreṇa mantra vid
kavāṭa udghāṭanam kṛtvā mantreṇa ādyena vā mune

original: vāyumantreṇa vā dvāraṃ kavāṭoddhāṭanaṃ kramāt // Vis_20.30 //
analyzed: vāyumantreṇa vā dvāram kavāṭa uddhāṭanam kramāt

original: taddvāraṃ tu dvidhā kṛtvā sādhako mantravittamaḥ /
analyzed: tat dvāram tu dvidhā kṛtvā sādhakaḥ mantra vittamaḥ
sūtrasya uttara pārśve tu pratiśet dakṣiṇa aṅghriṇā
praṇamya sādhakaḥ mantram ṣaḍakṣaram anusmaran

original: nityadīpaṃ tato jvālya viṣṇumantreṇa mantravit // Vis_20.32 //
analyzed: nitya dīpam tatas jvālya viṣṇu mantreṇa mantra vid
sūtrasya dakṣiṇe pārśve uttara abhimukhaḥ svayam

original: same śucau pradeśe tu kṛṣṇājinakuśāstare // Vis_20.33 //
analyzed: same śucau pradeśe tu kṛṣṇa ajina kuśa āstare
phalake vā samāsīnaḥ svastha antaḥkaraṇaḥ śuciḥ

original: padmaṃ vā svastikaṃ vāpi baddhvā svecchānurūpataḥ // Vis_20.34 //
analyzed: padmam vā svastikam vā api baddhvā sva icchā anurūpataḥ
tena mantreṇa digbandham aṣṭa dikṣu niveśayet
rakṣā artham yāga deśam tat iti tattva artha darśinaḥ
evam kṛtvā tu digbandham prāṇāyāmam atha ārabhet

original: savyāhṛtiṃ sapraṇavāṃ gāyatrīṃ śirasā saha // Vis_20.36 //
analyzed: sa vyāhṛtim sa praṇavām gāyatrīm śirasā saha
prāṇān āyamya yaḥ tisraḥ prāṇāyāma uttamaḥ smṛtaḥ
pañcaviṃśati kṛtvā antar prāṇān āyamya mānasaḥ
prāṇāyāmaḥ sa madhyamaḥ

original: prāṇo vāyuḥ śarīrasthaḥ tasyāyāmo nirodhakaḥ // Vis_20.38 //
analyzed: prāṇaḥ vāyuḥ śarīra sthaḥ tasya āyāmaḥ nirodhakaḥ

original: pūrakaṃ kumbhakaṃ caiva recakaṃ trividha smṛtam /
analyzed: pūrakam kumbhakam ca eva recakam smṛtam

original: jānuṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya na drutaṃ na vilambitam // Vis_20.39 //
analyzed: jānum pradakṣiṇīkṛtya na drutam na vilambitam
kriyate ca aṅguli sphoṭaḥ sā
mātrā parikīrtitaḥ

original: tathā dvādaśamātrābhiḥ pūrakaṃ kriyate kramāt // Vis_20.40 //
analyzed: tathā dvādaśa mātrābhiḥ pūrakam kriyate kramāt
tasmāt dviguṇa mātrābhiḥ kumbhakam kriyate budhaiḥ
tathā eva recakam kṛtvā budhāḥ tattva artha darśinaḥ
prāṇāyāmam idam proktam adhamam muti sattama
tri pradhāne vidhāne yathāsaṃbhavam ācaret

original: prāṇāyāmatrayaṃ kṛtvā pañca vā sapta vāthavā /
analyzed: prāṇāyāma trayam kṛtvā pañca vā sapta vā athavā
prāṇāyāmam prakurvīta prāṇāyāma vidām vara
tatas tu kāya śuddhi artham varṇam dhūmra ādi vinyaset

original: śabdaḥsparśaśca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaśca pañcamaḥ // Vis_20.44 //
analyzed: śabdaḥ sparśaḥ ca rūpam ca rasaḥ gandhaḥ ca pañcamaḥ
ahaṅkāra manaḥ buddhi yuktam ātmānam ānayet

original: sadāviṣṇau tu saṃyojya dhātudehaṃ suśodhayet // Vis_20.45 //
analyzed: sadā viṣṇau tu saṃyojya dhātu deham su śodhayet
yat bījam nābhi madhya stham dhūmram caṇḍa anila ātmakam
viśoṣayet aśeṣam tu dhyāyet deha stha kalmaṣam
kṣaumam hṛd padma madhya stham bījam tejaḥ mayam smaret
atha ūrdhva tiryagābhiḥ ca jvālābhiḥ kalmaṣam dahet
śaśāṅka ākṛti vat hāyan ambara stham sudhā ambudhim
hṛd padma vyāpibhiḥ deham sva karma bhrāmayet sudhīḥ
suṣumnā yoga mārgeṇa sarva nāḍī visarpibhiḥ
paścāt śabda ādi viṣayān yojayet mūrdhni madhyame

original: evaṃ cāmṛtarūpaṃ tu mayā proktaṃ tu nārada /
analyzed: evam ca amṛta rūpam tu mayā proktam tu nārada

original: yadbījaṃ tu nyasennābhau anāmikyā tu nārada // Vis_20.50 //
analyzed: yat bījam tu nyaset nābhau anāmikyā tu nārada
aṅguṣṭha anāmikābhyām tu kṣauma bījam hṛdi nyaset
sarvāsām aṅgulīnām tu mūrdhni imam
bījam uttamam
yakāra ādi vakāra antam dhūmram avya aruṇa asitam

original: evaṃ saṃśodhya dehaṃ tu ūrdhvapuṇḍraṃ samācaret // Vis_20.52 //
analyzed: evam saṃśodhya deham tu ūrdhva puṇḍram samācaret
ūrdhva puṇḍra vidhim vakṣye śṛṇu nārada tattvataḥ
sarva agha nāśanam puṇyam sarva tīrtha phala pradam
sva mūrti arcana mantreṇa lalāṭa ādi kakud param
ūrdhva puṇḍram likhet vidvān anāmikyā tu sādhakaḥ
dvādaśa śaiḥ
dvādaśaiḥ māsaiḥ nāmabhiḥ vā viśuddhaye
evam pūtaḥ bhavet ūrdhva puṇḍrāṇām dhāraṇāt mune
sṛṣṭi sthiti ādi vaśataḥ hasta aṅga nyāsayoḥ dvayoḥ
vinā abhi api ar
phalavatī mūrti mantra prabhāvataḥ
ārādhana kramam vakṣye dvāra pūjā ādi nārada
kuṣṭha apasmāra rahitaḥ dvāra pūjām samācaret
caṇḍa pracaṇḍa garuḍāḥ caturthī antam namaḥ ntakam
dakṣiṇa uttara pūrve tu pūrveṣu
dvāre ca praṇavaiḥ saha
caṇḍa adhare tu cakram syāt pracaṇḍasya adhare mbujam
gandha puppa ādibhiḥ dvāra pūjām evam samācaret
athavā dvāra pūjāyāḥ kramam śṛṇu mahā mune

original: caṇḍādīn pūrvavat pūjya cakrādirahitena tu // Vis_20.61 //
analyzed: caṇḍa ādīn pūrvavat pūjya cakra ādi rahitena tu
dhātāram pūjayet vāme vidhātāram tu dakṣiṇe

original: sūtrasya dakṣiṇe sthitvā ācāryo mantravitamaḥ // Vis_20.62 //
analyzed: sūtrasya dakṣiṇe sthitvā ācāryaḥ mantravitamaḥ
adhobhāge tu bhūmiḥ syāt upari aṅgam pūjayet śriyam

original: durgā gaṇapatī caiva kavāṭasthau prapūjayet // Vis_20.63 //
analyzed: durgā gaṇapatī ca eva kavāṭa sthau prapūjayet
śaṅga padma nidhī ca eva śākhayoḥ mūla deśataḥ

original: gaṅgāṃ ca yamunāṃ caiva kavāṭādhārake nyaset // Vis_20.64 //
analyzed: gaṅgām ca yamunām ca eva kavāṭa ādhārake nyaset
utkarṣaṇīm karṣaṇīm ca antar yantre hi adhas upari
gandha puṣpa akṣataiḥ dhūpaiḥ dīpa ādyaiḥ dvāram arcayet

original: atha caṇḍaṃ pracaṇḍaṃ ca garuḍāntaṃ(-ḍaṃ ca?)
analyzed: atha caṇḍam pracaṇḍam ca garuḍāntaṃḍam ca
samarcayet
praṇava ādi ca mantram iti abhidhīyate
pūrvavat pūjayet dvāra devān tantra vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: triprakāraṃ mayā proktaṃ yathāyogaṃ samācaret // Vis_20.67 //
analyzed: tri prakāram mayā proktam yathāyogam samācaret
praṇava ādi sva nāmnā ca pūjayet iha nārada
evam saṃkṣepataḥ proktaḥ dvāra pūjā vidhi kramaḥ
kāṃsya ghaṇṭā dhvanim kṛtvā dvāram ācchādya vāsasā
praviśet devapārśve tu sādhakaḥ saṃyata indriyaḥ
pūva uktam āsanam kṛtvā devasya āsanam ārabhet

original: sauvarṇe rājate vātha tāmre vātha mahāmune // Vis_20.70 //
analyzed: sauvarṇe rājate vā atha tāmre vā atha mahā mune
kuśena vā atha puṣpeṇa kalpayet āsanam hareḥ

original: devasya purataḥ kṛtvā hyāsanaṃ saṃyatendriyaḥ // Vis_20.71 //
analyzed: devasya puratas kṛtvā hi āsanam saṃyata indriyaḥ
ādhāraḥ praṇavaḥ jñeyaḥ śaktiḥ vāgīśvarī tathā
kandam ca pṛthivīm
na alam ākāśa rūpakam
na alasya agre smaret padmam hṛd padmam parama ālayam
ādhāra ādīni sarvāṇi hi āsanasya mahā mune
ajñānāt kalpayet mohāt niṣphalam syāt na saṃśayaḥ
tasmāt sarva prayatnena ādhāra ādīni kalpayet

original: ādhāraṃ prathamaṃ nyasya śaktiṃ caiva tataḥ param /
analyzed: ādhāram prathamam nyasya śaktim ca eva tatas param

original: śaktyopari nyaseddhīmān kandaṃ caiva mahāmune // Vis_20.75 //
analyzed: śaktyā upari nyaset dhīmān kandam ca eva mahā mune
kandasya upari vinyasya nālam ākāśa rūpakam

original: nālasyāgre tu vinyasya dharmādīni yathākramam // Vis_20.76 //
analyzed: nālasya agre tu vinyasya dharma ādīni yathākramam
dharma ādīnām tu tad madhye padmam śveta aṣṭa patrakam

original: dharmaṃ jñānaṃ ca vairāgyaṃ aiśvaryaṃ ca catuṣṭayam // Vis_20.77 //
analyzed: dharmam jñānam ca vairāgyam aiśvaryam ca catuṣṭayam
catvāri etāni koṇeṣu āgneya ādiṣu vinyaset

original: madhye tu rudraṃ vinyasya nālamūlasya madhyame // Vis_20.78 //
analyzed: madhye tu rudram vinyasya nāla mūlasya madhyame
adharma ajñāna
vairāgya anaiśvaryam ca catuṣṭayam
vinyaset ca catur dikṣu pūrva ādiṣu yathākramam
dharma ādīni nyaset ādau mantreṇa ādyena saṃyutam
sva nāmnā ca eva sarveṣām mantram iti abhidhīyate
adharma ādīni sarveṣām sva sva nāmnā ca sādhakaḥ
vinyaset ca catur dikṣu pūrva ādi krama yogataḥ

original: evaṃ nyāsaṃ kramāt kṛtvā hyādhārādi mahāmune /
analyzed: evam nyāsam kramāt kṛtvā hi ādhāra ādi mahā mune
nāradaḥ
dharma jñāna ādi rūpāṇi śrotum icchāmi aham prabho
āyudhāni ca sarveṣām yathāvat vaktum arhasi
viṣvaksenaḥ
śṛṇu nārada tattva jña viṣṇu pāda parāyaṇa
dharma ādīnām svarūpāṇi pravakṣyāmi āyudhāni ca
catur vaktram catur bāhum dvi pādam ca asita ānanam
śaṅkha cakra dharam saumyam pīta ambara samanvitam
jāti puṣpa dala prakhyam sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
dharma mūrtiḥ iti khyātam jñāna mūrtim bravīmi te

original: dvipādaṃ ca caturbāhuṃ caturvaktraṃ sanātanam // Vis_20.86 //
analyzed: dvi pādam ca catur bāhum catur vaktram sanātanam
nīlotpala dala prakhyam śaṅka cakra gadā dharam
jñāna mūrtiḥ iti khyātam vairāgyasya vadāmi aham
rakta akṣi traya saṃyuktam catur vaktram catur bhujam
pīta ambara dharam saumyam śaṅkha cakra dharam sadā
karṇikāra dala prakhyam vāyavyam diśam āśritam
vairāgyasya imi

original: ti nirdiṣṭaṃ aiśvaryasya vadāmi te // Vis_20.89 //
analyzed: nirdiṣṭam aiśvaryasya vadāmi te
rakta utpala dala prakhyam caturvaktram caturbhujam
saumyam śaṅkha cakra dharam sadā
