sita ānana samāyuktam muktā hāra samanvitam
aiśvaryasya iti nirdiṣṭam īśvarasya vadāmi te
kunda indu mukta
saṃkāśam dvi pādam ca catur bhujam
rakta akṣi traya saṃyuktam jaṭā makuṭa dhāriṇam
pīta ambara dharam saumyam paraśum īśvaram
śūla dhāriṇam
sarva ābharaṇa saṃyuktam sarva śobhita śobhanam

original: itthaṃ harasya rūpaṃ tu devarṣe viddhi nārada /
analyzed: ittham harasya rūpam tu deva ṛṣe viddhi nārada
evam saṃkṣepataḥ proktam dharma jñāna ādi rūpakam
adharma ādīni gātrāṇi
vakṣyāmi śṛṇu nārada
rakta varṇam mahā kāyam kambu grīvam catur bhujam
eka vaktram bṛhat kukṣim netra traya samanvitam
rakta ambara dharam raudram khaṅga mudgara dhāriṇam
adharma sayā evam uktam tu ajñānasya vadāmi te
pīta varṇam bṛhat kukṣim mahā kāyam catur bhujam
śūla khaṅga dharam raudram sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
etat ajñāna rūpam syāt avairāgyam vadāmi te
dūrvā śyāma nibham brahman dvi pādam ca catur bhujam
paraśu pāśa dharam raudram rakta ambara dharam sadā
akṣi traya samopetam jaṭā makuṭa dhāriṇam dhārakam

original: avairāgyasya rūpaṃ syāt anaiśvaryaṃ vadāmi te // Vis_20.100 //
analyzed: avairāgyasya rūpam syāt anaiśvaryam vadāmi te
dhūmra ākāram bṛhat kukṣim catur bāhum mahā hanum
eka vaktram mahā kāyam muktakeśa samanvitam
aśrīkaram asaumyam ca akṣi traya samanvitam

original: anaiśvaryasya rūpaṃ tu nirdiṣṭamadhunā mune // Vis_20.102 //
analyzed: anaiśvaryasya rūpam tu nirdiṣṭam adhunā mune
dharma ādi pañca pādāni adharma ādīni nārada

original: teṣāṃ rūpaṃ smarennityaṃ nyasettasmin yathākramam // Vis_20.103 //
analyzed: teṣām rūpam smaret nityam nyaset tasmin yathākramam
anyathā kalpayet mohāt ādhāra ādi nirūpakam

original: tatpūjā niṣphalā yāti grāmasyāgnibhayaṃ bhavet // Vis_20.104 //
analyzed: tad pūjā niṣphalā yāti grāmasya agni bhayam bhavet
tasmāt sarva prayatnena smaret rūpāṇi sādhakaḥ
nyaset aṣṭa dalam padmam teṣām upari nārada
tatra arka soma vahnīn ca upari upari
vṛtta ākāram tu rakta ābham arka maṇḍalakam nyaset
tatra upari nyaset dhyātvā śvetam vṛttam śaśāṅkakam
agnim agni nibham dhyātvā trikoṇam maṇḍala upari

original: evaṃ rūpaṃ tu saṃcintya maṇḍalārkādi nārada /
analyzed: evam rūpam tu saṃcintya maṇḍala arka ādi nārada
maṇḍala upari vinyasya tāmasa ādi guṇatrayam

original: tāmasaṃ rājasaṃ caiva sātvikaṃ ca yathākramam /
analyzed: tāmasam rājasam ca eva sātvikam ca yathākramam

original: tāmasaṃ kṛṣṇarūpaṃ tu rājasaṃ raktarūpakam // Vis_20.109 //
analyzed: tāmasam kṛṣṇa rūpam tu rājasam rakta rūpakam
sātvikam śvotavarṇam tu varṇāni etāni saṃsmaret

original: tatra tadvarṇakaṃ cintya maṇḍalopari vinyaset // Vis_20.110 //
analyzed: tatra tad varṇakam cintya maṇḍala upari vinyaset
tāmasa ādini vinyasya nyaset ātma dvayam budhaḥ
ātmānam ca antarātmānam vāsudeva parāyaṇau

original: ātmā tu śvetavarṇaḥ syādantarātmā tathaiva ca /
analyzed: ātmā tu śveta varṇaḥ syāt antarātmā tathā eva ca

original: ś teṣāṃ varṇaṃ tu saṃcintya nyasedātmāntarātmake // Vis_20.112 //
analyzed: teṣām varṇam tu saṃcintya nyaset ātma antara ātmake
ādhāra ādi antarātma antam nyāsa kramam atho śṛṇu

original: ādhāraṃ prathamaṃ nyasya śvetavarṇaṃ trimūrtiyuk // Vis_20.113 //
analyzed: ādhāram prathamam nyasya śveta varṇam trimūrti yuj
śakti nyāsam dvitīye tu kanda nyāsam atas param
nālam ākāśa rūpam syāt tamaḥ varṇam caturthakam
nālasya āgneya koṇe tu dharmamūrtim tu pañcamam

original: ṣaṣṭhaṃ tu nairṛte nyasya jñānamūrtiṃ tu nārada // Vis_20.115 //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭham tu nairṛte nyasya jñāna mūrtim tu nārada
saptame tu nyaset vidvān vairāgyam vāyugocare
aiśvaryam aṣṭamam nyasya īśāne tantra vittamaḥ
navamam nāla mūle tu rudra mūrtim sadāśivam

original: daśamaṃ nālasyāgre tu pūrve 'dharmaṃ tu vinyaset // Vis_20.117 //
analyzed: daśamam nālasya agre tu pūrve dharmam tu vinyaset
ekādaśe tu vinyasya dakṣiṇe jñāna rūpakam

original: paścime tu nyaset paścādavairāgyaṃ tu nārada // Vis_20.118 //
analyzed: paścime tu nyaset paścāt avairāgyam tu nārada
udīcyām vinyaset devam anaiśvaryam trayodaśa
nālasya agre smaret vidvān padmam tad parama ālayam

original: etat padmāsanaṃ proktaṃ tridaśaiḥ pūjitaṃ sadā /
analyzed: etat padmāsanam proktam tridaśaiḥ pūjitam sadā

original: tatropari nyaset paścāt maṇḍalārkādi nārada // Vis_20.120 //
analyzed: tatra upari nyaset paścāt maṇḍala arka ādi nārada
guṇatrayam nyaset madhye tāmasa ādi yathākramam
guṇa madhye nyaset dhīmān ātmānam ca antara ātmakam

original: evaṃ saṃkṣepataḥ prokta āsanasya kramo mayā /
analyzed: evam saṃkṣepataḥ proktaḥ āsanasya kramaḥ mayā
āsanasya arcanam vakṣye saṃkṣepāt vidhi pūrvakam
ādhāra ādi antarātma antam mūrtīnām muni sattama
vyastaiḥ saṃpūjayet sarvam samastaiḥ vā samāhitaḥ
arcayet gandha puṣpa ādyaiḥ pūjayet tam manoramaiḥ
teṣām sva nāmakaiḥ mantraiḥ dadyāt sarvam yathākramam

original: etat kalpyaṃ muniśreṣṭha āhvānaṃ ca vadāmyaham /
analyzed: etat kalpyam muni śreṣṭhaḥ āhvānam ca vadāmi aham
svarṇa ādi anyatamam pātram kuḍuba dvaya pūritam

original: itthaṃ hi lakṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ sarvapātrāṇi nārada /
analyzed: ittham hi lakṣaṇam proktam sarva pātrāṇi nārada

original: āvāhanādi pātraṃ tat pañcaṣaṭsapta eva vā // Vis_20.126 //
analyzed: āvāhana ādi pātram tat pañca ṣaṣ sapta eva vā
pūjakasya agratas sthāpya prokṣayet mūlavidyayā
eteṣām api alābhe tu śaṅkha śuktim atha api vā
kṣālayet sarva pātrāṇi viṣṇugāyatriyā mune
āḍhaka dvaya saṃpūrṇām pakva bimba phala ākṛtim
vardhanīm vāma pārśve tu vinyasya āpūrayet budhaḥ
gālitaiḥ udakaiḥ yasyām gandha puṣpa yutām nyaset

original: śeṣaṃ dakṣiṇapārśve tu parito vāgrato 'pi vā /
analyzed: śeṣam dakṣiṇa pārśve tu paritas vā agratas vā
sthāpayet tu krameṇa eva pūjā dravyam samastakam
tat pātreṣu eka pātram tu saṃgṛhya muni sattama

original: ṣaḍakṣareṇa mantreṇa saṃprokṣya tu punaḥ punaḥ // Vis_20.131 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ akṣareṇa mantreṇa saṃprokṣya tu punar punar

original: tatpātraṃ tu punaḥ prokṣya gandhodena prapūrayet /
analyzed: tat pātram tu punar prokṣya gandhodena prapūrayet
tasmin śirasi
puṣpam ca nyaset toyam sa puṣpakam
uddhṛtya pūjā mantreṇa dhyātvā atra mahā mune
yad rūpam cintitam samyak tad rūpam cintya
sādhakaḥ
avatīrṇam mahāberāt āgaccha antena mūrdhni ca

original: prokṣya caivāsanaṃ dadyāt kevalena jagadguroḥ // Vis_20.134 //
analyzed: prokṣya ca eva āsanam dadyāt kevalena jagadguroḥ

original: prakṣipya vādamūle tu puṣpamuṣṭiṃ tataḥ param /
analyzed: prakṣipya vāda mūle tu puṣpa muṣṭim tatas param
namaskṛtya añjalim paścāt darśayet muni sattama

original: ardhyaṃ pādyaṃ tathācāmaṃ datvā devāya mantravit /
analyzed: ardhyam pādyam tathā ācāmam da tvā devāya mantra vid
tatas tu parivārāṇi pātra śeṣeṇa kalpayet
parivāra kramam vakṣye yathātattvena yathātathyena nārada
āvāhana aṃśa toyena kalpeyat tu yathākramam
pūrve tu vāsudevam tu śuddha sphaṭika saṃnibham
śaṅkha cakra gadā pāṇim pīta ambara vibhūṣitam
saṃkarṣaṇam nyaset yāmye śaśi bāla arka saṃnibham
śaṅkha cakra samopetam catur bāhu virājitam
pradyumnam paścime nyasya śātakumbha nibham mune
śaṅkha cakra gadā pāṇim pīta ambara vibhūṣitam
aniruddham nyaset tasmin uttare nīla rūpiṇam
śaṅkha cakra samāyuktam pīta vastram catur bhujam
śriyam suvarṇa varṇa ābhām śveta rūpām sarasvatīm

original: raktavarṇāṃ ratiṃ paścāt śāntiṃ kuṅkumasaṃnibhām // Vis_20.142 //
analyzed: rakta varṇām ratim paścāt śāntim kuṅkuma saṃnibhām
āgneya ādiṣu koṇeṣu vinyaset śakti rūpakam

original: paiśāce tu nyaset paścāt śaṅkhādīnāṃ tu nārada // Vis_20.143 //
analyzed: paiśāce tu nyaset paścāt śaṅkha ādīnām tu nārada
pūrve śaṅkha niyuñjīta śveta varṇam
kālāgni sadṛśa ākāram dakṣiṇe cakram uttamam
paścime tu gadām nyasya haridrā ābhām anuttamām
rakta varṇa nibham padmam uttare tu nyaset budhaḥ

original: musalaṃ kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ tu āgneyyāṃ diśi vinyaset /
analyzed: musalam kṛṣṇa varṇam tu āgneyyām diśi vinyaset
nairṛtāyām nyaset tatra khaṅgam ākāśa saṃnibham
pañca varṇa tathā śārṅgam vāyavye tantra vittamaḥ
sarva varṇa maya ākārām vanamālām tathā aiśake
etat dbrijīya āvaraṇam garbhāgāre prakīrtitam

original: dvārasya dakṣiṇe caṇḍaṃ kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ caturbhujam // Vis_20.148 //
analyzed: dvārasya dakṣiṇe caṇḍam kṛṣṇa varṇam catur bhujam
śaṅkha cakra gadā pāṇim trinetram rakta locanam

original: evaṃ rūpaṃ tu saṃcintya pracaṇḍaṃ tu tataḥ śṛṇu // Vis_20.149 //
analyzed: evam rūpam tu saṃcintya pracaṇḍam tu tatas śṛṇu
śaṅkha cakra gadā pāṇim rakta varṇam catur bhujam
dvārasya uttara pārśve tu trinetram bhīma rūpiṇam
puratas vainateyam ca suvarṇa ābham kṛtāñjalim
karaṇḍa makuṭam nīla vāsasam priya darśanam
nīla agra nāsikā yuktam nāga ābharaṇa bhūṣitam

original: evaṃ tu garuḍaṃ cintya balarāmasya mūrtivat // Vis_20.152 //
analyzed: evam tu garuḍam cintya balarāmasya mūrti vat

original: yo bhaktyā devamabhyarcet tathaiva garuḍaṃ yajet /
analyzed: yaḥ bhaktyā devam abhyarcet tathā eva garuḍam yajet
bhagavat pramukham paścāt garutmantam niyojayet
rakta varṇam catur bāhum dvi bāhum vā muni īśvara
sarva ābharaṇa saṃyuktam sarva śobhana śobhitam
kālāgni sadṛśa ākāram cakra dhṛk makuṭa anvitam
evam cakra adhidaivam tu pūjayet dvāra pārśvake
śaṅkha ābham saumya rūpam tu sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
upavīta yutam śvetam śaṅkha dhṛk makuṭa anvitam
catur bāhum dvi bāhum vā dhyāyet dvārasya vāmake
dhātāram pīta varṇam vidhātāram aruṇa prabham

original: śyāmavarṇā tu bhūmiḥ syāt raktavarṇāṃ haripriyām /
analyzed: śyāma varṇā tu bhūmiḥ syāt rakta varṇām haripriyām

original: durgāṃ ca komalaśyāmāṃ śvetarūpaṃ vināyakam // Vis_20.158 //
analyzed: durgām ca komala śyāmām śveta rūpam vināyakam
śaṅkha padma nidhī ca eva śveta rakta nibhau mune

original: gaṅgāṃ ca yamunāṃ caiva śvetakṛṣṇanibhe mune // Vis_20.159 //
analyzed: gaṅgām ca yamunām ca eva śveta kṛṣṇa nibhe mune

original: utkarṣaṇīṃ tu raktāṃ vai karṣaṇīṃ raktavarṇakām /
analyzed: utkarṣaṇīm tu raktām vai karṣaṇīm rakta varṇakām
evam dvāre tu saṃcintya tri sandhyāyāṃsu
prapūjayet
na arcayet upasandhyāyām caṇḍa ādīn dvārapālakān
ajñānāt arcayet mohāt sthāna nāśaḥ bhaviṣyati
durbhikṣam jāyate rāṣṭram dhana dhānya vināśa kṛt
tasmāt sarva prayatnena vidhinā uktam samācaret
vimāna āgneya yāmye tu tad madhye gaṇanāyakam
pūrvavat varṇakam cintya hasti vaktram catur bhujam
vimāne dakṣiṇe kuryāt dakṣiṇāmūrtim īśvaram
akṣa mālā dharam devam aṣṭa akṣara parāyaṇam
trinetram śveta saṃkāśam saumyam soma ardha dhāriṇam
nārada ādi ṛṣi saṃghaiḥ ca sevitam dakṣiṇāmukham
evam rahasya rūpam te saṃkṣepeṇa vidhīyate
tasya tu mātṝṇām uttarā mukham
kalpayet muni śārdūla sarva saṃpad sukha āvaham
ālayasya uttare mātṝḥ kalpayet bā muni īśvara
teṣām nāma kramāt guhyam śṛṇuṣva avahitaḥ dhunā
vāc īśvarī kriyā kīrtiḥ lakṣmī sṛṣṭiḥ tathā eva ca
vidyākāntiḥ ca saptā etāḥ kathitāḥ viṣṇu mātaraḥ

original: uttare paścime caiva hayāsyaḥ śrīdharastathā // Vis_20.169 //
analyzed: uttare paścime ca eva hayāsyaḥ śrīdharaḥ tathā
vīrabhadra gaṇa īśau vā mātṝṇām dvārapālakau
sādhaka icchā anurūpeṇa kalpayet viṣṇu mātaraḥ

original: mātaraśca suvarṇābhāḥ śrīdharaḥ śyāma eva ca /
analyzed: mātaraḥ ca suvarṇa ābhāḥ śrīdharaḥ śyāmaḥ eva ca
varṇāḥ etāḥ te
prakīrtitāḥ
tathā eva vīrabhadra ādi varṇam tu paripaṭhyate
vimāna pṛṣṭha bhāge tu anantam atha sādhakaḥ
pañcāsya pannaga ūrdhve tu pañcavaktraiḥ samāvṛtam
caturbhujam samāsīnam śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam
ittham hi lakṣaṇa upetam sarva devaiḥ namaskṛtam
saumya āsya īśānayoḥ madhye durgām śyāma nibhām yajet

original: tasyottare tu vinyasya mama rūpaṃ camūpateḥ /
analyzed: tasya uttare tu vinyasya mama rūpam camū pateḥ

original: śyāmalaṃ piṅgalākṣaṃ tu piṅgaśmaśruḥ sanātanam // Vis_20.175 //
analyzed: śyāmalam piṅgalākṣam tu piṅgaśmaśruḥ sanātanam
śaṅkha cakra gadā pāṇim catur bāhum kirīṭinam
pīta ambara dharam saumyam vivṛtta akṣi samanvitam
tarjayan vāma tarjanyā nāsā agra āsannayā jagat
evam hi mama rūpam te tu
paṭhyate muni sattama
parivāra vidhāna uktam atha bāhyeṣu vinyaset

original: dvārasya śaṅkhacakre tu dakṣiṇottarataḥ smaret // Vis_20.178 //
analyzed: dvārasya śaṅkha cakre tu dakṣiṇa uttaratas smaret
dakṣiṇe śaṅkha varṇam tu śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam

original: caturbhujaṃ triṇetraṃ tu mūrdhni śaṅkhaṃ nyaset sadā // Vis_20.179 //
analyzed: caturbhujam trinetram tu mūrdhni śaṅkham nyaset sadā
vāma pārśve nyaset cakram agni rūpam catur bhujam
trinetram bhīma saṃkāśam śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam
tad mūrdhni vinyaset cakram nīla ambara kirīṭinam

original: evaṃ tu lakṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ śaṅcakrādirūpakam (?) // Vis_20.181 //
analyzed: evam tu lakṣaṇam proktam śaṅ cakra ādi rūpakam
indra ādi īśāna paryantam sveṣu sthāneṣu yojayet

original: vajrahasttaṃ sahasrākṣaṃ saumyaṃ tu śyāmalākṛtim // Vis_20.182 //
analyzed: vajra hasttam sahasra akṣam saumyam tu śyāmala ākṛtim
saundaryam indra daivatyam dhyāyet indram kirīṭinam
tri śikham rakta varṇa ābham rakta mālyaiḥ alaṃkṛtam
tri pādam ca aṣṭa bāhum ca rakta netra trayam mune
rakta keśa nakha śmaśru vahni rūpam sa śaktikam
dharmarājam tatas dhyāyet sarva lakṣaṇa lakṣitam
kāla megha nibha ākāram dvi bhujam daṃṇḍa pāṇinam
kirīṭa hāra keyūra makuṭa ādi vibhūṣitam
sarva preta adhināthasya lakṣaṇam kathitam mayā
tatas tu rakṣasām īśam nirṛtim rakta mūrdhajam
khaṅga bāhum mahākāyam rakta vaktram trinetrakam
etat tu lakṣaṇam proktam rākṣasa adhipateḥ tatas
sarva lakṣaṇa saṃyuktam sarva alaṃkāra bhūṣitam
śyāmalam pāśa hastam ca jaleśam paṅkaja āsanam
dhūmra varṇa nibha ākāram dhvaja yuktam mahā bhujam

original: dvipādaṃ ca dvihastaṃ ca sarveṣāṃ prāṇasaṃjñitam /
analyzed: dvi pādam ca dvi hastam ca sarveṣām prāṇa saṃjñitam

original: itthaṃ te muniśārdūla lakṣaṇaṃ paripaṭhyate // Vis_20.190 //
analyzed: ittham te muni śārdūla lakṣaṇam paripaṭhyate
dhyāyet saumye tu matimān yakṣeśvaram anuttamam
tapta hāṭaka saṃkāśam sarva lakṣaṇa lakṣitam

original: dvipādaṃ ca dvihastaṃ ca daṇḍapāṇiṃ dhaneśvaram /
analyzed: dvi pādam ca dvi hastam ca daṇḍa pāṇim dhaneśvaram
śveta adri śikhara ākāram dvi pādam ca catur bhujam
vṛṣadhvajam trinetram ca śūlapāṇi indumaulinam

original: evaṃ dhyāyet kramāt sarvān svanāmnā pūjayet pṛthak // Vis_20.193 //
analyzed: evam dhyāyet kramāt sarvān sva nāmnā pūjayet pṛthak
rakta varṇam mahā kāyam kambu grīvam catur bhujam
śaṅkha cakra gadā pāṇim trinetram bhīma rūpiṇam
pārśve tṛtīya dvārake ravim
kunda puṣpa nibha ākāram śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam

original: caturbhujaṃ triṇetraṃ ca pītavastraṃ ca cintayet // Vis_20.196 //
analyzed: catur bhujam trinetram ca pīta vastram ca cintayet
dvārasya vāma pārśve tu śaśāṅka ākṛtim uttamam
mauli pṛṣṭhasya sūrya ādau cintayet maṇḍala ākṛtim
evam śaśim ravim dhyātvā tṛtīya dvāra pārśvayoḥ

original: kumudādīni sarvāṇi nyaset pūrvādiṣu kramāt // Vis_20.198 //
analyzed: kumuda ādīni sarvāṇi nyaset pūrva ādiṣu kramāt
kumudaḥ kumudākṣaḥ ca vāmanaḥ
śaṅku karṇaḥ sarpa netraḥ su mukhaḥ su pratiṣṭhitaḥ
eteṣām lakṣaṇam proktam dhyāyet asmin mahā utsave

original: tadvat jñātvātra bhūteśān pūjayet sādhakottamaḥ // Vis_20.200 //
analyzed: tadvat jñātvā atra bhūta īśān pūjayet sādhaka uttamaḥ
puratas sthāpayet sarvān viṣṇu pāriṣadān bahūn
sarva varṇa dharāḥ sarve sarve śastra astra pāṇayaḥ
mahā pīṭhe tu saṃsmṛtya sarvān bhūta gaṇa anvitān

original: pūjākāle tato dhyāyet svarūpaṃ pūjakaḥ kramāt // Vis_20.202 //
analyzed: pūjā kāle tatas dhyāyet sva rūpam pūjakaḥ kramāt
sva nāmnā parivārāṇām praṇava ādi namaḥ ntakam
arghya pādya ādibhiḥ vā api gandha ādyaiḥ vā muni īśvara
arcayet nitya pūjāyām praṇava ādim anusmaran

original: asmin tantre mayā proktaṃ caṇḍādyāvaraṇārcanam // Vis_20.204 //
analyzed: asmin tantre mayā proktam caṇḍa ādi āvaraṇa arcanam
utsave parivārāṇām arcanā vidhiḥ uttamaḥ
tathā eva abhyarcya matimān parivārān atandritaḥ
evam abhyarcya bhūta īśān paścāt pūjām samācaret
kṣālayet sarva pātrāṇi pūrva uktena vidhānataḥ
sarva dravyāṇi saṃprokṣya nirīkṣya ādyena mantrataḥ
āvāhana ādibhiḥ sarvaiḥ upacāra krameṇa tu

original: devadevaṃ samabhyarcya sa yāti paramāṃ gatim /
analyzed: devadevam samabhyarcya sa yāti paramām gatim
upacāra kramam vakṣye yathāvat anupūrvaśas
pūrvam āvāhanam kuryāt punar āsanam eva ca

original: tṛtīyaṃ puṣpavikṣepaṃ turīyaṃ tu namaskṛtim // Vis_20.209 //
analyzed: tṛtīyam puṣpa vikṣepam turīyam tu namaskṛtim
ca syāt
ṣaṣṭham ardhyam tathā eva ca

original: pādyaṃ tu saptamaṃ kuryāt tathācamanamaṣṭamam // Vis_20.210 //
analyzed: pādyam tu saptamam kuryāt tathā ācamanam aṣṭamam
snapanam navamam vidyāt daśamaḥ vasanam bhavet
ekādaśaḥ bhūṣaṇam syāt dvādaśaḥ tu upavītakam
trayodaśaḥ ca ācamanam gandhaḥ ca eva caturdaśaḥ

original: puṣpaṃ pañcadaśaścaiva ṣoḍaśo dhūpa eva ca // Vis_20.212 //
analyzed: puṣpam pañcadaśaḥ ca eva ṣoḍaśaḥ dhūpaḥ eva ca
dīpaḥ saptadaśaḥ ca eva mudrā aṣṭādaśaḥ ucyate
haviḥ ekonaviṃśaḥ ca pānīyam viṃśakaḥ tathā
ekaviṃśaḥ tathā ācāmaḥ tāmbūlam ca dvāviṃśakaḥ
upacāraḥ trayoviṃśaḥ ācāmaḥ tad anantaram
mukhavāsaḥ pañcaviṃśaḥ ṣaḍviṃśaḥ geyam ucyate
purāṇam saptaviṃśaḥ ca nṛtta homam atas param
bali bhramaṇam ekonatriṃśe ardhyam atas param
puṣpam vā muni śārdūla dadyāt icchā anurūpataḥ
ekatriṃśaḥ mukhavāsaḥ ca udvāsanam atas param
dvātriṃśat upacārāṇām uktam evam mahā mune
vakṣye kalā upacārāṇi rān tu
śṛṇuṣva avahitaḥ bhava

original: ādya āvāhanaṃ paścāt āsanaṃ tadanantaram // Vis_20.218 //
analyzed: ādye āvāhanam paścāt āsanam tad anantaram

original: pādyaṃ tṛtīya ardhyaṃ syādācāmaṃ pañcamaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: pādyam tṛtīyaḥ syāt ācāmam pañcamaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: ṣaṣṭhaṃ tu snapanaṃ vidyāt saptamo vasanaṃ bhavet // Vis_20.219 //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭham tu snapanam vidyāt saptamaḥ vasanam bhavet
aṣṭamaḥ tu upavītam syāt navamam gandhaḥ ucyate

original: daśamaḥ puṣpavinyāsaḥ dhūpa ekādaśo bhavet // Vis_20.220 //
analyzed: daśamaḥ puṣpa vinyāsaḥ dhūpaḥ ekādaśaḥ bhavet
dīpaḥ tatas param vidyāt caruṇaḥ tu caroḥ ca eva nivedanam
caturdaśī añjali mudrā pradakṣiṇam atas param
udvāsanam ṣoḍaśaḥ syāt iti evam aparaḥ kramaḥ
evam ṣoḍaśadhā proktāḥ
ekādaśa upacārāṇām kramam śṛṇu mahā mune

original: āvāhanaṃ tu prathamaḥ dvitīyaścāsanaṃ bhavet // Vis_20.233 //
analyzed: āvāhanam tu prathamaḥ dvitīyaḥ ca āsanam bhavet

original: arghya cānantaraṃ vidyāt pādyaṃ caiva tataḥ param /
analyzed: arghya ca anantaram vidyāt pādyam ca eva tatas param

original: devasyācamanaṃ vidyāt pañcamaṃ tu vicakṣaṇaḥ // Vis_20.224 //
analyzed: devasya ācamanam vidyāt pañcamam tu vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: gandhaṃ cānantaraṃ vidyāt saptamaṃ puṣpameva ca /
analyzed: gandham ca anantaram vidyāt saptamam puṣpam eva ca

original: dhūpaṃ tu cāṣṭamaṃ vidyāt dīpastu navamaḥ smṛtaḥ // Vis_20.225 //
analyzed: dhūpam tu ca aṣṭamam vidyāt dīpaḥ tu navamaḥ smṛtaḥ
daśamaḥ tu nivedyam syāt udvāsanam atas param
mukhya gauṇa krameṇa eva viniyogam tatas śṛṇu
yatra pūjā uttamā tatra kuryāt mukhya upacārakam
madhyama ārādhanam yat tu
arcā kanīyasī yatra tatra evā ekādaśena tu
prayojyam iti śāstrasya niścayaḥ sādhaka uttamaiḥ
sarve sarvatra vā pūjā deśa kāla anurūpataḥ
sādhaka icchā anurūpeṇa kuryāt vā muni puṅgava
yat yat vai sādhaka uttamaḥ
tat tat vai mūrti mantreṇa kuryāt sarva upacārakam
snapane mantra bhedaḥ sti mūrtīnām muni sattama
nitye naimittike vā api viṣṇoḥ nu kamathau api
nārāyaṇa upaniṣadam dvādaśa akṣaram eva ca
nārāyaṇam brāhmaṇam
vai atas devīve
ti vā punar
sahasra śīrṣam devam aṣṭa akṣaram atha api vā

original: sahasraśīrṣā puruṣo mantraṃ vā parameṣṭhinaḥ // Vis_20.233 //
analyzed: sahasra śīrṣā puruṣaḥ mantram vā parameṣṭhinaḥ
eteṣu anyatamam vā api snapanam sādhakaḥ śuciḥ
kurvan sva rāṣṭram uddhṛtya viṣṇu lokam avāpnuyāt
kevalam mūlamantreṇa pūjakaḥ puruṣottama
āvāhana ādibhiḥ sarvaiḥ upacāraiḥ samarcayet
su guṇaḥ vaṃśa saṃpannaḥ roga varjitaḥ
āvāhana ādi karmāṇi sarvāṇi etāni sarvadā
aṣṭa akṣareṇa vā kuryāt mūrtīnām muni sattama
pūjakasya uttama tvāt ca nirdeṣa tvāt mahā mune
kevalam puṣpa mātreṇa deveśaḥ tṛpyate tu

original: sā pūjā saphalaṃ yāti vṛddhikṛt grāmarājyoḥ // Vis_20.238 //
analyzed: sā pūjā saphalam yāti vṛddhi kṛt grāma rājyoḥ

original: evaṃ yaḥ kārayedbhaktyā sa yāti paramāṃ gatim /
analyzed: evam yaḥ kārayet bhaktyā sa yāti paramām gatim

original: yatirvā brahmacārī vā pūjako munisattama // Vis_20.239 //
analyzed: yatiḥ vā brahmacārī vā pūjakaḥ muni sattama
dviguṇam phalam āpnoti na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
evam saṃpūjayet bhaktyā viṣṇum sakalam avyayam

original: iha loke śriyaṃ prāpya paraloke tathaiva ca /
analyzed: iha loke śriyam prāpya para loke tathā eva ca
sarvān kāmān avāpnoti sarva yajña phalam bhavet
viśeṣam atra vakṣyāmi ātma arthasya parasya ca

original: upacārakramaṃ sarvaṃ sādhakānāṃ hitāya tu // Vis_20.242 //
analyzed: upacāra kramam sarvam sādhakānām hitāya tu
arghya ādi mukha vāsantam kramāt devāya kalpayet

original: arghyaṃ pādyaṃ tathācāmaḥ madhuparkaḥ punaśca tat // Vis_20.243 //
analyzed: arghyam pādyam tathā ācāmaḥ madhuparkaḥ punar ca tat

original: tāmbūlaṃ gandhapuṣpaṃ ca akṣato dhūpa eva ca /
analyzed: tāmbūlam gandha puṣpam ca akṣataḥ dhūpaḥ eva ca

original: dīpo hyañjalimudrā tu nivedyaṃ tu mahāmune // Vis_20.244 //
analyzed: dīpaḥ hi añjali mudrā tu nivedyam tu mahā mune
pānīya ācamanīyam ca mukha vāsaḥ tathā eva ca
evam kramaḥ muni śreṣṭha tad krameṇa athavā arcayet
kṣālayet sarva pātrāṇi pūrvavat tantra vittamaḥ

original: tattat pātreṣu taddravyaṃ nikṣipyāpūrya puṣpakam // Vis_20.246 //
analyzed: tat tat pātreṣu tat dravyam nikṣipya āpūrya puṣpakam
arghya toyam sva mantreṇa mukham ālepayat hareḥ
pādyam devasya pāde ca dīyate id adyāt vai
sva sva vidyayā
devasya dakṣiṇe haste hi ācāmam madhuparkakam

original: punarācāmatāmbūlaṃ tathaiva ca punaḥ punaḥ // Vis_20.248 //
analyzed: punar ācāma tāmbūlam tathā eva ca punar punar
m ādāya peṣayet piṣṭha paṅka vat
kevalam candanam vā api gandham ṣaṣ muṣṭi mātrakam
puṣpa prastha catuṣkaiḥ tu mūrtīnām tu pṛthak pṛthak
dāpayet tu prayatnena sādhakaḥ parama artha vid
dhūpam surabhiṇā vyāptam prāpta jvālā ucchrita ujjñitam
bahu rekham anāragnyam daśa mātram
dīpam sapta aṅgula utthānam ghṛta karpūra dīpitam

original: dhūpaṃ tu dāpayedgandhaṃ nāsikāyāṃ tu dakṣiṇe /
analyzed: dhūpam tu dāpayet gandham nāsikāyām tu dakṣiṇe
dadyāt yathākramam sarvam vāsudevāya bhaktitaḥ
kalama ādīni
sarvāṇi śeṣa aṅgam mardayet budhaḥ

original: vāmahastena mantrajñaḥ puṣpaṃ gṛhya samāhitaḥ // Vis_20.254 //
analyzed: vāma hastena mantra jñaḥ puṣpam gṛhya samāhitaḥ
dakṣiṇena kareṇa eva dadyāt devasya pādayoḥ
muṣṭi mātram pradadyāt tu tri vāreṇa raṃ ca
sva vidyayā
madhyamā anāmikā madhye ca aṅguṣṭhena samanvitam

original: akṣataṃ tu tato dadyāt tathaiva ca punaḥ punaḥ // Vis_20.256 //
analyzed: akṣatam tu tatas dadyāt tathā eva ca punar punar
devasya vāma nāsau ca nāsāyām
dhūpam dadyāt samāhitaḥ

original: dakṣiṇe devadṛkpārśve dīpaṃ dadyāttu mantravit // Vis_20.257 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇe deva dṛś pārśve dīpam dadyāt tu mantra vid
tri mātrakam tu mudrāyāḥ darśanam dakṣiṇā dṛśi
kapila ājyena saṃsrāvya hi anna suktena saṃspṛśet
pariṣicya ādi mantreṇa pāṇim dadyāt tu pāṇinā
dadyāt tad dakṣiṇe haste haviḥprāśana mudrayā
pānīya ācamanīyam ca mukha vāsam tathā eva ca
evam ṣoḍaśadhā proktam viśeṣeṇa upacārakam
dadyāt yathākramam sarvam bhakti pūtena cetasā
tatas tu sādhakaḥ samyak praṇamya añjali mudrayā
devasya pādau hastābhyām saṃspṛśet tat samāhitaḥ

original: tatastvatharvavede tu śaunakāyāṃ tu śākhayā // Vis_20.262 //
analyzed: tatas tu atharvavede tu śaunakāyām tu śākhayā
nārāyaṇa upaniṣadam uccārya ca punar punar
tribhiḥ kāṇḍaiḥ samuccārya mantreṇa eva mahā mune
deveśaḥ tṛpyate ca eva na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: rājarāṣṭravivṛddhiḥ syāt grāmādiṣu tathaiva ca // Vis_20.264 //
analyzed: rāja rāṣṭra vivṛddhiḥ syāt grāma ādiṣu tathā eva ca
arcayet na anyathā mohāt ābhicāra karaḥ bhavet

original: sā pūjā niṣphalā caiva rogavṛddhirbhaviṣyati // Vis_20.265 //
analyzed: sā pūjā niṣphalā ca eva roga vṛddhiḥ bhaviṣyati
tasmāt sarva prayatnena tribhiḥ kāṇḍaiḥ samarcayet
agni kāryam tu pūrva uktam kuryāt tantra vicakṣaṇaḥ
samidhaḥ mūlamantreṇa ājyam ājyena mantrataḥ
carum puruṣasūktena pratyekam ṣoḍaśa āhutīḥ
hutvā hutvā agni madhye tu sādhakaḥ mantra vittamaḥ
śeṣa dravyāṇi sarvāṇi pūrva uktena eva kārayet
agni kāryam samāpya evam bali dānam atha ucyate
bali dāna kramaḥ sarvaḥ saṃkṣepāt vakṣyate dhunā
nitye naimittike ca eva sarva saṃpad sukha āvaham

original: svarṇādīnāṃ tu pātrāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kathyate 'dhunā // Vis_20.270 //
analyzed: svarṇa ādīnām tu pātrāṇām lakṣaṇam kathyate dhunā

original: tālaṃ tu karṇikā proktaṃ tatpādārdhatalaṃ tathā /
analyzed: tālam tu karṇikā proktam tad pāda ardha talam tathā

original: pādaṃ tu tadbahiḥ kuryāt tadante valayaṃ bhavet // Vis_20.271 //
analyzed: pādam tu tad bahis kuryāt tad ante valayam bhavet
bali pātram samākhyātam tāmra rājata haimakam
uttama adhama madhyam syāt vibhavasya anurūpataḥ
kārayet bali pātram tu eka dravyeṇa śilpinā
ācāryaḥ laṃkṛtaḥ samyak pātram ādāya maṇḍale
sādhitam prokṣitam paścāt gālitena udakena tu

original: tasminmadhye tu kurvīta sudṛḍhaṃ haviṣāsanam // Vis_20.274 //
analyzed: tasmin madhye tu kurvīta su dṛḍham haviṣā āsanam
karṇikāra parīmāṇam yat tāvat vistāram ucyate
catur aṅgulam utsedham anna pīṭhasya nārada
lakṣaṇam ca atra saṃproktam nitya pūjā utsavasya tu

original: mahotsave na kurvīta cānnapīṭhasya copari // Vis_20.276 //
analyzed: mahā utsave na kurvīta ca anna pīṭhasya ca upari
kārayet śibikā ādyeṣu bali bhramaṇam uttamam
kalpayet sa parīvāram antar āvaraṇa sthitam
tasmin pātra upari nyasya sva nāmnā muni sattama

original: annopari paṭaṃ nyasya puṣpairanyaiḥ prakīrya ca // Vis_20.278 //
analyzed: anna upari paṭam nyasya puṣpaiḥ anyaiḥ prakīrya ca
vastraiḥ ābharaṇaiḥ citraiḥ gandhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ alaṃkṛtam
suvarṇa kusumaiḥ citraiḥ prabhāva asita saṃyutam
vāsikā ādyābhiḥ mālābhiḥ
bhūṣitam su manoramam

original: sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ vāpi tāmraṃ vātīva sundaram // Vis_20.280 //
analyzed: sauvarṇam rājatam vā api tāmram vā atīva sundaram
tasmin tiṣṭhāpayet bimbam sva sva mūrti anusārataḥ

original: alābhe kāñcane vāpi rājataṃ tāmrameva vā // Vis_20.281 //
analyzed: alābhe kāñcane vā api rājatam tāmram eva vā

original: taṇḍulaṃ ca caruṃ puṣpaṃ prātarmadhyāhna eva ca /
analyzed: taṇḍulam ca carum puṣpam prātar madhyāhne eva ca

original: pradoṣe ca baliṃ kuryāt yathāyogakrameṇa tu // Vis_20.282 //
analyzed: pradoṣe ca balim kuryāt yathā yoga krameṇa tu
arghya ādi ca aṣṭamam dadyāt mukha vāsa antam eva vā

original: dīpāntaṃ vā pradātavyaṃ svena mantreṇa deśikaḥ // Vis_20.283 //
analyzed: dīpa antam vā pradātavyam svena mantreṇa deśikaḥ
anya pātre tu mantra jñaḥ ca annam toya samanvitam
gandha puṣpa samāyuktam svastivācana saṃyutam
pīṭhe pīṭhe muni śreṣṭha bali dānam samācaret
śaṅkha ghoṣa samāyuktam dhūpa dīpa samanvitam
vitāna dhvaja saṃyuktam chatra cāmara śobhitam
tūrya vāditra ghoṣaiḥ ca jaya śabda samanvitam
śiṣyam abhyarcya gandha ādyaiḥ garuḍam saṃsmaret svayam
vidyā nāma ādi mantreṇa pātram utthāpayet guruḥ
sthāpayet mūrdhni śiṣyasya bali pātram anuttamam
tad pātre sthāpayet devam gacchamānam ntam ca
prakalpayet
śanais śanais muni śreṣṭha śaṅkha ādyaiḥ geya saṃyutam
bali bhramaṇa kāle tu bimba agre balim ācaret
yaḥ mohāt bimba hīne tu bali karmaṇi ced mune

original: tatsthānaṃ nidhanaṃ yāti tatrasthā narakaṃ vrajet // Vis_20.290 //
analyzed: tad sthānam nidhanam yāti tatrasthā narakam vrajet
tasmāt sarva prayatnena bimba agre balim ācaret
pratimā ācāryayoḥ madhye gamanam varjayet tatas
gamanam yadi ced tatra snapanam pañcagavyakaiḥ
tad ante gandha toyena snāpayet tena mūrtinā
puṇya aha ghoṣa saṃyuktam svasti sūkta ravaiḥ yutam
mantrāṇām ādi mantreṇa mūrti mantreṇa vā mune
samidh ājyena caruṇā pratyeka eka āhutim kramāt

original: hutvā sve sve tu juhuyāt svāhāntena yathākramam // Vis_20.294 //
analyzed: hutvā sve sve tu juhuyāt svāhā antena yathākramam
paścāt pūrṇāhutim hutvā śeṣa karma samācaret
ādyam pradakṣiṇam kṛtvā nṛtta geya samanvitam
dvitīyam ca paribhramya geya tūrya samanvitam
tṛtīyam tu paribhramya tūryaiḥ nānāvidhaiḥ yutam
caṇḍa pracaṇḍa prabhṛti mahā pīṭha antam eva ca
arghya pādya ādinā abhyarcya gandha ādyaiḥ jala saṃyutam
parivārān samabhyarcya yathāpūrvam prakalpitam
bali bhrama antam kṛtvā tu mahā pīṭha pradakṣiṇam
tṛtīyasavane gatvā punar kuryāt pradakṣiṇam

original: śaṅkhaśabdatrayaṃ kuryāt gopure niḥsvanaṃ gatā(?) // Vis_20.299 //
analyzed: śaṅkha śabda trayam kuryāt gopure niḥsvanam gatā
vimāna dvāram āsādya ārghyam vā puṣpam eva vā
da tvā tad mūrti mantreṇa
praveśayet
pīṭhasya dakṣiṇe pārśve bali bimbam prasādayet

original: pādyādi caturo dadyāt karmārcāyāṃ tathaiva ca // Vis_20.301 //
analyzed: pādya ādi caturaḥ dadyāt karma arcāyām tathā eva ca
bali pātra sthitam puṣpam mama agre nikṣipet budhaḥ

original: annapīṭhaṃ satoyaṃ ca mahāpīṭhe vinikṣipet // Vis_20.302 //
analyzed: anna pīṭham sa toyam ca mahā pīṭhe vinikṣipet

original: prakṣālya pādau hastau ca ācamya vidhinā punaḥ /
analyzed: prakṣālya pādau hastau ca ācamya vidhinā punar

original: nyāsaṃ kṛtvā vidhānena mūrtimantreṇa pūrvavat // Vis_20.303 //
analyzed: nyāsam kṛtvā vidhānena mūrtimantreṇa pūrvavat
kakud antam lalāṭa ādi nyaset dehe yathākramam

original: sahasraṃ vā śataṃ vāpi aṣṭāviṃśamathāpi vā // Vis_20.304 //
analyzed: sahasram vā śatam vā api aṣṭāviṃśam atha api vā

original: svena svena tu mantreṇa yathāśakti japet kramāt /
analyzed: svena svena tu mantreṇa yathāśakti japet kramāt

original: namaskāraṃ kramāt kṛtvā tanmūrtistutibhiḥ kramāt // Vis_20.305 //
analyzed: namaskāram kramāt kṛtvā tad mūrti stutibhiḥ kramāt
japet mantrī sva mantreṇa devadevasya saṃnidhau
asmin kāle tu deveśaḥ tṛpyate
na atra saṃśayaḥ
sarvān kāmān avāpnoti grāma rājñoḥ ca vṛddhi kṛt
anyathā devadeveśaḥ kupyate
na atra saṃśayaḥ
tasmāt sarva prayatnena japet mūrti stutim budhaḥ

original: puṣpaṃ datvā namaskṛtya mūlabere nayeddharim // Vis_20.308 //
analyzed: puṣpam da tvā namaskṛtya mūlabere nayet harim
āvāhanam yathāpūrvam tadvat udvāsanam kuru
ālokya dattam iti āhuḥ bali dāna uttamam param
saṃkṣepeṇa mayā proktam vakṣye datta avalokanam
athavā parivārāṇām bali dāna vidhi kramam
pravakṣyāmi muni śreṣṭha guhyāt guhyataram śṛṇu
jhallarīmat dalaiḥ yuktam nānā vādya samanvitam
nitya utsavasya pūrve tu bali dānam samācaret
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam vitāna dhvaja saṃyutam
nṛtta gīta samāyuktam paścāt bimbam paribhramet
madhyamam bali dānam tat caṇḍa ādibhyaḥ hi atandritaḥ
datta avalokya kaṃkanam
nāma rājñaḥ rāṣṭrasya vṛddhi kṛt

original: evaṃ dine dine kuryāt parivārabalikramam // Vis_20.314 //
analyzed: evam dine dine kuryāt parivāra bali kramam
evam saṃkṣepataḥ proktaḥ nitya utsava bali bhramaḥ

original: viśeṣaṃ cātra vakṣyami parārthe balikarmaṇi // Vis_20.315 //
analyzed: viśeṣam ca atra vakṣyami para arthe bali karmaṇi
śṛṇuṣva avahitaḥ bhūtvā guhyāt guhyataram mune
indra ādi lokapālān vā kalyayet krama yogataḥ
eka āvaraṇa mārgam ced parivāra bali kramam
prathama āvaraṇe kuryāt vighneśa ādīn vivarjayet
caṇḍa ādi śarva paryantam saṃsthāpya balim ācaret

original: paścādbaliṃ mahāpīṭhe saṃsthāpya prathamaṃ mune // Vis_20.318 //
analyzed: paścāt balim mahā pīṭhe saṃsthāpya prathamam mune
śaṅkha ādi geya saṃyuktam dvitīyam bhrāmayet harim
nānā vādya samāyuktam tṛtīyam bhrāmayet harim
paścāt devam mahābhāgaḥ nītvā arghya ādyaiḥ samarcayet
śaṅkha ādi geya saṃyuktam dvitīyam bhrāmayet harim
nānā vādya samāyuktam tṛtīyam bhrāmayet harim
paścāt devam mahābhāgaḥ nītvā arghya ādyaiḥ samarcayet

original: pādyodakaṃ gṛhītvā tu bhaktān saṃprokṣya mantravit /
analyzed: pādya udakam gṛhītvā tu bhaktān saṃprokṣya mantra vid
evam bali vidhiḥ eka āvaraṇa pūjane
punar prākāram atra eva kalpitaḥ ced muni īśvara
caṇḍa ādi īśa avasānam tu prathama āvaraṇe nyaset
śeṣāṇi parivārāṇi dvitīye ca tṛtīyake
indra ādi supratiṣṭhā antam punar saṃsthāpya mantra vid
pūrva uktena vidhānena bali dānam samācaret

original: sā pūjā saphalā bhūtvā vardhate śrīrdine dine // Vis_20.325 //
analyzed: sā pūjā saphalā bhūtvā vardhate śrīḥ dine dine

original: rājño rāṣṭrasya vṛddhiḥ syāt ālayasya tathaiva ca /
analyzed: rājñaḥ rāṣṭrasya vṛddhiḥ syāt ālayasya tathā eva ca

original: evaṃ dine dine kuryāt tṛtīyāvaraṇāvṛtam(?) // Vis_20.326 //
analyzed: evam dine dine kuryāt tṛtīya āvaraṇa āvṛtam
evam eva balim kuryāt dvitīya āvaraṇa ālaye
arghya avasānam pūva ukta mārgeṇa prathame nyaset
vidhneśa ādi
muni śreṣṭha prathamam me
balim ācaret

original: prathamāvaraṇe paścāt indrādīnāṃ baliṃ haret // Vis_20.328 //
analyzed: prathama āvaraṇe paścāt indra ādīnām balim haret
tṛtīya āvaraṇe paścāt kumuda ādi balim haret

original: taṃ baliṃ madhyamamidaṃ pūrvā pūrvā garīyasī (?) // Vis_20.329 //
analyzed: tam balim madhyamam idam pūrvā pūrvā garīyasī  /
anyathā phalam āpnoti durbhikṣa anartha dā bhavet

original: tasmāt kuryāt prayatnena baliṃ viṇorvidhānataḥ // Vis_20.330 //
analyzed: tasmāt kuryāt prayatnena balim viṇoḥ vidhānataḥ
vṛkṣa mūle dri mūle vā kuḍye vā atra guhā antare

original: kiṃcidasmin viśeṣo 'sti tatkramaṃ śṛṇu nārada // Vis_20.331 //
analyzed: kiṃcid asmin viśeṣaḥ sti tad kramam śṛṇu nārada
deva agre pūrvavat kalpya maṇḍapam sa paricchadam
tatra upalipya vidhivat hasta mātram samaṃtataḥ
tad madhye śaktim āvāhya pātre pāduka saṃyute

original: arghyādisaptamaṃ datvā pṛthak pādyādibhiḥ kramāt // Vis_20.333 //
analyzed: arghya ādi saptamam da tvā pṛthak pādya ādibhiḥ kramāt
maṇḍapam paritas kalpya parivārān viśeṣataḥ
eka āvaraṇa mārgeṇa maṇḍapam bhrāmayet kramāt
matsya ādīnām tu deva ṛṣe evam eva samācaret
bali dānam muni śreṣṭha śeṣam pūrvavat ācaret
anyathā phalam āpnoti kartā bhartā ca naśyati

original: kevalaṃ balidānaṃ tu pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu kramāt // Vis_20.336 //
analyzed: kevalam bali dānam tu pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu kramāt
homa utsava vihīnam ced sādhakaḥ muni sattama
pañca uttara daśān sarvān caṇḍa ādi dvārapālakān
pūjayet muni śārdūla gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ kramāt
tad dvāre baliḥ iti āhuḥ adhamaḥ paripaṭhyate
uttame pi uttamam kuryāt madhyame madhyamam kuru
adhame pi adhamam kuryāt vibhavasya anurūpataḥ
nitya utsavasya pūrve tu kārayet tu viśeṣataḥ
bali dānam muni śreṣṭha paścāt devam paribhramet
adhama adhamam iti āhuḥ parivāra vihīnataḥ
dattāvalokyakam nāma tat grāmasya eva vṛddhi kṛt
alaṃkārāṇi sarvāṇi ca asmin pūrvavat ācaret
iti uttama ādi saṃproktaḥ bali karma vidhiḥ mayā
evam sa kṣepataḥ proktaḥ nitya utsava vidhiḥ mune
sādhaka icchā anurūpeṇa kārayet ekadhā atra tu
ātma artham vaidikena eva tāntrikeṇa eva vā mune

original: parārthe tāntrikeṇaiva miśritaṃ vā hariṃ param // Vis_20.344 //
analyzed: para arthe tāntrikeṇa eva miśritam vā harim param
arcayet pūrvavat dhīmān rājñaḥ rāṣṭrasya vardhanam

original: parārthe vaidikenaiva na kuryāttu kathaṃcana // Vis_20.345 //
analyzed: para arthe vaidikena eva na kuryāt tu kathaṃcana
tasmāt sarva prayatnena miśritam tāntrikeṇa tu

original: svārtha āvāhanaṃ kuryāt phalakādvā paṭādapi // Vis_20.346 //
analyzed: sva arthe āvāhanam kuryāt phalakāt vā paṭāt api
sūrya maṇḍala madhyāt vā para arthe mūlaberakāt
eka beram tu santyajya udvāsana āvāhanena tu

original: kuryāt svārthe parārthe ca śailabimbe viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: kuryāt sva arthe para arthe ca śaila bimbe viśeṣataḥ
tathā eva bāla gehasya bimbasya muni sattama
āvāhanam visargam tu na smaret śeṣam ācaret

original: aśakto 'nadhikārī vā svārthaṃ yaḥ kārayatyapi // Vis_20.349 //
analyzed: aśaktaḥ na adhikārī vā sva artham yaḥ kārayati api
pareṇa tad kulam sarvam sva kulam tārayiṣyati

original: viṣṇorniveditaṃ sarvaṃ mamāpi priyameva ca // Vis_20.350 //
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ niveditam sarvam mama api priyam eva ca
hastayoḥ aṅgulīnām tu sva aṅguṣṭha anāmikena tu

original: nirmālyaṃ mocayitvā tu prāṇānāyamya mānasaḥ(?) // Vis_20.351 //
analyzed: nirmālyam mocayitvā tu prāṇān āyamya mānasaḥ

original: tena(?) mālyaṃ ca taddravyaṃ mama prītikaraṃ śubham /
analyzed: tena mālyam ca tat dravyam mama prīti karam śubham

original: tanmālyaṃ caiva taddravyaṃ bhaktānāṃ caiva dāpayet // Vis_20.352 //
analyzed: tat mālyam ca eva tat dravyam bhaktānām ca eva dāpayet
mad pūjā tad vimāne tu vinā ced muni sattama

original: sā pūjā niṣphalā bhūyāt grāmasyānarthakṛdbhavet // Vis_20.353 //
analyzed: sā pūjā niṣphalā bhūyāt grāmasya anartha kṛt bhavet
kāka śvāna ādi
jantūnām pāṣaṇḍīnām tathā eva ca
veda vikrayakānām ca veda nindakam eva ca
śūdra anna tatparāṇām ca nāstikānām viśeṣataḥ
evamādīni jātīnām
bhakṣaṇa artham na dāpayet
avicāreṇa vā mohāt da tvā rauravam āpnuyāt

original: na laṅghayīta nirmālyaṃ mamāpi puruṣottama // Vis_20.356 //
analyzed: na laṅghayīta nirmālyam mama api puruṣottama
yaḥ ced tu laṅghayet te
mohāt mahān doṣaḥ bhaviṣyati
mahāraurava māyā agnau nimagnaḥ tatra doṣa bhāj
dvijāti ādi tri varṇa antam vaiṣṇavānām viśeṣataḥ
tretāgnīnām vrata sthānam yatīnām śānta cetasām
dīkṣitānām tapasvīnām vandhyā ādiṣu tathā eva ca
evamādīni bhaktānām
dāpayet deva saṃnidhau
tasmāt sarva prayatnena varjitānām na dāpayet
evam yaḥ kārayet bhaktyā viṣṇu pūjām anuttamām
mokṣa dam mokṣam icchūnām dhana dam dhana kāminām
anna dam ca annam icchūnām sarva kāma pradam śubham
iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām pūjābhedakathanam nāma viṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
ekaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
ekaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ nāradaḥ

original: bhagavannanayārcanayā sadṛśaṃ paramāptikaraṃ na hi puṃsa iti /
analyzed: bhagavan anayā arcanayā sadṛśam parama āpti karam na hi puṃsaḥ iti
ati cāpala gadgadā api dayā api
girā stutiḥ asti kim abhiyat sva parām
viṣvaksenaḥ

original: śṛṇu nārada mūrtinutiṃ paramāṃ parameṇa mamābhihitāṃ guruṇā /
analyzed: śṛṇu nārada mūrti nutim paramām parameṇa mama abhihitām guruṇā
tava bhaktimataḥ kathayiṣyāmi yāmi adhunā
iha tu iha

original: tṛpyati ko hi śubheṣu naraḥ // Vis_21.2 //
analyzed: tṛpyati kaḥ hi śubheṣu naraḥ
vinatā suta vāhanam ādarataḥ tridaśam kanaka aṅgadam aṣṭa bhujam

original: dhavalādrinibhaṃ dvipadaṃ sumukhaṃ paramātmaguruṃ praṇato 'smi sadā // Vis_21.3 //
analyzed: dhavala adri nibham dvipadam sumukham paramātma gurum praṇataḥ smi sadā
jalaja ari gadā ambuja hasta dharam sakala ābharaṇam tuhinādri muṣam
caturānana sevita pāda yugam para nāma dharam praṇataḥ smi sadā
taruṇa arka nibham
padam sukumāra dṛśam musala praharam

original: aruṇāmbaramapratimaṃ halinaṃ śaśivaktrasamaṃ praṇato 'smi sadā // Vis_21.5 //
analyzed: aruṇa ambaram apratimam halinam śaśi vaktra samam praṇataḥ smi sadā
catur aṅga su pīvara dīrgha bhujam hari varṇa kṛtāñjalinā upakṛtam

original: garuḍena ca dakṣiṇato 'mbuja- yottarataḥ praharaṃ praṇato 'smi sadā (?) // Vis_21.6 //
analyzed: garuḍena ca dakṣiṇatas mbuja yā uttaratas praharam praṇataḥ smi sadā
atra kaścid viśeṣaḥ sti mūrtīnām arcanā vidhau
matsya ādi daśa mūrtīnām iha loke phalam labhet

original: tatphalaṃ te pravakṣyāmi adhunā śṛṇu nārada /
analyzed: tad phalam te pravakṣyāmi adhunā śṛṇu nārada
āyuḥ ārogya daṃkam
ca eva sāyujyam labhate dhruvam
ukta krameṇa
yaḥ matsyam bhakti pūrvam samarcayet

original: sarvān kāmānavāpnoti viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // Vis_21.9 //
analyzed: sarvān kāmān avāpnoti viṣṇu lokam sa gacchati
kūrmam bhaktyā samārādhya naraḥ nirdhūta kalmaṣaḥ
sarvān kāmān anuprāpya viṣṇu sāyujyam āpnuyāt
bhaktyā varāham abhyarcya krameṇa anena buddhimān

original: pāparogavinirmuktaḥ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // Vis_21.11 //
analyzed: pāpa roga vinirmuktaḥ sa yāti paramām gatim
nārasiṃham samārādhya bhaktyā paramayā yutaḥ
samasta kāma saṃsiddhaḥ jaya lakṣmīm samṛcchati
bhaktyā arcya vāmanam jñānī viṣṇu sālokyam aśnute
bhārgavam rāmam ārādhya viṣṇu sārūpyam āpnuyāt

original: arcya dāśarathiṃ rāmamāyuḥ kīrtiṃ sukhaṃ yaśaḥ /
analyzed: arcya dāśarathim rāmam āyuḥ kīrtim sukham yaśaḥ
avāpya kāmam akhilam viṣṇu loke mahīyate
balarāmam samārādhya bala ārogya dhanam labhet
kṛṣṇam abhyarcya sakalam iṣṭam iṣṭa phalam labhet
jñānamūrtim ca kalkim tu
lakṣmī āyuḥ kīrtim eva ca
avāpya viṣṇu sālokyam modate viṣṇu pārṣadaiḥ
daśamūrti arcanam puṇyam guhyāt guhyataram mune

original: sādhakānāṃ hitārthāya tava bhaktasya dhīmataḥ // Vis_21.17 //
analyzed: sādhakānām hita arthāya tava bhaktasya dhīmataḥ
phala śrutiḥ mayā proktā matsya ādīnām viśeṣataḥ

original: tantrāṇāṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ viniyogamataḥ śṛṇu // Vis_21.18 //
analyzed: tantrāṇām paramam guhyam viniyogam atas śṛṇu
uktam ca nā upadeṣṭavyam abhaktāya kadācana

original: na mānine ḍaṃbhine ca nāstikāya śaṭhāya ca // Vis_21.19 //
analyzed: na mānine ḍaṃbhine ca nāstikāya śaṭhāya ca

original: na cāśuśrūṣave dadyāt śucaye ca kṛpālave /
analyzed: na ca a śuśrūṣave dadyāt śucaye ca kṛpālave
devatā guru bhaktāya na hi ced guru doṣa bhāj

original: jānakīṃ rukmiṇīṃ lakṣmyā puṣṭyā bhāmāṃ tu vidyayā /
analyzed: jānakīm rukmiṇīm lakṣmyā puṣṭyā bhāmām tu vidyayā

original: lakṣmaṇaṃ bharataṃ vāpi śatrughnaṃ ca mahāmune // Vis_21.21 //
analyzed: lakṣmaṇam bharatam vā api śatrughnam ca mahā mune
praṇava ādi sva nāmnā eva caturthī antam namaḥ yujā
arcayeta muni chandaḥ daivam rāghava mantra vid
sarveṣām parivārāṇām mantram evam prayojayet

original: ābhirhemaḥ prayoktavyaḥ svāhāntaṃ sakalaṃ mune // Vis_21.23 //
analyzed: ābhiḥ hemaḥ prayoktavyaḥ svāhā antam sakalam mune
abhyantara upacāreṇa ṣu
āgaccha antam mukhīkṛtau

original: kṣamasvāntaṃ visarge tu namo 'ntaṃ cānmakarmaṇi // Vis_21.24 //
analyzed: kṣamasva antam visarge tu namaḥ ntam ca anma karmaṇi
iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām matsyādyarcanaphalakathanam nāma ekaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
dvāviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
viṣvaksenaḥ
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi snapanasya vidhim param

original: prāsādāgre muniśreṣṭha maṇḍapaṃ kārayet kramāt // Vis_22.1 //
analyzed: prāsāda agre muni śreṣṭha maṇḍapam kārayet kramāt
triṃśat hasta āyatam brahman tad ardham vistṛtam bhavet

original: evaṃ jñātvā muniśreṣṭha maṇḍapaṃ tu śubhaṃ param // Vis_22.2 //
analyzed: evam jñātvā muni śreṣṭha maṇḍapam tu śubham param
śilpa śāstra anusāreṇa śeṣam asmin samācaret
yathā saṃbhavataḥ vā api ca agre maṇḍapam ācaret

original: maṇḍapaṃ tu tridhā kṛtvā tanmadhye kalaśān nyaset /
analyzed: maṇḍapam tu tridhā kṛtvā tad madhye kalaśān nyaset

original: paścimasyāṃ tṛtīye tu bhāge tu snānavedikām // Vis_22.4 //
analyzed: paścimasyām tṛtīye tu bhāge tu snāna vedikām
kārayet śāstra dṛṣṭena dṛṣṭyā tu
tad kramam ca adhunā śṛṇu

original: dvihastamekahastaṃ vā saṃjñātvā mānamatra tu // Vis_22.5 //
analyzed: dvi hastam eka hastam vā saṃjñātvā mānam atra tu
kārayet vedikām pūrvam vistāra āyāma tādṛśam

original: hastoddhṛtaṃ tadardhaṃ vā vedikālakṣaṇaṃ mune // Vis_22.6 //
analyzed: hasta uddhṛtam tad ardham vā vedikā lakṣaṇam mune
catur aṅgulam utsedham ghanam tādṛśam ucyate

original: vedikāyāṃ tadūrdhve tu mekhalāṃ parito nyaset // Vis_22.7 //
analyzed: vedikāyām tad ūrdhve tu mekhalām paritas nyaset
karṇikā sahitam madhye ca aṣṭa patrakam uttamam
kārayet uttare tasya snānakulyam yathākramam
tāla mānena kartavyam snānakulyam sa mekhalam

original: pūrvavanmekhalāṃ kuryāt madhye dhārāṃ samācaret // Vis_22.9 //
analyzed: pūrvavat mekhalām kuryāt madhye dhārām samācaret

original: uttare vedikāyāṃ tu snānaśvabhraṃ tu kāreyat /
analyzed: uttare vedikāyām tu snāna śvabhram tu
śilābhiḥ iṣṭakābhiḥ vā mṛdā vā vedim ācaret

original: evaṃ saṃkṣepataḥ proktaṃ viśeṣaṃ kathayāmi te /
analyzed: evam saṃkṣepataḥ proktam viśeṣam kathayāmi te
nitye naimittike ca eva sarva saṃpad sukha āvaham

original: sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ vāpi tāmraṃ vā rītikāṃ tathā /
analyzed: sauvarṇam rājatam vā api tāmram vā rītikām tathā
miśra loha mayam vā api saṃgṛhya astreṇa nārada
kārayet vedikām tatra catur gātra samanvitām
kārayet śilpibhiḥ samyak ācārya anujñayā mune
vidhānena kāṣṭhaiḥ vā vedim ācaret

original: evaṃ saṃkṣepataḥ proktaṃ sūtrapātavidhiṃ śṛṇu // Vis_22.14 //
analyzed: evam saṃkṣepataḥ proktam sūtra pāta vidhim śṛṇu
prāc pratyak brahmasūtram tu kārayet prathamam mune
madhya bhāgam samāśritya tat sūtram brahma vṛddhi dam
kṣatriyasya jaya artha tat vaiśyasya sukha vṛddhi dam
śūdraḥ sat gatim āpnoti tasmāt tat sūtram ācaret
prāc agrān udak agrān bhāskara sūtrān suśāli piṣṭa aktān
tamisrāṣaḥ
pārśva sthāḥ sarvatas tyaktvā
vīthi artham pramṛjya paṅktyā api pārśvayoḥ
sūtram vyūhānām tava nava padaka aṅgula āyāmān
kṛtvā vibhajet paścāt praṇavena abhyukṣya pada śuddhyai
pratyekam prasthena āpūrya kalaśāni śālīnām
prasthāpya kūrca yuktāni atha sarva dravyāṇi sa apidhānam
śuddhāni āḍhaka pūrṇa apūrṇāni atha gandha ādi arcya divasa antam
pratiyūpam nava vastraiḥ āveṣṭya punar tu pādya ādi yava udakam
rāmam kuryāt snapanam śāstra artha tattva jñaḥ
etad lakṣaṇa hīnān devān mānuṣāt vā api virodhāt
tad sthānasya anupapatyā sūtra pāte pi akauśalyāt

original: nāradaḥ--- pratyāsanne snapane kiṃ kartavyaṃ tribhirharerbhaktaiḥ /
analyzed: nāradaḥ pratyāsanne snapane kim kartavyam tribhiḥ hareḥ bhaktaiḥ

original: snapanaṃ praśnamimaṃ lokahitārtha bravītu bhagavān // Vis_22.23 //
analyzed: snapanam praśnam imam loka hita artha bravītu bhagavān

original: viṣvaksenaḥ--- vakṣyāmyuttaramasya śṛṇu bhaktānāṃ hitāya tava sādho /
analyzed: viṣvaksenaḥ vakṣyāmi uttaram asya śṛṇu bhaktānām hitāya tava sādho
tad sthāne vrīhiḥ na asti yatra tatra api

original: praṇavaṃ japan prasannastadupari saṃsthāpya kalaśāni // Vis_22.25 //
analyzed: praṇavam japan prasannaḥ tad upari saṃsthāpya kalaśāni
aṣṭa akṣareṇa kuryāt snapanam sarva artha sādhakaḥ bhavati

original: ityuktaṃ mama guruṇā snapanamidaṃ sāratastavoddiṣṭam // Vis_22.26 //
analyzed: iti uktam mama guruṇā snapanam idam sārataḥ tava uddiṣṭam
dravyāṇām parimāṇam dravya ākhyānām āḍhakam kathitam

original: tadalābher'dhaṃ vāpi ni tridaśamune trīṇi raṇānām // Vis_22.27 //
analyzed: vā api tridaśa mune trīṇi raṇānām
idhmānām śuṣkānām etat triguṇam tathā atrāṇām
su snigdham tanu sūtra pañca ratnī āyatam navam vastram
snapana ante pūrva uktam paṅkajam ālikhya tatra haribījam
kūrcasya upari kuryāt rajanī cūrṇam āḍhaka pūrṇam
saṃprokṣya vā api

original: praṇavaṃ japan mathitvā kūrcenādhomukhaṃ tadevātra // Vis_22.30 //
analyzed: praṇavam japan mathitvā kūrcena adhomukham tat eva atra
prakṣipya sa apidhānam pūjya yathāpūrvam abhiṣekam
kṛtvā ardha snapanam vāluka vṛkṣa āmraka śukla udaiḥ
ācchādya aṃśuka mukhyaiḥ arghya ādi abhyarcya dīpa antam

original: nivedya havirmahatā tridaśamune sādhakaḥ siddhaḥ (?) // Vis_22.32 //
analyzed: nivedya haviḥ mahatā tridaśa mune sādhakaḥ siddhaḥ

original: dravyāṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca lakṣaṇaṃ kathayāmi te /
analyzed: dravyāṇām devatānām ca lakṣaṇam kathayāmi te
saṃkṣepeṇa muni śreṣṭha snapane smin yathākramam
āḍhakena tu saṃpūrṇam kapila ājyam anuttamam
saṃgṛhya muni śārdūla deveśam abhiṣecayet
śuddha toyam tu saṃgṛhya kṣīravṛkṣa udbhava indhanaiḥ
siddham devagṛhe samyak uṣṇa udakam anuttamam

original: vajraṃ ca mauktikaṃ caiva maṇivaiḍūryameva ca /
analyzed: vajram ca mauktikam ca eva maṇi vaiḍūryam eva ca

original: pravālaṃ sphaṭikaṃ caiva kadalīphalameva ca // Vis_22.36 //
analyzed: pravālam sphaṭikam ca eva kadalī phalam eva ca
bilvam āmalakam ca eva kadalī phalam eva ca

original: nārikelaṃ ca havyaṃ ca tathā vai bījapūrakam // Vis_22.37 //
analyzed: nārikelam ca havyam ca tathā vai bījapūrakam
panasa āmram tathā aṣṭāṅgam phala ambhaḥ parikīrtitam

original: suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ tāmraṃ rītimāyasameva ca // Vis_22.38 //
analyzed: suvarṇam rajatam tāmram rītim āyasam eva ca
trapukam loha toyasya ca aṅgāni paripaṭhyate

original: rajanī sahadevī ca śirīṣaṃ sūryavartanī // Vis_22.39 //
analyzed: rajanī sahadevī ca śirīṣam sūryavartanī
kuśa agrāṇi sadadrābha sadā bhadram
mārjana dravyam ucyate

original: kuṅkumaṃ cāgaruṃ caiva candanośīrameva ca // Vis_22.40 //
analyzed: kuṅkumam ca agarum ca eva candana uśīram eva ca
hariberam hrīberam ca
muram ca eva koṣṭham paṭhyate
gandha dravyam iti proktam akṣata udakam ucyate
kṣālitam śuddha toyena pañca mantraiḥ kramāt mune
prasthasya ardha akṣatam ca eva kalaśe nikṣipet budhaḥ
pañcaviṃśatibhiḥ vā api tasya ardham vā ardham eva vā

original: yavaṃ gṛhya muniśreṣṭha toyamadhye vinikṣipet // Vis_22.43 //
analyzed: yavam gṛhya muni śreṣṭha toya madhye vinikṣipet

original: śyāmākaṃ viṣṇuparṇī ca dūrvā cāmbujameva ca /
analyzed: śyāmākam viṣṇuparṇī ca dūrvā ca ambujam eva ca
pādya dravyam iti proktam samāsena mahāmate
ghṛtavat dadhi saṃgṛhya mantreṇa ādyena mantra vid
pūrayet kalaśe madhye ca arghya dravyam iha ucyate

original: evaṃ gandhaṃ phalaṃ puṣpaṃ siddhārthākṣatameva ca /
analyzed: evam gandham phalam puṣpam siddhārtha akṣatam eva ca

original: kuśāgrāṇi tilaṃ caiva aṣṭāṅgaṃ cārghyamucyate // Vis_22.46 //
analyzed: kuśa agrāṇi tilam ca eva aṣṭa aṅgam ca arghyam ucyate
kṣīram ājyena saṃyuktam madhyame kalaśe nyaset

original: akṣataṃ jātikakkolaṃ lavaṅgaṃ tilameva ca // Vis_22.47 //
analyzed: akṣatam jāti kakkolam lavaṅgam tilam eva ca
dravyāṇi ācamanīya arthapātra toye vinikṣipet

original: vṛkṣodbhavaṃ navaṃ gṛhya madhu cāḍhakameva ca // Vis_22.48 //
analyzed: vṛkṣa udbhavam navam gṛhya madhu ca āḍhakam eva ca

original: tasyālābhe tu sarpiḥ syāt itthaṃ lakṣaṇamucyate /
analyzed: tasya alābhe tu sarpiḥ syāt ittham lakṣaṇam ucyate

original: prasthapādaṃ ghṛtaṃ caiva dadhi taddviguṇaṃ bhavet // Vis_22.49 //
analyzed: prastha pādam ghṛtam ca eva dadhi tad dviguṇam bhavet
triguṇam kṣīra saṃyuktam gomayam tu caturguṇam

original: ṣaḍguṇaṃ caiva gomūtraṃ pañcagavyasya lakṣaṇam // Vis_22.50 //
analyzed: ṣaḍguṇam ca eva go mūtram pañcagavyasya lakṣaṇam
palāśa khadira aśvattha bilvam audumbaram tathā
vaikaṅkata śamī jālām jambū
kaṣāya aṅgam iti smṛtam
kapila ājyasya abhāve tu ca anyat go ghṛtam ucyate
uṣṇa udakasya abhāve tu puṣpa toyam praśasyate
ratnānām api alābhe tu muktam ekam
praśasyate
phalānām api alābhe tu kadalī phalam uttamam
lohānām api alābhe tu suvarṇam śasyate param

original: mārjane sahadevī ca śeṣālābhe praśasyate // Vis_22.54 //
analyzed: mārjane sahadevī ca śeṣa alābhe praśasyate
gandha dravye tathā uśīram śeṣa alābhe praśasyate
abhāve ca akṣatasya eva yathāsaṃbhavam ācaret
yava abhāve tu śālī
syāt veṇu bījam atha api vā

original: dravyāṇāmapyalābhe tu pādye dūrvā praśasyate // Vis_22.56 //
analyzed: dravyāṇām api alābhe tu pādye dūrvā praśasyate
eteṣām api alābhe tu arghye siddhārthakam param
śeṣa alābhe tu kakkolam śastam ācamanīyake
abhāve pañcagavyasya gomaya ādyam praśasyate
dadhi gomaya dugdha ājyam yathālābham praśasyate

original: aśvatthaṃ ca praśastaṃ syāt śeṣālābhe kaṣāyake /
analyzed: aśvattham ca praśastam syāt śeṣa alābhe kaṣāyake
dravyāṇām api alābhe tu puṣpaiḥ eva prakalpayet
nava vastrāṇi sarvāṇi sarva dravya samam bhavet

original: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena vastrābhāve tu neṣyate // Vis_22.60 //
analyzed: tasmāt sarva prayatnena vastra abhāve tu na iṣyate
dravyāṇām lakṣaṇam proktam ghṛta ādi muni sattama
yāvat vastra avasānam hi tāvat dravyāṇi
śeṣāḥ tu kalaśāḥ sarve śuddha udaka samanvitāḥ

original: atra saptadaśa proktāḥ pradhānakalaśāstu ye // Vis_22.62 //
analyzed: atra saptadaśa proktāḥ pradhāna kalaśāḥ tu ye
tān sarvān viṣṇugāyatryā sthāpayet ca pṛthak pṛthak
śeṣān anyān catuṣṣaṣṭi dvādakṣa akṣara vidyayā
sthāpayet kalaśān sarvān prāc mukhaḥ vā api udak mukhaḥ
nava vastrāṇi sarvāṇi mūrtimantram anusmaran

original: kalaśānāṃ tadūrdhve tu prāgagreṇa tu sādhakaḥ /
analyzed: kalaśānām tad ūrdhve tu prāc agreṇa tu sādhakaḥ
toraṇān kalaśān sarvān gandha puṣpa ādinā arcayet
carma roga ādi rahitam kṛmi kīṭa vivarjitam
rajaḥ svena guhāḥśukyā ulūkhale kṣipya sādhakaḥ
punar punar muni śreṣṭha dvādaśa akṣara vidyayā
gaṇikā ādīn alaṃkṛtya maṅgala ālāpanaiḥ yutam
śaṅkha bherī ādi saṃyuktam ghātayet vaiṣṇavaiḥ saha

original: musalaṃ saṃgrahettatra ghātayecca punaḥ punaḥ // Vis_22.68 //
analyzed: musalam saṃgrahet tatra ghātayet ca punar punar

original: tataḥ parāgaṃ saṃgṛhya pūrayet kalaśaṃ kramāt /
analyzed: tatas parāgam saṃgṛhya pūrayet kalaśam kramāt
kalaśa ante muni śreṣṭha deveśam abhiṣecayet
evam dravyāṇi dravyam tu
saṃproktam uddhāraṇam atho mune

original: pādyaṃ tu prathamaṃ dadyāt dvitīyaṃ cārghyamucyate // Vis_22.70 //
analyzed: pādyam tu prathamam dadyāt dvitīyam ca arghyam ucyate
tṛtīyam ācamanīyam pañcagavyam caturthakam

original: ghṛtaṃ tu pañcamaṃ vidyāt dadhi ṣaṣṭhaṃ tathaiva ca // Vis_22.71 //
analyzed: ghṛtam tu pañcamam vidyāt dadhi ṣaṣṭham tathā eva ca

original: saptamaṃ tu tataḥ kṣīraṃ madhu caiva tathāṣṭamam /
analyzed: saptamam tu tatas kṣīram madhu ca eva tathā aṣṭamam

original: kaṣāyaṃ navamaṃ caiva uṣṇāmbho daśamaṃ smṛtam // Vis_22.72 //
analyzed: kaṣāyam navamam ca eva uṣṇāmbhaḥ daśamam smṛtam
ekādaśyā aṃśam
phala ambhaḥ tu dvādaśī āśam
mārjana udakam

original: trayodaśaṃ ca sāṃbhojaṃ ratnatoyaṃ caturdaśam // Vis_22.73 //
analyzed: trayodaśam ca sāṃbhojam ratna toyam caturdaśam

original: lohaṃ pañcadaśaṃ jñeyaṃ ṣoḍaśaṃ gandhavāri ca /
analyzed: loham pañcadaśam jñeyam ṣoḍaśam gandhavāri ca
yava udakam saptadaśam evam ca uddhāraṇa kramaḥ

original: sve sve ca navake cāṣṭau saha tena samuddharet /
analyzed: sve sve ca navake ca aṣṭau saha tena samuddharet
madhyamān kalaśān sarvān viṣṇugāyatriyā uddharet
śeṣam aṣṭa akṣareṇa eva vāsaḥ tena eva mocayet
tatas puruṣasūktena dadyāt vā muni sattama
devadevam anusmṛtya dadyāt pādya ādikān kramāt
pādya ādi navakān snāpya upasnānam tu kārayet

original: vastraṃ datvā tu pādyādīn gandhādīnapi dāpayet // Vis_22.78 //
analyzed: vastram da tvā tu pādya ādīn gandha ādīn api dāpayet
navakānām tathā ante tu kuryāt evam vicakṣaṇaḥ
madhyame navake pi evam kalaśān
evam ca uddhāraṇam proktam kathayāmi adhidaivatam
ghṛtasya daivatam viṣṇuḥ uṣṇa ambhasya
divākaraḥ
ratnānām devatam brahmā kuberaḥ ca phala ambhasaḥ
loha udakasya vasavaḥ viśvedevāḥ ca mārjanamne
gandharvāḥ gandhatoyasya nirṛtiḥ ca akṣatasya tu
āpyāḥ yava udakasya api pādyasya pitaraḥ tathā
kṣīra arghyasya bhavet devaḥ sarasvatī ācamanīyake

original: pañcagavyasya dakṣastu dadhnaḥ śakrastu daivatam // Vis_22.83 //
analyzed: pañcagavyasya dakṣaḥ tu dadhnaḥ śakraḥ tu daivatam
payasaḥ daivatam somaḥ mahendraḥ madhunaḥ tathā
kaṣāyasya yamaḥ devaḥ varāhaḥ tu gulāmbhasaḥ
tathā ca ikṣu rasasya api nārasiṃhaḥ tu daivatam
mūrtayaḥ vāsudeva ādyāḥ catasraḥ maṅgala ambhasaḥ

original: ṭa śuddhodakānāṃ sarveṣāṃ devyaḥ śāntyādayaḥ kramāt // Vis_22.86 //
analyzed: śuddha udakānām sarveṣām devyaḥ śānti ādayaḥ kramāt
kalaśānām tu sarveṣām aśvinau daivatam param

original: cakrikāṇāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ daivataṃ saptamātaraḥ // Vis_22.87 //
analyzed: cakrikāṇām tu sarveṣām daivatam sapta mātaraḥ
viṣṇuḥ sarveṣām viṣṇuḥ eva vā
mūlamantreṇa vā sarvam kuryāt mantra vicakṣaṇaḥ
adhama uttamam etat tu snapanam parikīrtitam

original: koṇe tu kalaśā ye tu dvātriṃśacchuddhavārayaḥ // Vis_22.89 //
analyzed: koṇe tu kalaśāḥ ye tu dvātriṃśat śuddha vārayaḥ
taiḥ vihīnam tu yat snānam tat syāt adhama madhyamam
yat śuddha vāri kalaśaiḥ hīnam sarvaiḥ yathādiśam
kevalam saptadaśabhiḥ kṛtam tat adhama adhamam

original: snapanādau tu kartavyaṃ kramāt kautukabandhanam // Vis_22.91 //
analyzed: snapana ādau tu kartavyam kramāt kautuka bandhanam
ūrṇā sūtra yutam sūtram sādhitam taṇḍula upari

original: sauvarṇaṃ rajanīcūrṇamāḍhakaṃ vādhikaṃ tu vā // Vis_22.92 //
analyzed: sauvarṇam rajanī cūrṇam āḍhakam vā adhikam tu vā
āḍhaka ardham tad ardham vā cūrṇam kṛtya
yathāvidhi
snapanānām kramāt ante deva mūrdhni nidhāpayet
śuddha snānam tatas kṛtvā alaṃkṛtya arcayet harim

original: punarācamanaṃ datvā darpaṇaṃ darśayet kramāt // Vis_22.94 //
analyzed: punar ācamanam da tvā darpaṇam darśayet kramāt
nṛtta gīta samāyuktam veda adhyayana saṃyutam
chatra cāmara saṃyuktam dhūpa dīpa samanvitam
devasya śirasi bhrāmya ca aṣṭa piṇḍāni dīpa yuj
indra ādi īśāna paryantam nikṣipet piṇḍam astrataḥ
mahāpīṭhe nayet devam yathāyogyam pravṛddhi kṛt
mahāhaviḥ navedyā atha pūrvavat deśika uttamaḥ

original: pūrve vā cottare vāpi nityāgnau vā tu homayet /
analyzed: pūrve vā ca uttare vā api nitya agnau vā tu homayet
samidh ājya carūṇām tu yathā kalaśa saṃkhyayā
ācāryam pūjayet paścāt nava vastra aṅgulīyakaiḥ
atra upayoga yukta
dravyāṇi ācāryāya pradāpayet
yavaiḥ ca veṇu bījaiḥ ca nīvāraiḥ gaurasarṣapaiḥ
nīlaiḥ ca tulasī patraiḥ bhavet dhātrī udakam kramāt
eteṣām api alābhe tu tulasī patram uttamam
indravalī aṅkuram ca eva aśvattha aṅkuram eva ca
eka patra ndmam
ca padmam ca bhavet vai maṅgala udakam
eteṣām api alābhe tu ca aśvattha aṅkuram uttamam
tad alābhe muni śreṣṭha indravalī aṅkuraḥ bhavet

original: ekapadmaṃ ca padmaṃ ca yathāsaṃbhavamācaret // Vis_22.103 //
analyzed: eka padmam ca padmam ca yathāsaṃbhavam ācaret
evam saṃkṣepataḥ proktam snapanam sarva siddhi dam
nāradaḥ
bhagavan viṣṇu bhūteśa viṣṇu pāriṣada īśvara
snapanam śrotum icchāmi kumbha uttara sahasrakam

original: bahuśaḥ snapanaṃ pūrvaṃ śrutaṃ viṣṇumukhāt prabho // Vis_22.105 //
analyzed: bahuśas snapanam pūrvam śrutam viṣṇu mukhāt prabho

original: tvayā ca kathitaṃ yadvai imameva vidhiṃ prati /
analyzed: tvayā ca kathitam yat vai imam eva vidhim prati
tasmāt yathā mahā bāho prītiḥ yadi asti ced mayi
viṣvaksenaḥ
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi kuṃbha uttara sahasrakam

original: prāsādāgre tu kartavyaṃ maṇḍapaṃ ca yathāvidhi // Vis_22.107 //
analyzed: prāsāda agre tu kartavyam maṇḍapam ca yathāvidhi
dvātriṃśat hastam āyāmam viṃśat hastam tu vistaram
catvāriṃśat ca paṅktonā
maṣṭa tālam pṛthak pṛthak
tad bhāge kalaśa sthāne pañcaviṃśati paṅktike

original: tasya madhyamabhāge tu dvādaśaṃ tālasaṃmitam // Vis_22.109 //
analyzed: tasya madhyama bhāge tu dvādaśam tāla saṃmitam
catur staṃbha samāyuktam utsedham tāvat eva tu
paritas sapta tālāni dvādaśa stambha saṃyutam
tad bahis sapta tālāni viṃśati stambha saṃyutam
paścime snāna bhāge tu tad pañcādaśa bhāgike
tasya madhyama bhāge tu dvādaśam tālam iṣyate
staṃbha aṣṭa daśa saṃyuktam snāna vedim yathāvidhi
śeṣāṇām api paṅktīnām sapta tālena mīyate
sarveṣām api tālānām catuṣṣaṣṭiḥ yathākramam
catvāriṃśat su vistāram tālānām parimīyate
catur uttara pañcāśat staṃbhānām parikīrtitam

original: bhūmibhāga iti proktaḥ śeṣāṇāṃ kathayāmi te /
analyzed: bhūmi bhāgaḥ iti proktaḥ śeṣāṇām kathayāmi te
catur tālena vistīrṇam tad ardha āyāma saṃyutam
tad ardham upa pīṭham tu upariṣṭāt upānaham
jagatī kumudam ca eva paṭṭikā upari śobhitam

original: samaṃ snigdhaṃ prakurvīta pīṭhaṃ tatra vicakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: samam snigdham prakurvīta pīṭham tatra vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: uttare vedikāyāstu snānaśvabhramaṃ tu kārayet // Vis_22.117 //
analyzed: uttare vedikāyāḥ tu snāna śva bhramam tu kārayet

original: dhārākulyā ca kartavyā śvabhraṃ vā vedikopari /
analyzed: dhārā kulyā ca kartavyā śvabhram vā vedikā upari
mūla madhya agra paryantam nahanam tu pramāṇataḥ
pīṭhikā valayam kuryāt pāda pīṭhasya ca upari

original: tat pātraṃ tu tataḥ kuryāt vṛttaṃ vā caturaśrakam // Vis_22.119 //
analyzed: tat pātram tu tatas kuryāt vṛttam vā caturaśrakam
catur aṅgulam utsedham tāvat vistāra saṃyutam
kulyā tad anuyuktā syāt udaka śvabhra gocaram
pīṭhikā lakṣaṇam proktam śeṣān vakṣyāmi aśeṣatas
catur dvāra samāyuktam catur toraṇa bhūṣitam
cāmaraiḥ tālavṛntaiḥ ca ghaṇṭāḥ nānā patāka yuj
lambayet mukta
dāmāni dvāra deśeṣu mantra vid

original: alaṃkṛtya tataḥ paścāt puṇyāhaṃ tatra kārayet /
analyzed: alaṃkṛtya tatas paścāt puṇyāham tatra kārayet

original: mārjanaṃ vidhinā samyak maṇḍapālepanaṃ tataḥ // Vis_22.123 //
analyzed: mārjanam vidhinā samyak maṇḍapa ālepanam tatas
prokṣayet pañcagavyena sādhakaḥ mantra vittamaḥ
paścāt tu pūjayet sarva dvāreṣu dvārapālakān
kumbhān tu pūjayet dvau dvau dvāra deśa vidhānataḥ

original: tatastu toraṇān pūjya ketūṃścāpi tathaiva ca // Vis_22.125 //
analyzed: tatas tu toraṇān pūjya ketūn ca api tathā eva ca
sva nāmnā pūjayitvā tu gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ kramāt
veṣṭayet toraṇa stambhān ṛ kṣaumaiḥ kauśeyakaiḥ api
kalaśa sthānam āsādya śāli piṣṭaiḥ vicitrayet

original: brāhmaṃ tu madhyamaṃ bhāgaṃ daivikaṃ tadanantaram // Vis_22.127 //
analyzed: brāhmam tu madhyamam bhāgam daivikam tad anantaram

original: tṛtīyaṃ mānuṣaṃ bhāgaṃ padamevaṃ nyaset kramāt /
analyzed: tṛtīyam mānuṣam bhāgam padam evam nyaset kramāt
brahma sthāne padam kuryāt ekāśīti vidhānataḥ
ghṛtam uṣṇa udakam ca eva ratna ambhaḥ phala vāri ca

original: lohāmbho mārjanaṃ caiva gandhāmbho 'kṣatameva ca // Vis_22.129 //
analyzed: loha ambhaḥ mārjanam ca eva gandha ambho kṣatam eva ca

original: yavodakaṃ ca ityete madhyame navake nyaset /
analyzed: yava udakam ca iti ete madhyame navake nyaset

original: tasyaiva paritaḥ kuryāt dikṣvaṣṭasu samantataḥ // Vis_22.130 //
analyzed: tasya eva paritas kuryāt dikṣu aṣṭasu samantataḥ
pādya arghya ācamanīyam ca pañcagavyam tatas dadhi
payaḥ madhu kaṣāyam ca dikṣu indra ādiṣu vinyaset
pādya ādi pañcagavya antam mahā dikṣu niveśayet

original: dadhyādi ca kaṣāyāntaṃ koṇeṣu viniveśayet // Vis_22.132 //
analyzed: dadhi ādi ca kaṣāya antam koṇeṣu viniveśayet
evam dravyāṇi ca uktāni vinyaset navakam prati

original: madhye madhye vinikṣipya dravyāṇāṃ tu yathākramam // Vis_22.133 //
analyzed: madhye madhye vinikṣipya dravyāṇām tu yathākramam

original: śeṣān śuddhodakān sarvān catuṣṣaṣṭiṃ tu kārayet /
analyzed: śeṣān śuddha udakān sarvān catuṣṣaṣṭim tu kārayet

original: tatastu daivike bhāge padaṃ kurvīta sādhakaḥ // Vis_22.134 //
analyzed: tatas tu daivike bhāge padam kurvīta sādhakaḥ

original: diśi cāpi tathā koṇe kuryāt saptadaśaṃ kramāt /
analyzed: diśi ca api tathā koṇe kuryāt saptadaśam kramāt

original: madhye madhye tathā kuryāt dravyakumbhaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ // Vis_22.135 //
analyzed: madhye madhye tathā kuryāt dravya kumbham vicakṣaṇaḥ
aindre tu madhya bhāge tu nyaset candana kardamam

original: yāmye tu madhyabhāge tu nyaset kuṅkumakardamam // Vis_22.136 //
analyzed: tu
vāruṇe madhma bhāge tu nyaset karpūra kardamam

original: saumye tu madhyabhāge tu nyasedauśīrakardamam // Vis_22.137 //
analyzed: saumye tu madhya bhāge tu nyaset auśīra kardamam
āgneye madhya bhāge tu vinyaset tila tailakam
nairṛte madhya bhāge tu nyaset āmala tailakam
vāyavye madhya bhāge tu nyaset sarṣapa tailakam

original: īśāne madhyabhāge tu nyaset karpūratailakam // Vis_22.139 //
analyzed: īśāne madhya bhāge tu nyaset karpūra tailakam
candanam kuṅkumam kardamam tathā
karpūra kardama aṃbhaḥ ca auśīram kardamam tathā
aindra ādi soma paryantam vinyaset tu vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: tilaṃ cāmalakaṃ tailaṃ tathā sarṣapatailakam // Vis_22.141 //
analyzed: tilam ca āmalakam tailam tathā sarṣapa tailakam
tathā karpūra tailam ca āgneya ādiṣu vinyaset
puruṣaḥ ca eva satyaḥ ca naraḥ cyutaḥ
aniruddhaḥ hariḥ kṛṣṇaḥ candana ādi aṣṭa daivatāḥ

original: śeṣān śuddhodakaiḥ sarvān aṣṭāviṃśacca tatkramāt // Vis_22.143 //
analyzed: śeṣān śuddha udakaiḥ sarvān aṣṭāviṃśat ca tad kramāt
pūrayet sarvatas paścāt ācāryaḥ su samāhitaḥ

original: tṛtīye mānuṣe bhāge caindrādīn ṣoḍaśa kramāt // Vis_22.144 //
analyzed: tṛtīye mānuṣe bhāge ca aindra ādīn ṣoḍaśa kramāt
pratyekam tu padam kuryāt catvāriṃśat nava uttaram

original: teṣāṃ madhye tu vinyasya dravyakumbhaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ // Vis_22.145 //
analyzed: teṣām madhye tu vinyasya dravya kumbham vicakṣaṇaḥ
gulam tu vinyaset
kṣu toyam tu dakṣiṇe

original: pratīcyāṃ nālikerāmbhaḥ udīcyāṃ śāntivāri ca // Vis_22.146 //
analyzed: pratīcyām nālikera ambhaḥ udīcyām śānti vāri ca
vārāham nārasiṃham ca śrīdharam hayaśīrṣakam

original: gulādyāni ca catvāri tasya tasyādhidaivatam // Vis_22.147 //
analyzed: gula ādyāni ca catvāri tasya tasya adhidaivatam
āgneya ādiṣu maṅgalān ca upavinyaset
mūrtayaḥ vāsudeva ādyāḥ catasraḥ maṅgala ambhasaḥ
indra agnyoḥ madhya bhāge tu vinyaset hima toyakam
dharma pāvakayoḥ madhye vinyaset ca tila udakam
yama nairṛtayoḥ madhye vinyaset taṇḍula udakam
nirṛteḥ varuṇasya api madhye nirjhara vāri ca
madhye varuṇa vāyvoḥ ca vinyaset vṛṣṭi toyakam
vāyavya somayoḥ madhye vinyaset ca kuśa udakam
īśāna somayoḥ madhye vinyaset tulasī jalam
tathā īśāna indrayoḥ madhye nyaset sāmudrakam jalam
tatas saptadaśān kumbhān uttarānana ṣaṣṭikān

original: pūrayet pūrvavat samyak gandhapuktena vāriṇā // Vis_22.153 //
analyzed: pūrayet pūrvavat samyak gandha puktena vāriṇā
arcayet ca tatas paścāt mūlamantreṇa mantra vid

original: arcayitvā yathānyāyaṃ kumbhān sarvān yathāvidhi // Vis_22.154 //
analyzed: arcayitvā yathānyāyam kumbhān sarvān yathāvidhi

original: veṣṭayitvā yathā vastraiḥ kumbhān sarvān yathākramam /
analyzed: veṣṭayitvā yathā vastraiḥ kumbhān sarvān yathākramam

original: pādyādīnāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ mantraṃ puruṣasūktakam // Vis_22.155 //
analyzed: pādya ādīnām tu sarveṣām mantram puruṣasūktakam
mūlamantreṇa vā kuryāt idam viṣṇuḥ iti tryṛcā
arcayet devadeveśam dravyāṇām dravyaiḥ saṃ
snāpayet budhaḥ
tatas dvitīya āvaraṇe snāpayet ca vicakṣaṇaḥ
viṣṇoḥ arāṭa mantreṇa candana ambu ādi bhedataḥ
mūlamantreṇa vā kuryāt idam viṣṇuḥ iti tryṛcā
snāpayet ca catur dikṣu catvāraḥ krama yogataḥ
tila taila ādi catvāri āpohiṣṭhā krama ādinā
evam dvitīya āvaraṇe koṇeṣu snāpayet budhaḥ
paścāt gulā udaka ādyaiḥ tu idam viṣṇuḥ iti mantrataḥ
maṅgala ambhāṃsi catvāri viṣṇoḥ nukam iti tryṛcā
snāpayet dikṣu ca aṣṭāsu mantravat ca yathākramam

original: himādyaṃbhāṃsi catvāri āpo asmāditi tryṛcā // Vis_22.161 //
analyzed: hima ādi aṃbhāṃsi catvāri āpaḥ asmāt iti tryṛcā

original: pādyādīnāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ dravyāṇāṃ tu suvistaram // Vis_22.162 //
analyzed: pādya ādīnām tu sarveṣām dravyāṇām tu su vistaram
śṛṇu guhya manāḥ bhūtvā saṃkṣepāt vakṣyate dhunā
tulasī padma dūrvā arve
ca śyāmākam viṣṇuparṇikā
bilva patram ca iti etāḥ ivam
paḍaṅgam pādyam ucyate
vrīhiḥ taṇḍula siddhārtha ṛṃthaḥ
gandha puṣpe phalam payaḥ

original: tilā yavāḥ kuśāścaiva arghyasya daśa cocyate /
analyzed: tilāḥ yavāḥ kuśāḥ ca eva arghyasya daśa ca ucyate
ṣaḍ aṅgāni tu ca etāni hi uktāni ācamanīyake
nyagrodha aśvattha śamyaḥ ca plakṣa jambu kapitthakam
khādira udumbaraḥ ca eva madhūkaḥ ca vikaṅkatam
bilvam palāśaḥ iti ete
dvādaśa smṛtam

original: vajraṃ pravālaṃ muktā ca vaiḍūryaṃ marakataṃ maṇiḥ /
analyzed: vajram pravālam muktā ca vaiḍūryam marakatam maṇiḥ

original: puṣyakaṃ brahmarāgaṃ ca indranīlaṃ ca gāruḍam // Vis_22.168 //
analyzed: puṣyakam brahmarāgam ca indranīlam ca gāruḍam
ratna udakasya dravyāṇi daśa ratnāni saṃgrahaḥ
panasa āmra kapittham ca kadala āmalakam tathā

original: bilvaṃ havyaṃ mātuluṅgaṃ nālikeraṃ ca dāḍimam /
analyzed: bilvam havyam mātuluṅgam nālikeram ca dāḍimam

original: badarīkuṭajaṃ caiva phalaṃ dvādaśa ucyate // Vis_22.170 //
analyzed: badarī kuṭajam ca eva phalam dvādaśaḥ ucyate
śirīṣam ca kuśāḥ ca eva rājasūrya vivartanī

original: bhūstṛṇaṃ ca sadābhadrā asanaṃ tulasīdvayam // Vis_22.171 //
analyzed: bhūstṛṇam ca sadābhadrāḥ asanam tulasī dvayam
sahadevī ca iti etā ivam
daśa aṅgāni tu mārjane

original: uśīraṃ ca tathā kuṣṭhaṃ kuṅkumaṃ candanaṃ tathā // Vis_22.172 //
analyzed: uśīram ca tathā kuṣṭham kuṅkumam candanam tathā
agaruḥ devadāruḥ ca māṃsīram
muram eva ca

original: hariberaśca karpūraṃ nāṭaraṃ muktameva ca (?) // Vis_22.173 //
analyzed: hariberaḥ ca karpūram nāṭaram muktam eva ca
gandha udakasya iti ete gandha dvādaśaḥ ucyate

original: vaiṇavaṃ ca yavaṃ caiva pālāśaṃ padmameva ca // Vis_22.174 //
analyzed: vaiṇavam ca yavam ca eva pālāśam padmam eva ca
tulasī dala nīvāra gaurasarṣapam eva ca
śāntyudakasya ca etāni kathitāni samāsatas
indravalī aṅkuram ca eva vaṃśaka aṅkuram eva ca

original: aśvatthasyāṅkuraṃ caiva ekapadmaṃ tathaiva ca // Vis_22.176 //
analyzed: aśvatthasya aṅkuram ca eva eka padmam tathā eva ca
palāśasya aṅkuram ca eva padma puṣpam tathā eva ca
etāni ca aṅkurāṇi aṣṭau maṅgala ambhasi vinyaset
suvarṇam rajatam tāmram āyasam trapukam tathā
phalam kanaka cūrṇam ca paittaloham lam ca
tathā iva ca
aṣṭāṅgāni tu lohāmbhaḥ kathitāni samāsatas
nīvāra vaiṇavam ca eva yava sarṣapa māṣakāḥ
priyaṅgu taṇḍulam brīhiḥ akṣata aṣṭāṅgam ucyate

original: pātravastrādike dravye kriyādravyaṃ tu kārayet // Vis_22.180 //
analyzed: pātra vastra ādike dravye kriyā dravyam tu kārayet
svīkṛtaḥ yajamānena snapanāya samārabhet

original: anyathā hi na kartavyaṃ kriyā bhavati niṣphalā // Vis_22.181 //
analyzed: anyathā hi na kartavyam kriyā bhavati niṣphalā
śeṣāṇām api vastūnām evam kuryāt prakīrtitam

original: kalaśānāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ devo nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // Vis_22.182 //
analyzed: kalaśānām tu sarveṣām devaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
cakrikāṇām tu sarveṣām brahmāṇam parameṣṭhinam

original: śeṣāṇāmapi vastūnāṃ devo viṣṇuḥ sanātanaḥ // Vis_22.183 //
analyzed: śeṣāṇām api vastūnām devaḥ viṣṇuḥ sanātanaḥ
snapanam vidhivat kṛtvā hi ācāryaḥ tantra vittamaḥ
yat cūrṇam paścāt gandha yuktaiḥ vimiśritaiḥ
cūrṇam tu vimṛjet paścāt snāpayet gandha vāriṇā
ārādhayet tatas devam vastra ābharaṇam āditas
madhuparkam tatas dadyāt devadevāya bhaktitaḥ
carubhiḥ pūjayet bhaktyā rāja vat puruṣottamam
ante bahuvidhaiḥ bhakṣyaiḥ pāyasauḥ ca gula odanaiḥ
vicitra annaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ upadaṃśaiḥ anekaśas
sarva bhakṣyaiḥ apūpaiḥ ca svādūni rasavanti ca
saugandhikena ca ājyena dadyāt devāya mantra vid
dadyāt gula dvayam ca eva kadalī phalam eva ca
panasa āmra phalam ca eva krameṇa evam nivedayet
dadhyodanam tatas dadyāt bahis antar ca deśikaḥ

original: niveditaṃ ca yaddravyaṃ puṣpaṃ phalamathāpi vā // Vis_22.190 //
analyzed: niveditam ca yat dravyam puṣpam phalam atha api vā
mama agre sthāpya tantra jñaḥ mad dakṣiṇa kare dadet
arghya pādya ādinā abhyarcya sva nāmnā mantra vittamaḥ

original: nivedya śeṣaṃ sarveṣāṃ vaiṣṇavānāṃ tu dāpayet /
analyzed: nivedya śeṣam sarveṣām vaiṣṇavānām tu dāpayet

original: hutaśeṣaṃ tathācāryaḥ prāśayet prāṅmukhaḥ śuciḥ // Vis_22.192 //
analyzed: huta śeṣam tathā ācāryaḥ prāśayet prāc mukhaḥ śuciḥ

original: kuñjaraṃ vā turaṅgaṃ vā grāmaṃ dāsīgaṇaṃ tathā /
analyzed: kuñjaram vā turaṅgam vā grāmam dāsī gaṇam tathā

original: gāścaiva vividhaṃ vastraṃ hiraṇyaṃ vāpi śaktitaḥ // Vis_22.193 //
analyzed: gāḥ ca eva vividham vastram hiraṇyam vā api śaktitas
ācāryāṇām tu deyam syāt dadyāt vai
yathā vitta anusārataḥ
evam ukta vidhānena sahasra kalaśaiḥ śubhaiḥ

original: snāpya bhaktyā hariṃ samyak aśvamedhaphalaṃ labhet //
analyzed: snāpya bhaktyā harim samyak aśvamedha phalam labhet
iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām snapanavidhiḥ nāma dvāviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
trayoviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
viṣvaksenaḥ
atas param pravakṣyāmi hareḥ pūjā aṅgam uttamam

original: puṣpārāmasya deśaṃ ca tasya saṃskārameva ca // Vis_23.1 //
analyzed: puṣpa ārāmasya deśam ca tasya saṃskāram eva ca
evamādīni ca anyāni sandhyā rakṣā avasānakam

original: śṛṇu guhyamanā bhūtvā sādhakānāṃ hitāya vai // Vis_23.2 //
analyzed: śṛṇu guhya manāḥ bhūtvā sādhakānām hitāya vai

original: devālayasya parito vāyavyāṃ diśi vā mune /
analyzed: devālayasya paritas vāyavyām diśi vā mune
pūrve dakṣiṇe vā api kuryāt ārāmam uttamam
pūrvavat vaiṣṇavaiḥ yuktam yajamānaḥ vidhānataḥ
ācāryam pūjayitvā tu brāhmaṇānām anujñayā
aṅgulīyaka vastra ādyaiḥ toṣayitvā harim smaret
ardhya ādi snāna paryantam tena eva manasā avyayam
ravi maṇḍala madhya stham devam nārāyaṇam prabhum
saṃpūjayitvā tad bhūmau śaṅkha tūrya ādi saṃyutam

original: vaiṣṇavaiḥ saha tāṃ bhūmiṃ nirīkṣyāstreṇa mantravit /
analyzed: vaiṣṇavaiḥ saha tām bhūmim nirīkṣya astreṇa mantra vid
karṣayet lāṅgalaiḥ śūdraiḥ vaiṣṇavaiḥ tu yathākramam
tatas mṛd śiṣya śastraiḥ tu tām bhūmim śikṣayet dvija

original: yajamāno hariṃ smṛtvā ācāryaṃ pūjayet punaḥ // Vis_23.8 //
analyzed: yajamānaḥ harim smṛtvā ācāryam pūjayet punar

original: brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā tu puṇyāhaṃ tatra kārayet /
analyzed: brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā tu puṇyāham tatra kārayet

original: tasyāṃ bhūmyāṃ śubhāyāṃ tu puṣpavṛkṣādikān kramāt // Vis_23.9 //
analyzed: tasyām bhūmyām śubhāyām tu puṣpa vṛkṣa ādikān kramāt
sthāpayet devadevasya pūjā artham muni sattama
karavīram tathā jatiḥ mallikā vakulam tathā

original: campakaṃ karṇikāraṃ tu nandyāvartaṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: campakam karṇikāram tu nandyāvartam tathā eva ca
tulasī dvam evam ca dala ekam padmam ucyate
māgadhī vṛkṣa vakulaṃlau
kramukaṃkaḥ
panasaṃsaḥ tathā
kadalyā āmala kaṃkau
ca eva madhuka āmraṃmrau
tathā eva ca
nālikeram tarasta
candanam hariberakam
puṃnāgam vaṃśa puṃnāgam kṣudra puṃnāgam eva ca

original: dāḍimaṃ ca tathā havyaṃ pālāśaṃ pādapaṃ tathā /
analyzed: dāḍimam ca tathā havyam pālāśam pādapam tathā

original: evamādīni cānyāni devodyāne tu darśakān // Vis_23.14 //
analyzed: evamādīni ca anyāni deva udyāne tu darśakān
puṣpa ārāme krameṇa eva kuryāt tu brāhmaṇena vai
brāhmaṇān jñāna saṃpannān vaiṣṇavān vedapāragān
saṃgṛhya tān alaṃkṛtya sarva dundubhi saṃyutam
pūrvam vighneśam abhyarcya upahācā
rasamanvitam
tāmbūlam sūkṣma vastraiḥ tu brāhmaṇān pūjya mantra vid

original: evamādīni cānyāni vaiṣṇavān praṇavaṃ smaret // Vis_23.17 //
analyzed: evamādīni ca anyāni vaiṣṇavān praṇavam smaret
gandha ādibhiḥ samabhyarcya dāpayet kramāt
tasmāt dvijavara śreṣṭhaiḥ ārāme muni sattama
bījāni vāpayet bhūmau praṇava ādi anta saṃyutam
viṣṇugāyatri mantreṇa viṣṇu mantram anusmaran
aṅkura ādīn tathā bhūmau ca ārāme krama yogataḥ
sarvā aśakrā
dīśāna paryantam karavīra ādikān kramāt
sthāpayet pūrvavat mantrī secayet praṇavaiḥ jalam
yantreṇa āhṛtya
vaiṣṇavaiḥ tu dine dine

original: toṣayet puṣpavṛkṣāṃśca patrāṇi vividha ni ca /
analyzed: toṣayet ca

original: evamādīni ca nyāni phalavṛkṣāntameva ca // Vis_23.22 //
analyzed: evamādīni ca nyāni phala vṛkṣa antam eva ca

original: tālaṃ nimbaṃ tathā rājavṛkṣaṃ khadirameva ca /
analyzed: tālam nimbam tathā rājavṛkṣam khadiram eva ca

original: viṣṇvālaye tathārāme svṛgṛhe ca vivarjayet // Vis_23.23 //
analyzed: viṣṇu ālaye tathā ārāme ca vivarjayet
varjyasya a varjana an yānine na eva
vṛddhiḥ syāt kupyate hariḥ

original: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena tālādīnāṃ tu varjayet // Vis_23.24 //
analyzed: tasmāt sarva prayatnena tāla ādīnām tu varjayet
brāhmaṇa ārādhane loke para arthe viṣṇum avyayam
brāhmaṇaiḥ eva kartavyaḥ puṣpa ārāmaḥ mahāmate
tathā eva nṛpa viḍbhyām ca viṣṇoḥ ārādhena kramam maḥ
śūdra ārādhana devasya śūdraiḥ nanda vanam mune
kārayet krama yogena brāhmaṇānām mahat tapaḥ
brāhmaṇa ārādhane bhūmau pūrvavat nandanam mune
sthāpitam brāhmaṇena iva puṣpa vṛkṣa ādikān kramāt

original: yathākāmaṃ tu mantreṇa jalaiḥ śūdraistu varjayet // Vis_23.28 //
analyzed: yathākāmam tu mantreṇa jalaiḥ śūdraiḥ tu varjayet
āpuṣpakālam atrā eva tāvat kuryāt dine dine
puṣpakāle ṅkura ādīni patrāṇi vividhāni ca
hastam prakṣālya tān chedya chitvā
pātre śūdraiḥ tu pūrayet
sa puṣpa pātram ādāya brahmaṇaḥ vedapāragaḥ
praṇavena samuddhṛtya sa apidhānam harim smaran
puṣpa maṇḍapam āsādya puṣpa bhāṇḍe tu pūrayet
paścāt śuddha jalaiḥ mantrīm saṃprokṣya asmin mukheṣu tān

original: pidhāya tu bahirdeśe niṣkramyāstreṇa mantrataḥ // Vis_23.32 //
analyzed: pidhāya tu bahis deśe niṣkramya astreṇa mantrataḥ
tatas tu phalakām tasmin mantrī vāyum anusmaran

original: saṃmṛjya kuśabṛndena prokṣayet praṇavena tu // Vis_23.33 //
analyzed: saṃmṛjya kuśa bṛndena prokṣayet praṇavena tu
saṃkṣālya viṣṇuṇā āyatryā gandha variṇā
hastam prakṣālya tena eva praṇavena abhimantrayet
puṣpa pātrāt samādāya hastābhyām praṇavena tu

original: pūrayet phalakāntaṃ tu navavastraistu vā mune // Vis_23.35 //
analyzed: pūrayet phalaka antam tu nava vastraiḥ tu vā mune
tathā eva aṅkura patraṇi sarvāṇi etāni vai kramāt
paścāt gandha jalaiḥ tasmin prokṣayet praṇavam smaret
manasā satatam devam anusmṛtya samāhitaḥ
namaskāra vihīnenaṃ
tu sūtreḥ puṣpāṇi sandhayet
utpala ādīni ca anyāni tulasī dvayam eva ca
nānā varṇa samāyuktam mālyāni evam samācaret
tatas praṇavam uccārya ṣaḍakṣaram anusmaran
puṣpa pātre tu saṃpūrya praṇavena uddharet budhaḥ
tu
harim smṛtya śanais śanais
devapārśvam samāsādya sthāpayet dakṣiṇa agratas
paścāt tāni astramantreṇa prokṣayet sādhakaḥ kramāt
tatas praṇamya manasā mūlamantram anusmaran

original: niṣkramya tu bahirdeśe japedvai vaiṣṇavo dvijaḥ /
analyzed: niṣkramya tu bahis deśe japet vai vaiṣṇavaḥ dvijaḥ
devālayāt bahis deśe na kuryāt puṣpa maṇḍapam

original: yo bāhye kurute mohāt puṣpamālyādikān mune /
analyzed: yaḥ bāhye kurute mohāt puṣpa mālya ādikāt mune
na pūjā phalam āpnoti tasmāt tam parivarjayet
sat śūdra vaiṣṇavaiḥ mālām āpadi api mahā mune

original: nitye naimittike caiva na kuryāttu kathaṃcana // Vis_23.44 //
analyzed: nitye naimittike ca eva na kuryāt tu kathaṃcana
brāhmaṇa ārādhena
ca asmin para arthe tu viśeṣataḥ
ātma artham avyayam viṣṇu yathākāmam samarcayet

original: sā pūjā bhuktimuktiḥ syāt tasmāt svārthaṃ viśiṣyate /
analyzed: sā pūjā bhukti muktiḥ syāt tasmāt sva artham viśiṣyate

original: yo mohāt kurute mālāṃ śūdro brāhmaṇapūjane // Vis_23.46 //
analyzed: yaḥ mohāt kurute mālām śūdraḥ brāhmaṇa pūjane

original: ātmārthe ca parārthe ca sā pūjā niṣphalā bhavet /
analyzed: ātma arthe ca para arthe ca sā pūjā niṣphalā bhavet
tat grāmaṃmo
nidhanam yāti tasmāt yatnena varjayet
prātar madhya pradoṣeṣu sāndhyā ṣaṭke viśeṣataḥ

original: nitye naimittike caiva brāhmaṇārādhane mune // Vis_23.48 //
analyzed: nitye naimittike ca eva brāhmaṇa ārādhane mune
mantra puṣpa ādikān sarvān brāhmaṇaiḥ eva ca uddharet
saṃmārjana śatam puṇyam sahasram anulepanam
mālāḥ śata sahasrāṇi anantaḥ dīpaḥ ucyate
tasmāt teṣām muni śreṣṭha dīpa mālā viśiṣyate
gandhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ tathā dhūpa dīpaiḥ mālyaiḥ manoramaiḥ
devadevam samabhyarcya sandhyā rakṣām samācaret
jagat saṃrakṣaṇa arthāya tad grāmasya viśeṣataḥ
dine dine tu kartavyam
pātre tāmra ādike budhaiḥ
puṣpa pātraiḥ tathā dūrvā mālā ādyaiḥ tila sarṣapaiḥ
saṃpūrya asmin tad astreṇa dīpān aṣṭadale nyaset
kārpāsa tūla go sarpiḥ sa tailena tailena ca
vimiśritam
karpūra agaru saṃyuktam aṣṭa diś dīpa saṃyutam
saṃgṛhya praṇavena eva puṣpaiḥ astreṇa pūjayet
mahā dīpa samāyuktam chatra cāmara saṃyutam
ṣaṣ akṣareṇa mantreṇa bhrāmayet tad śirā upari
tad paścāt dāsa dāsībhiḥ vaiṣṇavaiḥ saha mantra vid
nānā śaṅkha ravaiḥ yuktam nānā vādya samanvitam

original: pīṭāgre vātha bāhye vā rakṣādīpaṃ nayedbudhaḥ // Vis_23.57 //
analyzed: pīṭa agre vā atha bāhye vā rakṣā dīpam nayet budhaḥ
ṣaḍakṣareṇa mantreṇa praṇava ādi anta saṃyutam
paścāt garbhagṛha agre tu mahā dīpam visarjayet
nitye naimittike api evam sandhyā rakṣām samācaret
sa āyāne laṃkṛta ante vā sandhyā rakṣām viśeṣataḥ
kārayet krama yogena sarva saṃpad sukha āvaham
iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām pūjāṅgavidhiḥ nāma trayoviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
caturviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
viṣvaksenaḥ
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa viṣṇoḥ ārādhanam mune
jala gandha ādi saṃskāra vidhim guhyam anuttamam
brāhmaṇān veda saṃyuktān vaiṣṇavān su kula udbhavān

original: tān krameṇaiva saṃskṛtya prokṣayitvā śiropari // Vis_24.2 //
analyzed: tān krameṇa eva saṃskṛtya prokṣayitvā śiraḥ upari
mūlamantreṇa mantra jñaḥ paścāt tena eva kārayet
gopurasya uttare kuryāt dakṣiṇe vā jalāśayam
yāmye devagṛhasya eva ca uttare vā pramāṇataḥ

original: alaṃkṛtya tu tatsthānaṃ praṇavaṃ satataṃ japet // Vis_24.4 //
analyzed: alaṃkṛtya tu tat sthānam praṇavam satatam japet
samālipya prokṣayet gandha vāriṇā
dvādaśa akṣara mantreṇa praṇava ādi anta saṃyutam
alaṃkṛtya ca gandha ādi dhūpa dīpaiḥ samantataḥ
muktā dāma samāyuktam vitānaiḥ upaśobhitam
patāka mālā saṃyuktam śāli piṣṭaiḥ alaṃkṛtam
tat sthānam sādhakaḥ paścāt dvādaśa akṣara vidyayā
saṃprokṣya dhūpayitvā ca guggula agaru saṃyutam

original: tasmin manorame deśe jalabhāṇḍādikān mune // Vis_24.8 //
analyzed: tasmin manorame deśe jala bhāṇḍa ādikān mune

original: sthāpayet praṇavenaiva pratyekaṃ taṃ hariṃ smaran /
analyzed: sthāpayet praṇavena eva pratyekam tam harim smaran

original: jalabhāṇḍaṃ tathā kumbhaṃ vardhanīṃ ca bahūni ca // Vis_24.9 //
analyzed: jala bhāṇḍam tathā kumbham vardhanīm ca bahūni ca
sraj dhūpa pātra saṃyuktam sthāpayet tu samāhitaḥ

original: evamādīni cānyāni tadbhūmau sthāpayet kramāt // Vis_24.10 //
analyzed: evamādīni ca anyāni tad bhūmau sthāpayet kramāt
su gandham deva pānīyam snāna artham jalam eva ca

original: gandhadravyaṃ tathośīraṃ māñjaṃ malayajaṃ tathā // Vis_24.11 //
analyzed: gandha dravyam tathā uśīram māñjam malayajam tathā
evamādīni ca anyāni gandha dravya ādikāt mune
saṃgṛhya viṣṇugāyatryā praṇava ādi anta saṃyutam
jala bhāṇḍa ādikān sarvān viṣṇugāyatriyā mune
saṃkṣālya anyān su saṃprokṣya pūritān gālita udakaiḥ

original: pūrayet praṇavenaiva tān pidhāya pṛthak pṛthak /
analyzed: pūrayet praṇavena eva tān pidhāya pṛthak pṛthak
elā campaka puṣpāṇi ketaka utpalam eva ca
uśīra mallikā jātipuṣpam vakulam eva ca

original: etān puṣpān samādāya vikṣipettān pṛthak pṛthak // Vis_24.15 //
analyzed: etān puṣpān samādāya vikṣipet tān pṛthak pṛthak
eteṣām api alābhe tu jaleṣu muni sattama
yathāsaṃbhavam āhṛtya nikṣipet gandha puṣpakam
tri mātrāt puṣpam uddhṛtya praṇavena visarjayet
su sūkṣmaiḥ su dṛḍhaiḥ vastraiḥ veṣṭayet astra mantrataḥ
tatas candana saṃyuktam karpūram peṣayet budhaḥ
tathā eva gandham mālākām
rajanīm praṇavaiḥ saha
evam saṃskṛtya matimān sarvān devān anusmaran

original: vardhanīṃ viṣṇugāyatryā salakṣmyāsmin pṛthak pṛthak // Vis_24.19 //
analyzed: vardhanīm viṣṇugāyatryā sa lakṣmyā asmin pṛthak pṛthak
jala bhāṇḍāt jalam gṛhya praṇavena tu pūrayet

original: evaṃ saṃpūrayitvā tu pidhāya ca suvastrakaiḥ // Vis_24.20 //
analyzed: evam saṃpūrayitvā tu pidhāya ca su vastrakaiḥ
pūjā ārambhe muni śreṣṭha praṇava ādi anta saṃyutam
viṣṇugāyatri mantreṇa ca uddharat vardhanīm bahūn
maṇḍapasya uttare pārśve sthāpayet praṇavam smaran

original: evaṃ dine dine devapūjārthaṃ jalamuttamam // Vis_24.22 //
analyzed: evam dine dine deva pūjā artham jalam uttamam
tathā eva candana ādīni karpūreṇa vimiśritam
dūrvā akṣata añjanam ca eva mātrā taṇḍulam eva ca
tila go hema dadhi ājyam madhuparka upahārakam
snāna artham rajanī piṣṭam sa taila āmalakam tathā
