evamādīni ca anyāni pūjā dravyāṇi sarvaśas

original: praṇavena tu saṃskṛtya cāstramantreṇa coddharet // Vis_24.25 //
analyzed: praṇavena tu saṃskṛtya ca astramantreṇa ca uddharet
mukha vāsam muni śreṣṭha praṇavam satatam japan
saṃskṛtya ante vidhānena ca uddharet vāgyataḥ śuciḥ
śaṅkha traya tūrya
samāyuktam praṇavena dine dine
devasya dakṣiṇe pārśve sthāpayet astra mantrataḥ
prātar sandhyā ādi ṣaṣ kāle pi evam eva samācaret
nitye naimittike pi evam saṃskāraḥ muni sattama
saṃkṣepeṇa mayā proktaḥ jala gandha ādikaḥ kramāt

original: anyathā cenmahādoṣo bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // Vis_24.29 //
analyzed: anyathā ced mahā doṣaḥ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
durbhikṣam jāyate ca eva dhana dhānya kṣayaḥ bhavet
tasmāt sarva prayatnena kārayet vidhi coditam
iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām jalagādhādisaṃskāravidhiḥ nāma
caturviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pañcaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
nāradaḥ
bhagavan viṣṇu bhūta īśa viṣvaksena namaḥ stu te
jñātum icchāmi aham sarvam maṅgala aṅkura ropaṇam
pālikā lakṣaṇam ca eva ghaṭikā lakṣaṇam tathā

original: śarāvastu kathaṃ proktaṃ saṃkhyānāṃ tu kathaṃ bhavet // Vis_25.2 //
analyzed: śarāvaḥ tu katham proktam saṃkhyānām tu katham bhavet

original: teṣāṃ varṇaśca vai nāma dravyāṇāṃ ca kathaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: teṣām varṇaḥ ca vai nāma dravyāṇām ca katham bhavet

original: teṣāṃ caivādhidaivaṃ ca aṅkurāṇāṃ śubhāśubham // Vis_25.3 //
analyzed: teṣām ca eva adhidaivam ca aṅkurāṇām śubha aśubham

original: etatsarvaṃ samācakṣva paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me /
analyzed: etat sarvam samācakṣva param kautūhalam hi me
viṣvaksenaḥ
atas param pravakṣyāmi maṅgala aṅkura vistaram
sauvarṇām pālikām kuryāt rājatīm ghaṭikā ākṛtim

original: tāmraireva śarāvaṃ tu sarveṣāṃ tāmrameva vā // Vis_25.5 //
analyzed: tāmraiḥ eva śarāvam tu sarveṣām tāmram eva vā
mṛdbhiḥ vā api atha sarveṣām sarvāṇi
kārayitvā vicakṣaṇaḥ
yathā vitta anusāreṇa
kuryāt vā pālikā ādikān
ṣaṭtriṃśat ca aṅgula utsedham vistīrṇam tu tad ardhakam
pādam ca dvādaśam
jñeyam pālikānām prakīrtitam
caturviṃśa aṅgula utsedham vistāram dvādaśam bhavet
pañca āsyā ghaṭikā kāryā
pādam ca aṣṭa aṅgulam jñeyam ghaṭikānām prakīrtitam
dvādaśa aṅgulam utsedham vistāram tāvat eva tu

original: pādaṃ ṣaḍaṅgulaṃ jñeyaṃ śarāvāṇāṃ tu sarvaśaḥ /
analyzed: pādam ṣaṣ aṅgulam jñeyam śarāvāṇām tu sarvaśas
na alam kartṛ vaśāt mune
kārayet krama yogena su ślakṣṇam suṣira anvitam

original: yathākāmaṃ tu vā kuryāt pālikādīn krameṇa tu // Vis_25.11 //
analyzed: yathākāmam tu vā kuryāt pālika ādīn krameṇa tu
evam jñātvā muniḥ eṣṭha kārayet aṅkura arpaṇam
pratiṣṭhā ādi utsave ca eva snapane yāga darśane
viṣuve ca eva saṃkrāntyām ayane grahaṇe tathā
śubha nakṣatra yoge ca nāma ṛkṣetu athavā mune
aṅkura arpaṇa kāryam tu kārayet sarva karmaṇi
an aṅkura arpaṇam kuryāt anartham aśubha āvaham
tasmāt sarva prayatnena kārayet aṅkura arpaṇam
pratyekam ṣoḍaśa syuḥ vai

original: teṣāṃ caiva tu nāmāni vakṣyāmi munisattama /
analyzed: teṣām ca eva tu nāmāni vakṣyāmi muni sattama
sundaraḥ sundaraḥ ca eva vikramaḥ muraśāsanaḥ
vīrasenaḥ virāmaḥ ca somadattaḥ mahāhanuḥ

original: yajñabhuk sarvabhuk caiva manujo mardanastathā // Vis_25.17 //
analyzed: yajñabhuj sarvabhuj ca eva manujaḥ mardanaḥ tathā
agni grīvaḥ haya grīvaḥ vāyu grīvaḥ mahā hanuḥ

original: ityete ṣoḍaśa proktāḥ pālikānāṃ tu(atra?)nāmataḥ // Vis_25.18 //
analyzed: iti ete ṣoḍaśa proktāḥ pālikānām tuatra nāmataḥ

original: ghaṭikānāṃ tu vakṣyāmi yāthātathyaṃ hi nārada /
analyzed: ghaṭikānām tu vakṣyāmi yāthātathyam hi nārada
vegaḥ vegaḥ suvegaḥ ca vāyuvegaḥ tathā eva ca
agni nāthaḥ vāyu nāthaḥ haviḥ nāthaḥ hayāṃpatiḥ

original: sarvabhuk sarvadhṛk sarvī sarvabhakṣastathaiva ca // Vis_25.20 //
analyzed: sarva bhuj sarva dhṛk sarvī sarva bhakṣaḥ tathā eva ca
subhujaḥ durbhujaḥ ca eva bhujagaḥ vahnijeśvaraḥ

original: ityete ṣoḍaśa proktā ghaṭikānāṃ tu (-ścāpi?)nāmataḥ // Vis_25.21 //
analyzed: iti ete ṣoḍaśa proktāḥ ghaṭikānām tu
śarāvāṇām tu nāmāni tat vakṣyāmi yathākramam
rājarājaḥ virājaḥ ca suketuḥ kīrtivardhanaḥ
indrakarmāḥ mahā karmāḥ devakarmāḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: ityete ṣoḍaśa proktāḥ śarāvāṇāṃ tu(-ścaiva?)nāmataḥ // Vis_25.24 //
analyzed: iti ete ṣoḍaśa proktāḥ śarāvāṇām tuḥ ca eva nāmataḥ
varṇānām tu varṇān ca api
pravakṣyāmi yathāvat anupūrvaśas
sundara ādyāḥ tu catvāraḥ śukla varṇāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
vīrasena ādayaḥ raktāḥ śyāmāḥ yajñabhuj ādayaḥ

original: śeṣāstu pālikāḥ sarvāḥ kṛṣṇavarṇāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // Vis_25.26 //
analyzed: śeṣāḥ tu pālikāḥ sarvāḥ kṛṣṇa varṇāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
pālikāḥ ṣoḍaśa athavā
sarvāḥ śukla varṇā api vā mune
evam eva tu varṇāniḥ ca
ghaṭikānām tu sarvaśas
sita raktaḥ śarāvāṇām sarveṣām tu prakīrtitaḥ

original: śarāvāṇāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ raktavarṇa athāpi vā // Vis_25.28 //
analyzed: śarāvāṇām tu sarveṣām rakta varṇa atha api vā
pālikāḥ śukla varṇāḥ tu ghaṭikāḥ kṛṣṇam eva ca varṇakāḥ
śarāve ṣoḍaśena eva rakta varṇam iti smṛtam
uktaḥ tu varṇa vistāraḥ bīja nyāsa vidhim śṛṇu

original: prāsāde maṇḍape vāpi prākāre munisattama // Vis_25.30 //
analyzed: prāsāde maṇḍape vā api prākāre muni sattama
tatra upalipya vidhivat maṇḍalam caturaśrakam

original: tatrasthaṃ vai padaṃ kuryādaṣṭacatvārikaṃ kramāt // Vis_25.31 //
analyzed: tatrastham vai padam kuryāt aṣṭacatvārikam kramāt
śāli piṣṭam sa toyena
sūtram saṃlipya mūlayā

original: prāk pratyak navasūtraṃ tu prasāryāsphālya bhūtale // Vis_25.32 //
analyzed: prāk pratyak nava sūtram tu prasārya āsphālya bhū tale
tathā eva kārayet sūtram dvādaśam muni sattama
dakṣiṇa ādi uttara antena ca āsphālya astreṇa mantrataḥ
vimṛjet tu padān samyak vīthi artham muni sattama

original: dvipadaṃ dvipadaṃ tyaktvā tṛtīyaṃ mārjayet kramāt // Vis_25.34 //
analyzed: dvipadam dvipadam tyaktvā tṛtīyam mārjayet kramāt
sārdha tāla pramāṇam vā tāla mānam atha api vā

original: saṃjñātvātra muniśreṣṭha kārayet supadān pṛthak // Vis_25.35 //
analyzed: saṃjñātvā atra muni śreṣṭha kārayet supadān pṛthak
tad padeṣu punar samyak arcayet gandha vāriṇā
paścāt tu pūrayet dhānyaiḥ taṇḍulaiḥ śāli saṃbhavaiḥ
tripaṅktīkṛtya tān sarvān pratyekam krama yogataḥ
āgneya ādi īśa paryantam vinyaset dhānya pūrvakam

original: sthāpayitvā tu mantreṇa dvādaśārṇena vai tataḥ /
analyzed: sthāpayitvā tu mantreṇa dvādaśa arṇena vai tatas

original: vyastaiḥ pṛthak pṛthak sthāpya sarvāneva yathākramam // Vis_25.38 //
analyzed: vyastaiḥ pṛthak pṛthak sthāpya sarvān eva yathākramam
tatas tu pūrayet samyak mṛd vāluka karīṣakaiḥ

original: pūrayitvā samān sarvān arcayitvā tataḥ kramāt // Vis_25.39 //
analyzed: pūrayitvā samān sarvān arcayitvā tatas kramāt
gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ ca eva pūjayitvā vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: pūjayitvā tataḥ paścāt bījānādāya mantravit // Vis_25.40 //
analyzed: pūjayitvā tatas paścāt bījān ādāya mantra vid
tila mudgam tathā māṣa nimba niṣpāva śālayaḥ
yava śyāmāka nīvāra kuluttha kaṃku sarṣapāḥ
etāni dvādaśa proktā
maṅgala aṅkura karmaṇi

original: payobhiḥ kṣālayet pūrvaṃ bījena parameṣṭinā // Vis_25.42 //
analyzed: payobhiḥ kṣālayet pūrvam bījena parameṣṭinā
punar ca kṣālayet paścāt bījena puruṣa ātmanā

original: jitanta iti mantreṇa vinyasettu śanaiḥ śanaiḥ // Vis_25.43 //
analyzed: jitantaḥ iti mantreṇa vinyaset tu śanais śanais
āgneya ādi īśa paryantam pratipaṅkti yathākramam
tatas tu dūrvā aṅkura yuj ghṛta āropaṇam ācaret
tatas tu ca āhataiḥ vastraiḥ veṣṭayitvā pṛthak pṛthak

original: pālikāṃ kṣetrapūrve vā cottare vā tu homayet // Vis_25.45 //
analyzed: pālikām kṣetra pūrve vā ca uttare vā tu homayet
samidh ājya carūṇām tu pratyekam ṣoḍaśa āhutīḥ
saṃpāta ājyena saṃprokṣya pālikā ādīn viśeṣataḥ
nivāte saṃprakurvīta maṇḍapa īśāna koṇake
nava aham sapta rātram vā arcayet gandha vāriṇā
śirīṣa aṅkura pūrvaiḥ tu mālyaiḥ veṣṭya pṛthak pṛthak

original: durvāṅkurairmuniśreṣṭha pūrve vā veṣṭayet pṛthak(?) // Vis_25.48 //
analyzed: durvā aṅkuraiḥ muni śreṣṭha pūrve vā veṣṭayet pṛthak
puṇya āhū parvam saṃpūjya gandha ādi akṣata saṃyutam

original: baliṃ ca sarvato dadyādaṣṭadikṣu samantataḥ // Vis_25.49 //
analyzed: balim ca sarvatas dadyāt aṣṭa dikṣu samantataḥ
haviṣā gandha puṣpaiḥ tu pūjayet tu dine dine

original: bījanyāsa iti proktaḥ devatānāṃ bravīmi te // Vis_25.50 //
analyzed: bījanyāsaḥ iti proktaḥ devatānām bravīmi te
catasraḥ vāsudeva ādyāḥ mūrtayaḥ daivikāḥ tathā
śaṅkha ādīni āyudhāni aṣṭau pālikānām tu devatāḥ
vārāhaḥ nārasiṃhaḥ ca śrīdharaḥ hayaśīrṣakaḥ
jāmadagnyaḥ ca rāmaḥ ca vāmanaḥ yadu nandanaḥ
naraḥ nārāyaṇaḥ ca eva hariḥ kṛṣṇaḥ tathā eva ca

original: matsyaḥ kūrmaśca tārkṣyaśca ananto bhujagottamaḥ // Vis_25.53 //
analyzed: matsyaḥ kūrmaḥ ca tārkṣyaḥ ca anantaḥ bhujaga uttamaḥ

original: ityete ṣoḍaśa proktāḥ ghaṭikānāṃ tu devatāḥ /
analyzed: iti ete ṣoḍaśa proktāḥ ghaṭikānām tu devatāḥ

original: viṣṇvādyā dvādaśa ye ca haṃso 'tha bala eva ca // Vis_25.54 //
analyzed: viṣṇu ādyāḥ dvādaśa ye ca balaḥ eva ca
kapilaḥ ca halaḥ ca eva śarāvāṇām tu devatāḥ
apare candra agni āditya devatā trayam eva tu

original: viṣṇuṃ ca brahmarudrau ca aṅkurāṇāṃ munīśvara /
analyzed: viṣṇum ca brahma rudrau ca aṅkurāṇām muni īśvara
śubham āpnoti pīteṣu śukle deva tvam āpnuyāt
kṛṣṇa raktau ubhau varṇau aśubham kurvate sadā
pañcatvam āpnuyāt śīghram aprarūḍhe sa kartṛkam
śyāmā aṅkuraḥ orāt
dravya nāśaḥ kartuḥ kārayituḥ bhavet
eteṣām ca api nīrogam utsavasya mayā īritam
etat te kathitam samyak aṅkurāṇām su vistaram
iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām aṅkurrāpaṇavidhiḥ nāma pañcaviṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
ṣaḍviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
viṣvaksenaḥ
atas param pravakṣyāmi dhvaja utthāpanam uttamam
yena upasargā
naśyanti sarva saṃpad sukha āvaham
a dhvajaḥ viṣṇuyāgaḥ tu niṣphalaḥ syāt na saṃśayaḥ
tīrtha snāna dināt pūrvam saptaviṃśatike hani
ekaviṃśatike vā
dhvaja utthāpanam ācaret
athavā ārambha divase sadyas kāla udbhavaḥ bhavet
ārohaṇam divā kuryāt ketoḥ niśi aṅkura arpaṇam

original: ekatra divase yāge na dhvajoddhāra iṣyate // Vis_26.4 //
analyzed: ekatra divase yāge na dhvaja uddhāraḥ iṣyate
aṅkura arpaṇa pūrvam tu dvitīyam parikīrtitam
dhvajapīṭham prakalpayet
athavā bali pīṭhasya vainateyasya vā punar
hasta mātram parityajya bali pīṭhasya ca antare
kalpayet dhvaja pīṭham tu mānam tasya pracakṣate
tasya ardham vā api apohya eva dhvaja pīṭham prakalpayet
catur hastam tad ardham vā vistāra āyāmataḥ samam

original: hastocchrāyaṃ dvihastaṃ vā sthāpya stambhasya madhyataḥ // Vis_26.8 //
analyzed: hasta ucchrāyam dvi hastam vā sthāpya stambhasya madhyatas

original: ekahastaṃ tathā bhūmau gartaṃ pīṭhādadhaḥ śubham /
analyzed: eka hastam tathā bhūmau gartam pīṭhāt adhas śubham

original: stambhasya paritaḥ kuryāt mekhalātritayaṃ budhaḥ // Vis_26.9 //
analyzed: stambhasya paritas kuryāt mekhalā tritayam budhaḥ

original: vṛttaṃ vā caturaśraṃ vā ṣoḍaśāṣṭāśrameva vā /
analyzed: vṛttam vā caturaśram vā ṣoḍaśa aṣṭa āśram eva vā
antara ādi tad utsedham aṅgulīnām yathākramam
mekhalā ucchrāyam āyāmam ekaikam catur aṅgulam
tāla mātram visṛjya eva vedikāyām samantataḥ
paścāt tu mekhalāḥ samyak kārayet mantra vittamaḥ
mekhalānām atha ūrdhve tu vṛtta vedim samācaret
catur aṅgulam utsedham tad ūrdhve bja dalam padmakam likhet
ṣoḍaśa dvādaśam vā api ca aṣṭa patram atha api vā

original: dvyaṅgulaṃ tu ghanaṃ jñeyaṃ karṇikāsahitaṃ mune /
analyzed: dvi aṅgulam tu ghanam jñeyam karṇikā sahitam mune

original: tryaṅgulaṃ tu tadutsedhaṃ dvyaṅgulaṃ tadghanaṃ bhavet // Vis_26.14 //
analyzed: tri aṅgulam tu tad utsedham dvi aṅgulam tat ghanam bhavet
iti padma dalam vidhiḥ
proktaḥ uttama adhama madhyataḥ
stambhasya paritas kuryāt sarva alaṃkāra saṃyutam
evam ukta prakāreṇa dhvaja pīṭham prakalpayet

original: pūrvaṃ vāpyathavā paścāt kalpayet pīṭhamuttamam // Vis_26.16 //
analyzed: pūrvam vā api athavā paścāt kalpayet pīṭham uttamam
anyathā yadi ced vedim anartham aśubha āvaham
tasmāt sarva prayatnena kārayet vidhi coditam
dhvaja stambham pravakṣyāmi viviktena mahā mune

original: candanaṃ campakaṃ vāpi bilvamarjunameva ca // Vis_26.18 //
analyzed: candanam campakam vā api bilvam arjunam eva ca

original: tekavṛkṣaṃ ca khadiraṃ sālaṃ tindukameva ca /
analyzed: ca khadiram sālam tindukam eva ca

original: campakaṃ cāṣṭakaṃ caiva kramukaṃ nālikerakam // Vis_26.19 //
analyzed: campakam ca aṣṭakam ca eva kramukam nālikerakam

original: tālaṃ veṇuṃ tathaivātra saṃbhavena tu kārayet /
analyzed: tālam veṇum tathā eva atra saṃbhavena tu kārayet
śata tāla ardham ardham ca mukhya madhya adhamam kramāt
aśīti tālam icchanti kecid tasya ardham eva vā
gopura ākṛti tulyam syāt stambham adhyardham eva vā
stambha pramāṇam athavā tulyam adhyardham eva vā
prāsādena samucchrāyam suṣira ādi vivarjitam
triṃśat aṅgula nāham tu mūladaṇḍasya nārada
madhyamam ca aṣṭaviṃśat
tad agram ṣaḍviṃśakam bhavet
hi adhastāt garuḍa ālayam

original: lohaṃ dārumayaṃ vāpi garuḍaṃ tatra yojayet // Vis_26.24 //
analyzed: loham dāru mayam vā api garuḍam tatra yojayet
deva abhimukham āsīnam alpa kāyam kṛtāñjalim
ṣoḍaśa aṅgulakam vā api dvādaśa aṅgulakam tathā
aṣṭa aṅgulam atha jñātvā kalpayet garuḍam mune
tathā vā phalakam kām
kṛtvā yathākāmam muni īśvara
tad madhye garuḍam likhya sva sthāne vinatā sutam

original: yojayitvā tataḥ kheśaṃ sthāpayet svasvamantrataḥ // Vis_26.27 //
analyzed: yojayitvā tatas kha īśam sthāpayet sva sva mantrataḥ
vedikā upari mantra jñaḥ su prapām parikalpayet
darbha mālā samāyuktam muktā dāma samanvitam
prapāyām pūrva bhāga ādi patākāḥ tatra yojayet
daśa hastam sapta hastam pañca hastam atha api vā
anyām aṣṭa karām yaṣṭim stambhe yantreṣu yojayet

original: paṭasya lakṣaṇaṃ tasmin viśeṣaṃ kathaya mi te // Vis_26.30 //
analyzed: paṭasya lakṣaṇam tasmin viśeṣam kathaya te
śṛṇuṣva avahitaḥ bhūtvā sarva saṃpad sukha āvaham
vā nava sapta paṭam bhavet
āyāmam iti saṃproktam vistāram adhunā ucyate
ṣaṣ sapta tāla vistāram dvāra vistāram ucyate
puccha āyāmam dvi tālam syāt tad samam śiraḥ ucyate

original: śirasā tu samau jñeyau bhūjau tasyārdhameva vā // Vis_26.33 //
analyzed: śirasā tu samau jñeyau bhūjau tasya ardham eva vā
bhuja dvaya vihīnam vā paṭam etat viśiṣyate
kṣudra prāsāda rūpam ced nava sapta paṭam bhavet
nava hastāt ca nū nyū
nam vai mahā gehe tu na iṣyate

original: yo mohāt kurute tasmin kriyā bhavati niṣphalā // Vis_26.35 //
analyzed: yaḥ mohāt kurute tasmin kriyā bhavati niṣphalā
ālikhet garuḍam tatra suvarṇa ābham su varcasam
iṣyate
nava tāla paricchinnam māna unmāna pramāṇataḥ
kiñcid āyata vṛtta akṣam rakta akṣam nīla nāsikam
utkuñcitam vāma pādam dakṣiṇam pṛṣṭhatas sthitam
gagane gamana ārambham pakṣa vikṣepaṇa anvitam
puṣpa añjali puṭa upetam raudram ca vinatā sutam
nāga ābharaṇa saṃvītam smita āsyam kanaka aṅgadam
karaṇḍa makuṭam nīla vāsasam priya darśanam
su rakta pāṇi aṅghri talam daṃṣṭrābhyām ujjvala ānanam
anantaḥ vāmakaṭakaḥ yajñasūtram tu vāsukiḥ

original: takṣakaḥ kaṭisūtraṃ tu hāraḥ karkoṭakastathā // Vis_26.41 //
analyzed: takṣakaḥ kaṭisūtram tu hāraḥ karkoṭakaḥ tathā
padmaḥ dakṣiṇa karṇe tu mahāpadmaḥ tu vāmataḥ

original: śaṅkhaḥ śiraḥ pradeśe tu gulikastu bhujāntare // Vis_26.42 //
analyzed: śaṅkhaḥ śiraḥ pradeśe tu gulikaḥ tu bhujāntare
etaiḥ aṣṭa uragaiḥ ādyaiḥ bhūṣitam bhujaga uttamaiḥ
ananta gulikau viprau raktau vahni samudbhavau
vāsukiḥ śaṅkhapālaḥ ca pītau candra udbhavau nṛpau
mahākṣabja
takṣakau veśyau śuklau vāri samudbhavau
padma karkoṭakau śūdrau kṛṣṇau vāyu samudbhavau

original: likhitvā garuḍaṃ tatra chatraṃ copari kalpayet // Vis_26.45 //
analyzed: likhitvā garuḍam tatra chatram ca upari kalpayet
atho mṛtasya kalaśam padmam ca eva atra saṃlikhet

original: tābhyāmubhayataḥ kuryāt dīpau dvau śubhadarśanau // Vis_26.46 //
analyzed: tābhyām ubhayatas kuryāt dīpau dvau śubha darśanau
citra ābhāsa pratiṣṭhām tu kārayet mantra vittamaḥ

original: chāyādhivāsanaṃ kuryāt jalaṃ saṃhṛtya deśikaḥ // Vis_26.47 //
analyzed: chāyā adhivāsanam kuryāt jalam saṃhṛtya deśikaḥ
śāyayitvā tatas vedyām saṃhṛtya utpādya tattvataḥ
dhānya rāśim vinikṣipya vedi madhye samantataḥ
vedikā kalaśeṣu aṣṭau ananta ādīn prapūjayet

original: śaṅkhādimaṅgalānāṃ tu vinyaset paritaḥ kramāt // Vis_26.49 //
analyzed: śaṅkha ādi maṅgalānām tu vinyaset paritas kramāt

original: pūrve śaṅkhaṃ niyuñjīta āgneye cakrameva ca /
analyzed: pūrve śaṅkham niyuñjīta āgneye cakram eva ca

original: yāmye tu vinyaset ketuṃ śriyaṃ vai nairṛte tathā // Vis_26.50 //
analyzed: yāmye tu vinyaset ketum śriyam vai nairṛte tathā
darpaṇam vāruṇe bhāge vṛṣabham vāyugocare

original: some tu matsyayugmaṃ tu kumbhamīśānagocare // Vis_26.51 //
analyzed: some tu matsya yugmam tu kumbham īśāna gocare
evam tu maṅgalān
nyasya pūrva ādi krama yogataḥ
pūjayet kalaśeṣu aṣṭa maṅgalāni yathākramam
vāsobhiḥ veṣṭiteṣu eṣu nikṣipta kanakeṣu ca

original: vāsāṃsi madhye saṃstīrya garuḍaṃ tatra śāyayet // Vis_26.53 //
analyzed: vāsāṃsi madhye saṃstīrya garuḍam tatra śāyayet
pratyak grīvam tatas vastraiḥ saṃcchādya pataga īśvaram
tasya dakṣiṇatas kumbham vinyaset taṇḍula upari
vāri pūrṇam su saṃvītam sa daśena ahatena tu
śuklena ambara yugmena mṛdunā su śubhena ca
sa ratnam hema saṃyuktam sa apidhānam sa kūrcakam
tasmin āvāhayet devam garuḍam vinatā sutam
āvāhana vidhim samyak pravakṣyāmi mahā mune

original: sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ pātraṃ tāmraṃ mṛṇmayameva vā // Vis_26.57 //
analyzed: sauvarṇam rājatam pātram tāmram mṛṇmayam eva vā
āḍhakena tu saṃpūrṇam payobhiḥ vāribhiḥ tu vā
tad pātre devam āvāhya ākāśāt mantra vittamaḥ
ehi ehi khaga rāja indra vainateya mahā bala

original: sāṃnidhyaṃ pārṣadaiḥ sārdhaṃ kuru tubhyaṃ namo namaḥ // Vis_26.59 //
analyzed: sāṃnidhyam pārṣadaiḥ sārdham kuru tubhyam namaḥ namaḥ
tad pātra patitam devam ānayet kumbha toyake
mūlamantreṇa mantra jñaḥ tat mantram adhunā ucyate

original: oṃ namo 'ṣṭakulanāgabhūṣaṇāya vainateyāya nāgaśoṇitadigdhāṅgāya suparṇāya saptapātālavāsine pakṣirājāya bhagavadvāhanāya garuḍāya trailokyakṣobhaṇāya
analyzed: om namaḥ ṣṭa kula nāga bhūṣaṇāya vainateyāya nāga śoṇita digdha aṅgāya suparṇāya sapta pātāla vāsine pakṣirājāya bhagavat vāhanāya garuḍāya trailokya kṣobhaṇāya
yugānta bījāya mātuḥ arthe
śoka nāśāya hana hana
vighna nāśāya svāhā

original: anena tu svamantreṇa stutvā tu vihageśvaram /
analyzed: anena tu sva mantreṇa stutvā tu vihageśvaram
sāṃnidhyam kalpayet tatra pakṣirājasya sarvadā
evam āhūya garuḍam dhvaja mudrām pradarśayet

original: vāmasyopari saṃsthāpya dakṣiṇaṃ tu karaṃ samam // Vis_26.62 //
analyzed: vāmasya upari saṃsthāpya dakṣiṇam tu karam samam
aṅguṣṭham cālayet tatra dhvaja mudrām pradarśayet

original: evaṃ mudrāṃ prakurvīta garuḍaṃ sarpabhūṣaṇam // Vis_26.63 //
analyzed: evam mudrām prakurvīta garuḍam sarpa bhūṣaṇam
gandha ādibhiḥ samabhyarcya dhūpa dīpa antam eva hi

original: tataḥ paṭagataṃ bimbaṃ śayānaṃ garuḍasya tu // Vis_26.64 //
analyzed: tatas paṭa gatam bimbam śayānam garuḍasya tu
laya mārgeṇa saṃhṛtya punar utpādayet kramāt
pṛthivī ādini yathākramam
sa vācakāni vinyasya mantra deham prakalpayet
sakalīkaraṇam kṛtvā dhyāna mārgeṇa deśikaḥ
kumbha sthitena toyena prokṣayet tam sva vidyayā
pūrva ādi kalaśa stha adbhiḥ ananta ādīn sva nāmabhiḥ
praṇava ādi namaḥ ntaiḥ ca kuśaiḥ saṃprokṣayet kramāt
sāṃnidhyam prārthayitvā tu yāvat yāga avasānakam
tatas saṃpūjayet sarvaiḥ upacāraiḥ khageśvaram

original: ghṛtāplutaṃ tu mudgānnaṃ naivedyaṃ parikalpayet // Vis_26.69 //
analyzed: ghṛta āplutam tu mudga annam naivedyam parikalpayet
mukha vāsam pradāya atha homa karma samārabhet

original: sthaṇḍilaṃ tu caturdikṣu kṛtvā tatra vidhānataḥ // Vis_26.70 //
analyzed: sthaṇḍilam tu catur dikṣu kṛtvā tatra vidhānataḥ
vaiṣṇava agnim nidhāya atra homa karma samārabhet

original: samidājyena caruṇā pratyekaṃ śatamaṣṭa ca // Vis_26.71 //
analyzed: samidh ājyena caruṇā pratyekam śatam aṣṭa ca
āhutīḥ juhuyuḥ viprāḥ catvāraḥ samam eva tu

original: dīkṣitā eva juhuyuḥ sottarīyāḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥ // Vis_26.72 //
analyzed: dīkṣitāḥ eva juhuyuḥ sa uttarīyāḥ su alaṃkṛtāḥ
catasraḥ mūrtayaḥ proktāḥ pakṣirājasya deśikaiḥ

original: svāhāntaṃ juhuyuḥ sarve mūrtipāḥ mūrtibhāvitāḥ // Vis_26.73 //
analyzed: svāhā antam juhuyuḥ sarve mūrtipāḥ mūrti bhāvitāḥ

original: evaṃ samāpya homaṃ tu spṛśeyuste khageśvaram /
analyzed: evam samāpya homam tu spṛśeyuḥ te khageśvaram

original: pādayorjaṭhare cāsye mūrdhni caiva yathākramam // Vis_26.74 //
analyzed: pādayoḥ jaṭhare ca āsye mūrdhni ca eva yathākramam

original: athavā mūlamantreṇa homamekaṃ tu vā mune /
analyzed: athavā mūlamantreṇa homam ekam tu vā mune
prācīm diśam samāsādya kārayet tantra vittamaḥ

original: vinā homaṃ tu vā kuryādgaruḍasthāpanaṃ mune /
analyzed: vinā homam tu vā kuryāt garuḍa sthāpanam mune
dhvajāt anyatra kartavyam catur hemam yathākramam

original: evaṃ samāpya homaṃ tu sthāpanaṃ garuḍasya ca /
analyzed: evam samāpya homam tu sthāpanam garuḍasya ca
athavā asmin muni śreṣṭha adhivāsanam uttamam
pravakṣyāmi samāsena su puṇya aha puraḥsaram

original: puṇyāhaṃ kārayitvā tu brāhmaṇaiḥ saha mantravit // Vis_26.78 //
analyzed: puṇyāham kārayitvā tu brāhmaṇaiḥ saha mantra vid
bandhayet kautukam paścāt vainateyasya mantrataḥ
vedikā upari dhānyaiḥ ca pūrayet bhāra saṃmitaiḥ
aṣṭa patram likhet padmam vastreṇa ācchādayet punar

original: tadardhaṃ taṇḍulaṃ caiva tasyārdhaṃ tilameva ca // Vis_26.80 //
analyzed: tad ardham taṇḍulam ca eva tasya ardham tilam eva ca
vedikāyām tu saṃstīrya vastraiḥ ācchādayet punar

original: raktapuṣpaṃ tu saṃstīrya gandhapuṣpaiḥ samarcayet // Vis_26.81 //
analyzed: rakta puṣpam tu saṃstīrya gandha puṣpaiḥ samarcayet
tatra eva śāyayet devam pūrva uktena vidhānataḥ
arcayet garuḍam tatra dhūpa dīpa antam eva hi
devasya dakṣiṇe pārśve sthāpayet kumbham uttamam
tasmin āvāhayet kumbhe vainateyam mahā balam

original: ākāśāt patitaṃ kheśaṃ dhvajarūpe hi saṃsthitam /
analyzed: ākāśāt patitam kha īśam dhvaja rūpe hi saṃsthitam

original: ehi kheśa mahābāho vainateya mahābala // Vis_26.84 //
analyzed: ehi kheśa mahā bāho vainateya mahā bala

original: sāṃnidhyaṃ kuru pakṣīśa prasīdātra namo 'stu te /
analyzed: sāṃnidhyam kuru pakṣi īśa prasīda atra namaḥ stu te

original: anenāvāhayitvā tu mantreṇaiva tu deśikaḥ // Vis_26.85 //
analyzed: anena āvāhayitvā tu mantreṇa eva tu deśikaḥ
gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ dravyaiḥ vīśam kumbhe tatas urcayet

original: tatastu kalaśānaṣṭau kumbhasya parito nyaset // Vis_26.86 //
analyzed: tatas tu kalaśān aṣṭau kumbhasya paritas nyaset
indra ādi īśāna paryantam indra ādīn ca kramāt nyaset
kalaśeṣu arcayitvā tu lokeśān gandha puṣpakaiḥ
tad bāhye vinyaset aṣṭa maṅgalān
paritas tathā

original: arcayitvā tato homaṃ prācyāṃ ca sthaṇḍile kramāt // Vis_26.88 //
analyzed: arcayitvā tatas homam prācyām ca sthaṇḍile kramāt
samidh ājya carūn samyak aṣṭottaraśatam pṛthak
juhuyāt vainateyasya mūlamantreṇa deśikaḥ
praṇavam pūrvam uccārya namaskāram tatas kramāt

original: caturviṃśatikaṃ paścāt vyañjanaṃ tu tṛtīyakam // Vis_26.90 //
analyzed: caturviṃśatikam paścāt vyañjanam tu tṛtīyakam
svareṇa ādyena saṃyuktam ūnatriṃśat tathā eva ca

original: ṣoḍaśaṃ coccaret paścāt svareṇaikādaśena ca // Vis_26.91 //
analyzed: ṣoḍaśam ca uccaret paścāt svareṇa ekādaśena ca
vainateya padam paścāt caturthī anta samanvitam
svāhākāra samāyuktam mūlamantram viduḥ budhāḥ
homam samāpya vidhivat kumbhāt āvāhayet paṭe

original: taṃ paṭaṃ prokṣayitvā tu haṃsaḥ śuciṣadi tyṛcā // Vis_26.93 //
analyzed: tam paṭam prokṣayitvā tu haṃsaḥ śuciṣadi ti ṛcā
mūlamantreṇa ca āvāhya garuḍam sarpa bhūṣaṇam
tad rātrau vidhivat prokṣya pūjayet gandha puṣpakaiḥ
saktu khaṇḍa rasa upetam taiḥ
mudga annaiḥ ca gula odanaiḥ
bhakṣyaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ ca anyaiḥ pūjayet tam khageśvaram
mukha vāsam tatas dadyāt stuti mantreṇa toṣayet
pūrva ādi īśāna paryantam indra ādīn ca eva pūjayet
na iṣyate smin muni śreṣṭha pralaya ādi kriyā kramaḥ
dvi prakāraḥ mayā proktaḥ adhivāsa vidhi kramaḥ
ācārya icchā anurūpeṇa kārayet ekadhā atra tu
tatas tu devatā āhvānam sva sva mantreṇa tat niśi
kārayet muni śārdūla jagat saṃrakṣaṇa arthakam
prāsādasya agra bhāge tu garuḍa abhimukham yathā
droṇa dvayena saṃpūrṇam sa toyam rakta varṇakam
tri sūtram tantunā āveṣṭya pañcaratnaiḥ sa pallavaiḥ
kūrca dvaya samāyuktam rakta mālyaiḥ alaṃkṛtam
vastra yugmena saṃveṣṭya gandha puṣpaiḥ tu pūritam
evam lakṣaṇa saṃyukte kumbhe ca āvāhayet budhaḥ

original: indramagniṃ yamaṃ caiva nirṛtiṃ varuṇaṃ tathā // Vis_26.102 //
analyzed: indram agnim yamam ca eva nirṛtim varuṇam tathā
vāyum somam tathā īśānam candra āditya marut gaṇān
vasūn aṣṭa tathā rudrān ekādaśa vināyakam
kārtikeyam vīrabhadram dvādaśa āditya saṃjñakān
tryakṣam pañcamukham devam nīlakaṇṭham umāpatim
bhūteśān ca tathā sarvān sa gaṇān āhvayet tatas

original: mātṝścaiva tathā durgāṃ jyeṣṭhāṃ caiva sarasvatīm // Vis_26.105 //
analyzed: mātṝḥ ca eva tathā durgām jyeṣṭhām ca eva sarasvatīm

original: kāntiṃ śāntiṃ śuciṃ mudrāmumāṃ lakṣmīṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: kāntim śāntim śucim mudrām umām lakṣmīm tathā eva ca

original: sagaṇaiḥ parivāraiśca tān nayet kumbhatoyake // Vis_26.106 //
analyzed: sa gaṇaiḥ parivāraiḥ ca tān nayet kumbha toyake
tatas tu āvāhayet devān kumuda ādīn ca nārada

original: teṣāṃ ca parivārāṇi prayatnenānayed ghaṭe // Vis_26.107 //
analyzed: teṣām ca parivārāṇi prayatnena ānayet ghaṭe
indra ādi īśāna paryantam āvahet kumbha toyake
kuṃbha toya stha devānām arcanam gandha puṣpakaiḥ
dhūpa dīpaiḥ samāpya ivam ghaṇṭā śabda samanvitam
haviḥ nivedayet paścāt sarva deva priya arthakam
anyathākṛta tulyam syāt mahān doṣaḥ bhaviṣyati
tad grāma nāśa kṛt vā api tatrasthaḥ narakam vrajet
tasmāt sarva prayatnena tad kumbhe pārṣadān nyaset
maṇḍape ca aindra bhāge tu catur hasta pramāṇataḥ
gomayena samālipya śālinā vedim ācaret

original: aṣṭadroṇaṃ tadardhaṃ vā tasyārdhaṃ vārdhameva vā // Vis_26.112 //
analyzed: aṣṭa droṇam tad ardham vā tasya ardham vā ardham eva vā
pūrayet sthaṇḍile madhye ca aṣṭa patra abjam ālikhet
nava vastreṇa saṃchādya padmam praṇavam uccaran
dakṣiṇa ādi krameṇa eva śāyayet dakṣiṇāśiraḥ

original: tanmadhye bherikāṃ nyasya navaṃ lakṣaṇasaṃyutam // Vis_26.114 //
analyzed: tad madhye bherikām nyasya navam lakṣaṇa saṃyutam
uttarya uṣṇīṣa saṃyuktaḥ ācāryaḥ mantra vittamaḥ

original: paścimābhimukho bhūtvā tāṃ bherīṃ pūjayet kramāt // Vis_26.115 //
analyzed: paścima abhimukhaḥ bhūtvā tām bherīm pūjayet kramāt
gandha ādibhiḥ samabhyarcya harim smṛtvā ādi mantrataḥ
yāvadrātratrya
vasānam tu tāvat tat niśi tāḍayet
paścāt pañca mahā śabdam nṛtta gīta samanvitam
uttarya uṣṇīṣa saṃyuktaḥ yāmala ācāryataḥ kramāt
kārayet sarva pārṣadyān vainateya ādikān kramāt
evam saṃghoṣayitvā tu yāmala ācārya saṃyutam
rātra antakam ā rātri antam
viśeṣeṇa sarva deva priya arthakam
kuryāt pañca mahā śabdam sadā śubha vivardhanam
grāma rājñoḥ ca vṛddhiḥ syāt tathā eva nagara ādiṣu

original: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena bherīṃ tāṃ niśi tāḍayet // Vis_26.120 //
analyzed: tasmāt sarva prayatnena bherīm tām niśi tāḍayet
anyathā ced mahā doṣaḥ rāṣṭra bhraṃśaḥ bhavet dhruvam

original: tadgrāmaṃ nidhanaṃ yati vyādhibhiḥ pīḍanaṃ dhruvam // Vis_26.121 //
analyzed: tad grāmam nidhanam yati vyādhibhiḥ pīḍanam dhruvam
evam kṛtvā vidhānena dhvaja utsavam atha ācaret
tatas prabhāte vimale śaṅkha bherī rava ākulam
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam kṛtvā grāmam paribhramet
paribhramaṇa velāyām balim kuryāt samāhitaḥ
pūrvam indra ādi lakṣmī antān devān tatra eva pūjayet
nālikera phalam ca eva pañca dravya samanvitam

original: balyannametaiḥ saṃyojya balidānaṃ tu cotsave // Vis_26.125 //
analyzed: bali annam etaiḥ saṃyojya bali dānam tu ca utsave
krameṇa kārayet paścāt pūrvavat homa pūrvakam
dhvaja utthānam divā kuryāt rātrā vāhanam eva ca
sa tad dhvaje devatā āhvānam madhyāhne tu viśeṣataḥ
ārohaṇam divā kuryāt ketoḥ niśi aṅkura arpaṇam
haviṣā bali dānam tu kṛtvā dvāra agra pīṭhayoḥ

original: madhye hastasamāṃ vediṃ madhye devān samarcayet // Vis_26.128 //
analyzed: madhye hasta samām vedim madhye devān samarcayet
āramya bali dānam tu kuryāt grāma ādi vāstuṣu
indra ādi brahma paryantam diś vidikṣu kramāt nyaset
tad kumbhe devam āvāhya tad toyena samarcayet
pūrvāt indra ādi lakṣmī antān devān tatra supūjayet
tatas tu gaṇa saṃyuktam kṛtvā grāma ādi vāstuṣu
kumuda ādīn ca devān ca pūjayet tān anukramāt
ācāryaḥ dhauta vāsāḥ tu uttara abhimukhaḥ sthitaḥ
gandha puṣpa ādinā abhyarcya aindra ādi aiśāntaka ādiṣu
teṣām nāma samuccārya balim dadyāt vicakṣaṇaḥ
yāvat yāga avasānam tu tiṣṭhanti bali devatāḥ
atra kaścid viśeṣaḥ sti devatānām bali krame
dhvaja ārohaṇa kāle vai ca utsaveṣu viśeṣataḥ
yāga avasānam yāvat tu tāvat aindrādikāt mune
yāvat lakṣmī avasānam tu madhyāhne krama yogataḥ
pūjayet gandha puṣpa ādyaiḥ haviṣā vedi madhyame

original: baliṃ dadyādyathālabdhaṃ madhyāhne rātriṣu kramāt // Vis_26.136 //
analyzed: balim dadyāt yathālabdham madhyāhne rātriṣu kramāt

original: teṣāṃ tu balikāryāṇi viṣṇoḥ prītikaraṃ śubham /
analyzed: teṣām tu bali kāryāṇi viṣṇoḥ prīti karam śubham
aṅkura utsava kāla ante utsava artham mahā mune
kārayet yāga siddhi artham yāga maṇḍapa pūjanam
tad pūjā ante muni śreṣṭha homam kuryāt yathāvidhi
homa ante kumuda ādīnām ārabhya balim ācaret
yāvat tīrtha avasānam tu tāvat grāma ādi vāstuṣu
anyathā āvāhana baliḥ dhvaja yāge kṛtaḥ bhavet
dhvaja yāga vināśena utsavaḥ niṣphalaḥ bhavet
utsavasya vināśena nitya pūjā ca niṣphalā
nitya pūjā vināśaḥ tu sarva saṃhāra kāraṇam
tasmāt sarva prayatnena āvāhana balim kuru

original: ānīya garuḍaṃ veśma kṛtvā caiva pradakṣiṇam // Vis_26.142 //
analyzed: ānīya garuḍam veśma kṛtvā ca eva pradakṣiṇam
smṛtvā kāla vidhim paścāt kṛtvā puṇya aha ghoṣaṇam

original: pīṭhasya yāmyapārśve tu dhvajadaṇḍaṃ tu śāyayet // Vis_26.143 //
analyzed: pīṭhasya yāmya pārśve tu dhvaja daṇḍam tu śāyayet
tad agram dakṣiṇe sthāpya mūlam uttaratas nyaset
vimāne paścima dvāre pi uttare śāyayet guruḥ
dakṣiṇa dvāram evam ced ke ced tu
dhvaja stambham mahā mune
pīṭhasya pūrva pārśve tu śāyayet aindraśīrṣakam
tad mūlam avaṭe nyasya mūlamantram anusmaran
uttara dvāram evam syāt
tad dhvaja ārohaṇam prati
anyathā ced mahā doṣaḥ grāma rājñoḥ avṛddhi kṛt

original: dine dine muniśreṣṭha dharmamārgo vinaśyati // Vis_26.147 //
analyzed: dine dine muni śreṣṭha dharma mārgaḥ vinaśyati
tasmāt sarva prayatnena kārayet vidhi coditam
mahā kumbha stha toyena stambham prakṣālya mantrataḥ
tad dhvajam tu samādāya prokṣayet mantra vittamaḥ
mūlamantreṇa matimān dhvaja yaṣṭyāṣṭim
tu bandhayet
niścalam sthāpayitvā tu dhvaja daṇḍena ca uddharet

original: yantreṇa coddharedvāpi rajjunā saha deśikaḥ // Vis_26.150 //
analyzed: yantreṇa ca uddharet vā api rajjunā saha deśikaḥ
vedim kuryāt tu pūrva uktām lakṣaṇena samanvitām

original: vedikāṃ tu samālipya kṛtvā ca svastivācanam // Vis_26.151 //
analyzed: vedikām tu samālipya kṛtvā ca svastivācanam
yaṣṭi agrāt daṇḍa mūla antam darbhān āveṣṭya sādhakaḥ
darbha mālā ādinā āveṣṭya daṇḍa mūla antam eva hi

original: pādyācamanagandhaṃ ca puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: pādya ācamana gandham ca puṣpam dhūpam tathā eva ca
dīpam ca eva yathāyogam ghaṇṭā nāda samanvitam
arcayet garuḍam ca eva carum paścāt nivedayet
phala saktu samopetam mudgra annam ca ghṛta āplutam

original: pṛthak pātre tu saṃsthāpya garuḍāya nivedayet /
analyzed: pṛthak pātre tu saṃsthāpya garuḍāya nivedayet

original: pānīyācamanaṃ datvā mukhavāsaṃ tathaiva ca // Vis_26.155 //
analyzed: pānīya ācamanam da tvā mukha vāsam tathā eva ca
evam abhyarcya garuḍam sarva deva priyam śubham
dikpāla antam anādi antam parivāram atha arcayet
tatas tu lokapālān tu pūjayet vedikā dhare
pūrva ādi krama yogena sva nāmnā paripūjayet
evam dine dine kuryāt sandhyayoḥ ubhayoḥ api

original: niveditaṃ ca yaddravyamannaṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ tathā // Vis_26.158 //
analyzed: niveditam ca yat dravyam annam puṣpam phalam tathā
tat piṇḍam iti vijñeyam strīṇām ca eva pradāpayet

original: sumaṅgalī ca nārī ca satī śuddhā śubhavratā // Vis_26.159 //
analyzed: su maṅgalī ca nārī ca satī śuddhā śubha vratā
tat prasādam iti smṛtvā snātvā upoṣya śubha ānanā

original: prāśayedgaruḍaṃ dhyātvā vandhyā putraṃ prasūyate // Vis_26.160 //
analyzed: prāśayet garuḍam dhyātvā vandhyā putram prasūyate

original: rogārto mucyate rogāt baddho mucyet bandhanāt /
analyzed: roga ārtaḥ mucyate rogāt baddhaḥ mucyet bandhanāt
bhayāt mucyeta āpannaḥ samyak jñānam avāpnuyāt

original: āvāhanārthaṃ devānāṃ garuḍaṃ tu paṭe nyaset /
analyzed: āvāhana artham devānām garuḍam tu paṭe nyaset

original: tatpaṭe sarvadevāṃśca āhvayettu dine dine // Vis_26.162 //
analyzed: tad paṭe sarva devān ca āhvayet tu dine dine

original: lohaṃ dārumayaṃ bimbaṃ vinā vā sthāpyate dhvajam /
analyzed: loham dāru mayam bimbam vinā vā sthāpyate dhvajam

original: yadi dhvajapaṭe bimbaṃ garuḍasya kṛtaṃ bhavet // Vis_26.163 //
analyzed: yadi dhvaja paṭe bimbam garuḍasya kṛtam bhavet
patākā dhvaja saṃyuktam kṛtvā citram api dhvajam
upari pratimām kṛtvā sthāpayet deśika uttamaḥ
vaiṣṇave yāge snapana ante yathāvidhi

original: rātrau bhūtabaliṃ kṛtvā kramādudvāsya pārṣadān // Vis_26.165 //
analyzed: rātrau bhūta balim kṛtvā kramāt udvāsya pārṣadān
kārayet puṣpa yāgam tu yathāvidhi puraḥsaram
puṣpa yāga vidhiḥ proktaḥ mayā śakra vidhānake
tadvat maṇḍalam ālikhya tad vidhānena pūjayet
puṣpa yāga vidhim vakṣye samāsāt muni puṅgava
deveśa yajanam yat tu maṇḍale puṣpa pūrite

original: puṣpayāga iti prokta utsavānte tu kārayet // Vis_26.168 //
analyzed: puṣpayāgaḥ iti proktaḥ utsava ante tu kārayet
prāsāda agre yāmye vāruṇe saumyake thavā

original: pūrvoktamaṇḍapaṃ kṛtvā maṇḍape tu samālikhet // Vis_26.169 //
analyzed: pūrva ukta maṇḍapam kṛtvā maṇḍape tu samālikhet

original: vinodamaṇḍape vātha yatra vā ramate matiḥ /
analyzed: vinoda maṇḍape vā atha yatra vā ramate matiḥ

original: maṇḍalaṃ tu mahānantaṃ cakrābjaṃ ca tathaiva ca // Vis_26.170 //
analyzed: maṇḍalam tu mahānantam cakrābjam ca tathā eva ca

original: bhadrakaṃ vātha vidhivat sūtrapātaṃ tathā bhavet /
analyzed: bhadrakam vā atha vidhivat sūtra pātam tathā bhavet

original: ekahastaṃ dvihastaṃ vā garbhagehasamaṃ tu vā // Vis_26.171 //
analyzed: eka hastam dvi hastam vā garbha geha samam tu vā

original: caturaśraṃ samaṃ kṛtvā sūtreṇaiva tu deśikaḥ /
analyzed: caturaśram samam kṛtvā sūtreṇa eva tu deśikaḥ
ekaviṃśati sūtrāṇi prāc pratyak dakṣiṇa uttaram
āsphālayet bhavanti atra koṣṭakāni catur śatam
madhye ṣoḍaśa koṣṭhāni padma kṣetram udāhṛtam
bahis paṅktim visṛjya atha tri paṅktim grāhayet tatas

original: pādagātrakabhedena vimṛjet paritaḥ krama t // Vis_26.174 //
analyzed: pāda gātraka bhedena vimṛjet paritas

original: antaḥ ṣaṭ ca bahiḥ ṣaṭ ca madhye tu caturaśrakam /
analyzed: antar ṣaṣ ca bahis ṣaṣ ca madhye tu caturaśrakam

original: visṛjettu caturdikṣu gātrārthaṃ tu vicakṣaṇaḥ // Vis_26.175 //
analyzed: visṛjet tu catur dikṣu gātra artham tu vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: antaḥ ṣaṭ ca bahiḥ pañca koṇapādārdhamācaret /
analyzed: antar ṣaṭ ca bahis pañca koṇa pāda ardham ācaret

original: paṅktidvayaṃ tu tadbāhye vīthyarthaṃ parito mṛjet // Vis_26.176 //
analyzed: paṅkti dvayam tu tad bāhye vīthi artham paritas mṛjet
dvāra kaṇṭha upakaṇṭham ca śobhām bāhya pada dvaye

original: antardve caturo bāhye dvārārthaṃ tu caturdiśi // Vis_26.177 //
analyzed: antar dve caturaḥ bāhye dvāra artham tu catur diśi
trīṇi antar bahis ekam syāt viparyāsena mārjayet

original: antareko bahiḥ pañca koṇeṣu parimārjayet // Vis_26.178 //
analyzed: antar ekaḥ bahis pañca koṇeṣu parimārjayet

original: maṇḍalaṃ bhrāmayet kṣetraṃ padmārthaṃ tu puroditam /
analyzed: maṇḍalam bhrāmayet kṣetram padma artham tu purā uditam

original: padmakṣetrārdhamānaṃ tu bhāgaṃ dvādaśamaṃ (-kaṃ?) bahiḥ // Vis_26.179 //
analyzed: padma kṣetra ardha mānam tu bhāgam dvādaśamam kam bahis
visṛjya bhrāmayet śīrṣam tvara kṣetram tu vartalam
prathamam karṇikā kṣetram kesarāṇām dvitīyakam
tṛtīyam dala sandhīnām dala agrāṇām caturthakam
āsphalya koṇa sūtrāṇi koṇa diś madhyamam tatas
kesara agreṣu saṃsthāpya dala antam bhrāmayet tatas

original: dalāntarālamānaṃ tu sandhau sūtraṃ tu vinyaset // Vis_26.182 //
analyzed: dala antarāla mānam tu sandhau sūtram tu vinyaset
dala agram bhramayet tatra tasya agrām tad anantaram

original: etat sādhāraṇaṃ proktaṃ cakrābjaṃ tu tataḥ śṛṇu // Vis_26.183 //
analyzed: etat sādhāraṇam proktam cakrābjam tu tatas śṛṇu
dvi ṣaṭka aṅgula mānena akṣa kṣetram paribhramet
likhet
eka aṅgula pramāṇena ara kṣetram tatas bahis
padmam pūrva ukta vat kuryāt karṇikā kesaraiḥ yutam
ara kṣetrasya vistāram nābhi akṣa kṣetrayoḥ samam
nemi kṣetra anta valayam akṣa kṣetra ardhakam bhavet

original: arāṇi kārayettatra dvau dvau kuryāddalaṃ prati /
analyzed: arāṇi kārayet tatra dvau dvau kuryāt dalam prati
ara kṣetram tridhā kṛtvā guṇa traya vidhānataḥ

original: prathamaṃ sāttvikaṃ caiva dvitīyaṃ rājasaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: prathamam sāttvikam ca eva dvitīyam rājasam bhavet

original: tṛtīyaṃ tāmasaṃ caiva samaṃ kuryāddvijottama // Vis_26.188 //
analyzed: tṛtīyam tāmasam ca eva samam kuryāt dvijottama
sāttvikam kalaśa ākāram dūrvā ākāram tu rājasam
tāmasam kokūḥ
para ākāram pīṭha ākāram tathā upari
papīṭhasya pṛṣṭhatas ca api maṇibandha vat ācaret

original: adhovaktraṃ tu kalaśaṃ nābhikṣetraṃ tu madhyamam // Vis_26.190 //
analyzed: adhovaktram tu kalaśam nābhi kṣetram tu madhyamam
śikhākāram ara antam syāt śeṣam icchā anurūpataḥ
evam eva prakāreṇa cakrabjam paribhāṣitam
maṇḍalam pūrayet puṣpaiḥ karṇikā ādi yathākramam

original: pañcavarṇāni puṣpāṇi puṣpayāge śubhāni tu // Vis_26.192 //
analyzed: pañca varṇāni puṣpāṇi puṣpa yāge śubhāni tu

original: śvetaṃ raktaṃ ca pītaṃ ca kṛṣṇaṃ haritameva ca /
analyzed: śvetam raktam ca pītam ca kṛṣṇam haritam eva ca
śuddha varṇāni ca etāni miśritāni aparāṇi ca
puṣpeṣu puṣpa vargeṣu chedayitvā vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: pīteṣu karṇikāṃ pūrya raktaṃ vai kesarāṇi ca // Vis_26.194 //
analyzed: pīteṣu karṇikām pūrya raktam vai kesarāṇi ca
karṇikā valayam raktam haritam vā dvijottama

original: kesarānte ca valayaṃ śvetapuṣpeṇa pūrayet // Vis_26.195 //
analyzed: kesara ante ca valayam śvetapuṣpeṇa pūrayet
daleṣu mūla bhāgeṣu śveta rakta vimiśritaiḥ
dala agrān rakta puṣpeṇa pūrayet deśika uttamaḥ
dalānām sandhi deśe tu śyāma puṣpeṇa pūrayet
dala anta rekhām vipra indra kusumaiḥ haritena ca
pūrayet nābhi rekhām ca sitaiḥ puṣpaiḥ manoramaiḥ
madhya rekhām muni śreṣṭha pīta puṣpeṇa pūrayet
antāḥ rekhāḥ tu mantra jñaḥ kusumaiḥ raktakaiḥ atathā

original: araṃ cottararekhāṃ vai haritai raktakaistathā // Vis_26.199 //
analyzed: aram ca uttara rekhām vai haritaiḥ raktakaiḥ tathā
nemi ādi rekhām kṛṣṇena
sitapuṣpakaiḥ

original: nemiṃ raktena pūryātha pītapuṣpeṇa vā dvija // Vis_26.200 //
analyzed: nemim raktena pūrya atha pīta puṣpeṇa vā dvija
puṣpa maṇḍalam uddiṣṭam puṣpa yāge viśeṣataḥ

original: evaṃ lakṣaṇasaṃyuktaṃ cakrābjaṃ kārayet sudhīḥ // Vis_26.201 //
analyzed: evam lakṣaṇa saṃyuktam cakra abjam kārayet sudhīḥ
dhvaja āroha ādi jīrtha antam prāyaścittam tu yat bhavet

original: tasya doṣavighātārthaṃ puṣpayāgaṃ ca kārayet // Vis_26.202 //
analyzed: tasya doṣa vighāta artham puṣpa yāgam ca kārayet
prāsādasya agratas kuryāt dakṣiṇe paścime vā

original: uttare vā dvijaśreṣṭha maṇḍapaṃ pūrvavat kramāt // Vis_26.203 //
analyzed: uttare vā dvijaśreṣṭha maṇḍapam pūrvavat kramāt
tasya madhye likhet vidvān cakra abjam lakṣaṇa anvitam

original: dvāre dvāre tu ghaṭikā dve dve caiva tu vinyaset // Vis_26.204 //
analyzed: dvāre dvāre tu ghaṭikāḥ dve dve ca eva tu vinyaset
śarāvam vinyaset tadvat pūrva ādiṣu yathākramam
aindra ādi aiśāna paryantam pālikāḥ vinyaset kramāt
tad pārśve maṅgalān nyasya
śaṅkha ādīn ca yathākramam

original: maṇḍalaṃ pūrayet puṣpaiḥ karṇikādi yathākramam // Vis_26.06 //
analyzed: maṇḍalam pūrayet puṣpaiḥ karṇikā ādi yathākramam

original: śriyādīn koṇadeśeṣu nyaset padmopari kramāt // Vis_26.207 //
analyzed: śriyā ādīn koṇa deśeṣu nyaset padma upari kramāt
indra ādi parivārān ca dikṣu ca eva yathākramam
viṣvaksenam garutmantam yajet tatra eva saṃnidhau
iti evam yogayet vidvān puṣpa vinyāsa maṇḍale

original: sa yāti viṣṇusālokyaṃ jñānayajñena saṃyajet // Vis_26.109 //
analyzed: sa yāti viṣṇu sālokyam jñāna yajñena saṃyajet
puṣpa yāga vidhiḥ proktaḥ mayā śakra vidhānake
tat maṇḍalam samālikhya tad vidhānena pūjayet
bhūta krūra balim kṛtvā kramāt udvāsya pārṣadān
snātvā ācamya śuciḥ bhūtvā samabhyarcya khageśvaram
udvasayet yathāpūrvam āhūtāḥ tatra devatāḥ

original: nitye naimittike kāmye dhvajasaṃsthānaṃ matam // Vis_26.212 //
analyzed: nitye naimittike kāmye dhvaja saṃsthānam matam
ācāryam pūjayet paścāt yathāśakti samāhitaḥ
iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām ṣaṅviśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
saptaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
viṣvaksenaḥ
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi utsavasya vidhim param
sarva śānti karam puṇyam sarva yajña phala pradam
rāja rāṣṭra vivṛddhi artham śrīmat trailokya bhūṣaṇam
utsavam tu eka rātram tu tri rātrikam atha api vā

original: pañcarātraṃ tu vā vipra saptarātramathāpi vā // Vis_27.3 //
analyzed: pañca rātram tu vā vipra sapta rātram atha api vā

original: navarātraṃ tu vā kuryāt utsavasya tu vistaram /
analyzed: nava rātram tu vā kuryāt utsavasya tu vistaram

original: ekarātrotsavo brāhmaḥ triyahaḥ śaiva ucyate // Vis_27.4 //
analyzed: eka rātra utsavaḥ brāhmaḥ tri yahaḥ śaivaḥ ucyate
pañca ahaḥ ca aindra vijñeyaḥ sapta ahaḥ ca ārṣakaḥ bhavet

original: navāho daivikaḥ prokta utsavaḥ pañcadhocyate // Vis_27.5 //
analyzed: nava ahaḥ daivikaḥ proktaḥ utsavaḥ pañcadhā ucyate
daivikam sarva śānti artham rājya vardhana mārṣakam
aindram durbhikṣa nāśa artham śaivam roga vināśanam

original: brāhmaṃ tu brahmavṛddhiḥ syāt utsavaṃ pañcadhā phalam /
analyzed: brāhmam tu brahmavṛddhiḥ syāt utsavam pañcadhā phalam

original: ekāhaṃ triyahaṃ vāpi saptāhaṃ tu navāhakam // Vis_27.7 //
analyzed: eka aham triyaham vā api sapta aham tu nava ahakam
pañca aham ādi kālaḥ yam utsavam hrāsayet na tu
vardhayet tu yathākāmam hrāsanam rāṣṭra nāśa kṛt
rāta vibhrama kṛt ca api durbhikṣa bhaya kṛt bhavet
utsavānām tatas kuryāt kārakasya anurūpataḥ
śubha nakṣatra yoge ca tithi vāra nirīkṣite
pratiṣṭhā ṛkṣake vā atha nagara grāma ṛke
rājñaḥ sva janma nakṣatre yajamāna icchayā kuru

original: tatkramaṃ te pravakṣyāmi hareḥ suramune śṛṇu // Vis_27.11 //
analyzed: tad kramam te pravakṣyāmi hareḥ sura mune śṛṇu
savaḥ tu amaṅgalam viddhi tad nirāsāt tad utsavaḥ
pañca uttara daśa aṅgam ca kathyate tān anukramāt
prathamam ca aṅkura āvāpaḥ patākā ārohaṇam tatas

original: śuddhasnānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ syāt spapanaṃ tu tataḥ param // Vis_27.13 //
analyzed: śuddha snānam tṛtīyam syāt spapanam tu tatas param
aṅkurasya utsavam paścāt homaḥ syāt bhūṣaṇam tatas

original: aṣṭamaṃ tu baliṃ vidyāt navamaṃ tu mahotsavam // Vis_27.14 //
analyzed: aṣṭamam tu balim vidyāt navamam tu mahā utsavam
tīrtha adhivāsanam paścāt tīrtha snānam anantaram
dvādaśam snapanam vidyāt puṣpa yāgam anantaram
dakṣiṇā saṃpradānam ca dhvajasya api avarohaṇam
pañca uttara daśa aṅgaḥ yam utsavaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
sāyaṃprātar kṛtena eva homena ca samanvitam

original: dakṣiṇa bhiśca saṃyuktaṃ vaiṣṇavānāṃ ca pūjanam // Vis_27.17 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇa bhiḥ ca saṃyuktam vaiṣṇavānām ca pūjanam
ācaṇḍāla antam annādyam utsavasya eṣa saṃgrahaḥ
tad bhūta pitṛ yakṣābhiḥ brahmaśaivāni ahāni ca

original: vaiṣṇavāni ca śeṣāṇi sāyaṃ prātarbaliṃ haret /
analyzed: vaiṣṇavāni ca śeṣāṇi sāyam prātar balim haret
sapta ahe yājñikaiḥ dravyaiḥ balim kuryāt vicakṣaṇaḥ
pañca ahe brahmaka ādiḥ syāt tri yahe vaiṣṇava ādayaḥ
bali bhramaṇa pūrvam tu homam kuryāt vicakṣaṇaḥ
yātrā ca utsava bimbasya dvi kālam paścimam bhavet
eka kālam atho vā api kārayet tantra vittamaḥ
pūrvāhṇe vā atha madhyāhne bali dānam samācaret
bali bhramaṇa velāyām paribhramya śanais śanais
śaṅkha di kumbha paryantam aṣṭa maṅgalakān kramāt

original: brahmacārī gṛhastho vā vānaprastho 'tha bhikṣukaḥ // Vis_27.23 //
analyzed: brahmacārī gṛhasthaḥ vā bhikṣukaḥ
dhārayet śirasā vidvān vaiṣṇavān maṅgalān pṛthak

original: eṣa kramo mayā prokto balidravyamathocyate // Vis_27.24 //
analyzed: eṣa kramaḥ mayā proktaḥ bali dravyam atha ucyate
sitāḥ sumanasaḥ rajanī parāga lājā dadhi kamalam sita candanena

original: ahani sasaktu mune 'tha bhūtasaṃjñe prathamadine balirāha tṛptikārī // Vis_27.25 //
analyzed: ahani bhūta saṃjñe prathama dine baliḥ āha tṛpti kārī
tila kuṅkuma uda akṣata nīlapuṣpam dvitīye payaḥ miśritam vāsare syāt

original: balistṛptikārī pitṝṇāṃ tadīye mune kathyate tattṛtīye baliśca // Vis_27.26 //
analyzed: baliḥ tṛpti kārī pitṝṇām tadīye mune kathyate tad tṛtīye baliḥ ca

original: raktaṃ puṣpaṃ sarpiṣāpūpalājāḥ śarādaṃ vā karambheṇa yuktam /
analyzed: raktam puṣpam sarpiṣā apūpa lājāḥ śarādam vā karambheṇa yuktam

original: yakṣāṇāṃ tattṛptihetormunīndrai- riṣṭaiḥ prājñairahnireṣā baleḥ syāt // Vis_27.27 //
analyzed: yakṣāṇām tad tṛpti hetoḥ muni indraiḥ riṣṭaiḥ prājñaiḥ ahniḥ eṣā baleḥ syāt
eka uda nīla utpala nārikela kṣīreṇa śāleḥ atha piṣṭakam ca

original: kākodarāṇāṃ divase turīye saktūni cāhurbalimāryavaryāḥ // Vis_27.28 //
analyzed: kākodarāṇām divase turīye saktūni ca āhuḥ balim ārya varyāḥ
kamalam akṣatam utpala vāsitam jalam atho kamalāsana vāsare

original: balirayaṃ munibhiḥ parigīyate kanakasaṃnibhapuṣpacayaiḥ saha // Vis_27.29 //
analyzed: baliḥ ayam munibhiḥ parigīyate kanaka saṃnibha puṣpa cayaiḥ saha
pāṭala surabhita pūta jalaiḥ vā vāsita kusuma cayaiḥ caruḥ eṣā

original: pūpagulayuta iti ṣaṣṭhadine syāt pāvanacoditaharidinapūjā // Vis_27.30 //
analyzed: pūpa gula yutaḥ iti ṣaṣṭha dine syāt pāvana codita hari dina pūjā

original: viṣṇorutsavasaptame dinavare tattṛptikārī baliḥ puṣpaṃ śyāmalamodanaṃ ca sagulaṃ sanmallikāgandhikam /
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ utsava saptame dina vare tad tṛpti kārī baliḥ puṣpam śyāmalam odanam ca sa gulam sat mallikā gandhikam

original: jātīvāsitamambupāyasamapi syādaṣṭame vāsare puṣpaṃ mecakamāha nārada mahāviṣṇordine syādbaliḥ // Vis_27.31 //
analyzed: jātī vāsitam ambu pāyasam api syāt aṣṭame vāsare puṣpam mecakam āha nārada mahā viṣṇoḥ dine syāt baliḥ

original: sadāviṣṇostṛptayai kṛsaramaśilairgandhanivahaiḥ sadīpairyuktaṃ śītaṃ jalamakhilavarṇaiśca kusumaiḥ /
analyzed: sadā viṣṇoḥ tṛptayai kṛsaram aśilaiḥ gandha nivahaiḥ sa dīpaiḥ yuktam śītam jalam akhila varṇaiḥ ca kusumaiḥ

original: baliḥ saktūpetaṃ navamadivase nāradamune yathāvat kāryo 'yaṃ nṛpajanavivṛddhyai balividhiḥ // Vis_27.32 //
analyzed: baliḥ saktu upetam navama divase nārada mune yathāvat kāryaḥ yam nṛpa jana vivṛddhyai bali vidhiḥ

original: kumudādīnāṃ tu nāmāni teṣāṃ ca parivārakam /
analyzed: kumuda ādīnām tu nāmāni teṣām ca parivārakam
pravakṣyāmi muni śreṣṭha samāsena yathākramam
kumudaḥ kumudākṣaḥ ca vāmanaḥ
śaṅku karṇaḥ sarva netraḥ su mukhaḥ su pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: devāśca teṣāṃ ripavo 'surāśca gandharvayakṣāḥ pitaro bhujaṅgāḥ /
analyzed: devāḥ ca teṣām surāḥ ca gandharva yakṣāḥ pitaraḥ bhujaṅgāḥ

original: yakṣāśca yāścāpi piśācajātiḥ ye ṣaṣṭhako devagaṇā grahākhyāḥ // Vis_27.35 //
analyzed: yakṣāḥ ca yāḥ ca api piśāca jātiḥ ye ṣaṣṭhakaḥ deva gaṇāḥ graha ākhyāḥ
balim tu maṇḍale dadyāt vedi ādi krama yogataḥ
catuṣpatheṣu koṇeṣu tripatha ekapatheṣu ca
devāgāre tha valmīke kūpa tīre tha parvate
taṭāke caitya vṛkṣeṣu parvatasya samīpa ge ke
evamādiṣu deśeṣu toraṇāni ca kārayet

original: saṃsthāpya paritaḥ samyak grāmādyaṣṭasu vāstuṣu // Vis_27.38 //
analyzed: saṃsthāpya paritas samyak grāma ādi aṣṭasu vāstuṣu
utthāpayitvā ketūnām toraṇa ante pṛthak pṛthak
athavā atra muni śreṣṭha ketūn grāma ādi vāstuṣu
aṣṭa dikṣu yathāyogam bali pīṭham prakalpayet
tāla dvaya pramāṇena vistāra āyāma tādṛśam
mekhalā dvaya saṃyuktam pratyakam catur aṅgulam

original: tanmadhye karṇikāṃ kuryāt vṛttāṃ vā caturaśrakām // Vis_27.41 //
analyzed: tad madhye karṇikām kuryāt vṛttām vā caturaśrakām
catur aṅgulam āyāmām karṇikām muni sattama

original: evaṃ pīṭhavidhiḥ prokto haripārṣadān śṛṇu // Vis_27.42 //
analyzed: evam pīṭha vidhiḥ proktaḥ hari pārṣadān śṛṇu
nāradaḥ

original: vada mamākhila devagurorguro pratidiśaṃ haripāriṣadān kramāt /
analyzed: vada mama akhila devaguroḥ guro pratidiśam hari pāriṣadān kramāt
balibhujaḥ kumuda ādi purohitān hari mahā utsava karmaṇi vāstuṣu
viṣvaksenaḥ
aham khalu akhila aṇḍa yoneḥ aśeṣa dhiṣaṇā adhīśituḥ aprameyasya anavarata sukhinaḥ hareḥ mahā utsava ādiṣu
grāma ādi vāstuṣu aindra ādi diś sthitānām kumuda ādīnām varṇa rūpa vāhana āyudha parivāra mantra arcana ādi
yathāmati kathayiṣye
kumudaḥ tu punar śubhraḥ

original: pārṣadaḥ kundavāsāḥ tryakṣaḥ śaṅkhacakradharaḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭo grāmābhimukho hastyārūḍho devagrahagaṇamadhye sthitaḥ /
analyzed: pārṣadaḥ kunda vāsāḥ tryakṣaḥ śaṅkha cakra dharaḥ kṛta añjali puṭaḥ grāma abhimukhaḥ hasti ārūḍhaḥ deva graha gaṇa madhye sthitaḥ

original: utkaṭaḥ prakaṭonmukho vimukho 'śvagrīvo 'śvavadano 'śvajihvo hastivaktro kumudo hastipādaḥ keśavavāmananarakanaramardanamandadṛṣṭikaṇḍu (kandu?)
analyzed: utkaṭaḥ prakaṭa unmukhaḥ vimukhaḥ śva grīvaḥ śva vadanaḥ śva jihvaḥ hasti vaktraḥ kumudaḥ hasti pādaḥ keśava vāmana naraka nara mardana manda dṛṣṭi kaṇḍu kandu

original: pañcāśadbhiḥ pārṣadaiḥ saumyaiḥ nānāvidhākāraiḥ parivṛtamena saṃsmṛtya arghyapādyācamanagandhapuṣpadhūpadīpairabhyarcyānantaraṃ
analyzed: pañcāśadbhiḥ pārṣadaiḥ saumyaiḥ nānāvidha ākāraiḥ saṃsmṛtya arghya pādya ācamana gandha puṣpa dhūpa dīpaiḥ abhyarcya anantaram

original: taddinavihitahavyaṃ nivedya baliṃ dadyāt añjaliṃ darśayitvā hareḥ mukhādivāsaṃ vidhāya (mukhavāsaṃ datvā?)
analyzed: tad dina vihita havyam nivedya balim dadyāt añjalim darśayitvā hareḥ mukha ādi vāsam vidhāya mukha vāsam da tvā
tad devatā tṛpti artham śaṅkha dundubhi nṛtta geya ādi kārayet

original: kumudākṣaṃ punaḥ āgneyyāṃ sthitaṃ nīlavāsasaṃ triṇetraṃ kākavaktraṃ caturbhujaṃ muṣṭiyuddhahastaṃ
analyzed: kumudākṣam punar āgneyyām sthitam nīla vāsasam trinetram kāka vaktram catur bhujam muṣṭi yuddha hastam
khaḍga mudgara dhāriṇam mahiṣa ārūḍham grāma abhimukham asura graha gaṇa madhya stham

āgneya nidhana agnijihva hutāśana agni rūpa agni keśa agnivarṇa agni agnivaktra mahāvaktra mahāsena mahodara karāla kākajihva kākavaktra agnivaktra maṇḍu maṇḍūka vaktra devadevalaka śarva kaśapaka śaṅkuśaṅkuśrava mārīca droṇa mārīca mahiṣa māhiṣa kumbha nāsa vināsa kumbhakarṇa vikarṇa vidāri vikrama maskari maskara sūkara sūkara āsya śaśa śaśa mukha siṃha siṃha mukha narasiṃha narakāladhṛk kāla sūtra sūtra vināli nāla karṇaiḥ

original: parivṛtaṃ amuṃ yathāpūrvamabhyarcya taddinabalidravyaṃ nivedyācamanaṃ datvā añjalimudrāṃ
analyzed: parivṛtam amum yathāpūrvam abhyarcya tad dina bali dravyam nivedya ācamanam da tvā añjali mudrām
darśayitvā balibare mukha vāsa antam vidhāya mukha vāsam da tvā
tad digdeva tṛpti artham tūryāṇi ghāṣayet

original: antakāśāsthitaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ puṇḍarīkatviṣaṃ puṇḍarīkavadanaṃ trilocanaṃ caturbhujaṃ
analyzed: anta kāśa āsthitam puṇḍarīkam puṇḍarīka tviṣam puṇḍarīka vadanam tri locanam catur bhujam
śaṅkha cakra dharam kṛta añjali puṭam grāma abhimukham aśva ārūḍham pitṛ graha gaṇa madhya stha
yama dharmadhara dharmadharmarāja dhanurdhara vinaya praśraya niśreya nirguṇa alasa kuṇapa krūra bāhu kuñjara prāṃśu damana niṣkopa niranukrośa nirmama vivāhā
vibhava hutāśa ahyū bahūḥ

dhvara kṣaṇa saṃjñā ekalapā kala kaṅka kaṭaka avaṭa śaṅkhī cakrī gadī khaḍgī śārṅgī śārṅgadhara vāsudeva bhadra ketumat ketu kakṣamī jvalana kiṃnara aśvattha supta sujapana japa paścima kaikṣika svaṃja bāḍava kṣamībhiḥ parivṛtam
pūrvavat abhyarcya tad dina balim nivedya ācamanam da tvā añjalim darśayitvā anantaram bali kautuke
mukha vāsam vidhāya da tvā
tad digdevatā tṛpti artham śaṅkha ādi ghoṣayet

original: nirṛtyāśāsthitaṃ vāmanaṃ dhūmravarṇaṃ dhūmravāsasaṃ triṇayanaṃ caturbhujaṃ śūlakhaḍgamudgaradharaṃ
analyzed: nirṛti āśā sthitam vāmanam dhūmra varṇam dhūmra vāsasam triṇayanam catur bhujam śūla khaḍga mudgara dharam
muṣṭi yuddha hastam śakaṭa ārūḍham grāma abhimukham yātu graha antar sthitam

balambi ṛti prakṛti vikṛti sukṛti dāruṇa damaka rakṣaka lakṣaka mādhava māṃsaka niṣṭhura khara bhāṣaṇa pralambaka prāṇana praṇaya vīrasena aṅgada vibhāṣa vibhīṣaṇa raktākṣa lohitākṣa raktajihva vijahvaka vidyutkeśa viśālākṣa vikṣara vīraha akṣara prākṣara kāmarūpī virūpī sarvaga sarvavid gaura saṃbhava prabhava vāruṇa vasuvimarda madana damaka rakṣaka lakṣaka mādhava māṃsaka niṣṭhura khara bhāṣaṇa pralambaka prāṇa

original: e vaikartanavikartṛkapardīpṛthukandakīkandakanākīvaruṇāruṇaiḥ parivṛtaṃ pūrvavadabhyarcya taddinabalyācamanaṃ vidhāyāñjaliṃ nirvartya[bali]  #
analyzed: vaikartana vikartṛ kapardī pṛthukandakī kandaka nākī varuṇa aruṇaiḥ parivṛtam pūrvavat abhyarcya tad dina bali ācamanam vidhāya añjalim nirvartya bali
kautuke mukha vāsam vidhāya ā da tvā
nantaram tūryāṇi ghoṣayet

original: varuṇadigālayaṃ śaṅkukarṇaṃ pītavarṇaṃ trivīkṣaṇaṃ pītavāsasaṃ caturbhujaṃ śaṅkhacakradharaṃ
analyzed: varuṇa diś ālayam śaṅku karṇam pīta varṇam trivīkṣaṇam pītavāsasam catur bhujam śaṅkha cakra dharam
kṛta añjali puṭam grāma abhimukham vyāghra ārūḍham pitṛ graha gaṇa madhya stham

etat tīrtha mayam puṇyam tīrthacūrṇam iti smṛtam

original: rajanīṣvekavarjyaṃ tu droṇaṃ vāpyardhameva vā // Vis_27.107 //
analyzed: rajanīṣu eka varjyam tu droṇam vā api ardham eva vā

original: āḍhakaṃ vā tadardhaṃ vā cūrṇaṃ kuryāttu mantravit /
analyzed: āḍhakam vā tad ardham vā cūrṇam kuryāt tu mantra vid
cūrṇānām api alābhe tu rajanī cūrṇam uttamam
śālibhiḥ vā atha sarveṣām snāpayet mūlavidyayā
ghṛta ādi sneha dravyāṇām āḍhakam vā ardham eva vā
sarveṣām api alābhe tu pūrayet gandha vāriṇā
tena eva snāpayet devam yathā vitta anusārataḥ
yat proktam ca utsave puṣpam tasyāḥ
evam tu mantra vid

original: tattaddoṣaṃ smaret kṣipya tulasī cotpalākṣatam // Vis_27.111 //
analyzed: tad tad doṣam smaret kṣipya tulasī ca utpala akṣatam

original: evaṃ dravyaṃ tu saṃproktaṃ daivataṃ kathayāmi te /
analyzed: evam dravyam tu saṃproktam daivatam kathayāmi te
dāmodara avasānāḥ ca keśava ādyāḥ ca mūrtayaḥ
ghṛta ādi kalaśānām tu devatāḥ parikīrtitāḥ

original: rakṣārthaṃ kalaśānāṃ tu kumudādīni daivatam // Vis_27.113 //
analyzed: rakṣā artham kalaśānām tu kumuda ādīni daivatam
uddhāraṇa kramam yena tat proktam daivatam kramāt

original: evaṃ saṃsthāpya vidhivat paścācchuddhiṃ samācaret // Vis_27.114 //
analyzed: evam saṃsthāpya vidhivat paścāt śuddhim samācaret
puṇyāham vācayitvā tu prokṣayet kuśa vāriṇā

original: evaṃ saṃprokṣya vidhivat tataḥ snapanamācaret // Vis_27.115 //
analyzed: evam saṃprokṣya vidhivat tatas snapanam ācaret
ghṛtena dadhnā payasā madhunā uṣṇāka dakena ca

original: snāpayet pañcacūrṇaiśca saṃprapūjya prabhuṃ mune // Vis_27.116 //
analyzed: snāpayet pañcacūrṇaiḥ ca saṃprapūjya prabhum mune
aṣṭa akṣareṇa gandha ambhaḥ puṣpa ambhaḥ dvādaśa akṣaraiḥ

original: maṅgalaṃ viṣṇugāyatryā śuddhāmbhaḥ praṇavena tu // Vis_27.117 //
analyzed: maṅgalam viṣṇugāyatryā śuddha ambhaḥ praṇavena tu
tīrtha cūrṇam tatas snāpya mūlamantreṇa sādhakaḥ
snapana ante tu saṃsthāpya rajanī cūrṇam uttamam
ājya ādi niśi
cūrṇa antam evam saṃsnāpayet kramāt
gandha puṣpa ādinā abhyarcya dīpa antam ca mahā mune
snapana ante tu mantra jñaḥ kumuda ādīn ca rakṣakān

original: devasya śirasi bhrāmya bhaktānāṃ tu pradāpayet // Vis_27.120 //
analyzed: devasya śirasi bhrāmya bhaktānām tu pradāpayet

original: evaṃ tu snapanaṃ kṛtvā nadīsnānaṃ tu kārayet /
analyzed: evam tu snapanam kṛtvā nadī snānam tu kārayet

original: tīre devaṃ samānīya kuśakūrcena mārjayet // Vis_27.121 //
analyzed: tīre devam samānīya kuśa kūrcena mārjayet
pādya ādi dīpa paryantam arcayet kautukam tatas

original: avagāhya ca tattīrthaṃ tīrthānāvāhya sarvataḥ // Vis_27.122 //
analyzed: avagāhya ca tat tīrtham tīrthān āvāhya sarvatas
kṛtvā aghamarṣaṇam tatra pañca mantraiḥ samāhitaḥ

original: jalakeliṃ tataḥ kṛtvā tīramāsādya deśikaḥ // Vis_27.123 //
analyzed: jala kelim tatas kṛtvā tīram āsādya deśikaḥ
tatra tīrtha jale snātaḥ sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate
alaṃkṛtya tu vastra ādyaiḥ gandha puṣpa ādinā arcayet
haviḥ mahāhaviḥ vā api da tvā nṛtta ādi kārayet

original: devasya pūrvadigdeśe baliṃ dadyāt samāhitaḥ // Vis_27.125 //
analyzed: devasya pūrva diś deśe balim dadyāt samāhitaḥ
namaḥ stu sarva devebhyaḥ evam uccārya mantrataḥ
pālikā ādyaiḥ alaṃkṛtya yānam āropayet harim

original: punaḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kuryāt grāmaṃ vā nagaraṃ tu vā /
analyzed: punar pradakṣiṇam kuryāt grāmam vā nagaram tu vā
ālayam vā api abhāve tu yathā vitta anusārataḥ
svastivācana saṃyuktam śaṅkha bherī rava ākulam
pradīpa śata saṃyuktam nṛtta gīta ādi saṃyutam
puṣpa vṛṣṭi samāyuktam akṣatā
sāma gīta samāyuktam jaya śabda samanvitam
pradakṣiṇam parikramya na drutam na vilambitam
yāga bhūmim samāsādya pūjayitvā yathākramam
snapanam vidhivat kṛtvā puṣpa yāgam samārabhet

original: kṛtvā padmaṃ cakrakaṃ maṇḍalaṃ vā tatra sthāne vāsudevādikāṃ (-kā?) śca // Vis_27.131 //
analyzed: kṛtvā padmam cakrakam maṇḍalam vā tatra sthāne vāsudeva ādikām śca

original: śaṅkhādyā vai bāhyato lokapālāḥ viṣvakseno vainateyaśca bāhye /
analyzed: śaṅkha ādyāḥ vai bāhyatas lokapālāḥ viṣvaksenaḥ vainateyaḥ ca bāhye

original: bhūteśā vai bāhyataḥ pūjanīyāḥ gaulyannaṃ vai bhakṣyamagneśca kāryam // Vis_27.132 //
analyzed: bhūta īśāḥ vai bāhyatas pūjanīyāḥ gaulī annam vai bhakṣyam agneḥ ca kāryam

original: puṇyāhārghyaṃ puṣpamekaṃ baliṃ ca pūjāpujye mūlabimbe sthitaṃ vai /
analyzed: puṇya aha arghyam puṣpam ekam balim ca pūjā pujye mūla bimbe sthitam vai
cakra lakṣaṇa mārge tu śeṣam asmin niyojayet
dhvaja avarohaṇam kuryāt udvāsya eva tu devatāḥ
da tvā mahā balim tābhyaḥ mudga anna apūpa lājakaiḥ

original: saktubhirgrāmabāhye ca madhye caiva kṣamāpya ca /
analyzed: saktubhiḥ grāma bāhye ca madhye ca eva kṣamāpya ca
dhvajāt visarjayet devam vainateyam sva mantrataḥ
eka rātri dvi rātre vā tri rātre tu mahā mune

original: dhvajāvarohaṇaṃ kuryāt adhikaṃ tu na kārayet // Vis_27.136 //
analyzed: dhvaja avarohaṇam kuryāt adhikam tu na kārayet

original: adhikaṃ yadi cettatra snapanaṃ kārayet kramāt /
analyzed: adhikam yadi ced tatra snapanam kārayet kramāt
utsava pratimāyām tu snapanam tu adhama uttamam
pañcaviṃśatibhiḥ vā api kalaśaiḥ dvādaśaiḥ tu vā
yathā vitta anusāreṇa
snapanam kārayet harim
dhvaja avarohaṇam paścāt kārayet mantra vittamaḥ
karṣaṇa ādiṣu pūjāyām pratiṣṭhā ārohaṇa ādiṣu
dhvāja ārohaṇa velāyām dhvajasya api avarohaṇe

original: utsave balidāne tu śaṅkhādyaiścaiva ghoṣayet // Vis_27.140 //
analyzed: utsave bali dāne tu śaṅkha ādyaiḥ ca eva ghoṣayet
śaṅkha tūrya ādi nirghoṣam hari tṛpti karam mune
rakṣaḥ vidrāvaṇam ca eva rāja śānti karam tathā
rāṣṭra vṛddhi karam samyak yajamāna sukha āvaham

original: snapanasthāpanādīnāṃ yā mudrā yasya kathyate // Vis_27.142 //
analyzed: snapana sthāpana ādīnām yā mudrā yasya kathyate

original: tāṃ tathāśaknuvan kartuṃ mūlamantraṃ nyaset kare /
analyzed: tām tathā aśaknuvan kartum mūlamantram nyaset kare

original: tena kurvan kriyāḥ sarvāḥ kareṇa munipuṅgava // Vis_27.143 //
analyzed: tena kurvan kriyāḥ sarvāḥ kareṇa muni puṅgava
tṛtīyam samanudhyānam te ca ante ñjali kārakāḥ
tṛptim kurvanti devasya jala sthāna jaleśvarān
tṛpta tarpa
yet ātmanaḥ tṛptim iti guhya upadeśakaḥ
deva utsava ādi kriyayā nṛpasya bala āyuḥ ārogya jaya śriyaḥ ca
rāṣṭrasya vṛddhiḥ dhana dhānya yuj vai prayojayitṛ ādi phalam sukha ādi
utsava aṅgam atho vakṣye yāga maṇḍapam uttamam

original: dakṣiṇe gopurasyaiva āneyyāṃ diśi vai tathā /
analyzed: dakṣiṇe gopurasya eva āneyyām diśi vai tathā
yāmyāyām uttare vā atha kārayet yāga maṇḍapam
tad pūrva bhāge kartavyam kuṇḍam lakṣaṇa saṃyutam
kuṇḍa pārśve muni śreṣṭha vedim kuryāt yathāvidhi
catur hasta pramāṇena kārayet vedim uttamām
vistāra āyāma tulyā syāt yāga vediḥ mahā mune
tri hastam vā dvi hastam vā kārayet vedim uttamām
ratni mātra samutsedhām athavā tāla mātrakām
darpaṇa udara saṃkāśām yāga vedim anuttamām

original: evaṃ kṛtvā vidhānena vediṃ bhuktiśubhapradām // Vis_27.151 //
analyzed: evam kṛtvā vidhānena vedim bhukti śubha pradām
tatra upari likhet padmam aṣṭa patra dala ākṛti
gomayena samālipya dvādaśa akṣara vidyayā
prokṣayet tena mantreṇa kuśa pūtena vāriṇā
pālikā ca aṅkura upetam aṣṭa maṅgala saṃyutam
pūrva ādi krama yogena śaṅkha ādīn maṅgalān nyaset
uttama ādi kramam proktam vedikā lakṣaṇam mune
puṇyāham vācayitvā tu prokṣayitvā kuśa ambhasā
svasti sūktam tatā uccārya
brāhmaṇaiḥ saha mantra vid
tatra madhye muni śreṣṭha śālinā vedim ācaret

original: pañcabhārapramāṇaṃ vā tasyārdhaṃ vārdhameva vā // Vis_27.156 //
analyzed: pañca bhāra pramāṇam vā tasya ardham vā ardham eva vā
vistīrya vedi madhye tu raktaśāli antam eva vā
pūrvavat vilikhet rakta padmam aṣṭa dalaiḥ yutam

original: tatra madhye tu saṃsthāpya navakumbhān yathākramam /
analyzed: tatra madhye tu saṃsthāpya nava kumbhān yathākramam
sūtra traya samopetān gālita udaka pūritān
vastra yugmaiḥ alaṃkṛtya gandha puṣpa samanvitān
pañcaratna samopetān kūrca traya samanvitān
aśvattha pallavaiḥ yuktān cakrikābhiḥ pidhāya tu
evam lakṣaṇa saṃyukta kumbheṣu āvāhayet kramāt
mahāberāt nayet śaktim madhya kumbhe mahā mune
pūrva ādi ca aṣṭa kumbheṣu vāsudeva ādikān yajet
arghya pādya ādinā abhyarcya havīṃṣi mukhavāsakam
dāpa iyat kumbha madhya stha devāya muni sattama
pūrva ādi ca aṣṭa kumbheṣu tad śeṣeṇa balim kṣipet

original: vāsudevādikān jñātvā svanāmnaiva pṛthak pṛthak // Vis_27.163 //
analyzed: vāsudeva ādikān jñātvā sva nāmnā eva pṛthak pṛthak
tatas tu kumuda ādīnām kumbhasya paritorcayet
ghaṇṭā śabda samopetam kukkuṭa aṇḍa pramāṇataḥ
svastivācana saṃyuktam dhūpa dīpa samanvitam

original: svanamnā balidānaṃ tu sādhayet sādhakottamaḥ // Vis_27.165 //
analyzed: sva namnā bali dānam tu sādhayet sādhaka uttamaḥ
nārikela phalam dadyāt sandhyayoḥ evam arcayet

original: tatpūjānte tu mantrajño homakarma samārabhet // Vis_27.166 //
analyzed: tad pūjā ante tu mantra jñaḥ homa karma samārabhet
aṣṭottaraśatam vā api tad ardham vā ardham eva vā
samidh ādi tila antam tu juhuyāt sādhaka uttamaḥ
homa ante bali dānam tu kārayet grāma vāstuṣu
tatas tīrthasya divase pūrvāhṇe homa pūjanam
kārayet pūrvavat samyak sādhakaḥ parama artha vid
homa ante ca ānayet kumbhāt tat cakṣuḥ mūla berake
tatas tu vāsudeva ādīn nayet pūrva vat āvṛte

original: vatsare vatsare brahman kartavyaṃ paramaṃ śubham // Vis_27.170 //
analyzed: vatsare vatsare brahman kartavyam paramam śubham
nitya pūjā vihīnasya prāyaścittam mahā utsavam
evam saṃpūjayet devam ca utsave yāga maṇḍape
tīrthasya divasam yāvat tāvat saṃpūjayet kramāt
yāga maṇḍapa pūjāyām aṅkura arpaṇa pūjane
bali śeṣam homa śeṣam pātra śeṣam tathā eva ca
asmin niveditam sarvam ācāryāya pradāpayet
anyathā niṣphalam yāti yajamānasya roga kṛt
tasmāt sarva prayatnena kārayet śāstra coditam
yaḥ kārayet tu matimān tad phalam samavāpnuyāt

original: yāgamaṇḍapapūjāṃ tu vinā cedutsavaṃ kuru // Vis_27.175 //
analyzed: yāga maṇḍapa pūjām tu vinā ced utsavam kuru
kevalam homa mātreṇa ca api alam tu mahā utsavam
dhanyam yaśasyam āyuṣyam sarva pāpa nikṛntanam
iti śrī pāñcārātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām utsavavidhiḥ nāma saptaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
aṣṭāviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
viṣvaksenaḥ
amāvāsyā utsavam vakṣye māsi māsi muni īśvara
devajanma ṛkṣake vā api pratiṣṭhā ṛkṣam atha ṛkṣake pi vā
yajamānasya janma ṛkṣe rāja janma ṛkṣake vā

original: ayane viṣukāle vā niścayitvāṅkurān purā // Vis_28.2 //
analyzed: ayane viṣu kāle vā niścayitvā aṅkurān purā
nava ahe sapta pañca ahe tri aha eka aham atha api vā
aṅkura arpaṇam eteṣu sarva sampad sukha āvaham
kārayet vidhivat samyak sāyāhne muni sattama
an aṅkura arpaṇam kāryam anartham aśubha āvaham
tasmāt sarva prayatnena kārayet aṅkura arpaṇam
aṅkura arpaṇa kārye smin velā ādīni na vīkṣayet
pālikā ghaṭikā ca eva śarāvaḥ ca tridhā mune

original: uktamasmin mahātantre cotsave ṣoḍaśān kramāt // Vis_28.6 //
analyzed: uktam asmin mahā tantre ca utsave ṣoḍaśān kramāt
pratyakam pālikā ādīni lakṣaṇaiḥ saha nārada

original: kaścidasmin viśeṣo 'sti taṃ viśeṣaṃ śṛṇu kramāt // Vis_28.7 //
analyzed: kaścid asmin viśeṣaḥ sti tam viśeṣam śṛṇu kramāt
pratyekam dvādaśam vā api kevalāḥ pālikāḥ tathā

original: pālikāṣoḍaśaṃ vāpi dvādaśaṃ navakaṃ tu vā(?) // Vis_28.8 //
analyzed: pālikā ṣoḍaśam vā api dvādaśam navakam tu vā
dūrvābhiḥ sa śirīṣābhiḥ pālikā ādīn su veṣṭayet
tila ādi daśa bījāni mudgam ekam atha api vā
payobhiḥ kṣālayet pañcamantraiḥ vāribhiḥ eva vā
evam bījāni saṃkṣālya kārayet aṅkura arpaṇam
aṅkura arpaṇa kārye smin sūtra pātam na kārayet
viśeṣam atra vakṣyāmi padmasūtra vidhim śṛṇu
tri hasta parimāṇam tu ca eva gomayena anulepayet
tasya ūrdhve śālim āstīrya tad madhye bjam atha ālikhet
tri aha eka aha utsave ca eva snapane muni sattama

original: amāvāsyādikārye 'smin ṣoḍaśaṃ dvādaśaṃ tu(?) vā // Vis_28.13 //
analyzed: amāvāsyā ādi kārye smin ṣoḍaśam dvādaśam tu vā
pratiṣṭhā utsavayoḥ ca eva pavitra ārohaṇe mune

original: tathā dīkṣāvidhāne tu pratyekaṃ ṣoḍaśa kramāt /
analyzed: tathā dīkṣā vidhāne tu pratyekam ṣoḍaśa kramāt

original: dvādaśaṃ vātha niḥśeṣaṃ pālikādīṃśca kārayet // Vis_28.15 //
analyzed: dvādaśam vā atha niḥśeṣam pālika ādīn ca kārayet
śeṣa karmāṇi sarvāṇi likhet abjam anuttamam

original: padmasya dalasaṃkhyāstu śṛṇu cāsmin mahāmune // Vis_28.16 //
analyzed: padmasya dala saṃkhyāḥ tu śṛṇu ca asmin mahā mune

original: pālikā ṣoḍaśaṃ cettu dalaṃ pañcadaśaṃ likhet /
analyzed: pālikā ṣoḍaśam ced tu dalam pañcadaśam likhet

original: dvādaśaṃ pālikā cettu tādṛśaṃ padmamālikhet // Vis_28.17 //
analyzed: dvādaśam pālikā ced tu tādṛśam padmam ālikhet
athavā muni śārdūla aṣṭa patra abjam ālikhet
pūrvavat vilikhet bījam pūrva ādiṣu akṣarān vasūn

original: prokṣayettena mantreṇa śākhāmūlena vā mune // Vis_28.19 //
analyzed: prokṣayet tena mantreṇa śākhā mūlena vā mune
indra ādi īśa avasāneṣu pālikān navakān nyaset
tena mantreṇa matimān an prokṣayet gandha vāriṇā
puṇyāham vācayet tasmin brāhmaṇaiḥ tantra pāragaiḥ
tila ādi bījān abhyarcya taṇḍula upari nārada
jitantaḥ iti mantreṇa sarva bījāni vāpayet
gandha puṣpa ādinā abhyarcya su gupte sthāpayet kramāt
viśeṣaḥ ca atra saṃproktaḥ śeṣam sādhāraṇam bhavet

original: sāyāhne vātha pūrvāhṇe balimasmin samācaret // Vis_28.23 //
analyzed: sāyāhne vā atha pūrvāhṇe balim asmin samācaret
haviṣā ca akṣataiḥ vā api puṣpaiḥ vā atha balim kṣipet
amāvāsyā utsava ādyeṣu saṃproktam ca aṅkura arpaṇam
utsava pratimām vā api snapana arcām atha api vā

original: balibimbaṃ tu vā cakrabimbamekamathāpi vā // Vis_28.25 //
analyzed: bali bimbam tu vā cakra bimbam ekam atha api vā

original: tadgṛhītvā tu mantrajñaḥ śuddhasnānaṃ tu kārayet /
analyzed: tat gṛhītvā tu mantra jñaḥ śuddha snānam tu kārayet

original: pūrvarātrau tu kartavyaḥ sūtrabandho yathāvidhi // Vis_28.26 //
analyzed: pūrva rātrau tu kartavyaḥ sūtrabandhaḥ yathāvidhi
vāsa adhivāsa vat kṛtvā maṇḍapa alaṃkṛtiḥ mune
catur aṅgulam utsedham catur hasta pramāṇataḥ
śālibhiḥ vedikām samyak kṛtvā maṇḍapa madhyame

original: tadardhaṃ taṇḍulairvediṃ tanmadhye tu samācaret // Vis_28.28 //
analyzed: tad ardham taṇḍulaiḥ vedim tad madhye tu samācaret
dhānya abhāve yathāvediḥ yathālābham praśasyate
yajamāna icchayā vedim kuryāt tantra vicakṣaṇaḥ
pūrvavat padmam ālikhya tad madhye ṣṭa akṣaram nyaset

original: aṣṭākṣarasya madhye tu catuṣpādāsanaṃ nyaset // Vis_28.30 //
analyzed: aṣṭa akṣarasya madhye tu catuṣpāda āsanam nyaset
prokṣayet mūlamantreṇa dharma jñāna ādikān nyaset
gandha puṣpa ādinā abhyarcya tad madhye harim ānayet
pādya ādi dīpa paryantam arcayet puruṣottamam
kautukam bandhayet paścāt puṇḍarīkākṣa vidyayā
āḍhaka traya saṃpūrṇam śāli taṇḍulam uttamam

original: sauvarṇādiṣu pātreṣu hyekaṃ gṛhya vicakṣaṇaḥ // Vis_28.33 //
analyzed: sauvarṇa ādiṣu pātreṣu hi ekam gṛhya vicakṣaṇaḥ
pūrayet taṇḍulam śuddham kunda indu dhavala prabham
taṇḍula ūrdhve bjam ālikhya ca aṣṭa patram sa karṇikam
sauvarṇam rājatam vā api kṣauma sūtram atha api vā
kārpāsa sūtrakam vā api triguṇīkṛtya nārada
triguṇam triguṇīkṛtya karṇikāyām nyaset kramāt
prācī ādi paścima antena vinyaset sūtram uttamam
gandha ādi dīpa paryantam arcayet kautukam kramāt

original: bandhayet kautukaṃ paścāt dakṣiṇe bhagavatkare // Vis_28.37 //
analyzed: bandhayet kautukam paścāt dakṣiṇe bhagavat kare
aṅguṣṭha anāmikābhyām tu ācāryaḥ mantram uccaran
dhūpāt bhasmam
samādāya rakṣām kṛtvā sa mantrataḥ
lalāṭe ca aṣṭa digbandham devasya paritas kramāt
haviḥ nivedayet paścāt sādhakaḥ parameṣṭhinā
apūpa ādīni sarvāṇi upahārāṇi dāpayet

original: pānīyaṃ ca tato dadyāt mukhavāsaṃ nivedayet // Vis_28.40 //
analyzed: pānīyam ca tatas dadyāt mukha vāsam nivedayet
chatram cāmaram ādarśam deveśāya nivedayet
digbandham kārayet tasmin cakra mantreṇa sādhakaḥ
niveditam tu tat sarvam ācāryāya nivedayet
sarvam puroḍāśa samam mune
tasmāt sarva prayatnena saṃgrahet deva saṃnidhau
grāma āyatana vṛddhi artham pūrva ādi paritorcayet
kumuda ādyāḥ pragṛhṇantu sarve balim anuttamam
ghaṇṭā śabda samopetam dhūpa dīpa samanvitam
svastivācana saṃyuktam nṛtata gīta samanvitam
kārayet bali dānam tu puṣpa akṣata kuśa udakaiḥ
yat idam devadevasya toṣaṇa artham iha ucyate
rātriṃrātrau
visarjayet paścāt pūrva uktaiḥ dravya vistaraiḥ

original: deveśaṃ cārcayet samyak sūktena puruṣeṇa ca /
analyzed: deveśam ca arcayet samyak sūktena puruṣeṇa ca
vastra ābharaṇa puṣpa ādyaiḥ alaṃkṛtya prayatnataḥ

original: havirnivedayet paścāt tāmbūlaṃ ca tathaiva ca /
analyzed: haviḥ nivedayet paścāt tāmbūlam ca tathā eva ca
ācāryaḥ samalaṃkṛtya homa karma samārabhet
nitya agnau ca utsava agnau vā karayet vidhi coditam
samidh ājya carūn lājān pañcaviṃśati saṃkhyayā
kārayet sva sva jihvāyām samidh ādi yathākramam

original: samidho mūlamantreṇa chandomūlena vai ghṛtam // Vis_28.50 //
analyzed: samidhaḥ mūlamantreṇa chandaḥ mūlena vai ghṛtam
tatas tu viṣṇugāyatryā yarum hutvā akṣa mātrataḥ
lājān veda ādi mantreṇa juhuyāt tantra vittamaḥ
bali dravyam ca juhuyāt caturthī anta ādinā mune
prāyaścitta āhutim hūyāt pañca upaniṣadaiḥ kramāt
pūrṇāhutim tatas hutvā dvādaśa akṣara vidyayā
nitye mahā utsave ca eva amāvāsyā utsava ādiṣu
brahma praṇītam idhmau ca na iṣyate muni sattama
etat te kathitaḥ homa amāvāsyā utsava ādiṣu
homa ante bali dānam tu kārayet tantra vittamaḥ

original: pūrvavadbalidānaṃ tu prāsāde tu yathākramam // Vis_28.55 //
analyzed: pūrvavat bali dānam tu prāsāde tu yathākramam
kārayet muni śārdūla sarva deva priya arthakam

original: grāme vā nagare vāpi pattane vālaye 'pi vā // Vis_28.56 //
analyzed: grāme vā nagare vā api pattane vā ālaye vā
evamādiṣu deśeṣu kārayet balim uttamam

original: mārgaśuddhiṃ purā kṛtvā pūrvāhṇe balimācaret // Vis_28.57 //
analyzed: mārga śuddhim purā kṛtvā pūrvāhṇe balim ācaret
madhyāhne yat kṛtam brahman bali karma adhamam bhavet
pūrvāhṇe grāma vṛddhiḥ syāt sarva saṃpad sukha āvaham
madhyāhne tu agha nāśam tat nagara ādiṣu vṛddhi kṛt
tasmāt sarva prayatnena pūrvāhṇe balim ācaret
pūrvavat devadeveśam alaṃkṛtya prayatnataḥ
vāsita ādyaiḥ ca mātrābhiḥ toṣitam su manoramam
tad bimbam śibikā ādyeṣu samāropya samāhitaḥ

original: rathaṃ tu śibikāṃ vāpi gajaṃ vāśvavaraṃ tu vā // Vis_28.61 //
analyzed: ratham tu śibikām vā api gajam vā aśva varam tu vā
prokṣayet gāruḍena eva bhūṣayet garuḍam smaran
chatra dhvaja vitāna ādīn nṛtta geya samanvitam
śaṅkha bherī ādi nirghoṣam mahā jana samanvitam

original: grāmādivīthikāyāṃ tu madhye grāmaṃ paribhramet // Vis_28.63 //
analyzed: grāma ādi vīthikāyām tu madhye grāmam paribhramet
grāma ādi vāstu deśeṣu kumuda ādīn samarcayet
devāgāreṣu sarveṣu mahā śāstā ālayeṣu ca
kūpe ca eva kūpeṣu ca
taṭākeṣu saṅgameṣu ca vīthitaḥ
tad tad deśe muni śreṣṭha sarva bhūta gaṇān nyaset
devasya saṃnidhau tasmin bali dānam samācaret
karavīra samāyuktam śveta rakta akṣataiḥ yutam
tila udaka samopetam bali dravyaiḥ ca saṃyutam
kṛmi kīṭa pataṅga ādyaiḥ sparśite smin pramādataḥ
bali dravye muni śreṣṭha santi ājyam devatā arcane
akṣataiḥ vā atha puṣpaiḥ vā yathāsaṃbhavam arcayet
kārayet vāstu deśeṣu tad tad mantram anusmaran
uttarī īṣṇīṣa saṃyuktaḥ ācāryaḥ balim ācaret
bali ante paramātmānam arghya pādya ādinā arcayet
sarva maṅgala kārye smin maṅgala ālāpanam kuru
tṛtīyasavane gatvā devāgāre muni īśvara
pādya ādi saptakam da tvā tatas snapanam ārabhet
maṇḍapam samalaṃkṛtya śālinā vedim ācaret

original: tatra madhye tu matimān kalaśān viniveśayet /
analyzed: tatra madhye tu matimān kalaśān viniveśayet
śālmalī kiṃśukā puṣpa saṃkāśān sūtra veṣṭitān
vedikā upari saṃsthāpya catur veda ādi mantrataḥ

original: teṣāṃ madhye muniśreṣṭha dravyāṇi viniveśayet // Vis_28.74 //
analyzed: teṣām madhye muni śreṣṭha dravyāṇi viniveśayet

original: pādyaṃ tu madhyame bhāge pūrvabhāger'ghyameva ca /
analyzed: pādyam tu madhyame bhāge pūrva bhāga īrghyam eva ca
yāmye tu ācamanīyam syāt gandham vāruṇa gocare
puṣpa toyam nyaset some kṛśānau taṇḍula udakam

original: nairṛte dadhi vinyasya vāyavye kṣīrameva ca // Vis_28.76 //
analyzed: nairṛte dadhi vinyasya vāyavye kṣīram eva ca
aiśānye vinyaset ājyam gandha yuktam śubham mune

original: evaṃ tu navakaṃ sthāpya kūrcāṃsteṣu vinikṣipet // Vis_28.77 //
analyzed: evam tu navakam sthāpya kūrcān teṣu vinikṣipet
cakrikām sthāpayet teṣu gandha puṣpam vinikṣipet

original: tatastu rajanīcūrṇaṃ pūrve vā cottare 'tha vā // Vis_28.78 //
analyzed: tatas tu rajanī cūrṇam pūrve vā vā
sthāpayitvā arcayet tasmin gandha puṣpa akṣataiḥ kramāt

original: kalaśān navavastraistu veṣṭayet praṇavena tu // Vis_28.79 //
analyzed: kalaśān nava vastraiḥ tu veṣṭayet praṇavena tu
puṇyāham vācayet samyak yāthātathyena nārada
gandha puṣapādinā abhyarcya toraṇe ṣṭa ghaṭān nyaset

original: pūrvādi cottarānteṣu dvau dvau tu kalaśau nyaset /
analyzed: pūrva ādi ca uttara anteṣu dvau dvau tu kalaśau nyaset
gandha toyena saṃpūrya gandha puṣpa ādinā arcayet

original: svanāmnā caiva sarveṣāṃ mantraṃ tu munipuṅgava /
analyzed: sva nāmnā ca eva sarveṣām mantram tu muni puṅgava
ṣaḍakṣaram anusmṛtya sādhakaḥ parama artha vid
pādya ādyaiḥ kalaśaiḥ sarvaiḥ deveśam abhiṣecayet
snapana ante tu mantra jñaḥ rajanīm abhiṣecayet
śuddha snānam tatas kṛtvā alaṃkṛtya janārdanam

original: snānodakaṃ to gṛhya vaiṣṇavān prokṣayedbudhaḥ // Vis_28.84 //
analyzed: snāna udakam gṛhya vaiṣṇavān prokṣayet budhaḥ

original: taṃ gṛhītvā tu bhaktānāṃ sarveṣāṃ mūrdhni nikṣipet /
analyzed: tam gṛhītvā tu bhaktānām sarveṣām mūrdhni nikṣipet
gaṅgā snāna phalam puṇyam sarva pāpa praṇāśanam
sarva saṃpad samṛddhiḥ syāt iti śāstrasya niścayaḥ
pūrvavat yāna madhye tu devam āropya mantra vid
purāṇa ukta taṭāke vā nadī tīre mune
devadevam samānīya mūlamantreṇa sādhakaḥ
snāpayet teya madhye tu pūrvavat muni puṅgava
mahājanān samāhūya dadyāt tīrtham anuttamam
svastivācana saṃyuktam śaṅkha dundubhi saṃyutam
devālayam kramāt gatvā dvāram āśritya nārada
arghya pādya ādinā abhyarcya rakṣām kurvīta mantra vid
annena vā atha puṣpaiḥ vā aṣṭa diś balim ācaret
sudarśanena mantreṇa pūrva ādiṣu yathākramam
devāgāram samāśritya svastivācana pūrvakam
pūrvavat devam abhyarcya mahā annam ca nivedayet

original: ācāryaṃ pūjayet paścāt yathāśaktyatra nārada // Vis_28.92 //
analyzed: ācāryam pūjayet paścāt yathāśakti atra nārada
apūpa ādīni ca anyāni upahārāṇi dāpayet

original: tāmbūlaṃ dāpayet paścāt vidhivat parameṣṭhinā // Vis_28.93 //
analyzed: tāmbūlam dāpayet paścāt vidhivat parameṣṭhinā
śeṣa karmāṇi sarvāṇi rāja vat pratikārayet

original: yaḥ kārayettu matimān ihalāke śriyaṃ labhet // Vis_28.94 //
analyzed: yaḥ kārayet tu matimān ihalāke śriyam labhet
sa yāti viṣṇu sālokyam viṣṇu sārūpyam eva ca

original: atha vā muniśārdūla tīrthasnānavidhiṃ śṛṇu // Vis_28.95 //
analyzed: atha vā muni śārdūla tīrtha snāna vidhim śṛṇu
nadī pulina tīre tu maṇḍapam kārayet kramāt

original: atha vā suprapāṃ kṛtvā caturdvārasamanvitām // Vis_28.96 //
analyzed: atha vā su prapām kṛtvā catur dvāra samanvitām
vāsa adhivāsane proktam prapā lakṣaṇam uttamam

original: evaṃ lakṣaṇasaṃyuktāṃ prapāṃ kṛtvā munīśvara // Vis_28.97 //
analyzed: evam lakṣaṇa saṃyuktām prapām kṛtvā muni īśvara
aindra ādi īśāna paryantam gomayena anulepayet
pūrva ukta śālīn āstīrya vitāna ādyaiḥ alaṃkṛtam
puṣpa mālā ādi saṃyuktam tad madhye kalaśān nyaset
pūrvavat navakam sthāpya pūrvavat snānam ācaret
tīrtha snānam tatas brahman mahājana samanvitam

original: nadyāṃ hrade taṭāke vā deveśaṃ snānamācaret // Vis_28.100 //
analyzed: nadyām hrade taṭāke vā deveśam snānam ācaret
tīre devam samānīya śuddha snānam samācaret
arghya ādinā arcayet devam alaṃkṛtya prayatnataḥ
śeṣa karmāṇi sarvāṇi asmin pūrvavat ācaret

original: dviprakāraṃ mayā proktaṃ tīrthasnānaṃ munīśvara // Vis_28.102 //
analyzed: dvi prakāram mayā proktam tīrtha snānam muni īśvara
sādhaka icchā anurūpeṇa yathāyogam samācaret
tīrtha snāna vidhiḥ proktaḥ pūrva pūrvā garīyasī
evam saṃkṣepataḥ proktam amāvāsyā utsavam param
anyathā niṣphalam yāti roga vṛddhiḥ dhana kṣayaḥ
tasmāt sarva prayatnena kārayet vidhi pūrvakam
iti śrī pañcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām amāvāsyotsavavidhiḥ nāma aṣṭāviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
ekonatriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
viṣvaksenaḥ
rāghavasya eva vakṣyāmi tathā janma dinakriyām

original: ṛkṣe punarvasau kāryaṃ caitre nāvamike tithau // Vis_29.1 //
analyzed: ṛkṣe punarvasau kāryam caitre nāvamike tithau
māgha māse thavā brahyan rāghava utsavam uttamam
kṛtvā aṅkura arpaṇam pūrvam tatas ca utsavam ācaret

original: snapanaṃ vidhivat kṛtvā sāyāhne rāghavasya tu /
analyzed: snapanam vidhivat kṛtvā sāyāhne rāghavasya tu
ācāryam pūjayet paścāt vastra hema aṅgulīyakaiḥ

original: godānaṃ bhūmidānaṃ ca suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ tathā /
analyzed: go dānam bhūmi dānam ca suvarṇam rajatam tathā

original: paśvājyatiladānaṃ ca gogrāsaṃ ca yathāvidhi // Vis_29.4 //
analyzed: paśu ājya tila dānam ca gogrāsam ca yathāvidhi
kautukam bandhayet paścāt su puṇya aha puraḥsaram

original: homaṃ caiva vidhānena kārayet sādhakottmaḥ // Vis_29.5 //
analyzed: homam ca eva vidhānena kārayet sādhaka uttmaḥ
samidhaḥ mūlamantreṇa praṇavena ājyam eva ca
pratyekam aṣṭāviṃśaḥ ca caru homam atha ācaret
ṣoḍaśa ṛcam ca puṃsūktam atas devāḥ ṣaṣ arcakam
pañca upaniṣadam ca eva viṣṇoḥ nukam iti tryṛcā
dvādaśa akṣara mantreṇa vauṣaṭ antena homayet
etān pūrṇāhutim hutvā homa śeṣam samāpayet

original: tato homāvasāne tu puṇyāhaṃ kārayet kramāt /
analyzed: tatas homa avasāne tu puṇyāham kārayet kramāt
tatas tu dāpayet tatra homa puṇya aha dakṣiṇām
ātmani āropayet agnim ātmānam ca arpayet harau

original: rāghavaṃ pūjayet paścāt rāmamantreṇa mantravit // Vis_29.10 //
analyzed: rāghavam pūjayet paścāt rāma mantreṇa mantra vid
haviḥ nivedayet paścāt pañcadhā parameṣṭhinā

original: odanaṃ kṛsaraṃ gaulyaṃ pāyasaṃ dadhisaktukam // Vis_29.11 //
analyzed: odanam kṛsaram gaulyam pāyasam dadhi saktukam

original: pānīyaṃ ca sugandhāḍhyaṃ mukhavāsaṃ ca dāpayet /
analyzed: pānīyam ca su gandha āḍhyam mukha vāsam ca dāpayet

original: vividhāni ca bhakṣyāṇi vividhāni phalāni ca // Vis_29.12 //
analyzed: vividhāni ca bhakṣyāṇi vividhāni phalāni ca
brāhmaṇān bhojayet tatra vaiṣṇavān vedapāragān
geya nṛtta vinoda ādyaiḥ rātri śeṣam samāpeyat
prabhātāyām tu śarvaryām alaṃkāram tu dāpayet

original: alaṃkṛtya janān sarvān viṣṇupriyatamān samān // Vis_29.14 //
analyzed: alaṃkṛtya janān sarvān viṣṇu priyatamān samān
tailaiḥ candana paṅkaiḥ ca aṅgarāgaiḥ ca sarvaśas
haridrā cūrṇa puṣpaiḥ ca vastraiḥ nānāvidhaiḥ tathā
jala yuktāḥ ca śataśas jala miśraiḥ itas tatas
anyonyam cikṣukṣi
puḥ sarve nṛtta gīta samanvitāḥ
citra dhvaja vitānaiḥ ca cāmaraḥ tālavṛntakaiḥ
śaṅkha dundubhi nirghoṣaiḥ kṣvelita āsphoṭitaiḥ api
nṛtta geyaiḥ ca vādyaiḥ ca bhaktaiḥ bhāgavataiḥ tathā
jaya śaṣda ravaiḥ ca eva yuktam kuryāt mahā utsavam
taila gandha jalaiḥ yuktam rajanī cūrṇa saṃyutam
grāmam paribhramīkṛtya gaccheyuḥ punar ālayam
snāpayet devadevam tam yathā vibhava vistaram
vastra ābharaṇa gandha ādyaiḥ alaṃkṛtya prayatnataḥ
mahā haviḥ nivedya atha bhaktānām ca eva pūjanam

original: evaṃ yaḥ kārayed bhaktya cotsavaṃ rājajanmani // Vis_29.21 //
analyzed: evam yaḥ kārayet ca utsavam rāja janmani
sa yāti viṣṇu sālokyam kramāt pāriṣadeśvaraḥ

original: iti śrīpāñcārātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyāṃ śrīrāmajanmotsava- vidhirnāma ekonatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī pāñcārātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām śrīrāmajanmotsava vidhiḥ nāma ekonatriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
triṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
viṣvaksenaḥ
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi kṛṣṇa janma dina utsavam
sarva loka hita arthāya saṃbhūtam yādave kule
devakyām vasudevasya devānām hita kāmyayā

original: śrāvaṇe kṛṣṇapakṣe ca rohiṇyāmaṣṭame tithau // Vis_30.2 //
analyzed: śrāvaṇe kṛṣṇa pakṣe ca rohiṇyām aṣṭame tithau
aṅkura arpaṇa pūrvam tu sapta pañca dine

original: madhyarātre tu pūrve tu kṛṣṇabimbamanuttamam // Vis_30.3 //
analyzed: madhyarātre tu pūrve tu kṛṣṇa bimbam anuttamam
navanīta naṭam vā api sarpa nṛttam atha api vā

original: caturbhujaṃ vāpi tathā pūjayettaddine mune // Vis_30.4 //
analyzed: caturbhujam vā api tathā pūjayet tad dine mune
prāsāda pūrva bhāge tu maṇḍapam caturaśrakam
vitāna dhvaja saṃyuktam darbha mālā samāvṛtam
puṣpa mālyaiḥ alaṃkṛtya
ralaṃkṛtam
indra ādi īśāna paryantam mārjanam praṇavena tu
prokṣayet gandha toyena dvādaśa akṣara vidyayā
gomayena samālipya pūrva ādi krama yogataḥ

original: pradīpaṃ ca caturdikṣu dīpayet sādhakaḥ kramāt /
analyzed: pradīpam ca catur dikṣu dīpayet sādhakaḥ kramāt
pālikābhiḥ alaṃkṛtya maṇḍapasya samantataḥ

original: maṇḍapasya ca madhye tu catuṣpādāsanaṃ nyaset /
analyzed: maṇḍapasya ca madhye tu catuṣpāda āsanam nyaset

original: tatrordhve chādanaṃ kuryāt sitapuṣpaṃ vinikṣipet // Vis_30.9 //
