analyzed: tatra ūrdhve chādanam kuryāt sita puṣpam vinikṣipet
arcayet gandha puṣpaiḥ tu dharma ādi krama yogataḥ

original: bimbaṃ tu sthāpayettatra brāhmaṇaiḥ svastivācya ca // Vis_30.10 //
analyzed: bimbam tu sthāpayet tatra brāhmaṇaiḥ svasti vācya ca
kautukam bandhayitvā tu brāhmaṇa nāma anujñayā
aṅguṣṭha anāmikābhyām tu dvādaśa akṣara vidyayā
mukha vāsam tatas dadyāt tālavṛntaiḥ ca vījayet
chatra cāmara saṃyuktam nṛtta gīta samanvitam
vīṇā veṇu samāyuktam kautukam bandhayet hareḥ
śaṅkha dundubhi saṃyuktam svastivācana pūrvakam
pādukā dvaya saṃyuktam śayane saṃniveśayet
pūrvavat śayanam kalpya tad madhye devam ānayet
dakṣiṇe balabhadram ca paścāt tatra adhivāsayet
aṣṭa akṣareṇa digbandham kārayet sādhaka uttamaḥ
tathā eva vinyaset devam viṣṇu mantreṇa sādhakaḥ

original: pādyārghyācamanīyaṃ ca gandhapuṣpaṃ tathaiva ca // Vis_30.16 //
analyzed: pādya arghya ācamanīyam ca gandha puṣpam tathā eva ca
puṇyāham vācayet tatra vaiṣṇavaiḥ vedapāragaiḥ
ācāryaḥ śukla vāsāḥ tu śukla yajña upavītavān
ūrdhva puṇḍra dharaḥ ca eva sa pavitra karaḥ tathā
ā jānu pādau prakṣālya dvis dvis ācamanīyakam
devasya dakṣiṇe pārśve uttara abhimukha āsane

original: prāṇāyāmatrayaṃ kṛtvā sṛṣṭinyāsaṃ tathaiva ca // Vis_30.19 //
analyzed: prāṇāyāma trayam kṛtvā sṛṣṭinyāsam tathā eva ca
tathā eva devam vinyasya mantram aṣṭa akṣaram mune
sauvarṇa ādi ghaṭam gṛhya śuddha toyena mantra vid
tat pātram kṣālayet paścāt viṣṇugāyatriyā mune
toya pūrṇam su gandham ca sūtra vastra samanvitam
dhānya rāśau vinikṣipya tasya madhye mahā mune
mūlaberāt tatas devam dhyāyan nārāyāṇam prabhum
śyāmalam bāla vapuṣam
tat toyam pratimā mūrdhni secayet mūlavidyayā
kṛta añjali puṭaḥ bhūtvā namaskṛtya punar punar

original: śayane śāyayitvā tu taṃ devaṃ mūlavidyayā // Vis_30.24 //
analyzed: śayane śāyayitvā tu tam devam mūlavidyayā
tathā eva balabhadram ca śāyayet tasya mantrataḥ
vastraiḥ ācchādayet devam sita puṣpaiḥ samarcayet
tatas nārāyaṇam sūktam uccaret sādhaka uttamaḥ
śaṅkha dundubhi saṃyuktam veda adhyayana saṃyutam
vīṇā veṇu samāyuktam jhallarīmat dalaiḥ yutam
vārasairandhri saṃyuktam ācāryaḥ mantram uccaran
śaṅkha ādi ghoṣa saṃyuktam tatas devam samuddharet

original: gandhapuṣpaṃ vinikṣipya namaskṛtya punaḥ punaḥ // Vis_30.28 //
analyzed: gandha puṣpam vinikṣipya namaskṛtya punar punar
śrī ramā ājyena saṃyuktam bhalabhadrāya dāpayet

original: vaiṣṇavebhyaḥ sadasyānāṃ sarveṣāṃ ca pradāpayet // Vis_30.29 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavebhyaḥ sadasyānām sarveṣām ca pradāpayet
kṣīram dadhi ghṛtam ca eva pradadyāt bala kṛṣṇayoḥ
kadalī panasam ca eva jambu ādi phalam eva ca
tad ante devadevasya dāpayet mūlavidyayā

original: tailaṃ ca rajanīcūrṇaṃ tāvubhau mūrdhni secayet // Vis_30.31 //
analyzed: tailam ca rajanī cūrṇam tau ubhau mūrdhni secayet

original: śeṣaṃ ca vaiṣṇavebhyastu dadyāt sarvamathāpi vā /
analyzed: śeṣam ca vaiṣṇavebhyaḥ tu dadyāt sarvam atha api vā
śaṅkha dundubhi nirghoṣaiḥ tūrya veṇu samanvitaiḥ
nṛtta gīta samāyuktam brāhmaṇaiḥ svastivācanam

original: rāmakṛṣṇo tu saṃsthāpya cāsane puṣpasaṃyute // Vis_30.33 //
analyzed: tu saṃsthāpya ca āsane puṣpa saṃyute
arghya pādya ādinā abhyarcya homa karma samācaret

original: nityāgnau vātha pūrvasmin kārayedvā mahāmune // Vis_30.34 //
analyzed: nitya agnau vā atha pūrvasmin kārayet vā mahā mune
vaiṣṇava agnau tu juhuyāt samidh ājya carūṇi ca
mūlamantreṇa mantra jñaḥ pañcaviṃśati saṃkhyayā
pratyekam tu muni śreṣṭha paścāt śāntim samācaret
madhunā payasā dadhnā hūyatena
ghṛtena ca
tathā eva juhuyāt mantraiḥ pūrṇāhutim atha ācaret
homa ante devadeveśam snāpayet vidhi coditam
kṛṣṇagandhena kāṣṭhane uśīraiḥ candanena ca
rajanī dvaya cūrṇena punar kṛṣṇa tilaiḥ tathā
siddhārtha sarṣapaiḥ ca eva sarva dhānyāni sādhakaḥ
cūrṇokṛtya muni śreṣṭha snapana ante bhiṣecayet
tatas tu rajanī cūrṇam snāpayet deva mūrdhani

original: puṣpaṃ datvā namaskṛtya maṅgalālāpanaṃ kuru // Vis_30.40 //
analyzed: puṣpam da tvā namaskṛtya maṅgala ālāpanam kuru
śuddha snānam tatas kṛtvā gandha toyena sādhakaḥ
vastra ābharaṇa mālyaiḥ ca kṛtvā gandha anulepanam
arcayet vidhivat devam gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ tathā
alaṃkṛtya tatas devam nīrājana samanvitam
go dānam bhūmi dānam ca hiraṇyam vastra bhūṣaṇam

original: sarvadānaṃ tato dadyāt brāhmaṇebhyo yathākramam // Vis_30.43 //
analyzed: sarva dānam tatas dadyāt brāhmaṇebhyaḥ yathākramam
tad ante vaiṣṇavān pūjya bhojana ācchādana ādibhiḥ
tāmbūlam vā atha sarveṣām yathā vitta anusārataḥ

original: hiraṇyaṃ vātha vastraṃ vā gāvo vā dhānyameva vā /
analyzed: hiraṇyam vā atha vastram vā gāvaḥ vā dhānyam eva vā
ācāryāya pradātavyam ati saṃpatti kāraṇam
dānasya anantaram devam arghya pādya ādinā arcayet

original: pāyasaṃ kṛsaraṃ gaulyaṃ śuddhānnaṃ ca pṛthak pṛthak // Vis_30.46 //
analyzed: pāyasam kṛsaram gaulyam śuddha annam ca pṛthak pṛthak
kadalī panasaiḥ yuktam deveśāya nivedayet
pānīya ācamanīyam ca dadyāt devāya bhaktitaḥ
bhojya āsanam vyapohya āśu devam bhoga āsane nayet
devasya ācamanam dadyāt mukhavāsam pradāpayet
pūrva mālām visṛjya atha tu dāpayet
devadevam alaṃkṛtya mukha vāsam punar dadet
nṛtta gīta samāyuktam vīṇā veṇu samanvitam
devāgāram paribhramya garbhagehe nayet harim
prabhātāyām tu śarvaryām utsavam kārayet tatas

original: grāme vā nagare vāpi mārgaśuddhiṃ ca kārayet // Vis_30.51 //
analyzed: grāme vā nagare vā api mārga śuddhim ca kārayet

original: śibikāṃ vā rathaṃ vāpi kuñjaraṃ vā hayaṃ tu vā /
analyzed: śibikām vā ratham vā api kuñjaram vā hayam tu vā
vastra puṣpaiḥ alaṃkṛtya mālyaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ api
evam devam alaṃkṛtya sthāpayet yāna madhyame
grāma pradakṣiṇam kṛtvā geya nṛtta ādi saṃyutam
paṭahaiḥ tāla saṃyuktam kṛtvā grāmam paribhramet
tailaiḥ candrana saṃyuktam rajanī cūrṇam eva ca
dāpayet vaiṣṇavānām tu sadasyānām viśeṣataḥ
punar pradakṣiṇam kṛtvā devālayam anuttamam
vidhivat snapanam kṛtvā devadevam sanātanam
mahāhaviḥ nivedya atha garbhāgāre nayet harim
iti saṃkṣepataḥ proktaḥ kṛṣṇa janma dina utsavaḥ
sāyujya phalam āpnoti satyam etat na saṃśayaḥ

original: iti śrīpāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyāṃ jayantyutsavavidhānaṃ nāma triṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām jayantyutsavavidhānam nāma triṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
ekatriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
nāradaḥ
pavitra āropaṇe puṣpa yāge prati sthā ādi utsave dīkṣā vidhāna ādi kāle
yat uktam purā

original: neśa varṇaiḥ kathaṃ maṇḍalaṃ vartite tatra kāle // Vis_31.1 //
analyzed: varṇaiḥ katham maṇḍalam vartite tatra kāle
viṣvaksenaḥ

original: mune deśakāloktavarṇādihīne yathā kartṛricchānurūpaṃ tu kāryā /
analyzed: mune deśa kāla ukta varṇa ādi hīne yathā kartṛḥ icchā anurūpam tu kāryā

original: kriyā sādhakaiste pravakṣyāmyupāyaṃ mune tattvatastacchṛṇuṣvādiguptam // Vis_31.2 //
analyzed: kriyā sādhakaiḥ te pravakṣyāmi upāyam mune tattvataḥ tat śṛṇuṣva ādi guptam
sarojam tu anāmikayā sādhakaḥ saṃvilipte sva hasta vistāra dīrghe

original: śucau bhūtale droṇaśālyakṣatasaṃ- kīrṇe sakarṇikāṣṭapatraṃ yathecchatam // Vis_31.3 //
analyzed: śucau bhū tale droṇa śāli akṣatasam kīrṇe sa karṇikā aṣṭa patram yathā id śatam
nāradaḥ
śrutvā ānandana bhedāt ananta arcana ādi kriyāḥ vāhinī nātha yuṣmad prasādāt

original: guro mūlamantraprabhāvaṃ manīṣā mama śrotumāsījjagatkāraṇasya // Vis_31.4 //
analyzed: guroḥ mūlamantra prabhāvam manīṣā mama śrotum āsīt jagat kāraṇasya
viṣvaksenaḥ
śṛṇuṣva prabhāvaḥ sya padmāsane na api acintya śrutau bandha mūlasya

original: aṣṭākṣarasyeyamīdṛk tathā yenābhibhāṣituḥ śaktirmune bho // Vis_31.5 //
analyzed: aṣṭa akṣarasya iyam īdṛś tathā yena abhibhāṣituḥ śaktiḥ mune bho

original: tathā prasādādyathā devadevaḥ svayaṃ bhrāntināśāya bhaktārtihārī /
analyzed: tathā prasādāt yathā devadevaḥ svayam bhrānti nāśāya bhakta ārti hārī

original: yadājñaptavān mūlavidyāprabhāvaṃ mune vaiṣṇavatvāttavāhaṃ bravīmi // Vis_31.6 //
analyzed: yadā ājñaptavān mūlavidyā prabhāvam mune vaiṣṇava tvāt tava aham bravīmi
sva arthe supta tad dvayam pūta deśe niṣaṇṇaḥ

original: tatopāyatayā bhaktitattvārṇabīja- cchandomunikṣetradeve ca mānavāḥ // Vis_31.7 //
analyzed: tata upāya tayā bhakti tattva arṇa bīja chandaḥ muni kṣetra deve ca mānavāḥ
svayam vā yathāśakti japtvā aṅgulībhiḥ samastābhiḥ āmṛṣṭa dṛś deśa dehaḥ

original: bhaveddhūtapāpaḥ kṛtārtherthādhī svayaṃ devavat pūjitaścaiva bhaktaiḥ // Vis_31.8 //
analyzed: bhavet hūta pāpaḥ kṛtārtha īrtha adhī svayam deva vat pūjitaḥ ca eva bhaktaiḥ
āvāhana ādi arcana aṅgena yuktāḥ viyukta pāpāḥ mūlamantra prabhāvāt

original: viriñcātmajārcā kṛtā prītikāri- ṇyanantasya viṣṇoraśeṣāṇḍayoneḥ // Vis_31.9 //
analyzed: viriñca ātmaja arcā kṛtā prīti kāri ṇī anantasya viṣṇoḥ aśeṣa aṇḍa yoneḥ
nāradaḥ

original: āvāhanaṃ nāma mantreṇa lakṣmī- dharasyābhimukhasya kriyāsaṅgasya /
analyzed: āvāhanam nāma mantreṇa lakṣmī dharasya abhimukhasya kriyā saṅgasya

original: mantrātmano mantrakartuḥ pratīte- ṣvanenaiva saṃsthāpanādi priyāsya // Vis_31.10 //
analyzed: mantra ātmanaḥ mantra kartuḥ pratīte su anena eva saṃsthāpana ādi

original: harirjaṅgameśvaratastāni kāle sthito nityamāhūtaye yattadā kim /
analyzed: hariḥ jaṅgama īśvarataḥ tāni kāle sthitaḥ nityam āhūtaye yat tadā kim

original: kathaṃ mūlaberasthito vāsudevo nareṇa tu kācotsavādipratīteḥ // Vis_31.11 //
analyzed: katham mūlabera sthitaḥ vāsudevaḥ nareṇa tu kāca utsava ādi pratīteḥ

original: vadānīkinīnātha guhyaṃ pariṣṭhaṃ guro saṃśayaṃ bhaktimānityamuṣmin /
analyzed: vadānīkinī nātha guhyam pariṣṭham guro saṃśayam bhaktimān iti amuṣmin
viṣvaksaneḥ

original: praśnaṃ tvadanyaḥ kathaṃ praṣṭumīṣṭe mune 'nena tuṣṭaḥ pravakṣyāmi tubhyam // Vis_31.12 //
analyzed: praśnam tvad anyaḥ katham praṣṭum īṣṭe mune nena tuṣṭaḥ pravakṣyāmi tubhyam
hareḥ pūjana aṅga upacāre yatta tu āvāhanam tvad sadbhāva hetoḥ

original: mune yaugapadyena sāṃnidhyamasmin krameṇeti vā saṃśayaḥ prādurāsīt // Vis_31.13 //
analyzed: mune yaugapadyena sāṃnidhyam asmin krameṇa iti vā saṃśayaḥ prādurāsīt

original: ekapradīpotthitā dīpamālā dāpe yathā yaugapadyena devaḥ /
analyzed: eka pradīpa utthitā dīpa mālā dāpe yathā yaugapadyena devaḥ

original: tathā vāsudevo likhettu pratīke mune saṃnidhiṃ dāsyatīti pratītiḥ // Vis_31.14 //
analyzed: tathā vāsudevaḥ likhet tu pratīke mune saṃnidhim dāsyati iti pratītiḥ

original: athānyo mahābhogayogapradāyī prajānāṃ tathā vṛddhido muktidaśca /
analyzed: athā anyaḥ mahā bhoga yoga pradāyī prajānām tathā vṛddhi daḥ mukti daḥ ca

original: paraṃ mūlamantreṇa saṃsmṛtya pañcā- ṅgulaṃ hṛdi spṛśya bimbasya mudrām // Vis_31.15 //
analyzed: param mūlamantreṇa saṃsmṛtya pañca aṅgulam hṛdi spṛśya bimbasya mudrām

original: pradṛśyāṅgulisaṃjñitāṃ pādamūle praṇamyākṣataṃ vāpi puṣpaṃ prakīrya /
analyzed: pradṛśya aṅguli saṃjñitām pāda mūle praṇamya akṣatam vā api puṣpam prakīrya

original: mune vidyayāṣṭārṇayaivātha cārghyaṃ punaḥ pādyācamanaṃ gandhapuṣpam // Vis_31.16 //
analyzed: mune vidyayā aṣṭa arṇayā eva atha ca arghyam punar pādya ācamanam gandha puṣpam

original: tato dhūpadīpaṃ pradāyātha bhūtānnaṃ nivedyāntarāvaraṇaṃ kalpya samyak /
analyzed: tatas dhūpa dīpam pradāya atha bhūtānnam nivedya antar āvaraṇam kalpya samyak

original: tathāvaraṇānāṃ yathāpūrvamarghyā- dyanenaiva mantreṇa puṣpaṃ pradāya // Vis_31.17 //
analyzed: tathā āvaraṇānām yathāpūrvam arghyā di anena eva mantreṇa puṣpam pradāya

original: nivedyātha tāmbūlikāmacyutāya pradīpyo baliṃ homamante vidhāya /
analyzed: nivedya atha tāmbūlikām acyutāya pradīpyaḥ balim homam ante vidhāya

original: samastādhikaḥ sarvasiddhipradāyī nṛpādipriyo yogasiddhiṃ labheta // Vis_31.18 //
analyzed: labheta
nāradaḥ

original: ekaḥ pradhānaḥ kathaṃ pūjyate sve- pade cāvṛtāsane vāsudevaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ pradhānaḥ katham pūjyate sve pade ca āvṛta āsane vāsudevaḥ

original: guro viṣṇusenāpate vaktumarha- syaśeṣeṇa me saṃśayacchedanāya // Vis_31.19 //
analyzed: guro viṣṇu senāpate vaktum arhasi aśeṣeṇa me saṃśaya chedanāya
viṣvaksenaḥ

original: yathā pāvakasthānabhedāt kriyaiko makheṣvijyate vāsudavo dvijendraiḥ /
analyzed: yathā pāvaka sthāna bhedāt kriyā ekaḥ makheṣu ijyate vāsudavaḥ dvijendraiḥ

original: tathā viṣṭare sve pade ca vṛtāva- pyanantocyate sthānabhedena bhedaḥ // Vis_31.20 //
analyzed: tathā viṣṭare sve pade ca vṛtau a pi anantā ucyate sthāna bhedena bhedaḥ
iti śrī pañcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām maṇḍalādividhiḥ nāma ekatriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
dvātriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
viṣvaksenaḥ
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi heti rājasya lakṣaṇam
śṛṇu nārada guhyena
uttama ādi krameṇa tu
sahasra aram mahā cakram śata aram vā ardham eva vā

original: ṣoḍaśāraṃ tu vā cakraṃ dvādaśāramathāpi vā // Vis_32.2 //
analyzed: ṣoḍaśa aram tu vā cakram dvādaśa aram atha api vā
kārayet muni śārdūla sauvarṇa ādi krameṇa tu

original: svarṇena rajatenāpi tāmralohena vā mune // Vis_32.3 //
analyzed: svarṇena rajatena api tāmralohena vā mune
kārayet heti rājānam uttama adhama madhyataḥ

original: uttamaṃ hetirājasya lakṣaṇaṃ prathamaṃ śṛṇu // Vis_32.4 //
analyzed: uttamam heti rājasya lakṣaṇam prathamam śṛṇu
aṅguṣṭha aṅgula mānena dvādaśa aṅgulam āyatam
bhrāmayet cakra rūpeṇa vistāra āyāma tādṛśam
athavā atra muni śreṣṭha māna mārgam vidhīyate
grāma rāja anukūlena nakṣatreṇa eva kārayet
śilpa śāstā anurūpeṇa kārayet śilpa vittamaiḥ
ṣaṣ diś vā atha catur diś vā likhet jvālā agni rūpiṇām
cakreṇa dviguṇīkṛtya daṇḍa ākāra āyatam bhevat
ṣaṣ aṅgulam tu tad nāham padmam aṣṭa aṅgula ucchrayam
viṃśati aṅgula mānam tat pāda āyatam kramāt sadā
karṇikām dvādaśa aṅgulyā kārayet su manoramām
kārayet cakra madhye tu śaktim tat vaiṣṇavam mahat
su vṛtta antargatam dhyātvā tad tad mūrti anusārataḥ
raviḥ agniḥ ca rudraḥ ca brahmā viṣṇuḥ tathā eva ca
kālaḥ ca baḍabāgniḥ tu śikhāyām agniḥ eva ca

original: kālarūpastu daṇḍe ca jyotiścakraṃ tu tatprabhā(?) /
analyzed: kālarūpaḥ tu daṇḍe ca jyotiścakram tu tad prabhā
aṣṭa śakti samopetam cakram tam devam ākṛtim

original: evaṃ tu hetirājasya lakṣaṇaṃ kathitaṃ mayā /
analyzed: evam tu heti rājasya lakṣaṇam kathitam mayā

original: madhyamaṃ hetirājasya lakṣaṇaṃ śṛṇu suvrata // Vis_32.13 //
analyzed: madhyamam heti rājasya lakṣaṇam śṛṇu suvrata
daśa aṅgula samopetam bhrāmayet cakra vat kramāt
cakra daṇḍa āyatam samyak aṣṭa aṅgulam udāhṛtam
catur aṅgula nāham tat padmam pañca aṅgula ucchrayam
padmasya pāda vistāram tatas pañcadaśa aṅgulam
pāda anurūpataḥ kṛtvā karṇikām muni sattama

original: evaṃ tu madhyamaṃ proktaṃ śeṣaṃ pūrvavadācaret // Vis_32.16 //
analyzed: evam tu madhyamam proktam śeṣam pūrvavat ācaret
aṣṭa aṅgulasya vistāram bhrāmayet cakra rūpakam
catur aṅgulam āyāmam gadā rūpam tu kārayet

original: triyaṅgulaṃ tu nāhaṃ tatpādotsedhaṃ tathā bhavet /
analyzed: triyaṅgulam tu nāham tat pāda utsedham tathā bhavet
caturdaśa aṅgulam padmam pāda vistāram eva ca
karṇikā parimāṇam yat kārayet anurūpatas
pūrvavat kārayet vā api daṇḍa ākārasya lakṣaṇam
madhyama adhama cakre smin na alam kartṛ vaśāt kuru

original: uttamādikramaṃ proktaṃ śeṣaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ bhavet // Vis_32.20 //
analyzed: uttama ādi kramam proktam śeṣam sādhāraṇam bhavet

original: bhaktanāṃ darśanārthaṃ yat cakraṃ tu sumanoramam /
analyzed: bhaktanām darśana artham yat cakram tu su manoramam
tathā eva kārayet vidvān hetirājasya lakṣaṇam
sauvarṇam rājatam ced tu karma arcā ādi mahā mune
bali artham heti rājānam tāmraiḥ vā api atha kārayet
miśra lohena vā kuryāt śāstra dṛṣṭena nārada
bali utsavam tathā artha ṛṃcā
tu snapana artham mahā mune
cakramūrtiḥ iha proktā sarva saṃpad sukha āvahā
athavā balibereṇa kārayet tantra vittamaḥ

original: divā bimbena kartavyaṃ rātrau cakreṇa kārayet(?) /
analyzed: divā bimbena kartavyam rātrau cakreṇa kārayet
cakra abhāve dvi sandhyāyām balibereṇa kārayet

original: evaṃ saṃkṣepataḥ proktaṃ sarvaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyate /
analyzed: evam saṃkṣepataḥ proktam sarvam vaktum na śakyate
pavitra ārohaṇe ca eva puṣpa yāge samantataḥ
tathā dīkṣā avasāne tu su pratiṣṭhā ātma pūjane

original: evameva tu kartavyaṃ cakraṃ bhūmau tu maṇḍalam // Vis_32.27 //
analyzed: evam eva tu kartavyam cakram bhūmau tu maṇḍalam

original: daṇḍākāraṃ vinā tasmin niśi cūrṇena pūja(-ra?)yet /
analyzed: daṇḍa ākāram vinā tasmin niśi cūrṇena
prathamam cakra madhye tu dvitīyam
madhyame
tṛtīyam tu nyaset dhīmān bahis valayam eva tu
evam cūrṇaiḥ alaṃkṛtya cakra maṇḍalam uttamam
na iṣyate smin mahā viṣṇuḥ madhyama antargataḥ harim
tatas tu paritoṣa dhīm kārayet tāla mātrataḥ
kunda indu dhavala ākāram taṇḍulaiḥ ubhayatra tu
dvārāṇi tāla mātreṇa kārayet caturaḥ diśi

original: dvāre dvāre muniśreṣṭha pūrṇaireva tu bhūṣayet / ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ......
analyzed: dvāre dvāre muni śreṣṭha pūrṇaiḥ eva tu bhūṣayet
gena eva śuddhi ati
evam saṃkṣepataḥ proktam hetirājasya lakṣaṇam
pratiṣṭhāyāḥ kramam ca eva rāja rāṣṭra sukha āvaham
dhanyam yaśasyam āyuṣyam samare vijayam tathā
yaḥ kārayet tu matimān sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt
iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhritāyām hetirājalakṣaṇavidhiḥ nāma dvātriśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
trayastriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
viṣvaksenaḥ
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi dravya śuddhi vidhim param
ratnāni hema vastāṇi bhūṣaṇa ādīn ca tāmra jān
annam toyam dadhi kṣīre ghṛtam madhu gula ādayaḥ
madhuparkaḥ ca puṣpāṇi mukha vāsa upahārakam
evamādīni ca anyāni nivedayet

original: niveditāni vastūni śuddhāśuddhāni vai śṛṇu // Vis_33.3 //
analyzed: niveditāni vastūni śuddha aśuddhāni vai śṛṇu
anna ādīn upahārān tān varjayet muni sattama

original: ratnādilohajāntāśca śuddhā eva na saṃśayaḥ // Vis_33.4 //
analyzed: ratna ādi loha ja antāḥ ca śuddhāḥ eva na saṃśayaḥ
ratnāni hema vastrāṇi bhūṣaṇāni ca dīn ca loha jān
niveditāni śuddhi ante kṣālayet mantra pūrvakam
asta rājena mantreṇa kṣālayet tān punar tridhā
tathā eva tāmra kalaśān vastreṇa pariveṣṭayet
mantra māhātmya mātreṇa śuddhi ante na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: annaṃ toyaṃ dadhikṣīraṃ ghṛtaṃ madhu gulaṃ tathā // Vis_33.7 //
analyzed: annam toyam dadhi kṣīram ghṛtam madhu gulam tathā
madhuparkaḥ puṣpam ca mukha vāsa upahārakam

original: nirmālyamiti vijñeyaṃ mama prītikaraṃ śubham // Vis_33.8 //
analyzed: nirmālyam iti vijñeyam mama prīti karam śubham

original: tāmbūlaṃ madhuparkaṃ ca naivedyānnaṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: tāmbūlam madhuparkam ca naivedya annam tathā eva ca

original: yadbhuktaṃ tadvinā brahman ācāryāya pradāpayet // Vis_33.9 //
analyzed: yat bhuktam tat vinā brahman ācāryāya pradāpayet

original: turyabhāgra hi saṃgṛhya mamāgre sthāpayet kramāt /
analyzed: saṃgṛhya mama agre sthāpayet kramāt
gandha puṣpa ādinā abhyarcya mām uddiśya nivedayet

original: tannirmālyaṃ ca tadbhuktaṃ vaiṣṇavānāṃ tu dāpayet /
analyzed: tat nirmālyam ca tat bhuktam vaiṣṇavānām tu dāpayet

original: evaṃ saṃkṣepataḥ proktaḥ dravyaśuddhirmayā mune // Vis_33.11 //
analyzed: evam saṃkṣepataḥ proktaḥ dravya śuddhiḥ mayā mune
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi sruc sruva ādi adhidaivatam
sruc sruvam vau

original: caiva darvī ca pṛthivīdevatā smṛtā // Vis_33.12 //
analyzed: ca eva darvī ca pṛthivī devatā smṛtā
uda kumbhaḥ candra daivatyaḥ
praṇītā varuṇa devatā
jihvaḥ ca svarga daivatyaḥ
antarikṣam caruḥ tathā
gandharvaḥ gandha daivatyaḥ
puṣpam śukra adhidaivatam
akṣatā lakṣmī daivatyā
dhūpam ca arghya adhidaivatam
dīpasya bhāskaram vidyāt mūlam saḥ candra devatā
viharī vāsu devatyā
samidhaḥ brahma devatāḥ
ājyam tu rudra daivatyam
annam rudra adhidaivatam
idhma pravraścanam ne
ca eva
pitṛ vargāḥ yathākramam
gavya vastūni sarvāṇi gaṇeśaḥ tatra devatā

original: svare sarasvatī devī praṇave sarvaśaktayaḥ // Vis_33.17 //
analyzed: svare sarasvatī devī praṇave sarva śaktayaḥ
sarveṣām eva vastūnām rasa rūpam tu vaiṣṇavam

original: smṛtaṃ cedasmṛtaṃ cettu sarvaṃ nārāyaṇātmakam // Vis_33.18 //
analyzed: smṛtam ced asmṛtam ced tu sarvam nārāyaṇa ātmakam

original: kalaśe devatā vakṣye śṛṇu nārada tattvataḥ /
analyzed: kalaśe devatāḥ vakṣye śṛṇu nārada tattvataḥ

original: vaktraṃ vāgīśvarī devī karṇaṃ lakṣmīstathaiva ca // Vis_33.19 //
analyzed: vaktram vāgīśvarī devī karṇam lakṣmīḥ tathā eva ca

original: pārśvayośca tathā śāntī pṛṣṭhe ca pṛthivī smṛtā /
analyzed: pārśvayoḥ ca tathā śāntī pṛṣṭhe ca pṛthivī smṛtā
tathā eva pūrṇa kumbham tu saṃsmaret adhidaivatam
eva saṃkṣepataḥ proktam sruc sruva ādya vidaivatam

original: nitye naimittike cāsmin viṣṇuyāgeṣu sarvaśaḥ // Vis_33.21 //
analyzed: nitye naimittike ca asmin viṣṇu yāgeṣu sarvaśas
jñātvā tatra adhidaivam tu sādhakaḥ saṃprayojayet
kārayet viṣṇu yāgeṣu mantrāṇām adhidaivatam

original: ajñānāt kurute mohāt sā kṛtāpyakṛtā bhavet /
analyzed: ajñānāt kurute mohāt sā kṛtā api akṛtā bhavet
tasmāt sarva prayatnena sādhakaḥ parama artha vid
saṃjñātvā teṣu kāryeṣu kārayet mantra vittamaḥ
iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām dravyaśuddhyādividhiḥ nāma
trayastriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
catustriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
viṣvaksenaḥ
prāsāda lakṣaṇam vakṣye saṃkṣepeṇa muni īśvara

original: nadītīre hrade vāpi parvatāgre same tale // Vis_34.1 //
analyzed: nadī tīre hrade vā api parvata agre same tale
samudra saṅgame tīre taṭāke saṅgameṣu ca
puṇya kṣetre mahā araṇye puṇya tīrthe mahā mune

original: grāme vā nagare vāpi pattane kheṭake 'pi vā /
analyzed: grāme vā nagare vā api pattane kheṭake vā

original: kugrāme 'tha mahāgrāme madhyame paścime 'pi vā // Vis_34.3 //
analyzed: ku grāme tha mahā grāme madhyame paścime vā
yat sthānam manasaḥ ramyam kārayet viṣṇu mandiram

original: uttamaṃ tu śilāveśma madhyamaṃ dāru cocyate // Vis_34.4 //
analyzed: uttamam tu śilāveśma madhyamam dāru ca ucyate
kaniṣṭham iviṣṭa
kuryāt vitta anusārataḥ

original: mṛdā vā kārayeddhīmān viṣṇorāyatanaṃ kramāt // Vis_34.5 //
analyzed: mṛdā vā kārayet dhīmān viṣṇoḥ āyatanam kramāt
trividham trividham hastam uttama adhama madhyataḥ
yat triṃśat hasta saṃkhyā ca uttama uttamam ucyate
ekaviṃśati hastam tu trividham ca uttamam viduḥ
tat pañcadaśa hastam tu madhyama uttamam ucyate

original: ekādaśaṃ ca hastaṃ tu madhyamaṃ parikīrtitam /
analyzed: ekādaśam ca hastam tu madhyamam parikīrtitam

original: madhyame tu kaniṣṭhaṃ ca navahastamihocyate // Vis_34.8 //
analyzed: madhyame tu kaniṣṭham ca nava hastam iha ucyate
tad kaniṣṭha uttamam proktam sapta hastam iha ucyate

original: madhyamaṃ pañcahastaṃ tu trihastaṃ tu kanīyasam // Vis_34.9 //
analyzed: madhyamam pañca hastam tu tri hastam tu kanīyasam
tad tad vitta nusāreṇa tat tat kuryāt samāhitaḥ

original: kaniṣṭhamūle catuṣkoṇe vāhanaṃ sthāpayet kramāt // Vis_34.10 //
analyzed: kaniṣṭha mūle catuṣkoṇe vāhanam sthāpayet kramāt

original: siṃhaṃ vā garuḍaṃ vāpi mārutātmajameva vā /
analyzed: siṃham vā garuḍam vā api mārutātmajam eva vā
vimānasya upari nyasya pūrva ādi caturaḥ diśi
vārāham nārasiṃham ca śrīdharam hayaśīrṣakam
kārayet sva svarūpeṇa hi uttare nantam eva vā
naraḥ nārāyaṇaḥ ca eva hariḥ kṛṣṇaḥ tathā eva ca

original: pūrvādi caturo dikṣu kārayettu yathākramam // Vis_34.13 //
analyzed: pūrva ādi caturaḥ dikṣu kārayet tu yathākramam

original: kārayitvā tadūrdhve tu śikharaṃ maṇḍalaṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: kārayitvā tad ūrdhve tu śikharam maṇḍalam tatas
kārayet śāstra dṛṣṭena śilpinā kuśalena tu
mūrdheṣṭakā vidhānena tad ūrdhve kārayet kramāt

original: stūpiṃ saṃsthāpya tantrajño tanmadhye munisattama // Vis_34.15 //
analyzed: stūpim saṃsthāpya tantra jño tad madhye muni sattama
stūpi madhye bjam ālikhya karṇikā kesara anvitam

original: dvādaśāṣṭadalaṃ vāpi ṣoḍaśaṃ vā sukārayet // Vis_34.16 //
analyzed: dvādaśa aṣṭa dalam vā api ṣoḍaśam vā su kārayet

original: tadūrdhve kārayet kumbhaṃ hastaṃ vā dviguṇaṃ tu vā /
analyzed: tad ūrdhve kārayet kumbham hastam vā dviguṇam tu vā
tad pāda hīnakam vā api kārayet tam su śobhanam

original: sudhākarma tataḥ kuryāt citrakarma ca kārayet /
analyzed: sudhākarma tatas kuryāt citrakarma ca kārayet

original: evaṃ kṛtvā vimānaṃ tu kārayenmaṇḍapaṃ kramāt // Vis_34.18 //
analyzed: evam kṛtvā vimānam tu kārayet maṇḍapam kramāt
prākāram dvi tris ekam vā gopureṇa samanvitam
kārayet muni śārdūlaḥ āgneye pacana ālayam
puṣpa sthānam jala sthānam prākāre tu prakārayet

original: vāyavye nairṛte vāpi īśāne vā munīśvara // Vis_34.20 //
analyzed: vāyavye nairṛte vā api īśāne vā muni īśvara
vinoda maṇḍapam kṛtvā sarva alaṃkāra saṃyutam
anuktam ca anya tantreṣu nirīkṣya atra prayojayet
evam saṃkṣepataḥ proktam prāsādasya iha lakṣaṇam

original: vimānākhyamatho vakṣye śṛṇu tattvena nārada // Vis_34.22 //
analyzed: vimāna ākhyam atho vakṣye śṛṇu tattvena nārada

original: mandaraṃ niṣadhaṃ caiva nāgaraṃ ca samanvitam /
analyzed: mandaram niṣadham ca eva nāgaram ca samanvitam

original: drāviḍaṃ vesaraṃ caiva pañcabhedena kīrtitam // Vis_34.23 //
analyzed: drāviḍam vesaram ca eva pañca bhedena kīrtitam
kūṭaśālā samāyuktam sarva diś nāsikā yutam

original: kaṇṭhopari suvistīrṇaṃ parvato mandaraḥ smṛtaḥ // Vis_34.24 //
analyzed: kaṇṭha upari su vistīrṇam parvataḥ mandaraḥ smṛtaḥ
pāda prabhṛti siṃha antam caturaśram su vistaram
yat kūṭa śālā rahitam parvataḥ niṣadhaḥ smṛtaḥ
kaṣṭhāt prabhṛti stūpi antam caturaśram samantataḥ

original: nāgaraṃ tat samākhyātaṃ drāviḍaṃ cādhunocyate // Vis_34.26 //
analyzed: nāgaram tat samākhyātam drāviḍam ca adhunā ucyate
kaṇṭhāt prabhṛti ra cā
ṣṭāśram prāsādam drāviḍam bhavet
śayane tu muni śreṣṭha gopura ākṛtiḥ ucyate
tri catuḥ pañca ṣaṣ kumbha saṃyuj vā atra kārayet
kumuda ādi tstūpi mūla antam ṣoḍaśa aṣṭa āśram eva vā
dvātriṃśat aśrakam vā api kārayet muni sattama
tat prāsādam samācakṣva drāviḍa aṃśa bhevat dhruvam

original: kaṇṭhāt prabhṛti vṛttaṃ syādvesaraṃ tatsamaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: kaṇṭhāt prabhṛti vṛttam syāt vesaram tad samam bhavet
tri pūrṇa kumbha yuj dhāma vesara ākāra rūpiṇam
rāja rāṣṭra vivṛddhi artham śrīmat trelokya bhūṣaṇam
prāc āyatam vimānaḥ yaḥ
muttamam paripaṭhyate
dagdha iṣṭakābhiḥ tu śilā mayaiḥ tu yat tat tu kḷptam puruṣa ākhyam eva
śilā mayaiḥ dāru maya iṣṭakā mayaiḥ samāśritam bhāvyam idam napuṃsakam

original: kṛtaṃ dṛḍhaṃ dārumayena kevalaṃ tadaṅganākhyaṃ trividhaṃ vimānam /
analyzed: kṛtam dṛḍham dāru mayena kevalam tat aṅganā ākhyam trividham vimānam
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi mūrdheṣṭakā vidhim param
prāsādasya uttare kuryāt pūrve vā muni sattama
ṣoḍaśa stambha saṃyuktam catur toraṇa bhūṣitam
catur dvāra samāyuktam catur toraṇa bhūṣitam
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam śālibhiḥ vedi saṃyutam
aṣṭa droṇa samāyuktam sarva śobhana śobhitam

original: tadardhaṃ taṇḍulaṃ kuryāt tadardhaṃ tilameva ca // Vis_34.36 //
analyzed: tad ardham taṇḍulam kuryāt tad ardham tilam eva ca
upari upari kartavyam vedikām ca su śobhanām
kuśaiḥ paristaret tatra udak prāc agratas kramāt
nava vastraiḥ tu saṃveṣṭya tad ūrdhve tu kramāt nyaset
iṣṭakāṃkāḥ
pūrvavat kṛtvā catvāraḥ pūrvavat kramāt
mūrtimantreṇa saṃsthāpya mūlamantreṇa mantra vid
stūpim saṃsthāpayet tatra mūlamūrtim anusmara nu

original: tattanmadhye tu saṃsthāpya punaḥ pracchādya vāsasā /
analyzed: tad tad madhye tu saṃsthāpya punar pracchādya vāsasā

original: homaṃ kuryāccaturdikṣu athavā paścime diśi (?) // Vis_34.40 //
analyzed: homam kuryāt catur dikṣu athavā paścime diśi
eka agnim vā pratiṣṭhāpya homayet niśi pūrvavat
mūrti mantreṇa sakalam samidh ājya carūn tathā
sthaṇḍile muni śārdūlaḥ ekaikam śatam āhutīḥ
turīyeṇa tu mantreṇa pūrṇāhutim atha acerat

original: kumbhaṃ ca sudṛḍhaṃ sthāpya pūrvabhāge tu mantravit /
analyzed: kumbham ca su dṛḍham sthāpya pūrva bhāge tu mantra vid
nānā ratna samopetam athavā hema saṃyutam
sa apidhānam sa vastram ca su dṛḍham tantu veṣṭitam
kalaśān sādhayet aṣṭa vidyeśān paritas kramāt
sa vastrān sa apidhānān ca sa hiraṇyān ca kūrcakān
aśvattha pallavaiḥ yuktān droṇena paripūritān
puṇyāham vācayet tatra vaiṣṇavaiḥ vedapāragaiḥ
rātri śeṣam nayet tatra geya nṛtta samanvitam
prabhātāyām tu śarvaryām ācāryaḥ sarva mantra vid
snātvā vastra ādibhiḥ bhūṣya daivajñam pūjayet tadā
takṣakam karma yogya tvāt ācārya anujñayā mune
nava vastra aṅgulīyaiḥ tu pūjayet takṣakān kramāt

original: takṣakeṇa vinā kiñcit karmātra hi na vidyate /
analyzed: takṣakeṇa vinā kiñcid karma atra hi na vidyate

original: sa eva viśvakaraṇāt sraṣṭeti parikīrtyate // Vis_34.49 //
analyzed: saḥ eva viśvakaraṇāt sraṣṭā iti parikīrtyate
takṣakeṇa tu yat karma pūrvam ārabdham uttamam

original: takṣakeṇa tu kartavyaṃ nānyena tu kadācana // Vis_34.50 //
analyzed: takṣakeṇa tu kartavyam na anyena tu kadācana
tasya eva karma yogya tvam vidhātṛ vihitam yatas

original: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena tenaiva saha coditam // Vis_34.51 //
analyzed: tasmāt sarva prayatnena tena eva saha coditam
mūlam agram viditvā tu catur asra iṣṭakāḥ nyaset

original: madhye stūpiṃ pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyāhaṃ vācayettataḥ // Vis_34.52 //
analyzed: madhye stūpim pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyāham vācayet tatas
mūrdheṣṭakām nyaset mantrī pūrve puruṣa mantrataḥ

original: viśvena dakṣiṇe nyasya nivṛtyā paścime nyaset // Vis_34.53 //
analyzed: viśvena dakṣiṇe nyasya nivṛtyā paścime nyaset
aiśvaryam sarveṇa
ca uttare nyasya stūpim tu parameṣṭhinā

original: kalaśaiḥ snāpayedvidvān sūktena puruṣeṇa ca // Vis_34.54 //
analyzed: kalaśaiḥ snāpayet vidvān sūktena puruṣeṇa ca
kumbham ca mūlamantreṇa sthāpayet stūpi mūrdhani
brāhmaṇān bhojayet tatra vaiṣṇavān vedapāragān

original: ṛgvedaṃ pūrvabhāge tu yajurvedaṃ tu dakṣiṇe /
analyzed: ṛgvedam pūrva bhāge tu yajurvedam tu dakṣiṇe
paścime sāma gānam tu uttare tharvavedinaḥ
kramāt saṃbhojya vidhivat puṇyāham vācayet tatas
evam eva prakuryāt tu parivāra ālayasya ca
prākārasya eva kuryāt tu ratna nyāsam vinā kramam

original: gopure maṇḍape caiva mūrtihomaṃ vinā bhavet // Vis_34.58 //
analyzed: gopure maṇḍape ca eva mūrti homam vinā bhavet
etat saṃkṣepataḥ proktam mūrdheṣṭakā vidhim param
evam ukta prakāreṇa kārayet geham uttamam

original: brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vāpi vaiśyaḥ śūdro 'tha eva vā /
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyaḥ vā api vaiśyaḥ eva vā
takṣakaḥ vā muni śreṣṭha yathā śāstra anusārataḥ
kārayet śilpakarmāṇi pūrva pūrvā garīyasī
ādya iṣṭakā ādikān sarvān kārayet krama yogataḥ
takṣṇaḥ tu sarvathā alābhe mūrdheṣṭakā vidhim param

original: sudhākāryaṃ ca citrārdhaṃ citrābhāsaṃ tathaiva ca // Vis_34.62 //
analyzed: sudhā kāryam ca citra ardham citra ābhāsam tathā eva ca
mūlabera vidhānam ca parivāra ālaya ādikam
anyaiḥ api kulāla ādyaiḥ kārayet vā yathākramam
upānah stūpi paryantam mūla ālaya vidhim dhiḥ param raḥ
takṣakeṇa eva kartavyam anyathā rājya nāśa kṛt
iti mūrdheṣṭakānyāsam kārayīta kramāt guruḥ

original: rājño rāṣṭrasya kartuśca svasyāpi hitakāmyayā // Vis_34.65 //
analyzed: rājñaḥ rāṣṭrasya kartuḥ ca svasya api hita kāmyayā
iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām prāsādalakṣaṇādividhiḥ nāma
catustriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pañcatriṃśaḥ dhyāya
viṣvaksenaḥ
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi parivārasya lakṣaṇam
śṛṇu deva muni śreṣṭha mahā pīṭha avasānakam
tāla dvayam tad ardham vā prāsādāt parivārakam
visṛjya kalpayet dhīmān vā
catur hastam pañca hastam vyapohyante mahā mune
kalpayet parivārāṇām hasta mātram samantataḥ
śilābhiḥ iṣṭakābhiḥ vā ācārya aṅgulinā mune
catur aṅgulam utsedham madhye padmam sa karṇikam
kārayet paritas pīṭham mekhalā dvaya saṃyutam

original: tālamātreṇa vā kuryāt balipīṭhaṃ samantataḥ // Vis_35.5 //
analyzed: tāla mātreṇa vā kuryāt bali pīṭham samantataḥ
tathā eva parivārāṇām prākārāt mānam atra tu

original: evaṃ kalpya tato pīṭhaṃ parivārasya tu sarvaśaḥ // Vis_35.6 //
analyzed: evam kalpya pīṭham parivārasya tu sarvaśas
maṇḍapāt vā mahā pīṭham prākārāt vā mahā mune
hastam ṣoḍaśam utsṛjya ācārya aṅgulinā agratas
aṣṭa hastam tad ardham vā visṛjya ante mahā mune
kārayet vā mahā pīṭham pūrva apūrvā garīyasī
tad lakṣaṇam pravakṣyāmi bhukti mukti pradam śubham

original: viviktane paraṃ guhyaṃ śṛṇu nārada tattvataḥ // Vis_35.9 //
analyzed: param guhyam śṛṇu nārada tattvataḥ
tri catur pañca hastam vā vistāra āyāma tādṛśam samam
pādukā ādi abja paryantam uttama ādi krameṇa tu
kārayet śāstra dṛṣṭena śilpinā kuśalena tu

original: uttame 'pyuttamaṃ kuryāt madhyame madhyamaṃ kuru // Vis_35.11 //
analyzed: uttame pi uttamam kuryāt madhyame madhyamam kuru
adhame pi adhamam kuryāt vibhavasya anu rūpataḥ
ṣaṣ sapta hasta āyatam vā api
tad samam vistṛtam bhavet
evam jñātvā mahā pīṭham kalpayet su manoramam
yuktyā yukti viśeṣeṇa kārayet bali pīṭhakam
ekaviṃśati bhāgena tad kramam śṛṇu suvrata
aḍgena pādukam kā
ca eva pañcakaiḥ jagatī tathā

original: triyaṃśaṃ kumudaṃ caiva ekāṃśena tu paṭṭikā /
analyzed: triyaṃśam kumudam ca eva eka aṃśena tu paṭṭikā

original: galaṃ caiva caturbhāgaṃ bhāgaṃ caivordhvapaṭṭikā // Vis_35.15 //
analyzed: galam ca eva catur bhāgam bhāgam ca eva ūrdhva paṭṭikā
triyaṃśeḥ valabhī chandaḥ tryaṃśam karṇikā ucchrayam yaḥ

original: evaṃ kṛtvā mahāpīṭhaṃ śitrpinā kuśalena tu // Vis_35.16 //
analyzed: evam kṛtvā mahā pīṭham śitrpinā kuśalena tu
śilpa kārya avasāne tu prokṣayet tantra vittamaḥ
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi prokṣaṇam bali pīṭhake
ayane ca uttare kuryāt pūrvapakṣe śubhe hani
kalyāṇavāre su tithau pūrvedyus kārayet budhaḥ
takṣa kriyām samāpya atha prokṣayet tantra vittamaḥ
puṇyāham kārayet tatra prokṣayet pañca mantrakaiḥ
deva agra pīṭhayoḥ madhye maṇḍapam kārayet sudhīḥ

original: maṇḍapasya vidhānena toraṇāni tu pūrvavat // Vis_35.20 //
analyzed: maṇḍapasya vidhānena toraṇāni tu pūrvavat

original: kṛtvā tu pūrvavat samyak vediṃ kuryāttu madhyataḥ /
analyzed: kṛtvā tu pūrvavat samyak vedim kuryāt tu madhyatas

original: caturhastaṃ dvihastaṃ vā ekahastocchrayaṃ mane // Vis_35.21 //
analyzed: catur hastam dvi hastam vai eka hasta ucchrayam mane
su snigdham
kārayet tatra darpaṇa udara saṃnibha bhām
gomayena upalipya atha prokṣayet gandha vāriṇā
tad vedi pīṭhayoḥ madhye vṛttam vā caturaśrakam

original: kārayettatra kuṇḍaṃ tu madhyame homamācaret // Vis_35.23 //
analyzed: kārayet tatra kuṇḍam tu madhyame homam ācaret
śāli droṇa dvaye vedyām sa kūrcam sa apidhānakam
sa hiraṇyam sa vastram ca sarit salila pūritam
sa sūtram kāla rahitam droṇa pūrṇam su śobhanam

original: madhyame tu nyaseddhīmān viṣṇupāriṣadān bahūn // Vis_35.25 //
analyzed: madhyame tu nyaset dhīmān viṣṇu pāriṣadān bahūn
aindra ādi īśāna paryantam kalaśān sthāpayet pṛthak

original: kumudaṃ kumudākṣaṃ ca puṇḍarīkaṃ ca vāmanam // Vis_35.26 //
analyzed: kumudam kumudākṣam ca puṇḍarīkam ca vāmanam
śaṅku karṇam sarpa netram su mukham su pratiṣṭhitam
gandha ādibhiḥ samabhyarcya homam kuryāt anandritaḥ
samidh ājya carūn dadhnā madhunā payasā api ca
yavān siddhārtha salilān pratyakam śatam āhutīḥ
mantreṇa aṣṭa akṣareṇa eva dvādaśa akṣaram eva vā
nṛtta gīta samātodyaiḥ rātri śeṣam nayet budhaḥ
su muhūrte tu saṃprāpte brāhmaṇānām unajñayā
svasti sūkti kta

original: yuto gatvā vimānaṃ tu pradakṣiṇam // Vis_35.30 //
analyzed: yutaḥ gatvā vimānam tu pradakṣiṇam

original: svasvasthāne tu saṃprokṣya tattatsthānān smaran budhaḥ /
analyzed: sva sva sthāne tu saṃprokṣya tad tad sthānān smaran budhaḥ
kumbha udakāt aśeṣam tu mahā pīṭhe bhiṣecayet
saṃsmaret

original: pāyasaṃ kṛsaraṃ gaulyaṃ haridrānnaṃ caturvidham // Vis_35.32 //
analyzed: pāyasam kṛsaram gaulyam haridrā annam caturvidham
sa ājyam dadhi payaḥ yuktam nārikela payāṃsi ca
nivedayet mahā pīṭhe ca ādi mūrtim anusmaran

original: nivedya śeṣaṃ saṃgṛhya caṇḍādibhyo baliṃ kṣipet /
analyzed: nivedya śeṣam saṃgṛhya caṇḍa ādibhyaḥ balim kṣipet
śaṅkha bherī ādi saṃyuktam geya nṛtta samanvitam
veda adhyayana saṃyuktam bali karma samāpayet
bali ante parama ātmānam snāpayet adhama uttamam
mahā haviḥ nivedya atha puṇyāham punar ācaret
brāhmaṇān bhojayet tatra vaiṣṇavān vedapāragān
ācāryam pūjayet paścāt hema ratna aṅgulīyakaiḥ

original: idaṃ dhanyaṃ yaśasyaṃ ca sarvaśāntikaraṃ bhavet // Vis_35.37 //
analyzed: idam dhanyam yaśasyam ca sarva śānti karam bhavet

original: iti śrīpāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyāṃ mahāpīṭha- pratiṣṭhāvidhirnāma pañcatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām mahāpīṭha pratiṣṭhāvidhiḥ nāma pañcatriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
ṣaṭtriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
ro-0 fl-3 fl-4
puṇyāham vācayet tatra brāhmaṇaiḥ saha mantra vid

original: pañcabhārapramāṇaṃ vā tadardhaṃ vārdhameva vā // Vis_36.1 //
analyzed: pañca bhāra pramāṇam vā tad ardham vā ardham eva vā
tad nyūnam na hi kartavyam śāli saṃcayam uttamam

original: tatrordhve vikiredvidvān tadardhaṃ taṇḍulaṃ tathā // Vis_36.2 //
analyzed: tatra ūrdhve vikiret vidvān tad ardham taṇḍulam tathā
taṇḍula upari vinyasya ca aṣṭa patra abjam uttamam

original: tatra madhye likhedbījaṃ dale cāṣṭākṣaraṃ nyaset // Vis_36.3 //
analyzed: tatra madhye likhet bījam dale ca aṣṭa akṣaram nyaset
madhyame nava kumbham tu sthāpayet sādhaka uttamaḥ
sūtra vastra samāyuktam ratna mālyeḥ alaṃkṛtam
gandha udakena saṃpūrṇam vastra j yugmena veṣṭitam
pūrva ādi ca aṣṭa kumbhasya vastram ekaikam eva vā
diś mūrti ādīni ca aṣṭānām eka vastram atha api vā

original: karṇikāyāṃ nyaset kumbhaṃ daleṣvaṣṭaghaṭān nyaset // Vis_36.6 //
analyzed: karṇikāyām nyaset kumbham daleṣu aṣṭa ghaṭān nyaset
tri sapta pañca darbhaiḥ vā kṛtvā kūrcam vinikṣipet

original: tasmin pūrṇaghaṭe madhye devāgāraṃ tu cintayet // Vis_36.7 //
analyzed: tasmin pūrṇa ghaṭe madhye devāgāram tu cintayet
sahasra śīrṣā puruṣaḥ sahasra akṣāḥ sahasra pād
sahasra kuntala upetam sahusra makuṭa anvitam
sahasra āditya saṃkāśam sahasra indu nibha ānanam
sahasra vāhanaiḥ yuktam sarva diś nāsikā anvitam
śaṅkha cakra gadā pāṇim sarva praharaṇa anvitam
prāsāda rūpam iti āhuḥ pūrvarātre dhivāsayet
tad dhyānena eva deva ṛṣe samyak snānam avāpnuyāt
mokṣa arthī mokṣam āpnoti tasmāt dhyānam viśiṣyate
maṇḍapa ādiṣu sarveṣu dhyānam evam prakīrtitam

original: tasmin madhye nayedvidvān smaran tat parameṣṭhinā // Vis_36.12 //
analyzed: tasmin madhye nayet vidvān smaran tat parameṣṭhinā

original: pūrvādi cottarānte tu tanmūrtiṃ tu vicintayet /
analyzed: pūrva ādi ca uttara ante tu tad mūrtim tu vicintayet
āgneya ādiṣu koṇeṣu vainateya ādikān nyaset
mṛtagasya adhipatim siṃham vainateya aṃśakam nyaset

original: tasmin pūrṇaghaṭe madhye pauruṣaṃ sūktamabhyaset // Vis_36.14 //
analyzed: tasmin pūrṇa ghaṭe madhye pauruṣam sūktam abhyaset
diś deva ādiṣu kumbheṣu tad tad mūrtim japet kramāt

original: ṛgādīnāṃ tu vedānāṃ sāramuddhṛtya nārada // Vis_36.15 //
analyzed: ṛk ādīnām tu vedānām sāram uddhṛtya nārada
pūrva ādi soma paryantam uccaret susvareṇa tu
tatas pūrṇa ghaṭa ādīni ca arcayet tena mantrataḥ
haviḥ nivedayet paścāt mantreṇa parameṣṭhinā

original: mukhavāsaṃ tato dadyāt rakṣāṃ kṛtvāṣṭadikkrāmat // Vis_36.17 //
analyzed: mukha vāsam tatas dadyāt rakṣām kṛtvā aṣṭa diś krāmat
ghaṇṭā dhvani samāyuktam gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ saha

original: haviṣā balidānaṃ tu kārayedaṣṭadikṣu ca // Vis_36.18 //
analyzed: haviṣā bali dānam tu kārayet aṣṭa dikṣu ca
kumuda ādīni sarvāṇi gṛhṇanti balim uttamam
śaṅkṣa dundubhi nirghoṣam kṛtvā asmin muni sattama
tatas puṣpa añjalim kṛtvā sādhakaḥ parama artha vid
namaskṛtya akhilān sarvān maṅgalān uccaret kramāt
prabhātāyām tu śarvaryām ācāryaḥ snānam ācaret

original: sūktena puruṣeṇaiva mantraṃ vā parameṣṭhinā // Vis_36.21 //
analyzed: sūktena puruṣeṇa eva mantram vā parameṣṭhinā
kumbha sthitena deveśam pūjayet puruṣottamam
gandha ādi dīpa paryantam tad tad mantreṇa sādhakaḥ
pūrva ādi īśāna paryantam arcayet aṣṭa diś ghaṭān

original: mahāmumbhādi saṃgṛhya prāsādaṃ tu paribhramet // Vis_36.23 //
analyzed: mahā mumbha ādi saṃgṛhya prāsādam tu paribhramet
śaṅkha bherī ādi nādaiḥ tu nṛtta gīta samanvitam
svastivācana saṃyuktam garbhāgāram praveśayet
devasya agre tu saṃsthāpya taṇḍula upari nārada
mahā kumbha stha deveśam vidhinā adhipatim param
tad pūrva pārśve saṃsthāpya taṇḍuleṣu ghaṭān kramāt
arghya pādya ādinā abhyarcya mukha vāsa avasānakam
evam abhyarcya matimān kṣamyatām iti ca uccaran
mantra hīnam kriyā hīnam bhakti hīnam janārdana
kṣantum arhasi deveśa paripūrṇam tat astu me

original: evaṃ kṛtvā tu mantrajño maṅgalāni samīrayet // Vis_36.28 //
analyzed: evam kṛtvā tu mantra jñaḥ maṅgalāni samīrayet
ācāryaḥ puṣpam ādāya namaskṛtya harim prabhum
kumbha sthitena deveśe mūlabere niyojayet
tathā eva aṣṭa ghaṭāt śaktim tad dehe viniveśayet

original: parameṣṭhyā nyaset pūrvaṃ diṅmūrtyādīn svavidyayā // Vis_36.30 //
analyzed: nyaset
mūlaberasya mūrdhnā iva secayet tān tribindunā

original: devapāde tu hastābhyāṃ puṣpaṃ datvā punaḥ punaḥ // Vis_36.31 //
analyzed: devapāde tu hastābhyām puṣpam da tvā punar punar

original: tataḥ puruṣasūktaṃ tu brāhmaṇaiḥ saha saṃjapet /
analyzed: tatas puruṣasūktam tu brāhmaṇaiḥ saha saṃjapet

original: tasmin kāle mahāprājña ācāryaṃ pūjayeddhanaiḥ // Vis_36.32 //
analyzed: tasmin kāle mahā prājñaḥ ācāryam pūjayet dhanaiḥ
nava vastra aṅgulīyaiḥ tu kaṭaka ādi vibhūṣaṇaiḥ
kumbha sthitena toyena prokṣayet geham uttamam
atra upayuktam yat dravyam devatā alaṃkṛtam vinā

original: ācāryāya pradātavyaṃ vastraṃ vrīhyādibhiḥ saha // Vis_36.34 //
analyzed: ācāryāya pradātavyam vastram vrīhi ādibhiḥ saha
niveditam tu tat sarvam sāttvatebhyaḥ nivedayet
śilpinam pūjayet tatra daivajñam anupūjayet
brāhmaṇān bhojayet tatra vaiṣṇavān vedapāragān

original: kriyāvasāne matimān citrakarma ca kārayet // Vis_36.36 //
analyzed: kriyā avasāne matimān citrakarma ca kārayet
havanam maṇḍapa ādyeṣu evam eva samācaret
evam ukta prakāreṇa kārayet adhivāsanam
vāsa adhivāsanam ca eva prāsāda prokṣaṇe mune

original: aṅkurārpaṇakārye tu homamatra na vidyate // Vis_36.38 //
analyzed: aṅkura arpaṇa kārye tu homam atra na vidyate

original: bālagehaṃ tu devarṣe kalpayet pūrvavat kramāt /
analyzed: bāla geham tu deva ṛṣe kalpayet pūrvavat kramāt
jagatī kumuda ādīni varjayet taruṇālaye
bāla ālaya pratiṣṭhāyām sthaṇḍile homam ācaret
adhivāsa ādi karmāṇi vāsava ādīni kārayet
evam ukta prakāreṇa śaktim udvāsya nārada

original: jīrṇoddhāraṃ tataḥ kuryāt śilpinā kuśalena tu // Vis_36.41 //
analyzed: jīrṇa uddhāram tatas kuryāt śilpinā kuśalena tu
anyathā kurute mohāt grāma nāśaḥ dhana kṣayaḥ
sthāna nāśaḥ bhavet tatra saṃbhavet na atra saṃśayaḥ
tasmāt sarva prayatnena vimāna stha harim param
udvāsayet mahābere kramāt pūrvam yathāvidhi
tasmāt sarva prayatnena śakti udvāsanam ārabhet
mārgeṇa ekena saṃyojya prāsādasya adhidaivatam
vinoda maṇḍapam ca eva vapra prākārake tathā
parivāra ālaya ādyeṣu bahis prākārake tathā
evam ukta prakāreṇa kārayet adhivāsanam
evam saṃkṣepataḥ proktam jīrṇoddhāram atha ārabhet
atas param pravakṣyāmi jīrṇoddhāra vidhim param

original: ācāryaṃ yajamānaṃ ca takṣācāryaṃ mahāmune // Vis_36.47 //
analyzed: ācāryam yajamānam ca takṣa ācāryam mahā mune
mṛṇmaya pratimā ajīrṇe śūla mṛd paṭa rajjavaḥ

original: punastu mṛṇmayāḥ kāryā śilayā vāpi kārayet // Vis_36.48 //
analyzed: punar tu mṛṇmayāḥ kāryā śilayā vā api kārayet
śailaja pratimā jīrṇe loha jāḥ śaila jāḥ tathā
ratna ja pratimā jīrṇe sauvarṇam vā api rājatam
dāru mṛd śaila loha ādyāḥ rukma ratna ādikāḥ kramāt
uttamāḥ iti vijñeyāḥ uttarottaram agrataḥ
rukmam ratnam samānam ca kecid āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: śilālohaṃ ca sadṛśaṃ devarṣe iti kecana // Vis_36.51 //
analyzed: śilā loham ca sadṛśam deva ṛṣe iti kecana
hāṭakam rajatam tāmram samānam iti nārada
loha śabdena saṃjñātvā kārayet utsava ādikam
yajamānasya vāñchā ced yathā vitta anusārataḥ

original: asmin munivaraśreṣṭha trapukaṃ cāyasaṃ vinā // Vis_36.53 //
analyzed: asmin muni vara śreṣṭha trapukam ca āyasam vinā

original: ātmārthe ca parārthe ca pratimākaraṇe mune /
analyzed: ātma arthe ca para arthe ca pratimā karaṇe mune
adhama dravya saṃpannam para kāryam anuttamam

original: sadṛśane tu yatkāryaṃ madhyamaṃ procyate budhaiḥ /
analyzed: tu yat kāryam madhyamam procyate budhaiḥ

original: nottamaṃ tvadhamaiḥ kāryaṃ kurvan mohāt praṇaśyati // Vis_36.55 //
analyzed: na uttamam tu adhamaiḥ kāryam kurvat mohāt praṇaśyati

original: rājarāṣṭraṃ ca sakalaṃ iti śāstrasya niścayaḥ /
analyzed: rāja rāṣṭram ca sakalam iti śāstrasya niścayaḥ
dravye eva visaṃvādaḥ māna unmāna pramāṇakaiḥ
na nyūnam atiriktam ca yadi ced siddhim ātmanaḥ
ātma arthe vā para arthe vā tulyam etat dvijottama

original: ātmārthe vaṃśanāśaḥ syāt parārthe rāṣṭranāśanam // Vis_36.58 //
analyzed: ātma arthe vaṃśa nāśaḥ syāt para arthe rāṣṭra nāśanam
tasmāt sarva prayatnena kārayet vidhi coditam

original: vimānaṃ pratimāṃ vāpi prākāraṃ gopuraṃ tathā // Vis_36.59 //
analyzed: vimānam pratimām vā api prākāram gopuram tathā
maṇḍapam pūrvavat kuryāt nava karma anulepane

original: naṣṭālayaṃ cettadbhūmau purāṇoktaṃ cārṣaṃ tu vā // Vis_36.60 //
analyzed: naṣṭa ālayam ced tat bhūmau purāṇa uktam ca ārṣam tu vā

original: daivikaṃ mānuṣaṃ vāpi yathākāmaṃ tu kārayet /
analyzed: daivikam mānuṣam vā api yathākāmam tu kārayet
uttama ālayam atra eva uttama uttamam eva vā
adhama uttamam vā vipra indra jīrṇam ced muni sattama
madhyamena adhamena eva kārayet ālayam punar
yajamānasya vāñchā ced madhyame pi evam eva tu
adhama ālayam bhavet tasmin adhama uttamam eva vā
adhama adhamam eva atha jīrṇa uddhāraṇa karmaṇi

original: upapīṭhasamāyuktaṃ dvitalaṃ tritalaṃ tu vā // Vis_36.64 //
analyzed: upa pīṭha samāyuktam dvi talam tri talam tu vā
yathā vitta anusāreṇa
kuryāt eka talam tu vā

original: uttamādikramaṃ jñātvā yathākāmaṃ tu vardhayet // Vis_36.65 //
analyzed: uttama ādi kramam jñātvā yathākāmam tu vardhayet
vardhanāt śriyam āpnoti rājñaḥ rāṣṭrasya nārada
tathā eva nagara ādīnām ālayasya viśeṣataḥ
bhavanam gopura ākāram śālakūṭa ādikam mune

original: jīrṇaṃ cediha loke tu kārayedvā prapākṛtim // Vis_36.67 //
analyzed: jīrṇam ced iha loke tu kārayet vā prapā ākṛtim
nagara ādīni saṃjñātvā grāma rāja anukūlataḥ
yathā vitta anusāreṇa
kuryāt veśma yathā aparuci
grāma anukūlataḥ vā api dhāma kuryāt anuttamam
pratimām punar atra eva kuryāt prāsāda mātrataḥ

original: dvāramānena vā cāsmin garbhamānena vā mune /
analyzed: dvāra mānena vā ca asmin garbha mānena vā mune
uttama adhama madhyena naṣṭa uddhāraṇa karmaṇi
tad gehāt paścime yāmye nirgama ākṛti na iṣyate
pūrvavat kārayet jīrṇasya uddhāre muni sattama
saṃmohāt paściye yāmye nirgamam kārayet yadi
grāmasya kalaham kuryāt
vinaśyati
tad rāṣṭram yajamānaḥ ca naśyati eva na saṃśayaḥ
tasmāt na kuryāt nirgama ākṛtim
pūrva dvārasya gehasya maṇḍapa ādi yathākramam

original: yajamānasya vāñchā cedyathākāmaṃ tu vardhayet // Vis_36.74 //
analyzed: yajamānasya vāñchā ced yathākāmam tu vardhayet
sarvaśas pratidikṣu ādi paścimam na iṣyate mune
pūrva dvārasya gehasya maṇḍapa ādi yathākramam
jīrṇoddhāre muni śreṣṭha sarvam pūrvavat ācaret

original: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena yathākāmaṃ tu vardhayet // Vis_36.76 //
analyzed: tasmāt sarva prayatnena yathākāmam tu vardhayet
vardhanāt śriyam āpnoti tad gehasya dine dine

original: prākārādiṣu bhūṣāṇāṃ bhedo vā doṣakāraṇam // Vis_36.77 //
analyzed: prākāra ādiṣu bhūṣāṇām bhedaḥ vā doṣa kāraṇam
na bhavet iti bhāṣante munayaḥ nārada ādayaḥ
gopure dhika bhāvam ca prākāre viśeṣataḥ
evam parīkṣya matimān navakarma anulepane

original: naṣṭoddhāre ca vai cāsmin jīrṇoddhārādiṣu kramāt // Vis_36.79 //
analyzed: naṣṭa uddhāre ca vai ca asmin jīrṇa uddhāra ādiṣu kramāt
kārayet sādhakaḥ paścāt śilpa ācārya samanvitaḥ

original: mūlabere muniśreṣṭha bhinnaṃ chedyaṃ bhavedyadi // Vis_36.80 //
analyzed: mūlabere muni śreṣṭha bhinnam chedyam bhavet yadi
sphuṭitam ced tu tat beram tyaktvā paścāt mahā mune
śaktim udvāsayet berāt kṣipram śāntim samācaret
tasya agre vidhivat kumbhe saṃsthāpya harim avyayam
tad kumbha madhye mūlena mūlaberān nayet harim
śānti homam tatas kṛtvā cakra mantreṇa mantra vid
sudarśana mahā mantram sarva śanti karam bhavet
āvāhana visargam tu kumbhāt pūrva vat ācaret
bālasthānam kramāt kalpya sthāpayet vidhi coditam
jala adhivāsanam tasya na iṣyate muni sattama
sadyas dhivāsanena eva sthāpayet harim avyayam
jīrṇoddhāre muni śreṣṭha kāla velā ādi na iṣyate

original: nirīkṣya bahudhā doṣān pūjākāle dine dine // Vis_36.86 //
analyzed: nirīkṣya bahudhā doṣān pūjā kāle dine dine
paścāt saṃpūjayet devam doṣa hīnam bhavet yadi
evam doṣa samāyuktam mohāt lobhāt yajet harim

original: tatpūjā niṣphalā yāti kartā bhartā ca naśyati /
analyzed: tad pūjā niṣphalā yāti kartā bhartā ca naśyati
tat grāmam nidhanam yāti roga vṛddhiḥ bhaviṣyati
tasmāt sarva prayatnena jīrṇa uddhāraṇam ācaret

original: dhvaje vārohite paścāt vaiguṇyaṃ yadi dṛśyate // Vis_36.89 //
analyzed: dhvaje vā ārohite paścāt vaiguṇyam yadi dṛśyate
utsavam ca muni śreṣṭha śānti homa samanvitam

original: bālasthāne samāsādya utsavaṃ tatra kārayet // Vis_36.90 //
analyzed: bālasthāne samāsādya utsavam tatra kārayet
anyathā ced mahā doṣaḥ rājñaḥ ca eva vināśa kṛt
tasmāt sarva prayatnena śeṣa karma samācaret
nitya utsava ādi karmāṇi bālasthāne nārada

original: pūrvavat kārayeddhīmān iti śāstrasya niścayaḥ // Vis_36.92 //
analyzed: pūrvavat kārayet dhīmān iti śāstrasya niścayaḥ
mantra jñaḥ kulīnaḥ śāstra pāragaḥ
tantra jñaḥ veda pāṭhī ca sthāpana ādi kriyā paraḥ
sarva avayava saṃpūrṇaḥ sarva roga vivarjitaḥ
su śāntaḥ kuśalaḥ dāntaḥ yadṛcchā lābha toṣakaḥ
amatsarī jita krodhaḥ

original: varjyāvarjyaḥ kṛtajñaśca pūrvakārī ca bhaktimān // Vis_36.95 //
analyzed: varjya avarjyaḥ kṛtajñaḥ ca pūrva kārī ca bhaktimān
tad vaṃśyaḥ vā api śiṣyaḥ vā praśiṣyaḥ tantra pāragaḥ

original: tantravān dīkṣito vāpi guṇavān guṇavittamaḥ // Vis_36.96 //
analyzed: tantravān dīkṣitaḥ vā api guṇavān guṇa vittamaḥ
rājayakṣmā

original: ca kuṣṭhī ca gulmī ca śibi(pi?) viṣṭakaḥ /
analyzed: ca kuṣṭhī ca gulmī ca śibipi viṣṭakaḥ
khalvāṭaḥ ca ati vṛddhaḥ ca bālaḥ vṛṣaṇa rogavān
hrasva ākāraḥ ti dīrghaḥ ca kṛśa cibukaḥ eva ca
badhiraḥ vikala aṅgaḥ ca vipraḥ radana doṣa yuj
varjayet deva kāryeṣu kunakhī ca viśeṣataḥ
sthāpaka ācāryayoḥ ca eva lakṣaṇam viddhi nārada
saṃgrahet lakṣaṇa upetam ācāryam sthāpakam tathā
evam parīkṣya matimān pratiṣṭhā ārādhana ādiṣu
jīrṇa uddhāre viśeṣeṇa lakṣayet lakṣaṇān krāmat
su muhūrte su lagne ca sthāpakaḥ takṣaka anvitaḥ
tantreṇa ekena kartavyam karṣaṇa ādiṣu nārada
yad tantreṇa samārabdham tat tantreṇa samācaret
anuktam ca anya tantreṣu nirīkṣya atra prayojayet
viśeṣān ca muni śreṣṭha ca anyathā rāṣṭra nāśa kṛt
cāturvarṇya samopetaḥ
sat ācāra parāyaṇaḥ
sat vaṃśyaḥ sarva śāstra jñaḥ loka jñaḥ sarva dharma vid
bhaktimān dhanavān vāgmī sarva saṃkalpa vṛddhi yuj
su śīlaḥ ca surūpaḥ ca śraddhāluḥ śuddha mānasaḥ
ācāryaḥ takṣakaḥ ca eva vaṃśa gaḥ sumukha uttamaḥ
śāstra prāmāṇyakaḥ ca eva dīnaḥ su bahu bhṛtyavān
yathā ukta kārī matimān kuśalaḥ sarva karmasu

original: pūrvakārī ca tadvaṃśyaḥ tacchiṣyo vā praśiṣyakaḥ // Vis_36.107 //
analyzed: pūrva kārī ca tad vaṃśyaḥ tad śiṣyaḥ vā praśiṣyakaḥ
tad jātīyaḥ nya jātīyaḥ pūrva apūrva guṇa adhikaḥ

original: pūrvāpalobhe tu gṛhṇīyāt uttaraṃ nānyathā mune // Vis_36.108 //
analyzed: pūrva apalobhe tu gṛhṇīyāt uttaram na anyathā mune

original: mohena yadi gṛhṇīyāt tasya syāt kartṛsaṃkaraḥ /
analyzed: mohena yadi gṛhṇīyāt tasya syāt kartṛ saṃkaraḥ
kartṛ saṃkara doṣeṇa rāja rāṣṭrasya roga kṛt
tasmāt sarva prayatnena śāstra dṛṣṭyā samācaret
takṣakam takṣa sūtra jñam kuśalam sarva karmasu

original: laghuhastaṃ surūpaṃ ca suśāntaṃ daivikaṃ tathā /
analyzed: laghu hastam surūpam ca su śāntam daivikam tathā
vaṃśa anuvaṃśa sampannam kuśalam sat parāyaṇam
vaiṣṇavam sūtra kāla jñam kriyā jñam pūrva kāriṇam
dayālum śānta manasam sa tīrtham
sat samādṛtam

original: tadalābhe tu tadvaṃśyān tacchiśyān vā praśiṣyakān /
analyzed: tad alābhe tu tad vaṃśyān tad śiśyān vā praśiṣyakān
saṃnimantritam evam tat
na kuryāt jāti saṃkaram
anya jāti samālabdham ādi kāle mahā mune
anya jātyā kṛtam mohāt rāja rāṣṭra vināśa kṛt
evam lakṣaṇam ālabhya kartuḥ icchā puraḥsaram
yaḥ mohāt anya mārgeṇa kārayet muni sattama
ācāryasya ca kartuḥ ca takṣṇaḥ ca api aśubham bhavet

original: iti subahu nirīkṣya buddhidṛṣṭyā satatamananyamatiḥ sa kartṛmatyā // Vis_36.116 //
analyzed: iti su bahu nirīkṣya buddhi dṛṣṭyā satatam ananya matiḥ sa kartṛmatyā
sthapatimati ca
kārayīta jīrṇa uddharaṇam asau jagatām guruḥ guruḥ yaḥ
viṣvaksenaḥ

original: ataḥ paraṃ pravaṣyāmi prāsādasya viśeṣataḥ // Vis_36.117 //
analyzed: atas param prāsādasya viśeṣataḥ
ratha ādi śibikā ādīnām prokṣaṇam paramam śubham
sarva śānti karam puṃsām sarva tīrtha phala āpradam
pūrva ukta maṇḍape śuddhe sarva maṅgala saṃyute

original: tanmadhye hastakāṃ vediṃ vṛttāṃ vā cutaraśrakām // Vis_36.119 //
analyzed: tad madhye hastakām vedim vṛttām vā
kārayet śāstra dṛṣṭena tat nāma adhunā ucyate

original: vṛttaṃ suśobhanaṃ nāma caturaśraṃ sumaṅgalam // Vis_36.120 //
analyzed: vṛttam su śobhanam nāma caturaśram su maṅgalam
rāja rāṣṭra vivṛddhi artham vṛtta kāram bhavet sadā
grāma āyatana vṛddhi artham caturaśram tu nārada
vṛttam vā akṛti vijñeyaḥ
caturaśram tu vādhiḥ
āma iṣṭakābhiḥ pakvābhiḥ kuryāt vedim anuttamām
hasta ucchrāyām tad ardham vā darpaṇa udara saṃnibhām
pūrvavat vedim ālipya prokṣayet pūrvavat kramāt
puṇyāham vācayet tatra brāhmaṇānām anujñayā

original: pūrvavat sthaṇḍilaṃ kṛtvā śālinā munisattama // Vis_36.124 //
analyzed: pūrvavat sthaṇḍilam kṛtvā śālinā muni sattama
tad ardham taṇḍulam kṛtvā śālibhiḥ vā anyam eva vā

original: vedikāyāṃ tadūrdhve tu pīṭhaṃ kṛtvā likhet punaḥ // Vis_36.125 //
analyzed: vedikāyām tad ūrdhve tu pīṭham kṛtvā likhet punar
vedikāyām tu paritas śālibhiḥ vedim ācaret
śāli madhye muni śreṣṭha ca aṣṭa diś dalam ālikhet
chandaḥ mūla ādi vacanam likhet tad dala madhyame
sūtra vastra paricchannam sarva lakṣaṇa saṃyutam
candra maṇḍala madhye tu sthāpayet tena mantrataḥ
tad kumbha jala madhye tu sitapuṣpam vinikṣipet
puṣpa mālyaiḥ alaṃkṛtya vastra yugmaiḥ alaṃkṛtam
nava ratna samāyuktam nava kūrca yutam tathā
tasmin āvāhayet madhye prāsādasya adhidaivatam

original: madhye kumbhaṃ ca paritaḥ sthāpayedaṣṭadigdale // Vis_36.130 //
analyzed: madhye kumbham ca paritas sthāpayet aṣṭa diś dale
tad tad mantreṇa matimān aṣṭa kumbhān anukramāt
nava vastreṇa saṃchādya sūtra puṣpa jala anvitam
kūrca dvaya samopetam puṣpa mālyaiḥ alaṃkṛtam
pūrva ādi īśāna paryantam kumbhe pūrvavat ānayet
ācāryaḥ samalaṃkṛtya hema vastra aṅgulīyakaiḥ

original: kumbhasya dakṣiṇe pārśve uttarābhimukhaḥ sthitaḥ // Vis_36.133 //
analyzed: kumbhasya dakṣiṇe pārśve uttara abhimukhaḥ sthitaḥ
puṇpa añjali puṭam kṛtvā imam mantram japet budhaḥ
sahasra śīrṣa ādīni di
sūktam tu puruṣeṇa tu
mulaberān nayet kumbhe devam prāsāda rūpiṇam
athavā muni śārdūla ca ānayet parameṣṭhinā
pūrvavat bali dānam tu kāreyat mantra vittamaḥ
tathā eva prokṣayet vidvān sūktena puruṣeṇa tu

original: garbhagehaṃ tathā prokṣya bahirantaḥ samantataḥ // Vis_36.137 //
analyzed: garbha geham tathā prokṣya bahis antar samantataḥ
kumbha sthitena deveśam vimāna ādiṣu yojayet
arghya pādya ādinā abhyarcya haviḥ tatra na vidyate
balim tu kārayet tatra ca aṣṭa dikṣu samantataḥ

original: tasmin kāle mahāprājño ācārya pūjayet kramāt // Vis_36.139 //
analyzed: tasmin kāle mahā prājñaḥ ācārya pūjayet kramāt
hema vastra aṅgulīyaiḥ tu pūjayet deva vat tadā
śilpinam pūjayet tatra nava vastra aṅgulīyakaiḥ
brāhmaṇān bhojayet tatra vaiṣṇavān vedapāragān
evam eva tu kartavyam tris adhā
śibikāni ca
ratha ādi vāhanānām tu khaga īśāt śaktim ānayet

original: tena mantreṇa mantrajño prokṣayet pūrvavat kramāt // Vis_36.142 //
analyzed: tena mantreṇa mantra jño prokṣayet pūrvavat kramāt
caṇḍāla patita udakyā niṣādya edai
stakṣaka ādikaiḥ

original: lobhādvā yadi vā mohāt sparśanaṃ cenmunīśvara // Vis_36.143 //
analyzed: lobhāt vā yadi vā mohāt sparśanam ced muni īśvara
prāsāda prokṣaṇena eva prāsādam vai
athavā muni śārdūla pañcagavyam samānayet
deva agre hasta mātram tu samālipya samāhitaḥ

original: droṇaśāliṃ tu vistīrya tadardhaṃ taṇḍulaṃ tathā // Vis_36.145 //
analyzed: droṇa śālim tu vistīrya tad ardham taṇḍulam tathā

original: tatra madhye likhet padmaṃ pūrvoktena vidhānataḥ /
analyzed: tatra madhye likhet padmam pūrva uktena vidhānataḥ

original: pañcagavyaṃ tu saṃsthāpya tena bījena sādhakaḥ // Vis_36.146 //
analyzed: pañcagavyam tu saṃsthāpya tena bījena sādhakaḥ
puṇyāham vācayet tatra gandha puṣpa ādinā arcayet

original: havirnivedayet paścāt smaran devasya rūpiṇam // Vis_36.147 //
analyzed: haviḥ nivedayet paścāt smaran devasya rūpiṇam
prokṣayet gavyakaiḥ mantraiḥ pañca upaniṣadaiḥ kramāt

original: tataḥ saptadaśā bhinnān kalaśān baliberage // Vis_36.148 //
analyzed: tatas saptadaśāḥ bhinnān kalaśān baliberage
snapanam kārayet tasmin na atra saṃśayaḥ
caṇḍāla ādyaiḥ ca
prāyaścittam idam smṛtam
prāsāda prokṣaṇam paścāt kārayet vidhi coditam
ācāryam pūjayet tatra yathā vitta anusārataḥ

original: diṅmūrtīnāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ na śuddhiriha nārada /
analyzed: diś mūrtīnām tu sarveṣām na śuddhiḥ iha nārada
atra kaścid viśeṣaḥ sti diṅmūrti sthāpanā vidhau
ardhacitra pratiṣṭhāyām yat proktam saṃhitā antare

original: tathaiva kārayettasmin diṅmūrtīnāṃ tu nārada // Vis_36.152 //
analyzed: tathā eva kārayet tasmin diṅmūrtīnām tu nārada
āyuḥ ārogya putra ādīn labhate na atra saṃśayaḥ
utsava ante pralepa ante durjana sparśane tathā
durnimittāt taḥ
ca eva kāryam saṃprokṣaṇā vidhiḥ

original: diṅmūrtīnāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ utsavānte na kārayet // Vis_36.154 //
analyzed: diṅmūrtīnām tu sarveṣām utsava ante na kārayet
ardhacitra pratiṣṭhā asmin śeṣam sādhāraṇam bhavet
durjana sparśanam ced tu prāsādam muni sattama
caṇḍāla ādyaiḥ ca
prāyaścittam samācaret

original: tenaiva śuddhyate tasmin nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // Vis_36.156 //
analyzed: tena eva tasmin na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
diś mūrtīnām tu sarveṣām asmin tena eva tuṣyati
gehasya ālepana ante ca durjana sparśane ca

original: diṅmūrtīnāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ viśeṣaṃ na tu kārayet /
analyzed: diś mūrtīnām tu sarveṣām viśeṣam na tu kārayet
tathā eva durnimitteṣu śeṣam pūrvavat ācaret
prāsāda prokṣaṇena eva śuddhyate na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: nāstikyenaiva yo mohāt anyathākurute mune // Vis_36.159 //
analyzed: nāstikyena eva yaḥ mohāt anyathākurute mune

original: tat sthānaṃ nāśakṛdvāpi tadgrāmasya tathaiva ca /
analyzed: tat sthānam tat grāmasya tathā eva ca
tasmāt tu vidhivat samyak kārayet tantra vittamaḥ
iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām jīrṇoddhārādividhiḥ nāma ṣaṭtriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
saptatriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
nāradaḥ
namaḥ te stu jagannātha viṣṇupāriṣadeśvara
viṣvaksena namaḥ te stu namaḥ te viśvakarmaṇe
tvattaḥ dhītam mayā tantram pañcarātra arṇava amṛtam
dīkṣā śakuna vistāraḥ na tvayā kiñcid īritaḥ
tat sarvam śrotum icchāmi prabrūhi bhagavat mama

original: iti vijñāpito devo viṣvakseno mahātmanā // Vis_37.3 //
analyzed: iti vijñāpitaḥ devaḥ viṣvaksenaḥ mahātmanā
pratyuvāca mahajejāḥ praṇamya garuḍadhvajam
viṣvaksenaḥ

original: śruṇu nārada tattvena mahāvidyāṃ purātanīm // Vis_37.4 //
analyzed: śruṇu nārada tattvena mahā vidyām purātanīm
mayā pṛṣṭaḥ purā prāha mahā viṣṇuḥ jagat mayaḥ
sādhakānām hita arthāya catuḥṣaṣṭi prabhedataḥ

original: śakunāni jagannāthaḥ tān sarvān prabravīmi te /
analyzed: śakunāni jagannāthaḥ tān sarvān prabravīmi te

original: vighneśaḥ prathamaḥ prokto gāṅgeyo mūṣikādhvajaḥ // Vis_37.6 //
analyzed: vighneśaḥ prathamaḥ proktaḥ gāṅgeyaḥ mūṣikādhvajaḥ

original: taṃ pūjayitvā vidhivat praṇamya prārthayen mune /
analyzed: tam pūjayitvā vidhivat praṇamya prārthayet mune
tasmin prasanne vighneśe sarva deva namaskṛte
sarva artha siddhiḥ bhavati na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: sa eva nāyakasteṣāṃ śakunānāṃ gaṇeśvaraḥ // Vis_37.8 //
analyzed: saḥ eva nāyakaḥ teṣām śakunānām gaṇa īśvaraḥ
tasmāt sarva prayatnena pūjayet vighnanāyakam
pūjā kramam pravakṣyāmi saṃkṣepeṇa mahā mune
āvāhayet śucau deśe su lipte su vicitrite
sva āsane darbha saṃkīrṇe kusumaiḥ upaśobhite
gāyatryā ca āsanam dadyāt praṇamya gaṇanāyakam

original: arghyaṃ pādyaṃ tathācāmaṃ madhuparkaṃ tathaiva ca // Vis_37.11 //
analyzed: arghyam pādyam tathā ācāmam madhuparkam tathā eva ca
snānam vastra upavītam ca bhūṣaṇam gandha puṣpakam
dhūpa dīpam pau
nivedya ādi stotram raja mukham smaran

original: kṛtvā pūjāṃ gaṇeśasya praṇamya prārthayet prabhum /
analyzed: kṛtvā pūjām gaṇeśasya praṇamya prārthayet prabhum
gāyatryā ca eva tat sarvam kuryāt tantra vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: evaṃ pūjya tataḥ paścāt gandhapuṣpādibhiḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: evam pūjya tatas paścāt gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ punar
pustakam tu yathāvat vijita indriyaḥ
ālikhet pustakam sarvam śakunāni yathākramam
nāradaḥ

original: kathaṃ deva nimittāni likhyate pustake naraiḥ // Vis_37.15 //
analyzed: katham deva nimittāni likhyate pustake naraiḥ
etat ācakṣva bhagavan saṃśayaḥ me mahā nasau
viṣvaksenaḥ

original: evameva mayā pṛṣṭaḥ provāca bhagavān yathā // Vis_37.16 //
analyzed: evam eva mayā pṛṣṭaḥ provāca bhagavān yathā
tathā eva atra pravakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣva muni puṅgava
vighnarāja jo

original: kabandhaṃ na nadī caiva bṛhajjālī tathaiva ca /
analyzed: kabandham na nadī ca eva bṛhajjālī tathā eva ca
puruṣaḥ ca mṛgaḥ ca eva mārjāraḥ devagauḥ tathā
devāgāraḥ rathaḥ ca eva jvaraḥ kalpadrumaḥ tathā
mṛgaḥ grāhaḥ tathā eva ca
makaraḥ vṛścikaḥ ca eva puṣkalārā
vartakaḥ tathā

original: matsyayugmaṃ ca śyenaṃ ca śrīvṛkṣe ca sarasvatī // Vis_37.20 //
analyzed: matsya yugmam ca śyenam ca śrīvṛkṣe ca sarasvatī
vānaram ca raḥ ca
mahā cakram vṛka śaṅkha kapiñjalāḥ
aṅkuśam lokamātaṅgaḥ ṛkṣāśvam rājahaṃsakam
dhūma cāmara siṃhāḥ ca pūrṇa rikta ghaṭau kramāt
padminī kāka candrāḥ ca dhvaja śūlau ca darpaṇam
nagnaḥ dīpaḥ ca vidhavā maṅgalā pitṛbhūḥ tathā
kūrmaḥ kālī mahādurgārge
sarparāja jaradgavau
nṛpa brahma hari īśān vai ete śakuna sūcakāḥ

original: ekaikasya bhavecchākhā eka eva prakīrtitaḥ // Vis_37.24 //
analyzed: ekaikasya bhavet śākhā ekaḥ eva prakīrtitaḥ

original: tān sarvān kramaśo vakṣye yathāvattān nibodha me /
analyzed: tān sarvān kramaśas vakṣye yathāvat tān nibodha me
vighneśam āditas tatra tatas ślokam pravakṣyate
vighneśaḥ dṛśyate yatra sādhaka indreṇa dhīmatā

original: prārthitasya tu tāṃ siddhiṃ tacchiṣyāyādiśedguruḥ // Vis_37.26 //
analyzed: prārthitasya tu tām siddhim tad śiṣyāya ādiśet guruḥ
śatru nāśam tathā eva agram rāja pūjā ca dṛśyate
dhana lābha ūrtha lābhaḥ ca abhayam ca bhaviṣyati

original: kāyakleśaṃ tathā rogaṃ sarvatra bhayameva ca /
analyzed: kāya kleśam tathā rogam sarvatra bhayam eva ca

original: dṛśyate yatra mahiṣaṃ tatra vyādhirbhaviṣyati // Vis_37.28 //
analyzed: dṛśyate yatra mahiṣam tatra vyādhiḥ bhaviṣyati
vidyā sukham mahā jyotiḥ dṛśyate śukapītakam

original: āyuśca labhate yasmāt bandhūnāṃ ca sukhaṃ bhavet // Vis_37.29 //
analyzed: āyuḥ ca labhate yasmāt bandhūnām ca sukham bhavet
lamba ānanam kabandham tu
yathādṛṣṭam viyogam bandhubhiḥ saha
yujyate bhayam anyu pagram piśāyebhyaḥ tathā eva ca

original: dṛśyate yatra kāverī vipadaṃ ca vinaśyati /
analyzed: dṛśyate yatra kāverī vipadam ca vinaśyati
sukham bhavati sarvatra bahuvrīhiḥ bhaviṣyati

original: vṛddhirbhavati sasyānāṃ rājā ca vijayī bhavet /
analyzed: vṛddhiḥ bhavati sasyānām rājā ca vijayī bhavet
āyuḥ ārogya dam nṝṇām roga nāśaḥ bhaviṣyati
dṛśyate tu bṛhajjālī mukha rogam vinirdiśet
kṛṣṇa kuṣṭha śarīre
tu gṛha nāśam atha api vā
puruṣaḥ ca ṣe ca
mṛge dṛṣṭe brahmavarcaḥ tapaḥ yutaḥ

original: abhipretārthasiddhiṃ ca śubhaṃ caiva vinirdiśet // Vis_37.34 //
analyzed: abhipreta artha siddhim ca śubham ca eva vinirdiśet
mārjārāḥ yatra dṛśyante bandhu nāśam viyogi tā
dadhi kṣīra ghṛta ādīnām nāśaḥ bhavati na anyathā
deva gauḥ dṛśyate yatra śatrubhyaḥ bhayam ādiśet

original: sahavāsaṃ ca putrāṇāṃ mātṝṇāṃ ca vināśanam (?) // Vis_37.36 //
analyzed: sahavāsam ca putrāṇām mātṝṇām ca vināśanam
devālaye dṛṣṭe vai vidyā vṛddhiḥ tathā bhavet
putra lābhaḥ ūrtha lābhaḥ ca bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: vimānaṃ dṛśyate yatra rājyalābho nṛpasya tu /
analyzed: vimānam dṛśyate yatra rājya lābhaḥ nṛpasya tu
śudra brāhmaṇa vaiśyānām lābhaḥ sarvaḥ bhaviṣyati
jvare dṛṣṭe jvaram brūyāt aṅga hāniḥ kṣudhā ārta tā

original: hṛttāpa arthanāśaśca bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // Vis_37.39 //
analyzed: hṛd tāpa artha nāśaḥ ca bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: kalpadrume 'tha dṛṣṭe vai rājyena sadṛśaṃ sukham /
analyzed: kalpadrume tha dṛṣṭe vai rājyena sadṛśam sukham
brāhmaṇasya śriyam brūyāt īpsita artham bhaviṣyati

original: vyāghre dṛṣṭe bhayaṃ ghoraṃ gavādīnāṃ vinirdiśet /
analyzed: vyāghre dṛṣṭe bhayam ghoram go ādīnām vinirdiśet

original: rājato bhayamatyugraṃ puruṣasya na saṃśayaḥ // Vis_37.41 //
analyzed: rājataḥ bhayam ati ugram puruṣasya na saṃśayaḥ

original: prāsādo dṛśyate yatra putrapautraiḥ sukhī bhavet /
analyzed: prāsādaḥ dṛśyate yatra putra pautraiḥ sukhī bhavet
dhana dhānya samṛddhiḥ ca bhavet tatra na saṃśayaḥ

original: niśācare ca vai dṛṣṭe ghoraṃ nṝṇāṃ bhayaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: niśācare ca vai dṛṣṭe ghoram nṝṇām bhayam bhavet

original: brāhmaṇānāṃ gavāṃ caiva vadhaṃ brūyurasaṃśayaḥ // Vis_37.43 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇānām gavām ca eva vadham brūyuḥ asaṃśayaḥ
kṛśṇe mṛge dṛṣṭe vai yajña kalyāṇam ādiśet

original: rāṣṭraśānti kuṭumbasya kīrtiṃ vātha vinirdiśet // Vis_37.44 //
analyzed: rāṣṭra śānti kuṭumbasya kīrtim vā atha vinirdiśet

original: śiṃśumāre 'tha dṛṣṭe vai maraṇaṃ ca bhayāvaham /
analyzed: śiṃśumāre dṛṣṭe vai maraṇam ca bhaya āvaham
aja go mahiṣa ādīnām vyādhim ca ārtim vinirdiśet

original: makare dṛśyamāne tu strībhogaṃ labhate dhruvam /
analyzed: makare dṛśyamāne tu strī bhogam labhate dhruvam
ārogayam anna lābhaḥ ca labhate na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: vṛściko dṛśyate yatra viṣeṇa maraṇaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: vṛścikaḥ dṛśyate yatra viṣeṇa maraṇam bhavet
hṛd tāpam ātma pīḍā ca bhāryā kalaham eva ca
puṣkala ārāvartake dṛṣṭe mahat vṛddhiḥ bhaviṣyati

original: vṛddhirbhavati sasyānāṃ subhikṣaṃ kṣetrameva ca // Vis_37.48 //
analyzed: vṛddhiḥ bhavati sasyānām subhikṣam kṣetram eva ca

original: kīrtiṃ vṛddhiṃ jayaṃ caiva vindate paramaṃ sukham /
analyzed: kīrtim vṛddhim jayam ca eva vindate paramam sukham

original: balavṛddhiṃ subhikṣaṃ ca matsyayugmaṃ vinirdiśet // Vis_37.49 //
analyzed: bala vṛddhim subhikṣam ca matsya yugmam vinirdiśet

original: śyenastu dṛśte yatra śastreṇa maraṇaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: śyenaḥ tu dṛśte yatra śastreṇa maraṇam bhavet
palāyanam kuṭumbasya śatrubhiḥ bhayam ādiśet
nidhanam labhate sastu yaḥ tu
sadā
puṣkalam dhana dhānyam ca vaṃśa vṛddhiḥ bhaviṣyati
kṛkalāsaḥ bhavet yatra brāhmaṇaiḥ ca

original: varṇasya saṃkaraṃ brūyāt tvagdoṣaṃ ca vinirdiśet // Vis_37.52 //
analyzed: varṇasya saṃkaram brūyāt tvac doṣam ca vinirdiśet

original: śrutalābhaṃ ca vā vṛddhiṃ kīrtilābhaṃ ca śāśvatam /
analyzed: śruta lābham ca vā vṛddhim kīrti lābham ca śāśvatam

original: vyavahāre jayaṃ caiva sarasvatyāṃ vinirdiśet // Vis_37.53 //
analyzed: vyavahāre jayam ca eva sarasvatyām vinirdiśet
kuṭumbasya ca daurbalyam varṇa saṃkaram eva ca

original: vānaro dṛśyate yatra mṛgebhyo bhayameva ca // Vis_37.54 //
analyzed: vānaraḥ dṛśyate yatra mṛgebhyaḥ bhayam eva ca
cakre tu vijayam nityam rājya lābham avāpsyati
vyādhi durbhikṣa nāśam ca śatru nāśam vinirdiśet

original: taskarebhyo bhayaṃ nityaṃ vṛke dṛṣṭe na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: taskarebhyaḥ bhayam nityam vṛke dṛṣṭe na saṃśayaḥ

original: kṣutpīḍāṃ rājapīḍāṃ ca rāṣṭrasya ca vinirdiśet // Vis_37.56 //
analyzed: kṣudh pīḍām rāja pīḍām ca rāṣṭrasya ca vinirdiśet

original: bhayanāśaṃ śrinayaṃ caiva puṣkalārthaṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: bhaya nāśam śri nayam ca eva puṣkala artham tathā eva ca

original: strīlābhaṃ vastralābhaṃ ca pāñcajanye vinirdiśet // Vis_37.57 //
analyzed: strī lābham vastra lābham ca pāñcajanye vinirdiśet
piṅgalā dṛśyate yatra śatrubhiḥ maraṇam bhavet

original: rāṣṭrasya kalahaṃ brūyāt viṣaṃ bhavati nānyathā // Vis_37.58 //
analyzed: rāṣṭrasya kalaham brūyāt viṣam bhavati na anyathā
hasti lābhaḥ tathā rājñaḥ aṅkuśe tu vinirdiśet

original: samare vijayaṃ teṣāṃ puṣkalārthaṃ vinirdiśet // Vis_37.59 //
analyzed: samare vijayam teṣām puṣkala artham vinirdiśet
varāhaḥ dṛśyate yatra sasya nāśam vinirdiśet

original: śastrakṣayaṃ punaḥ paśyet arthanāśaṃ bhayaṃ tu vā // Vis_37.60 //
analyzed: śastra kṣayam punar paśyet artha nāśam bhayam tu vā

original: putralābhaṃ śriyaṃ caiva rājyalābhaṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: putra lābham śriyam ca eva rājya lābham tathā eva ca

original: sphuṭamairāvate dṛṣṭe rājyalābhaṃ tu nirdiśet // Vis_37.61 //
analyzed: sphuṭam airāvate dṛṣṭe rājya lābham tu nirdiśet
vai dṛṣṭe kṣetra nāśaḥ bhavet dhruvam

original: sthānanāśo bhavettatra śatruvṛddhiṃ ca nirdiśet // Vis_37.62 //
analyzed: sthāna nāśaḥ bhavet tatra śatru vṛddhim ca nirdiśet
grāme śāntiḥ manaḥ tuṣṭiḥ maṅgala āyatanam bhavet
āyuḥ ārogyam aiśvaryam artheśve
na tu vinirdiśet
rājahaṃsaḥ se
bhavet nityam rājya lābhaḥ jayāya tu
āyuḥ aiśvarya vṛddhiḥ ca puṣkalā kīrtiḥ eva ca
dhūme bandhu vināśaḥ ca vidyutā maraṇam bhavet

original: niṣādebhyo bhayaṃ caiva vaidhavyaṃ ca bhaviṣyati // Vis_37.65 //
analyzed: niṣādebhyaḥ bhayam ca eva vaidhavyam ca bhaviṣyati

original: cāmare caiva dṛṣṭe tu grāmanāśo bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: cāmare ca eva dṛṣṭe tu grāma nāśaḥ bhaviṣyati
anāvṛṣṭiḥ ca rājyasya ati vṛṣṭiḥ atha api vā

original: siṃhe dṛṣṭe bhaveccaiva arthalābhaṃ ca nirdiśet /
analyzed: siṃhe dṛṣṭe bhavet ca eva artha lābham ca nirdiśet
sat vṛddhim sarva jantūnām putra pautra vivardhanam
putra pautra vivṛddhim ca puṣkalām śriyam āpnuyāt

original: pūrṇakumbhe tu vai dṛṣṭe puruṣāṇāṃ na saṃśayaḥ // Vis_37.68 //
analyzed: pūrṇa kumbhe tu vai dṛṣṭe puruṣāṇām na saṃśayaḥ
śatrūṇām vṛddhi saṃyuktam dhana dhānya vināśanam

original: riktakumbhe tu vai dṛṣṭe bhavatyeva na saṃśayaḥ // Vis_37.69 //
analyzed: rikta kumbhe tu vai dṛṣṭe bhavati eva na saṃśayaḥ
dhana lābham tathā avāptiḥ
putra lābhaḥ tathā eva ca

original: labhate sarvalābhaṃ ca puṣkariṇyāḥ pradarśane // Vis_37.70 //
analyzed: labhate sarva lābham ca puṣkariṇyāḥ pradarśane
cintita arthāḥ vinaśyanti āyuḥ aiśvarya nāśanam

original: yasmin kāle tu saṃpaśyet duṣṭakākaṃ sudurmanāḥ // Vis_37.71 //
analyzed: yasmin kāle tu saṃpaśyet duṣṭa kākam su durmanāḥ
śatru kṣayam dhana avāptim samare vijayam tathā
āyuḥ ārogya saṃprāptim pūrṇa candrasya darśanāt
vijayam śatru nāśaḥ ca dhana dhānya sukha āvaham
āyuḥ ārogya dam nṝṇām uttama dhvaja darśanāt
śatru vṛddhim dhana chedam sa rogam sasya nāśanam

original: saṃpaśyan śūlarājānaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // Vis_37.74 //
analyzed: saṃpaśyan śūlarājānam na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
ārogśyam balam aiśvaryam kīrtim vidyā dhana āgamam

original: labhate nāsti sandeho darpaṇasya ca darśanāt // Vis_37.75 //
analyzed: labhate na asti sandehaḥ darpaṇasya ca darśanāt
lābha hāniḥ yaśaḥ hāniḥ āyuḥ hāniḥ tathā eva ca
sarva hāniḥ bhavati eva nagnasya eva ca darśanāt

original: cittārthaṃ labhate tatra śubhaṃ vāpyaśubhaṃ tu vā /
analyzed: citta artham labhate tatra śubham vā api aśubham tu vā

original: śatrukṣayaṃ ca bhavati pradīpaṃ yastu paśyati // Vis_37.77 //
analyzed: śatru kṣayam ca bhavati pradīpam yaḥ tu paśyati
artha hāniḥ manaḥ tāpaḥ gṛhe duścaritam bhavet

original: vidhavādarśanaṃ yasya bhavatyatra na saṃśayaḥ // Vis_37.78 //
analyzed: vidhavā darśanam yasya bhavati atra na saṃśayaḥ
artha lābhaḥ manaḥ tuṣṭiḥ gṛhe saṃpad bhaviṣyati
cintita artham labhet tatra sumaṅgalyāḥ pradarśane
śmaśānam dṛśyate yatra grāma nāśam dhana kṣayam

original: bandhudevaviyogaṃ ca sarvate bhayameva vā // Vis_37.80 //
analyzed: bandhu deva viyogam ca bhayam eva vā

original: rājyaṃ śriyaṃ ca saṃprāpya kṣemārogyayuto bhavet // Vis_37.81 //
analyzed: rājyam śriyam ca saṃprāpya kṣema ārogya yutaḥ bhavet
śatru vṛddhiḥ dhana chedaḥ vyādhiḥ durbhikṣa vardhanam
cintitam naśyate
tatra mahākālī pradarśanāt
vijayam ca artha lābham ca kīrti śrī vardhanam tathā

original: putrapautravivṛddhiśca durge dṛṣṭe na saṃśayaḥ // Vis_37.83 //
analyzed: putra pautra vivṛddhiḥ ca durge dṛṣṭe na saṃśayaḥ

original: vyādhiṃ pravāsaṃ maraṇaṃ vipatsyati na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: vyādhim pravāsam maraṇam vipatsyati na saṃśayaḥ
pañcāsya pannagam paśyet pāpibhiḥ ca abhibhūyate
vyādhi nāśaḥ
mahat duḥkham kuṭumbasya vināśanam

original: ālokite mahāpāpe gardabhe syānna saṃśayaḥ // Vis_37.85 //
analyzed: ālokite mahā pāpe gardabhe syāt na saṃśayaḥ
jaradgavam prapaśyeta narāḥ śoka arṇavam punar

original: vrajanti vyādhinā pīḍā kalahaṃ ca gṛhe bhavet // Vis_37.86 //
analyzed: vrajanti vyādhinā pīḍā kalaham ca gṛhe bhavet
cakravartinam āyāntam avalokya janādhipam

original: śriyaṃ prāpnoti putrāṃśca puṣṭiṃ ca labhate naraḥ // Vis_37.87 //
analyzed: śriyam prāpnoti putrān ca puṣṭim ca labhate naraḥ
caturmukham samālokya brahmāṇam kamalāsanam
sarva ādhipatyam āpne vaṃśa vṛddhiḥ ca jāyate
viṣṇum ālokya deveśam śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam

original: sarvādhipatyamāsthāya sthitiṃ ca labhate naraḥ // Vis_37.89 //
analyzed: sarva ādhipatyam āsthāya sthitim ca labhate naraḥ
rudram ālokya bhūteśam śūlapāṇim umāpatim

original: śatrusainyaṃ mahajjitvā modate saha bandhubhiḥ // Vis_37.90 //
analyzed: śatru sainyam mahat jitvā modate saha bandhubhiḥ
ete ślokāḥ mayā uddiṣṭāḥ śakunānām viśeṣataḥ

original: etāṃstu pustake likhya vivekaṃ sumanoramam // Vis_37.91 //
analyzed: etān tu pustake likhya vivekam su manoramam
eka patre tathā ekaikam ślokam saṃlikhya vāgyataḥ
sūtreṇa sūtrayitvā tu puṣpa ādibhiḥ atha arcayet
anujñāpya tatas devam vighneśam gaṇanāyakam

original: ānīya tu tataḥ śiṣyān baddhanetrān yathākramam // Vis_37.93 //
analyzed: ānīya tu tatas śiṣyān baddha netrān yathākramam

original: teṣāṃ haste tu puṣpāṇi nidhāya ca samāhitaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām haste tu puṣpāṇi nidhāya ca samāhitaḥ

original: ādāya pustakaṃ paścāt praṇavena samāhitaḥ // Vis_37.94 //
analyzed: ādāya pustakam paścāt praṇavena samāhitaḥ
śiṣya haste nidhāya atha namaskṛtvā prasādya ca
prārthayet ca sa tena atha vighna rāja agni saṃbhavam
namaḥ te stu jagannātha lambodara gajānana

original: saṃśaye 'smin mahābāho saṃtyaṃ saṃdarśayasva naḥ // Vis_37.96 //
analyzed: saṃśaye smin mahā bāho saṃtyam saṃdarśayasva naḥ
satyam hi bhavatām āhuḥ manuyaḥ tattva darśinaḥ

original: iti vijñāpya deveśaṃ śiṣyaṃ brūyāttataḥ param // Vis_37.97 //
analyzed: iti vijñāpya deveśam śiṣyam brūyāt tatas param

original: visraṃsayitvā sūtraṃ tu patraṃ gṛhṇīṣva pustake /
analyzed: visraṃsayitvā sūtram tu patram gṛhṇīṣva pustake

original: ityuktastu tataḥ śiṣyaḥ srasayitvā tu sūtrakam // Vis_37.98 //
analyzed: iti uktaḥ tu tatas śiṣyaḥ srasayitvā tu sūtrakam
gṛhṇīyāt patram ekam tu hasta prāptam yadṛcchayā

original: ācāryastu tato tetrabandhanaṃ pravimucya ca // Vis_37.99 //
analyzed: ācāryaḥ tu tetra bandhanam pravimucya ca

original: dehi patramiti bruyāt śiṣyaṃ prati samāhitaḥ /
analyzed: dehi patram iti bruyāt śiṣyam prati samāhitaḥ

original: śiṣyastu patraṃ dadyācca guruhaste mahāmune // Vis_37.100 //
analyzed: śiṣyaḥ tu patram dadyāt ca guru haste mahā mune
guruḥ tu vācayet patram asaṃmūḍhena cetasā

original: taduktaṃ vidhivajjñātvā śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham // Vis_37.101 //
analyzed: tat uktam vidhivat jñātvā śubham vā yadi vā aśubham
tatas śiṣyam pratibrūyāt yathā uktam sarvam eva tu

original: pratiśiṣyaṃ tathā kṛtvā jñātvā karma śubhāśubham // Vis_37.102 //
analyzed: pratiśiṣyam tathā kṛtvā jñātvā karma śubha aśubham
dīkṣayet śiṣyam ācāryaḥ tatparam lakṣaṇa anvitam
etat pustakam ādāya sūtrayitvā vicakṣaṇaḥ
anyeṣām api bhaktānām anena vidhinā punar

original: pūjayitvā gaṇeśaṃ tu pustakaṃ ca yathākramam // Vis_37.104 //
analyzed: pūjayitvā gaṇeśam tu pustakam ca yathākramam
śubha aśubha vidhim prājñaḥ prabrūyāt deśika uttamaḥ

original: na nāstikānāṃ saṃpaśyet nābhaktānāṃ kadācana // Vis_37.105 //
analyzed: na nāstikānām saṃpaśyet na abhaktānām kadācana
na nindakānām sarveṣām anācāra juṣām api
durvṛttānām ca sarveṣām bāhya dīkṣā juṣām api
a saṃbhāṣyeṇa paśyet ca na vijñāte kadācana

original: śiṣyāṇāṃ vanitānāṃ tu bhaktānāmapi sarvadā // Vis_37.107 //
analyzed: śiṣyāṇām vanitānām tu bhaktānām api sarvadā
saṃśaya āviṣṭa cetānām kṛpaṇānām gurau sadā
a jihmakānām bhaktānām deyam etat yathātatham
anukta guṇa yuktānām yadi paśyet tu dadyāt tu deśikaḥ
devatāḥ ca prakupyante
na tathyam ca bhaviṣyati

original: iti vijñāya sarvaṃ tu prapaśyecchakunāni tu /
analyzed: iti vijñāya sarvam tu prapaśyet śakunāni tu

original: śakunānte tato vighnanāyakaṃ pūjayet kramāt // Vis_37.110 //
analyzed: śakuna ante tatas vighnanāyakam pūjayet kramāt
pustakam pūjayet paścāt gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ punar

original: ācāryaṃ pūjayet paścāt sarvasvaṃ vādharmeva vā // Vis_37.111 //
analyzed: ācāryam pūjayet paścāt sarvasvam vā adharma iva vā
yathā vitta anusāreṇa
pūjayet guru pūjanam
udvāsayet tatas devam ākāśe gaṇanāyakam

original: iti śrīpāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyāṃ dīkṣāśakunavistāro nāma saptatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām dīkṣāśakunavistāraḥ nāma saptatriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
aṣṭatriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
viṣvaksenaḥ
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi jala saṃprokṣaṇam param
rahasyam paramam guhyam sarva pāpa praṇāśanam
tava snehāt pravakṣyāmi durlabham

original: sadya eva tu kartavyaṃ prāyaścittaṃ tu nārada // Vis_38.2 //
analyzed: sadyas eva tu kartavyam prāyaścittam tu nārada

original: na tithirna ca nakṣatraṃ kālavelā na vidyate /
analyzed: na tithiḥ na ca nakṣatram kālavelā na vidyate

original: duḥsthitaṃ susthitaṃ vāpi devabimbaṃ na cālayet // Vis_38.3 //
analyzed: duḥsthitam susthitam vā api deva bimbam na cālayet

original: śilābimbaṃ tathā lauhaṃ bimbaṃ vā caikaberakam /
analyzed: śilā bimbam tathā lauham bimbam vā ca ekaberakam
daivāt vā mānuṣāt vā api mohāt vā muni sattama
cālayet yadi tat bimbam prāyaścittam viśeṣataḥ
kārayet muni śārdūla sarva saṃpad sukha āvaham
prāsāda karaṇe kāle nava karma kṛte sati
citra karma kṛte vā api citrakāra ādi saṃspṛśet
spṛśyate vā nikṛṣṭaiḥ tu devaḥ caṇḍāla pātakaiḥ

original: pīṭhe śvabhrasthite kāle calite pūrvavat kṛte // Vis_38.7 //
analyzed: pīṭhe śvabhra sthite kāle calite pūrvavat kṛte
candana ādīni puṣpāṇi tathā sarva oṣadhīni ca
kuśa pallava dūrvāḥ ca pūrayitvā tad ūrdhvatas
yojayet pañcagavyena prāc mukhaḥ sa kuśa udakam
arcayitvā arghya gandha ādyaiḥ sāṅmūlam samuccaran
ācchādya nava vastreṇa dadyāt bhūta balim tatas
devatāyatana grāma nagareṣu api pallike
sthāpana āspadam āsādya śodhanam pañcagavyakaiḥ

original: tatra madhye khanet śvabhraṃ mūlamantramudīrayan // Vis_38.11 //
analyzed: tatra madhye khanet śvabhram mūlamantram udīrayan
aṅguṣṭha udaram āvartya tridhā sūtreṇa veṣṭayet

original: tenaiva bhrāmayenmadhye sthāpya tatrāvaṭaṃ khanet // Vis_38.12 //
analyzed: tena eva bhrāmayet madhye sthāpya tatra avaṭam khanet
hasta mātram adhastāt ca ṣaṣ aṅgula samanvitam

original: saṃprokṣya pañcagavyena tatra ratnādikaṃ nyaset // Vis_38.13 //
analyzed: saṃprokṣya pañcagavyena tatra ratna ādikam nyaset

original: śeṣaṃ dhyātvā tadūrdhve tu abhyarcyārghyādibhiḥ kramāt /
analyzed: śeṣam dhyātvā tad ūrdhve tu abhyarcya arghya ādibhiḥ kramāt
vāsasā ācchādya digbandham ācaret astram uccaran
saṃspṛśca gavya kumbhābhyām dhyātvā mūlam japet guruḥ

original: prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ kṛtvā snānādikīṃ kriyām // Vis_38.15 //
analyzed: prabhātāyām tu śarvaryām kṛtvā snāna ādikīm kriyām
kumbha stham nṛharim pūjya japa antam pūrva vartmanā

original: puṇyāhavācanaṃ kṛtvā muhūrte śobhane guruḥ // Vis_38.16 //
analyzed: puṇyāha vācanam kṛtvā muhūrte śobhane guruḥ
padma patra avavṛ
tu kumbham śvabhre tāreṇa vinyaset

original: paritaḥ sarvadhānyena pūrayitvā caśalaṃ (?) yathā // Vis_38.17 //
analyzed: paritas sarva dhānyena pūrayitvā caśalam yathā
pañcagavyam samuddhṛtya ghaṭa stham kalaśam laban

original: tenaiva pūrayet kumbhaṃ śvabhrasthaṃ mūlamuccaran // Vis_38.18 //
analyzed: tena eva pūrayet kumbham śvabhra stham mūlam uccaran
samabhyarcya arghya puṣpa ādyaiḥ pūrayet mṛdbhiḥ āhṛtaiḥ

original: śaṃsūktaṃ bhadrasūktaṃ ca svastisūktaṃ ca pākkṛte(?) // Vis_38.19 //
analyzed: śaṃsūktam bhadrasūktam ca svastisūktam ca pāk kṛte
etat sādhāraṇam proktam bahubera ekaberayoḥ
sarva lakṣaṇa saṃpannam aṅga yuktam dvijottamam
pada vākya pramāṇa jñam devayajña vrata sthitam
evam lakṣaṇa saṃyuktam ācāryam tantra pāragam
jñātvā tena eva kartavyam jala saṃprokṣaṇam śubham
prāsāda agre muniḥ eṣṭha kuryāt maṇḍapam uttamam
dakṣiṇe pi athavā kuryāt uttare vā mahā mune

original: aiśāne vātra matimān yathālābhaṃ sudikṣu ca // Vis_38.23 //
analyzed: aiśāne vā atra matimān yathālābham su dikṣu ca
caturaśram sukham samyak samam

original: karaṣoḍaśakaṃ vāpi hastaṃ pañcadaśaṃ tu vā // Vis_38.24 //
analyzed: kara ṣoḍaśakam vā api hastam pañcadaśam tu vā
stambha ṣoḍaśa saṃyuktam catur dvāra samanvitam
iṣṭakā dāru pāṣāṇaiḥ kṛtām samyak su vedikām
hasta mātra samāyuktam dhvaja āśā mukha toraṇam
darbha mālā parivṛtam puṣpa mālyaiḥ alaṃkṛtam
phala pallava mālā ādyaiḥ dhūpa dīpa samanvitam
śāli saṃcaya saṃpūrṇam prāc udak pravaṇam śubham
vitānena ūrdhvam ācchādya nānā vastraiḥ alaṃkṛtam
chatra cāmara saṃyuktam
ralaṃkṛtam
dhvajaiḥ nānā vidheḥ citraiḥ dīpa mālā virājitam
varṣa vātaiḥ na ca ākrāntam pālikābhiḥ alaṃkṛtam
etasya maṇḍapasya agra pyattare vā yathākramam

original: īśāne vā muniśreṣṭha kuryāt snapanamaṇḍapam // Vis_38.30 //
analyzed: īśāne vā muni śreṣṭha kuryāt snapana maṇḍapam
hasta dvaya pramāṇena taḥ samam
maṇḍapasya aiśa pūrve tu snapana artham su vedikām
hasta ucchrayām tad ardhām vā hi uttare śvabhra saṃyutām

original: dhārāyugvedikāṃ kuryāt paścime kalaśān nyaset // Vis_38.32 //
analyzed: dhārā yuj vedikām kuryāt paścime kalaśān nyaset
snapanam kārayet evam ekāśīti krameṇa tu
ekabera vidhānam ced mūla arcāyām prayojayet
karma arcāyām tu kartavyam bahu bera vidhau sati

original: snapanaṃ vidhivat kṛtvā tataḥ karma samārabhet // Vis_38.34 //
analyzed: snapanam vidhivat kṛtvā tatas karma samārabhet
pīta vastraiḥ tu śuklaiḥ vā veṣṭayet deva pīṭhakam
tatas smin maṇḍape dvāri kalaśān toraṇa dhvajān
gandha puṣpaiḥ samabhyarcya sva nāmnā eva pṛthak pṛthak
