tatas maṇḍapa vedyām ca nikṣipet śāli saṃcayam
śāli madhye likhet padmam aṣṭa patram sa karṇikam

original: sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ vāpi tāmraṃ vā mṛṇmayaṃ tu vā // Vis_38.37 //
analyzed: sauvarṇam rājatam vā api tāmram vā mṛṇmayam tu vā
droṇa dvayena saṃpūrṇam
kalaśam śubham
vastra pūta jalaiḥ pūrṇam sa kūrcam sa apidhānam
sa sūtram vastra yugmena veṣṭitam ratna saṃyutam
aṣṭa śakti samāyuktam sauvarṇa āyudha pañca yuj
tad kumbham praṇavena eva śāli padme tu vinyaset
tatas padma daleṣu aṣṭa kalaśān paritas nyaset
pūrvavat toya saṃpūrṇān sa hiraṇyān sa vastrakān
sa apidhānān sa kūrcān ca mukhe ca aśvattha pallavān
arcayet gandha puṣpaiḥ ca dīpaiḥ anyaiḥ pavitrakaiḥ
pūjayet mūlamantreṇa tad tad mūrtim anusmaran

original: viṣṇuṃ caiva mahāviṣṇuṃ sadāviṣṇuṃ ca madhyame /
analyzed: viṣṇum ca eva mahā viṣṇum sadāviṣṇum ca madhyame
vāsudeva aniruddha antam
nyaset pūrva ādi dikṣu ca
nyaset śriyā diśā antyantam āgneya ādi vidikṣu ca
evam nyasya vidhānena gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ yajet
etān api samabhyarcya homa karma samārabhet

original: pūrvādi cottarāntaṃ tu kuṇḍāni parikalpayet // Vis_38.45 //
analyzed: pūrva ādi ca uttara antam tu kuṇḍāni parikalpayet

original: vāsudevaṃ yajet pūrvaṃ kuṇḍe tu caturaśrake /
analyzed: vāsudevam yajet pūrvam kuṇḍe tu caturaśrake

original: ardhacandrāgnikuṇḍe tu yāmye saṃkarṣaṇaṃ yajet // Vis_38.46 //
analyzed: ardhacandra agnikuṇḍe tu yāmye saṃkarṣaṇam yajet

original: vāruṇyāṃ vartule kuṇḍe pradyumnaṃ tu yajedbudhaḥ /
analyzed: vāruṇyām vartule kuṇḍe pradyumnam tu yajet budhaḥ

original: uttare 'bje trikoṇe vā aniruddhaṃ yajet prabhum // Vis_38.47 //
analyzed: uttare bje trikoṇe vā aniruddham yajet prabhum
pālāśam khādiram vā api bailvam audumbaram tathā
aṣṭottaraśatam hutvā pṛthak pūrva ādeḥ kramāt
samidh ājya carūn lājaiḥ juhuyuḥ mūrtipāḥ pṛthak

original: evaṃ homaṃ praśaṃsanti ekahomena cāpyalam // Vis_38.49 //
analyzed: evam homam praśaṃsanti eka homena ca api alam
kārayet caturaśre tu juhuyāt tat vidhānataḥ
vaiṣṇavīkaraṇa arthāya kuṇḍam pūrvavat ācaret
tad kuṇḍe muni śārdūlaḥ ācāryaḥ homam ācaret

original: samidājyena caruṇā juhuyāttu punaḥ punaḥ // Vis_38.51 //
analyzed: samidh ājyena caruṇā juhuyāt tu punar punar
samidhaḥ mūlamantreṇa praṇavena ājyam eva ca
carum puruṣasūktena pratyekam ṣoḍaśa āhutīḥ
evam hutvā vidhānena punar ājyena homayet
pauruṣeṇa ca sūktena juhuyāt viṣṇu bhaktitaḥ
tatas nārāyaṇam sūkta sṛṣṭi ādi pratipādakam

original: samyagjñātvā muniśreṣṭha kālyāṃ tu juhuyāt kramāt // Vis_38.54 //
analyzed: samyak jñātvā muni śreṣṭha kālyām tu juhuyāt kramāt
pañca upaniṣadaiḥ mantraiḥ juhuyāt tu punar punar
pūrvavat śānti homam tu kārayet ca vidhānataḥ
evam hutvā muni śreṣṭha kautukam bandhayet harim
pūrva uktena vidhānena pūjayet haviḥ antakam
dvādaśa akṣara mantreṇa mūrtimantreṇa ca eva hi

original: kṣaumasūtreṇa vā tatra kārpāsaṃ vā mahāmune // Vis_38.57 //
analyzed: kṣauma sūtreṇa vā tatra kārpāsam vā mahā mune
prokṣayet mūlamantreṇa tat sūtram tu punar punar
rātrau mahā utsavam kuryāt śaṅkha tūrya ādi nisvanaiḥ
kautukam samalaṃkṛtya taṇḍula upari nārada
paścāt grāmam paribhramya mahā dīpa samūha yuj
bandhayet kautukam paścāt pūrva uktena vidhānataḥ

original: rātrau homaḥ prakartavyaḥ jalasaṃprokṣaṇaṃ divā // Vis_38.60 //
analyzed: rātrau homaḥ prakartavyaḥ jala saṃprokṣaṇam divā

original: na kuryāt prokṣaṇaṃ rātrau na divā homamācaret /
analyzed: na kuryāt prokṣaṇam rātrau na divā homam ācaret

original: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena rātrau homaṃ prakalpayet // Vis_38.61 //
analyzed: tasmāt sarva prayatnena rātrau homam prakalpayet
prabhāte su muhūrte tu jala saṃprokṣaṇam kramāt
prokṣayet tu vidhānena bimba ādi āvaraṇa antikam
āvāhayet tatas devam nārāyaṇam anāmayam
śaṅkha cakra dharam devam pītavāsasam acyutam
sarva ābharaṇa saṃyuktam vanamālā virājitam
rājāvarta maṇi prakhyam hāra keyūra bhūṣitam
śrīvatsa vakṣasam cāru makara ākṛti kuṇḍalam
kambu grīvam mahā bāhum kiñcid prahasita ānanam
evam dhyātvā mahā viṣṇum garuḍa upari saṃsthitam
saha dvādaśabhiḥ ca eva mūrtibhiḥ daśabhiḥ tathā
lokapālaiḥ tathā ādityaiḥ rudraiḥ vasubhiḥ eva ca
ṛṣibhiḥ cāraṇaiḥ siddhaiḥ kiṃnaraiḥ apsaraḥ gaṇaiḥ
evam dhyātvā mahā viṣṇum nārāyaṇam anāmayam
tad tad mantreṇa saṃsthāpya prokṣayet gandha vāriṇā
śeṣa udakena matimān prokṣayet parivārakam
praṇava ādi sva mantraiḥ tu parivārān aśeṣatas
pūrva ādi kalaśān gṛhya mahā pīṭhe bhiṣecayet
tatas puruṣasūktena pūjayet puruṣottamam
haviḥ nivedayet paścāt pūrva uktena vidhānataḥ

original: caṇḍādibhyo baliṃ dadyāddikṣu caiva vidikṣu ca // Vis_38.71 //
analyzed: caṇḍa ādibhyaḥ balim dadyāt dikṣu ca eva vidikṣu ca
bali bimba samāyuktam bali bhramaṇam ācaret

original: evaṃ baliṃ kramāt kuryāt śaṅkhatūryādisaṃyutam // Vis_38.72 //
analyzed: evam balim kramāt kuryāt śaṅkha tūrya ādi saṃyutam
pradakṣiṇam tatas kuryāt praṇipatya kṣamāpayet
ācārya dakṣiṇām da tvā brāhmaṇān bhojayet tatas
hotṝn ca eva su saṃpūjya ācāryam pūjayet punar
hāra keyūra saṃyuktam kaṭisūtra aṅgulīyakaiḥ
vividhāni ca vastrāṇi ācāryāya nivedayet

original: dakṣiṇāṃ cottamāṃ dadyāt gāṃ ca datvā payasvinīm // Vis_38.75 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇām ca uttamām dadyāt gām ca da tvā payasvinīm

original: ardhaṃ vāpi dhanaṃ deyaṃ mūrtipānāṃ hitaiṣiṇām /
analyzed: ardham vā api dhanam deyam mūrtipānām hita eṣiṇām

original: pādonaṃ sādhakānāṃ ca dīkṣitānāṃ tadardhakam // Vis_38.76 //
analyzed: pāda ūnam sādhakānām ca dīkṣitānām tad ardhakam
anna dānam ca sarveṣām dadyāt deva samīpatas
pavitra āropaṇe api evam dakṣiṇām dāpayet mune
iti samyak samākhyātaḥ jala saṃprokṣaṇa kramaḥ
etat vicārya kartavyam
pañcarātra viśāradaiḥ
iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām pīṭhacalanādinimitta prokṣaṇavidhiḥ nāma aṣṭatriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
ekonacatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
viṣvaksenaḥ
atas param pravakṣyāmi prāyaścitta vidhim param
pūjana ādiṣu sarvāsu kriyāsu muni sattama
prātar sandhyā arcanā hīne madhyāhne dviguṇam caret
prātar madhyāhnayoḥ hīne sāyāhne triguṇam caret
eka aham arcanā hīne upavāsa vratam caret
kalaśaiḥ navabhiḥ snāpya pūrva uktena vidhānataḥ
puṇyāham vācayet tatra bhojyāḥ vai brāhmaṇāḥ trayaḥ
arcayitvā yathānyāyam pūrva uktena vidhānataḥ

original: dvitīye dviguṇaṃ caiva tṛtīye triguṇaṃ caret /
analyzed: dvitīye dviguṇam ca eva tṛtīye triguṇam caret

original: evameva tu kartavyaṃ dvādaśāhāntameva ca // Vis_39.5 //
analyzed: evam eva tu kartavyam dvādaśa aha antam eva ca
pakṣa hīnam bhavet tasmin snāpayet adhama uttamam

original: brāhmaṇān bhojayettatra viprān dvādaśaṃ pāyasaiḥ // Vis_39.6 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇān bhojayet tatra viprān dvādaśam pāyasaiḥ
māsa hīnam bhavet tatra vāstu homena saṃyutam
adhama uttama mārgeṇa snapanam kārayet hareḥ
puṇyāham vācayet tatra pūjayet pūrvavat kramāt
brāhmaṇān bhojayet tatra śiṣṭān pañcadaśa adhikān

original: etat krameṇa kṛtvā tu trimāsāntaṃ viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: etat krameṇa kṛtvā tu tri māsa antam viśeṣataḥ
tri māsa ādīni ṣaṣ māsāt arvāk pūjā vilopane
saṃmārjya antar bahis geham prakṣālya vidhivat tadā
dhūpayitvā agaru dhūpena puṇyāham tatra kārayet
uttama uttama mārgam vā hi ekāśīti krameṇa vā
snāpayet devadeveśam yathā vitta anusārataḥ
brāhmaṇān bhojapet tatra pūrvavat homam ācaret
mahā haviḥ nivedya atha pūjayet puruṣottamam

original: tataḥ paraṃ trivarṣāt prāk snapaṃna cottamottamam /
analyzed: tatas param tri varṣāt prāk ca uttamottamam
snāpayet muni śārdūla pūrva uktena vidhānataḥ
brāhmaṇān bhojayet tatra yathā vitta anusārataḥ
tad ūrdhvam dvādaśāt arvāk prāyaścittam vidhīyate
praṇavena nirīkṣya atha garbha geham tu sādhakaḥ

original: pañcagavyaṃ kramāt kṛtvā garbhāgāraṃ vidhodhayet // Vis_39.15 //
analyzed: pañcagavyam kramāt kṛtvā garbhāgāram vidhodhayet
uttama uttama mārgam vā api athavā madhyamam tu vā
snāpayet devadeveśam yathā vibhava vistaram
brāhmaṇān bhojayet tatra yathā vitta anusārataḥ

original: śāntihomaṃ krāmat kṛtvā pūrvavat pūjayetaddharim // Vis_39.17 //
analyzed: śānti homam krāmat kṛtvā pūrvavat pūjayeta harim
atas ūrdhvam muni śreṣṭha prāyaścitam vidhīyate
jala saṃprokṣaṇam kuryāt puṇya aha ukti puraḥsaram
brāhmaṇān bhojayet tatra tena śāntiḥ bhaviṣyati
pūjā aṅga dravya hīnam ced arghya ādi haviḥ antakam
hīnaiḥ dravyaiḥ tu deveśam arcayet dviguṇam punar

original: aṣṭākṣareṇa mantreṇa devāgre tu śataṃ japet // Vis_39.20 //
analyzed: aṣṭa akṣareṇa mantreṇa deva agre tu śatam japet
tad doṣa parihāra artham prāyaścittam idam bhavet

original: prāyaścittaṃ kramāt kuryāt taddravyeṇa dine dine // Vis_39.21 //
analyzed: prāyaścittam kramāt kuryāt tad dravyeṇa dine dine

original: etat saṃkṣepataḥ proktaṃ pūjālope tu nārada /
analyzed: etat saṃkṣepataḥ proktam pūjā lope tu nārada

original: ālaye patite tatra bālasthānaṃ tu kārayet // Vis_39.22 //
analyzed: ālaye patite tatra bāla sthānam tu kārayet

original: deveśaṃ vidhivat sthāpya pūjayettu dine dine /
analyzed: deveśam vidhivat sthāpya pūjayet tu dine dine

original: ālayaṃ pūrvavat kṛtvā prokṣaṇaṃ kārayettataḥ // Vis_39.23 //
analyzed: ālayam pūrvavat kṛtvā prokṣaṇam kārayet tatas

original: bhinnālaye tu tatsthāne śailaṃ vā dāru yojayet /
analyzed: bhinna ālaye tu tad sthāne śailam vā dāru yojayet
iṣṭakā sudhayā yuktam nava karmāṇi kārayet
citrābhāsa ālaye tatra citra karma samācaret

original: snapanaṃ tatra kurvīta mūrtihomaṃ ca kārayet // Vis_39.25 //
analyzed: snapanam tatra kurvīta mūrti homam ca kārayet
brāhmaṇān bhojanam kārayet tatas
mahā haviḥ nivedya atha pūjayet puruṣottamam
dahane tu pravakṣyāmi prāyaścitta vidhi kramam

original: prāsādaṃ maṇḍapaṃ vātha prākāraṃ gopuraṃ tathā // Vis_39.27 //
analyzed: prāsādam maṇḍapam vā atha prākāram gopuram tathā
prāsāda abhyantaram vā api pacanālayam eva vā
vinoda maṇḍapam ca eva yāga maṇḍapam eva vā
puṣpa sthāne jala sthāne ca anyasmin itareṣu ca
pramādāt agni dagdham ced samyak utpādya pūrvavat
snapanam tu tri rātrāt prāk kārayet adhama uttamam

original: brāhmaṇān bhojayettatra puṇyāhaṃ caiva kārayet // Vis_39.30 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇān bhojayet tatra puṇyāham ca eva kārayet
nārāyaṇa upaniṣadam paṭhet tantra uttara kramāt
aṣṭa akṣareṇa juhuyāt ājyena śatam āhutīḥ
yadi dagdham vimānam ced
pratimā punar

original: dagdhasya caikadeśaṃ cet samyagutpādya pūrvavat // Vis_39.32 //
analyzed: dagdhasya ca eka deśam ced samyak utpādya pūrvavat
snapanam ca uttamam kuryāt adhama uttamam eva vā
snāpayet devadeveśam pūjayet pūrvavat kramāt
vimānam bahu dagdham ced bālasthānam prakalpayet

original: navagehaṃ kramāt kṛtvā śeṣakarmāṇi kārayet // Vis_39.34 //
analyzed: nava geham kramāt kṛtvā śeṣa karmāṇi kārayet
nāradaḥ

original: ukto me bhavatā doṣaḥ sthānasya tu viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: uktaḥ me bhavatā doṣaḥ sthānasya tu viśeṣataḥ
ati adbhutānām sarveṣām doṣān me brūhi aśeṣatas

original: ālaye devadevasya ye doṣāḥ prabhavanti vai /
analyzed: ālaye devadevasya ye doṣāḥ prabhavanti vai

original: haviṣāṃ caiva ye doṣāḥ tathopakaraṇeṣu ca // Vis_39.36 //
analyzed: haviṣām ca eva ye doṣāḥ tathā upakaraṇeṣu ca
viṣvaksenaḥ

original: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā deva vaktavyaṃ ca mayādhunā /
analyzed: sādhu pṛṣṭam tvayā deva vaktavyam ca mayā adhunā

original: ālaye devadevasya ye doṣāstān bravīmi te // Vis_39.37 //
analyzed: ālaye devadevasya ye doṣāḥ tān bravīmi te
valmīka darśane ca eva tathā sarpasya darśane

original: anyeṣāṃ caiva jantūnāṃ saviṣāṇāṃ munīśvara // Vis_39.38 //
analyzed: anyeṣām ca eva jantūnām saviṣāṇām muni īśvara
madhu pralambane ca eva buddhi pūrva agni pātane

original: vaidyudaśanipāte ca ulkāpāte tathaiva ca // Vis_39.39 //
analyzed: vaidyuta aśani pāte ca ulkā pāte tathā eva ca

original: pramādāt pratimā vāpi dvidhā caiva bhevadyadi /
analyzed: pramādāt pratimāḥ vā api dvidhā ca eva

original: ulūkavāsane caiva vṛkṣāṇāṃ ca samudbhave // Vis_39.40 //
analyzed: ulūka vāsane ca eva vṛkṣāṇām ca samudbhave

original: vimānasya ca bhede ca sarveṣāṃ ca vināśakṛt(?) /
analyzed: vimānasya ca bhede ca sarveṣām ca vināśa kṛt
keśa kīṭa ādi pāte ca jala jānām nipātane

original: anyeṣāṃ caiva jantūnāṃ vinipāte haviḥṣu ca /
analyzed: anyeṣām ca eva jantūnām vinipāte haviḥṣu ca

original: garbhāgāre tathā viṣṇoḥ upahāre tathaiva ca // Vis_39.42 //
analyzed: garbhāgāre tathā viṣṇoḥ upahāre tathā eva ca
maṇḍape devadevasya prathama āvaraṇe

original: dvitīye vā tṛtīye vā balipīṭheṣu sarvaśaḥ // Vis_39.43 //
analyzed: dvitīye vā tṛtīye vā bali pīṭheṣu sarvaśas
agni sthāne jala sthāne puṣpa sthāne tathā eva ca
āsthāna maṇḍape ca eva tathā alaṃkāra maṇḍape

original: līlāsthāneṣu cānyeṣu gavāṃ sthāne tathaiva ca /
analyzed: līlā sthāneṣu ca anyeṣu gavām sthāne tathā eva ca

original: śithilīnāṃ samudbhāve doṣān vakṣye munīśvara // Vis_39.45 //
analyzed: śithilīnām samudbhāve doṣān vakṣye muni īśvara
valmīka darśane vyādhiḥ mṛtyuḥ sarpasya darśane
anāvṛṣṭiḥ madhoḥ ca eva durbhikṣam itareṣu api
śithilīśilīndhra
darśane ca eva pratimāyām hareḥ yadi
rājā mṛtyum avāpnoti rājya bhraṃśam atha api vā
vyādhim vā mahāt āpnoti śatrubhiḥ vā parābhavam

original: putradāraviyogaṃ vā labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // Vis_39.48 //
analyzed: putra dāra viyogam vā labhate na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: grāmāṇāṃ nagarāṇāṃ ca deśasya ca balasya ca /
analyzed: grāmāṇām nagarāṇām ca deśasya ca balasya ca

original: vināśamāpnuyāt samyak sadyo vā syādupalpavaḥ // Vis_39.49 //
analyzed: vināśam āpnuyāt samyak sadyas vā syāt upalpavaḥ

original: pīṭhe garbhagṛhe caiva upahāre tathaiva ca /
analyzed: pīṭhe garbhagṛhe ca eva upahāre tathā eva ca

original: amātyamantriṇāṃ doṣāḥ prakṛtīnāṃ tathaiva ca // Vis_39.50 //
analyzed: amātya mantriṇām doṣāḥ prakṛtīnām tathā eva ca
sthāna antareṣu sarvatra śithilīnām tu darśane
rāṣṭre doṣāḥ bhaviṣyanti dubhikṣa vyādhi saṃbhavāḥ
śunā aiśvabhiḥ
vā vānaraiḥ vā api gṛdhraiḥ ca kṛmi kīṭakaiḥ
piṅgalaiḥ vāyasaiḥ ca eva pakṣibhiḥ kukkuṭa ādibhiḥ
tathā anyaiḥ tādṛśaiḥ bhūtaiḥ pratimā spṛśyate yadi
sthāna nāśam avāpnoti grāmasya anartham eva ca
prāyaścittam pravakṣyāmi valmīka ādeḥ ca darśane

original: tadapi pratimāyāṃ cedyātrāṃ kṛtvā yathāvidhi // Vis_39.54 //
analyzed: tat api pratimāyām ced yātrām kṛtvā yathāvidhi
tad deśam śodhayitvā tu yāvat samyak bhavet dṛḍham

original: pūrvavat kalpayitvā tu punaḥsaṃsthāpayet kramāt // Vis_39.55 //
analyzed: pūrvavat kalpayitvā tu punar saṃsthāpayet kramāt
jala saṃprokṣaṇam vā api kuryāt mantrīm vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: dūṣitaṃ cetaradbimbaṃ jantubhiḥ sparśane sati // Vis_39.56 //
analyzed: dūṣitam ca itarat bimbam jantubhiḥ sparśane sati
mārjayitvā kuśaiḥ darbhaiḥ puṇyāham tatra kārayet

original: snapanaṃ kārayet paścāt karmārcāyāṃ yathāvidhi // Vis_39.57 //
analyzed: snapanam kārayet paścāt karma arcāyām yathāvidhi
juhuyāt pañca mantraiḥ tu pratyekam śatam āhutīḥ

original: tataśca śithilījāte pīṭhe garbhagṛhepi vā // Vis_39.58 //
analyzed: tatas ca śithilī jāte pīṭhe garbhagṛhe pi vā

original: śodhayitvā tu taṃ deśaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya prayatnataḥ /
analyzed: śodhayitvā tu tam deśam dṛḍhīkṛtya prayatnataḥ

original: snapanaṃ vidhivat kṛtvā caikāśītikrameṇa tu // Vis_39.59 //
analyzed: snapanam vidhivat kṛtvā ca ekāśīti krameṇa tu
śānti homam tatas kṛtvā puṇya ahena eva śuddhi ati
vimāne madhunā utpanne prākāre bhyantare vā
prakṣālya pañcagavyena bahis antar samantataḥ

original: snapanaṃ cāpi kṛtvā tu puṇyāhenaiva śuddhyati // Vis_39.61 //
analyzed: snapanam ca api kṛtvā tu puṇya ahena eva śuddhi ati
an uktānām tu sarveṣām prāyaścitam vidhīyate

original: uttamaṃ madhyamaṃ vāpi adhamottamameva vā // Vis_39.62 //
analyzed: uttamam madhyamam vā api adhama uttamam eva vā
snāpayet devadeveśam pūjayet vidhi pūrvakam

original: śāntihomaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā puṇyāhenaiva śuddhyati // Vis_39.63 //
analyzed: śānti homam tatas kṛtvā puṇya ahena eva śuddhi ati
nṛtta gītam ca vādyam ca kārayet deva sannidhau

original: tadante pūjayitvā tu japenmūrtiṃ yathākramam // Vis_39.64 //
analyzed: tad ante pūjayitvā tu japet mūrtim yathākramam
brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā tu vaiṣṇavān ca viśeṣataḥ

original: alaṃkāravidhiṃ kṛtvā naivedyaṃ ca mahāhaviḥ // Vis_39.65 //
analyzed: alaṃkāra vidhim kṛtvā naivedyam ca mahā haviḥ
nitya dīpa vināśe tu prāyaścittam vidhīyate
kapila ājyam śarāve tu sthāpayitvā astra mantrataḥ
dīpayitvā muni śreṣṭha dīpa mudrām pradarśayet

original: nityāgnau samidājyena caruṇā hūyate pṛthak // Vis_39.67 //
analyzed: nitya agnau samidh ājyena caruṇā hūyate pṛthak

original: śataṃ vāpi tadardhaṃ vā tasyārdhaṃ vāhutīḥ kramāt /
analyzed: śatam vā api tad ardham vā tasya ardham vā āhutīḥ kramāt
kārayet mūrti mantreṇa pratyekam juhuyāt kramāt
haviḥ ādi eṣa sarveṣu keśa kīṭa ādi pātane

original: evameva tu kartavyaṃ prāyaścittaṃ tu nārada // Vis_39.69 //
analyzed: evam eva tu kartavyam prāyaścittam tu nārada
śuddha snānam purā kṛtvā tat bimbam parameṣṭhinā
adhama uttama mārgeṇa snapanam kārayet kramāt
pañca upaniṣadaiḥ mantraiḥ pratyekam śatam āhutīḥ

original: puṇyāhaṃ vācayitvā tu tena śāntirbhaviṣyati // Vis_39.71 //
analyzed: puṇyāham vācayitvā tu tena śāntiḥ bhaviṣyati
deveśam pūjayet paścāt pūrva uktena vidhānataḥ

original: ācāryaṃ pūjayet paścāt yathā tuṣṭo bhaviṣyati // Vis_39.72 //
analyzed: ācāryam pūjayet paścāt yathā tuṣṭaḥ bhaviṣyati
iha upayukta dravyāṇi ācāryāya nivedayet
prāyaścittam pravakṣyāmi maraṇe devatā ālaye
caṇḍāla patita ādīnām maraṇe vartite sati
garbhāgāre ca ardha maṇḍape vā muni īśvara
prāsāda sthita pīṭha agre tathā abhyantara maṇḍape

original: khātvā caiva dhanurmātraṃ taṃ deśamaśilā tu cet // Vis_39.75 //
analyzed: khātvā ca eva dhanuḥ mātram tam deśam aśilā tu ced
saṃpūrya saikataiḥ mṛdbhiḥ kṣālayitvā tu vāriṇā
ālayam pañcagavyena bahis antar ca śodhayet
samidh ājyena caruṇā pratyekam tu sahasrakam
aṣṭa dikṣu yathānyāyam juhuyāt mūlamantrataḥ
brāhmaṇān bhojayet paścāt prāsādasya samantataḥ
puṇyāham vācayet tatra kārayet adhama uttamam
samyak yathā vitta anusārataḥ

original: etadardhaṃ tu śūdrasya maraṇe kārayedbudhaḥ // Vis_39.79 //
analyzed: etad ardham tu śūdrasya maraṇe kārayet budhaḥ
tad ardham tu dvijātīnām maraṇe devatālaye

original: maṇḍape gopure teṣāṃ maraṇe vartite sati // Vis_39.80 //
analyzed: maṇḍape gopure teṣām maraṇe vartite sati

original: bhūśuddhiṃ pūrvavat kṛtvā puṇyāhaṃ caiva kārayet /
analyzed: bhū śuddhim pūrvavat kṛtvā puṇyāham ca eva kārayet
homam ekam tu kartavyam ālayasya uttare budhaḥ
śilā mayam ced tat geham garbhāgāra ādi nārada
kapilā gomayam grāhyam mūlamantreṇa mantra vid
garbhāgāra ādi sarvatra vāyumantreṇa lepayet
saṃprokṣya pañcagavyena śeṣa pūrvavat ācaret
bhū gupte ca agni dagdhe ca jala āviṣṭe nirāspade
mantreśaṃśe
cira lupte ca punar sthāpanam ācaret
tasmāt ūrdhvam tu vidhivat bimba sthāpanam ārabhet
aṅga hīnasya berasya aṅga hīnam
bhavet yadi
suvarṇena tad aṅgam tu kṛtvā sandhāpayet daḍham

original: evaṃ kṛtvā vidhānena punaḥ sthāpanamārabhet // Vis_39.86 //
analyzed: evam kṛtvā vidhānena punar sthāpanam ārabhet
jala vāsa vidhānena pūrvavat śeṣam ācaret

original: athavātra muniśreṣṭha jalasaṃprokṣaṇa tu vā // Vis_39.87 //
analyzed: athavā atra muni śreṣṭha jala saṃprokṣaṇa tu vā
kārayet devadevasya tena śāntiḥ bhaviṣyati

original: santyājyaṃ dārujaṃ bimbaṃ sandheyaṃ mṛṇmayaṃ bhavet // Vis_39.88 //
analyzed: santyājyam dāru jam bimbam sandheyam mṛṇmayam bhavet

original: chinne bhinne tathā vaktre mūlārcāyāṃ pramādataḥ /
analyzed: chinne bhinne tathā vaktre mūla arcāyām pramādataḥ

original: kalpayitvā tu deveśe bālasthānakrameṇa tu // Vis_39.89 //
analyzed: kalpayitvā tu deveśe bāla sthāna krameṇa tu
yuktyā yukti viśeṣeṇa śilpibhiḥ kārayet dṛḍham
kṛtvā varṇaiḥ alaṃkāram pratiṣṭhām punar ārabhet

original: sauvarṇapratimāyāṃ tu chinne bhinne ca vaktrake /
analyzed: sauvarṇa pratimāyām tu chinne bhinne ca vaktrake

original: drāvayitvā sakṛt siktaṃ kṛtvā saṃsthāpayet punaḥ // Vis_39.91 //
analyzed: drāvayitvā sakṛt siktam kṛtvā saṃsthāpayet punar

original: tatastu bahudhā bhinnaṃ tāmraṃ cāpsu vinikṣipet /
analyzed: tatas tu bahudhā bhinnam tāmram ca apsu vinikṣipet

original: ekadhā ca dvidhā bhinnaṃ tāmreṇaiva tu yojayet // Vis_39.92 //
analyzed: ekadhā ca dvidhā bhinnam tāmreṇa eva tu yojayet

original: tatsarvaṃ pūrvavat kṛtvā bimbaṃ kuryānnavaṃ śubham /
analyzed: tat sarvam pūrvavat kṛtvā bimbam kuryāt navam śubham

original: tāmrabimbaṃ tu saṃsthāpya nityaṃ pūjā pravartate // Vis_39.93 //
analyzed: tāmra bimbam tu saṃsthāpya nityam pūjā pravartate
bimbam su lakṣaṇa upetam rājatam saṃbhavet yadi
jala adhivāsana ādīni tasmin kāryāṇi sarvaśas
tāmra bimba gatām śaktim rājate sthāpya yatnataḥ

original: tāmrabimbaṃ parityajya rājataṃ sthāpayet kramāt // Vis_39.95 //
analyzed: tāmra bimbam parityajya rājatam sthāpayet kramāt

original: tathaiva rājataṃ tyaktvā sauvarṇaṃ sthāpayet kramāt /
analyzed: tathā eva rājatam tyaktvā sauvarṇam sthāpayet kramāt

original: kadācidapi na tyājyaṃ sauvarṇaṃ bhūtimicchatā // Vis_39.96 //
analyzed: kadācid api na tyājyam sauvarṇam bhūtim icchatā
svadharma yukta jātibhyaḥ tathā dvija

original: mukhya eva sadā vipra tathaivottamaberakam // Vis_39.97 //
analyzed: mukhyaḥ eva sadā vipra tathā eva uttamaberakam
sauvarṇam eva sarveṣām mukhya bimbam praśasyate

original: saṃsthāpya svasya sthāne tu pūjayettu dine dine // Vis_39.98 //
analyzed: saṃsthāpya svasya sthāne tu pūjayet tu dine dine

original: brahmasthāne sthitaṃ bimbaṃ karmārcāṃ na tu cālayet /
analyzed: brahma sthāne sthitam bimbam karma arcām na tu cālayet

original: calanaṃ tu bhavettasmin rājyasya calanaṃ bhavet // Vis_39.99 //
analyzed: calanam tu bhavet tasmin rājyasya calanam bhavet

original: tatsthānaṃ nidhanaṃ yāti grāmasya nidhanaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: tat sthānam nidhanam yāti grāmasya nidhanam bhavet

original: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena uktakāle tu cālayet // Vis_39.100 //
analyzed: tasmāt sarva prayatnena ukta kāle tu cālayet

original: ayane viṣuve caiva saṃkrāntyāṃ grahaṇe tathā /
analyzed: ayane viṣuve ca eva saṃkrāntyām grahaṇe tathā
prātaḥsandhyā arcanane
snāna velāyām muni sattama
snāna bimba vihīne tu calanam tu samācaret

original: dvitīyāvaraṇādbāhye karmārcāṃ na tu cālayet // Vis_39.102 //
analyzed: dvitīya āvaraṇāt bāhye karma arcām na tu cālayet
pramādāt vā api mohāt vā calanam ced muni īśvara
jala saṃprokṣaṇam kṛtvā su puṇya aha puraḥsaram
adhama uttama mārgeṇa snāpayet beram uttamam
eka bera vidhāne tu prāyaścittam vidhīyate
snapanam sthāvara arcāyām kartavyam vidhivat sadā

original: prāsādaṃ tu navaṃ kṛtvā pañcagavyena śodhayet // Vis_39.105 //
analyzed: prāsādam tu navam kṛtvā pañcagavyena śodhayet
adhama uttama mārgeṇa snāpayet puruṣottamam
evam eva tu kartavyam ṣaṅviṃśat vatsara antakam
atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi jala saṃprokṣaṇam kramāt
tasmāt tena eva śuddhiḥ syāt sarva śāntiḥ bhaviṣyati
aṅga hīnam bhavet bimbam punar utpādya pūrvavat

original: saṃsthāpya vidhivat pūrvaṃ punaḥ sthāpanamācaret // Vis_39.108 //
analyzed: saṃsthāpya vidhivat pūrvam punar sthāpanam ācaret
nāradaḥ
senāpate mahā prājña snapanasya prasīda me

original: aśāstrīye mahādoṣān sarvān me brūhyaśeṣataḥ // Vis_39.109 //
analyzed: aśāstrīye mahā doṣān sarvān me brūhi aśeṣatas
rāja rāṣṭram vinaśyati
paśavaḥ ca prajāḥ ca eva sasya ādi nidhanāni ca
viṣvaksenaḥ
snapanasya pravakṣyāmi mahā doṣān muni īśvara
śalabhaiḥ gandha duṣṭaiḥ tu duṣṭāḥ syuḥ sarva mānavāḥ

original: sādhite kalaśe bhinne taddravyaiḥ pūrayet punaḥ /
analyzed: sādhite kalaśe bhinne tad dravyaiḥ pūrayet punar
ūnaiḥ ca kalaśaiḥ ūna vibhavāḥ sarva mānavāḥ
kṛmi kīṭa pataṅga ādi dravyeṣu patane yadi
tat sarvam varjayet nityam viṣṇu yāgeṣu sarvaśas
varjitaiḥ tu sadā dravyaiḥ deveśasya arcanam yadi
ṣaṣṭiḥ varṣa sahasrāṇi narakam pratipadyate
keśa yuktam tu yat dravyam nipāte nipatet
viṣṇu mūrdhani
mūrdhābhiṣiktam rājānam nāśayet na atra saṃśayaḥ
anyeṣu api ca duṣṭeṣu patiteṣu mahā mune

original: etadeva phalaṃ prāha svayaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ // Vis_39.116 //
analyzed: etat eva phalam prāha svayam nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
paryuṣitaiḥ na ca ambhābhiḥ kalaśeṣu prapūrayet

original: yadi lobhena gṛhṇīyāt kākayoniśataṃ vrajet // Vis_39.117 //
analyzed: yadi lobhena gṛhṇīyāt kāka yoni śatam vrajet
purāṇa sarpiṣā devam snāpayet yadi lobhataḥ

original: gṛdhrayoniśataṃ gacchet tadante sūkaro bhavet // Vis_39.118 //
analyzed: gṛdhra yoni śatam gacchet tad ante sūkaraḥ bhavet
mahiṣa ājyena deveśam snāpayet yadi mohataḥ

original: gṛdhrayoniśataṃ gacchet tadante kukkuṭo bhavet // Vis_39.119 //
analyzed: gṛdhra yoni śatam gacchet tad ante kukkuṭaḥ bhavet
snāpayitvā anyathā ājyena kṛkalāsa śatam vrajet

original: dadhiyuktaṃ tu yat kṣīraṃ snāpayedyadi lobhataḥ // Vis_39.120 //
analyzed: dadhi yuktam tu yat kṣīram snāpayet yadi lobhataḥ
daridraḥ mānuṣaḥ loke
śatam vrajet

original: rasadravyaṃ ca vanyaistu niyujyānmākṣikaṃ naraḥ // Vis_39.121 //
analyzed: rasa dravyam ca vanyaiḥ tu niyujyāt mākṣikam naraḥ
yadi tad pūjitaḥ vipra vṛṣa janma śatam vrajet
kṛmi kīṭa pataṅgānām dravyeṣu patite patanam yadi
tat sarvam varjayet nityam viṣṇu yāgeṣu sarvaśas

original: dṛśyate sādhitaṃ caiva taddravyaṃ tu parityajet // Vis_39.123 //
analyzed: dṛśyate sādhitam ca eva tat dravyam tu parityajet

original: tān sarvānna spṛśedyastu kalaśe sādhite punaḥ /
analyzed: tān sarvān na spṛśet yaḥ tu kalaśe sādhite punar

original: tathā vai dṛśyate cāpi tato 'nyāni ca vinyaset // Vis_39.124 //
analyzed: tathā vai dṛśyate ca api tatas nyāni ca vinyaset
śvāna kukkuṭa caṇḍālaiḥ sādhite
dṛśyate punar

original: parityajya tato 'nyāṃśca sādhayet kalaśān punaḥ // Vis_39.125 //
analyzed: parityajya tatas nyān ca sādhayet kalaśān punar
udakyā antyajaiḥ vā api sādhite
dṛśyate punar

original: parityajya tato vidvān punaścānyaṃ tu vinyaset // Vis_39.126 //
analyzed: parityajya tatas vidvān punar ca anyam tu vinyaset

original: duṣṭairhi vīkṣitaṃ caiva pādaspṛṣṭaṃ ca yadbhavet /
analyzed: duṣṭaiḥ hi vīkṣitam ca eva pāda spṛṣṭam ca yat bhavet

original: rājānaṃ rājamātraṃ ca yajamānamathāpi vā // Vis_39.127 //
analyzed: rājānam rājamātram ca yajamānam atha api vā
nāśayet sa parīvāram sa paśu dravya saṃcayam
sa amātyam sa puram rāṣṭram duṣṭa dravya abhiṣecane
vyādhayaḥ ca bhavanti ugrāḥ anāvṛṣṭiḥ tathā eva ca
bhūta vetāla rakṣāṃsi piśāca uraga dānavāḥ

original: bādhante hyaniśaṃ hyete rājānaṃ rāṣṭrameva ca /
analyzed: bādhante hi aniśam hi ete rājānam rāṣṭram eva ca

original: āḍhakaṃ vā tadardhaṃ vā tannyūnaṃ parivarjayet // Vis_39.130 //
analyzed: āḍhakam vā tad ardham vā tad nyūnam parivarjayet
sneha dravyāṇi sarvāṇi sādhakaḥ mantra vittamaḥ
vastra sūtra vihīne tu toraṇa ādibhiḥ eva vā
nṛtta gīta ādibhiḥ vā api gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ tathā
alaṃkāra raiḥ
vihīnam vā devadevasya śāṅrgiṇaḥ

original: yasmin rāṣṭre muniśreṣṭha snapanaṃ syāt kadācana /
analyzed: yasmin rāṣṭre muni śreṣṭha snapanam syāt kadācana
tat rāṣṭram cora bhūyiṣṭham śatrubhiḥ ca eva hanyate
tasmāt sarva prayatnena yathāśāstram yathākramam

original: snapanaṃ kārayedviṣṇoḥ bhūtimicchan parāṃ gatim // Vis_39.134 //
analyzed: snapanam kārayet viṣṇoḥ bhūtim icchan parām gatim

original: doṣāṇāṃ ca praśamanaṃ vyādhīnāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ /
analyzed: doṣāṇām ca praśamanam vyādhīnām ca eva sarvaśas

original: grahāṇāṃ śāntaye caiva śatrūṇāṃ ca jayāya ca // Vis_39.135 //
analyzed: grahāṇām śāntaye ca eva śatrūṇām ca jayāya ca
āyuḥ ārogya vṛddhi artham putra pautra vivṛddhaye

original: kāmānāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ vṛddhaye sarvavarṇinām // Vis_39.136 //
analyzed: kāmānām ca eva sarveṣām vṛddhaye sarva varṇinām
vidhi hīnam kriyā hīnam dravya hīnam tathā eva ca

original: mānahīnaṃ tu yaddravyaṃ pūjāhīnaṃ ca yadguroḥ // Vis_39.137 //
analyzed: māna hīnam tu yat dravyam pūjā hīnam ca yat guroḥ
kāla atītam prajā hīnam kartṛ deśeṣu sarvaśas
ābhicāraṃro

original: bhavet sadyo grāmasya nagarasya ca // Vis_39.138 //
analyzed: bhavet sadyas grāmasya nagarasya ca
evam yathā ukta snapanam kārayet yaḥ tu mānavaḥ
mucyate pātakaiḥ sarveḥ padma patram iva ambhasā
go dhnaḥ pitṛ dhnaḥ mātṛ dhnaḥ bhrūṇa hā guru talya gaḥ
surā paḥ svarṇa hārī ca paradāra abhimarśakaḥ

original: ete cānye ca mucyante pāpebhyaḥ snapanena vai /
analyzed: ete ca anye ca mucyante pāpebhyaḥ snapanena vai

original: snapane hyadhikaṃ puṇyaṃ vidyate munisattama // Vis_39.141 //
analyzed: snapane hi adhikam puṇyam vidyate muni sattama
aśvamedha sahasram tu yat kuryāt kāya śodhanam

original: snapanena tu tadviṣṇoḥ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // Vis_39.142 //
analyzed: snapanena tu tat viṣṇoḥ labhate na atra saṃśayaḥ
dhvajasthāne pravakṣyāmi prāyaścitam tu nārada

original: apramāṇapaṭaṃ citraṃ vaiṇavaṃ daṇḍameva vā // Vis_39.143 //
analyzed: apramāṇa paṭam citram vaiṇavam daṇḍam eva vā
anukta adhika hīnam ca prayatnena vivarjayet

original: varjitena kṛtaṃ cettanniṣphalaṃ syānna saṃśayaḥ // Vis_39.144 //
analyzed: varjitena kṛtam ced tat niṣphalam syāt na saṃśayaḥ
dhvaja adhivāsane kāle kumbhe ca āvāhya vāhane

original: tatkumbhapatane caiva calane bhedane tathā // Vis_39.145 //
analyzed: tad kumbha patane ca eva calane bhedane tathā
pratimā parikumbhe ca tad grāmaḥ ca vinaśyati
snapanam tatra kartavyam deveśasya adhamettamam
śānti homam tatas kṛtvā grāma doṣa nikṛntanam
punar utpādayet kumbham saṃsthāpya vidhi pūrvakam

original: dhvaje lakṣaṇahīne tu garuḍe vā viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: dhvaje lakṣaṇa hīne tu garuḍe vā viśeṣataḥ

original: kartṛbhartṛvināśaḥ syāt tatrastho narakaṃ vrajet // Vis_39.148 //
analyzed: kartṛ bhartṛ vināśaḥ syāt tatrasthaḥ narakam vrajet

original: kṣipraṃ tyaktvā dhvajaṃ tatra ācāryeṇa samāhitaḥ /
analyzed: kṣipram tyaktvā dhvajam tatra ācāryeṇa samāhitaḥ
dhvajam utthāpayet sadyas sarva lakṣaṇa saṃyutam
pūrva ukta vidhinā samyak śeṣam karma samārabhet
grāma pradakṣiṇe kāle patite vāta kopite
durbhikṣam vartate tatra kartāraḥ vyādhi pīḍitāḥ
tad doṣa parihārāya snapanam ca adhama uttamam
puṇyāham vācayet tatra brāhmaṇānām ca bhojanam
kārayet muni śārdūla śeṣa pūrvavat ācaret
ācāryam pūjayet paścāt yathā śāstra ukta mārgataḥkam

original: patanādbhedane caiva dhvajaṃ tyaktvā tu tatkṣaṇāt // Vis_39.153 //
analyzed: patanāt bhedane ca eva dhvajam tyaktvā tu tad kṣaṇāt
snapanam ca uttamam kṛtvā devadevasya cakriṇaḥ

original: vāstuhomaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā puṇyāhaṃ vācayettataḥ // Vis_39.154 //
analyzed: vāstu homam tatas kṛtvā puṇyāham vācayet tatas
utpādya ca uddharet samyak dhvajam lakṣaṇa saṃyutam
grāma pradakṣiṇe kāle bali hīnam bhavet yadi

original: sa grāmo nidhanaṃ yāti tatrastho narakaṃ vrajet /
analyzed: sa grāmaḥ nidhanam yāti tatrasthaḥ narakam vrajet
tad doṣa parihārāya prāyaścittam vidhīyate
snāpayet devadeveśam pañcāśat kalaśaiḥ krāmat

original: pūjayitvā tato devaṃ punargrāmaṃ paribhramet // Vis_39.157 //
analyzed: pūjayitvā tatas devam punar grāmam paribhramet
bali dāna samāyuktam paścāt utthāpayet
kevalam bali dānam tu kārayet dundubhiḥ yutam

original: etasminneva kāle tu velādīni na vīkṣayet /
analyzed: etasmin eva kāle tu velā ādīni na vīkṣayet
vidhivat dhvajam utthāpya śeṣam pūrvavat ācaret
dhvaja utthāpana kāle tu calane gagane tatas
kartāraḥ vyādhim ṛcchanti nairdhanyam api sarvaśas
tad doṣa parihārāya snapanam ca adhama uttamam

original: puṇyāhaṃ vācayitvā tu tasya doṣaḥ praśāmyati // Vis_39.161 //
analyzed: puṇyāham vācayitvā tu tasya doṣaḥ praśāmyati
patanāt bhūpatiḥ ca eva tad grāmam ca vinaśyati

original: dhvajasya patane caiva prāyaścittaṃ pravakṣyate // Vis_39.162 //
analyzed: dhvajasya patane ca eva prāyaścittam pravakṣyate
snapanam devadevasya vidhinā ca adhama uttamam

original: puṇyāhaṃ vācayitvā tu brāhmaṇānatha bhojayet // Vis_39.163 //
analyzed: puṇyāham vācayitvā tu brāhmaṇān atha bhojayet
saṃsthāpya vidhivat paścāt pūjayet vidhinā tatas
patana udbhedane ca eva punar utpādayet dhvajam
sthāpane nipatet tatra tad rāṣṭram ca vinaśyati

original: snapanaṃ cottamaṃ kuryāt utsavaṃ ca vidhānataḥ // Vis_39.165 //
analyzed: snapanam ca uttamam kuryāt utsavam ca vidhānataḥ
śāntim kṛtvā vidhānena puṇyāham vācayet tatas

original: corairapahṛte caiva tadrāṣṭraṃ ca vinaśyati // Vis_39.166 //
analyzed: coraiḥ apahṛte ca eva tad rāṣṭram ca vinaśyati
snapanam ca uttamam kṛtvā śānti homa puraḥsaram

original: balibhramaṇakāle tu nitye vā cotsave tu vā // Vis_39.167 //
analyzed: bali bhramaṇa kāle tu nitye vā ca utsave tu vā
dravyasya patane ca eva gandha puṣpa ādikasya ca

original: śānti kṛtvā vidhānena pañcopaniṣadaiḥ kramāt // Vis_39.168 //
analyzed: śānti kṛtvā vidhānena pañca upaniṣadaiḥ kramāt
punar utpādayet dravyam gandha ādyam sakalam kramāt

original: dravyābhāve tu caruṇā cākṣatairvā baliṃ dadet // Vis_39.169 //
analyzed: dravya abhāve tu caruṇā ca akṣataiḥ vā balim dadet
saṃspṛṣṭe durjana ādīnām śūdra ādyaiḥ ca anya jātibhiḥ

original: śāntihomaṃ tu kṛtvaiva maṅgalāni ca darśayet // Vis_39.170 //
analyzed: śānti homam tu kṛtvā eva maṅgalāni ca darśayet
bali bhramadha kāle tu prāyaścittam vidhīyate

original: anālocya pradāne tu bimbahīne tu vā mune // Vis_39.171 //
analyzed: an ālocya pradāne tu bimba hīne tu vā mune
sa bali grāma rājñoḥ ca roga vṛddhiḥ bhaviṣyati
tad doṣa parihārāya prāyaścittam vidhīyate
adhama uttama mārgeṇa snāpayet bali kautukam

original: śāntihomaṃ kramāt kṛtvā bhojyā vai brāhṛmaṇāstrayaḥ // Vis_39.173 //
analyzed: śānti homam kramāt kṛtvā bhojyāḥ vai brāhṛmaṇāḥ trayaḥ

original: balibimbasya patane yāne vā bhūgate 'pi vā /
analyzed: bali bimbasya patane yāne vā bhū gate vā

original: tadgrāmaṃ nidhanaṃ yāti kartā bhartā tathaiva ca // Vis_39.174 //
analyzed: tad grāmam nidhanam yāti kartā bhartā tathā eva ca
ālaye tu nayet devam snapanam ca adhama uttamam

original: śāntihomaṃ ca kṛtvā tu mahāpūjāpuraḥsaram // Vis_39.175 //
analyzed: śānti homam ca kṛtvā tu mahā pūjā puraḥsaram
puṇyāham vācayet tatra brāhmaṇān ca eva toṣayet

original: grāme vā nagare vāpi śeṣakarma samācaret // Vis_39.176 //
analyzed: grāme vā nagare vā api śeṣa karma samācaret
patanena aṅga hīne ca rājā rāṣṭram ca naśyati
anna bimbe puṣpe śaktim udvāsayet kramāt
karma arcāyām nyaset śaktim snapanam ca uttamam bhavet
śānti homam catur dikṣu kuryāt pañca mantrakaiḥ
anya bimbe samāvāhya śeṣa karma samācaret
sandhānam pūrvavat kṛtvā pūrva lakṣaṇa saṃyutam

original: sthāpitaṃ pūrvavat kṛtvā asmin kālādi neṣyate /
analyzed: sthāpitam pūrvavat kṛtvā asmin kāla ādi na iṣyate
tad śaktim yojayet bimbe śeṣa karma samācaret
sthānake ca āsane ca eva śayane baliberake

original: patane cāṅgahīne ca prāyaścittaṃ tu pūrvavat // Vis_39.181 //
analyzed: patane ca aṅga hīne ca prāyaścittam tu pūrvavat
utsava ārambha divase kalpite ṛtvijaiḥ api

original: taistaireva tu kartavyāḥ kriyāḥ sarvāvasānakam (?) // Vis_39.182 //
analyzed: taiḥ taiḥ eva tu kartavyāḥ kriyāḥ sarva avasānakam
madhye tu yojayet anyān mohāt tu muni sattama

original: tāḥ kriyā niṣphalāyānti tasmācchāntiṃ tu kārayet // Vis_39.183 //
analyzed: tāḥ kriyāḥ niṣphalā āyānti tasmāt śāntim tu kārayet
prāyaścittam tu kartavyam tasya doṣa āpunattaye
pūrveṇa ṛtvijena api kuryāt karma avasānakam
adhama uttama mārgam vā pañcāśat vā muni īśvara
pañcaviṃśatibhiḥ vā api kalaśaiḥ snāpayet harim
puṇyāham vācayet tatra śānti homam ca kārayet
vyādhi graste mṛte vā api śāstra hīne
pratiṣṭhā karmaṇi tathā ca utsave parama arthinam
yojayet anyam evam ced ācāryam tantra pāragam

original: yāgāgnau caiva vicchinne utsave vartite sati /
analyzed: yāga agnau ca eva vicchinne utsave vartite sati
tad rāṣṭram ca vinaśyanti
kartāraḥ vyādhi pīḍitāḥ
tad doṣa parihārāya snapanam ca adhama uttamam
saṃprārthya devadeveśam mahā havi puraḥsaram
mathitvā agnim samutpādya laukika agnim atha api vā
vaiṣṇavīkaraṇaiḥ yuktam su puṇya aha puraḥsaram
evam tu kārayet vidvān tad doṣasya nikṛntanam
yogeśasya arcanā hīne ca utsave yāga maṇḍape

original: madhye kumbhagate deve hyutsave tu viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: madhye kumbha gate deve hi utsave tu viśeṣataḥ

original: niṣphalaḥ sa ca yāgastu kartāro vyādhipīḍitāḥ // Vis_39.192 //
analyzed: niṣphalaḥ sa ca yāgaḥ tu kartāraḥ vyādhi pīḍitāḥ
tasmāt tad phala siddhi artham snapanam ca adhama uttamam
kārayet śānti homam tu juhuyāt śatam āhutīḥ

original: puṇyāhaṃ vācayitvā tu tasya doṣaḥ praśāmyati /
analyzed: puṇyāham vācayitvā tu tasya doṣaḥ praśāmyati
yāga īśa kumbhe vicale parikumbhe punar

original: bhedane patane vedyāṃ prāyaścittaṃ tu pūrvavat /
analyzed: bhedane patane vedyām prāyaścittam tu pūrvavat

original: aṣṭamaṅgalahīne tu pūjājīne tu tatra ca // Vis_39.195 //
analyzed: aṣṭa maṅgala hīne tu pūjā jīne tu tatra ca
maṅgalam tu vinaśyeta kartāraḥ vyādhi pīḍitāḥ
maṅgala ātmānam abhyarcya deveśam vidhi pūrvakam
śānti homam tatas kṛtvā puṇyāham vācayet tatas
utsave nitya pūjāyām vilope homa karmaṇi
tatrasthāḥ narakam yānti tasmāt vṛddhiḥ na jāyate
tad doṣa parihārāya prāyaścittam tu pūrvavat
nitya pūjā avasāne tu homam kuryāt tathā utsave
homa ante tu balim kuryāt yathāvidhi puraḥsaram
nitya utsavasya hīne vā bali dānasya ca ubhayoḥ
juhuyāt mūlamantreṇa nitya agnau śatam āhutīḥ
etat dvi kāla hīne tu tad ūrdhvam snapanam tathā
hutvā aṣṭa akṣara mantreṇa paścāt nityam samācaret
nitya utsavasya hīnena yadi syāt tu mahā utsavaḥ
snāpayet pañcagavyena baliberam anuttamam
snapanam kārayet paścāt pañcaviṃśatibhiḥ kramāt
alaṃkāram kramāt kṛtvā pūjayet haviḥ antakam
nitya utsava vidhānena prāsāde balim ācaret
prātar madhya pradoṣeṣu bali bhramaṇam ācaret
atha madhyāhna hīne ca kārayet bali karmaṇi

original: ekakālaṃ bhavettasmin balikarma tu cenmune // Vis_39.205 //
analyzed: eka kālam bhavet tasmin bali karma tu ced mune
utsavaḥ niṣphalaḥ tatra grāma nāśaḥ bhavet dhruvam
tasmāt tad phala siddhi artham dvikālam balim ācaret

original: dvikālaṃ tu muniśreṣṭha balidānaṃ tu kārayet /
analyzed: dvikālam tu muni śreṣṭha bali dānam tu kārayet
rātri kāla bali sa pradakṣiṇam
bhūta rākṣasa piśāca pannagānām
nāśada kā
raṇam idam bali bhramam
yaḥ mohāt eka sandhyāyām balim nikṣipya nārada
tad doṣa parihārāya prāyaścittam vidhīyate
adhama uttama mārgeṇa snapanam kārayet hareḥ
brāhmaṇān bhojayet paścāt mahāhavi puraḥsaram
puṇyāham vācayet paścāt pūrvavat homam ācaret
tad kāla ucite paścāt bali dānam samācaret

original: aṅkurārpaṇapātraṃ tu naṣṭaṃ patitameva vā // Vis_39.211 //
analyzed: aṅkura arpaṇa pātram tu naṣṭam patitam eva vā
aspṛśyaiḥ sparśitam vāti punar utpādayet kramāt
śyāme rakte prarūḍhe vā daṇḍe
mūṣika bhakṣite
juhuyāt pañca mantraiḥ tu pratyekam samidh ādibhiḥ
aṣṭottaraśatam hutvā viṣṇu mantreṇa mantra vid
uddeśya divase tīrtham akṛtam ced tu nārada
daivikaiḥ mānuṣaiḥ vighnaiḥ punar utsavam ārabhet
vyatyāsaḥ divasaiḥ dravyaiḥ bali dāne kṛte yadi
juhuyāt mūlamantreṇa sarpiṣā śatam āhutīḥ
digdevatānām tu vyatyāsaḥ vartate ced mahā utsave
krameṇa kārayet paścāt pūrvavat homa pūrvakam
eka aham eka kālam vā bali dānam tu ca utsave

original: vighnitaṃ cet pravakṣyāmi prāyaścittaṃ tu nārada // Vis_39.217 //
analyzed: vighnitam ced pravakṣyāmi prāyaścittam tu nārada
juhuyāt mūlamantreṇa tad dravyeṇa śata āhutīḥ
dviguṇam kārayet paścāt vighnite hi ekakālike
pūrva dravyeṇa pūrvam tu pūrva rātrasya pūrvavat

original: kṛtvā tu vidhivat sarvaṃ paścāt paścātmakaṃ(?)kramāt // Vis_39.219 //
analyzed: kṛtvā tu vidhivat sarvam paścāt
vighnitam ced ahorātram kārayet apare hani
rātrim trau
tad balim ca api kārayet

original: paribhramaṃ tu dviguṇaṃ homaṃ caiva tu kārayet /
analyzed: paribhramam tu dviguṇam homam ca eva tu kārayet
eka ahāt adhikam ca eva vighnitaḥ ced mahā utsavaḥ
aṅkura arpaṇa pūrvam tu tat sarvam punar ārabhet
tat tīrtham vighnitam ced tu kuryāt tat aparehani

original: snapanaṃ vidhivat kṛtvā tatra homaṃ tu pūrvavat /
analyzed: snapanam vidhivat kṛtvā tatra homam tu pūrvavat

original: kṛtvaivaṃ vidhivat sarvaṃ śeṣaṃ pūrvavadācaret // Vis_39.223 //
analyzed: kṛtvā evam vidhivat sarvam śeṣam pūrvavat ācaret
pratiṣṭhāyām pravakṣyāmi prāyaścittam muni īśvara
pramāṇa rahitam bimbam vastra alaṃkārayoḥ ca vā

original: ā(a?)sthāne vāmuhūrte vā sthāpanaṃ tu na kārayet /
analyzed: ā asthāne vā amuhūrte vā sthāpanam tu na kārayet

original: sthāpanaṃ cenmahāmohāt kartā bhartā vinaśyati // Vis_39.225 //
analyzed: sthāpanam ced mahā mohāt kartā bhartā vinaśyati

original: yātrāṃ kṛtvā vidhānena punaḥ sthāpanamārabhet // Vis_39.226 //
analyzed: yātrām kṛtvā vidhānena punar sthāpanam ārabhet

original: vighnitā cetkriyā madhye prāyaścittaṃ vidhīyate // Vis_39.227 //
analyzed: vighnitā ced kriyā madhye prāyaścittam vidhīyate
brāhmaṇānām anujñām tu labdhvā paścāt parehani
pañca upaniṣadaiḥ mantraiḥ hutvā ājyena śatam śatam

original: tathaiva kārayet sarvaṃ rakṣitaṃ ceddinatrayam // Vis_39.229 //
analyzed: tathā eva kārayet sarvam rakṣitam ced dina trayam

original: aspṛśyasparśitaṃ vāpi bhinnaṃ vā mantrasāditam // Vis_39.230 //
analyzed: a spṛśya sparśitam vā api bhinnam vā mantra sāditam
anyam pūrvavat utpādya sthāpayet pūrvavat kramāt

original: uddhṛtaṃ brahmakumbhaṃ tu dūṣitaṃ patitaṃ tu vā // Vis_39.231 //
analyzed: uddhṛtam brahma kumbham tu dūṣitam patitam tu vā
kumbham anyam tathā kṛtvā saṃskṛtya vidhivat budhaḥ
pañca upaniṣadaiḥ mantraiḥ praṇavena tathā eva ca
ājyena juhuyāt tatra pratyekam śatam āhutīḥ

original: kṛtvā puṇyāhanirghoṣaṃ sthāpayet pūrvavat kramāt // Vis_39.233 //
analyzed: kṛtvā puṇya aha nirghoṣam sthāpayet pūrvavat kramāt

original: vyatyāsaḥ kālahīnaṃ ca sphālitaṃ cādbhutaṃ tathā // Vis_39.234 //
analyzed: vyatyāsaḥ kāla hīnam ca sphālitam ca adbhutam tathā
eteṣām ca api anuktānām prāyaścittam vidhīyate
juhuyāt mūlamantreṇa ghṛtena śatam āhutīḥ
āśaucam vā athavā vyādhiḥ mṛtyuḥ vā vidyate yadi

original: ācāryasya tu tatkāle vakṣye saṃsthāpanakramam // Vis_39.236 //
analyzed: ācāryasya tu tad kāle vakṣye saṃsthāpana kramam
a dīkṣitam vā vipra indra vaiṣṇavam vedapāragam
snāpya alaṃkāritam śuddham tena eva sthāpayet budhaḥ

original: pauruṣeṇa tu sūktena praṇavena tataḥ param /
analyzed: pauruṣeṇa tu sūktena praṇavena tatas param
tatas tu mūlamantrābhyām muhūrte sthāpayet budhaḥ
tatas ca ācāryam anvīkṣya daśa ahāt prāk prayatnataḥ

original: tenaiva kārayet sarvaṃ mantranyāsādi pūrvavat // Vis_39.239 //
analyzed: tena eva kārayet sarvam mantra nyāsa ādi pūrvavat
tatas prabhṛti devasya caturthyā
snānam eva ca

original: ācāryaṃ pūjayet paścāt puṣkalena dhanena ca // Vis_39.240 //
analyzed: ācāryam pūjayet paścāt puṣkalena dhanena ca
ācārya dakṣiṇā hīne prāyaścittena pūjayet
devasya sthāpanāt ūrdhvam caturthe hani nārada
snapanam ca arcanam tasmin a kṛtam ced tu nārada
tad ūrdhvam dvādaśa ahāt arvāk prāyaścittam vidhīyate
snapanam ca uttamam vā syāt adhama uttamam eva vā

original: snapanaṃ kārayitvādau brāhmaṇānāṃ ca bhojanam // Vis_39.243 //
analyzed: snapanam kārayitvā ādau brāhmaṇānām ca bhojanam
pañca upaniṣadaiḥ bhantraiḥ hutvā ājyena śatam śatam
yathā vitta anusāreṇa
snapanam vā atha kārayet

original: yathāvitaṃ tu deveśaṃ pūjayettu dine dine /
analyzed: tu deveśam pūjayet tu dine dine
pūjā ante dakṣiṇām dadyāt ahani ahani nārada
sādhakānām hita arthāya rāja rāṣṭra hitāya ca
tasmāt sarva prayatnena dakṣiṇām dāpayet sadā
dakṣiṇā hīnam etat ced sarvam niṣphalam eva ca
ācārya dakṣiṇā hīne prāyaścittam vidhīyate
adhama uttama mārgeṇa deveśam snāpayet tatas

original: brāhmaṇān bhojayet paścāt puṇyāhaṃ vācayettataḥ // Vis_39.248 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇān bhojayet paścāt puṇyāham vācayet tatas
pūrva uktena vidhānena pūjayet puruṣottamam

tasmāt sarva prayatnena
sruc sruvam vau
maṇḍape ca eva kuṇḍa maṇḍala toraṇam
vedikā ādi muni śreṣṭha kuryāt ced apramāṇataḥ
pramādāt mūlamantreṇa mūla yuj śatam āhutīḥ
juhuyāt vaiṣṇava agne tu ācāryaḥ nala madhyame

vaiṣṇavīkaraṇāt tasmin tena śāntiḥ bhaviṣyati
hareḥ ati priya karam tasmāt karma samācaret
bālasthānasya vakṣyāmi prāyaścittam tu nārada

tu pūjayet

original: pūjayedvarjyabimbaṃ tu yadi lobhācca mantravit // Vis_39.255 //
analyzed: pūjayet varjya bimbam tu yadi lobhāt ca mantra vid

original: tatpūjā niṣphalaṃ yāti kartā bhartā vinaśyati /
analyzed: tad pūjā niṣphalam yāti kartā bhartā vinaśyati
yaḥ mohāt arcayet bimbam prāyaścittam vidhīyate

original: madhyamaṃ vā muniśreṣṭha taddoṣasya nikṛntanam // Vis_39.257 //
analyzed: madhyamam vā muni śreṣṭha tad doṣasya nikṛntanam

original: śāntihomaṃ kramāt kṛtvā puṇyāhaṃ vācayettataḥ // Vis_39.258 //
analyzed: śānti homam kramāt kṛtvā puṇyāham vācayet tatas
mūlāyām arcakaḥ samyak bālasadmani pūjayet

original: tadgrāmaṃ nidhanaṃ yāti dharmamārgo vinaśyati // Vis_39.260 //
analyzed: tad grāmam nidhanam yāti dharma mārgaḥ vinaśyati
tasmāt sarva prayatnena mūlāgāre na pūjayet

jala saṃprokṣaṇam kṛtvā su puṇya aha puraḥsaram
mūla adhivāsanam kṛtvā maṇḍape ca adhivāsanam
adhama uttama mārgam vā kārayet muni sattama
brāhmaṇān bhojayet paścāt yathā vitta anusārataḥ

original: evaṃ cāpi na kṛtvā tu vartate kālalaṅghanam /

original: snapanaṃ mūrtihomaṃ ca maṇḍape cādhivāsanam // Vis_39.265 //
analyzed: snapanam mūrti homam ca maṇḍape ca adhivāsanam

original: kṛtvā tu vidhivat samyak sthāpayedvidhivat kramāt /

original: ūrdhvaṃ tu vatsarāt kālo gataṃ cedvakṣyate 'dhunā // Vis_39.266 //

vinā jala adhivāsam ca sarvam pūrvavat ācaret

tu pratimā taruṇālaye
bimbam anyam samutpādya loha jam su manoharam
jala adhivāsanam kṛtvā maṇḍape ca adhivāsanam

original: mūrtihomaṃ tathā śāntiṃ snapanaṃ cādhamottamam // Vis_39.269 //
analyzed: mūrti homam tathā śāntim snapanam ca adhama uttamam

original: kṛtvā tu vidhivat samyak sthāpanādikrameṇa hi // Vis_39.273 //
analyzed: kṛtvā tu vidhivat samyak sthāpana ādi krameṇa hi
teṣām vāstau tu sāṃkaryāt rāṣṭra nāśaḥ dhana kṣayaḥ

atra kiñci kaści
dvi śeṣaḥ sti vakṣyāmi śṛṇu suvrata

pañca rātreṇa śāstreṇa sthāpayet puruṣottamam
śaiva vaikhānasābhyām tu vidhinā vāstu saṃgraham

original: vidyate yadi vāñchā cet pañcarātreṇa vārcanam /
analyzed: vidyate yadi vāñchā ced pañcarātreṇa vā arcanam

śaiva vaikhānasābhyām ca arcayet na kadācana
vaikhānasasya śaivasya avaidika tvāt muni īśvara
śaivam vekhānasam ca api asaumyam tat udāhṛtam

original: saumyaṃ tu sāttvataṃ caiva tasmātsaumyaṃ viśiṣyate // Vis_39.280 //
analyzed: saumyam tu sāttvatam ca eva tasmāt saumyam viśiṣyate
tatra sāttvata mārgeṇa pūjayet puruṣottamam
śaiva vaikhānasābhyām tu rodra pūjā agni roga kṛt
saumyam tu sāttvatam tantram tad śāstra vidhim ācaret
daivāt vā mānuṣāt vā api lobhāt mohāt pramādataḥ
sthāpite raudra mārgeṇa pūjyamāne dine dine

original: hitvā raudravidhānaṃ tu sarveṣāṃ hitakāmyayā // Vis_39.283 //
analyzed: hitvā raudra vidhānam tu sarveṣām hita kāmyayā

original: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena hitvā raudraṃ tu tatkṣaṇāt // Vis_39.284 //
analyzed: tasmāt sarva prayatnena hitvā raudram tu tad kṣaṇāt
sthāpayet sāttvatena atha vidhinā pūjayet harim
tasmāt sarva prayatnena na kuryāt tantra saṃkaram

anuṣṭheyam dvijaśreṣṭhaiḥ vaiṣṇavaiḥ vedapāragaiḥ

original: śaivaṃ ca śambhunā proktaṃ śuddhaṃ laiṅgamiti dvidhā // Vis_39.287 //
analyzed: śaivam ca śambhunā proktam śuddham laiṅgam iti dvidhā
na anuṣṭheyam dvijaśreṣṭhaiḥ para arthe muni sattama
ātma arthe muni dvija
varyaḥ tu pūjayet śuddham uttamam

original: dine dine muniśreṣṭha laiṅgikaṃ na smaredbudhaḥ /
analyzed: dine dine muni śreṣṭha laiṅgikam na smaret budhaḥ
vaikhānasa hita arthāya śāstram bhārgava nirmitam
na anuṣṭheyam dvijaśreṣṭhaiḥ ātmanā arthe parasya ca
pratiloma hita arthāya pūjayet puruṣottamam
sā pūjā śūdra vṛddhi arthā dvijānām śakti hāni kṛt

original: dine dine muniśreṣṭha nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // Vis_39.291 //
analyzed: dine dine muni śreṣṭha na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
tad pūjā vaidika tvāt ca na anuṣṭheyā dvijottamaiḥ
nāradaḥ

original: vaikhānasā iti proktāḥ ke te cātra vivakṣitāḥ // Vis_39.292 //
analyzed: vaikhānasāḥ iti proktāḥ ke te ca atra vivakṣitāḥ

original: vānaprasthā dvidhā kiṃ te sūtā vā kiṃ vivakṣitāḥ /
analyzed: vānaprasthāḥ dvidhā kim te sūtāḥ vā kim vivakṣitāḥ
viṣvaksenaḥ
brahmaṇyām kṣatriyā jyātāḥ sūtāḥ vaikhānasāḥ tathā
sūtakāḥ ca rathakārāḥ ca tathā paurāṇikāḥ iti
paryāya vācakāḥ śabdāḥ pratilomeṣu pūjitāḥ
ete proktāḥ bhārgava āgama pūjakāḥ
pratiloma hita arthāya bhṛguṇā tantram īritam
manu ādi dharma śāstreṣu vānaprastha āśramaḥ kramāt

original: saṃproktastu muniśreṣṭha iti śāstrasya niścayaḥ // Vis_39.296 //
analyzed: saṃproktaḥ tu muni śreṣṭhaḥ iti śāstrasya niścayaḥ
eteṣām saṃkaram tatra varjyam āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ
tantra saṃkara doṣeṇa sarvam naśyati asaṃśayaḥ
rājñā sarva prayatnena jagat rakṣaṇa kāṃkṣiṇā
saṃkaraḥ parihartavyaḥ rāja rāṣṭra sukhāya ca
yad daivatyam kṛtam kṣetram vidhinā karṣaṇa ādinā

original: tadanyadaivataṃ vipra manasāpi na kalpayet // Vis_39.299 //
analyzed: tad anya daivatam vipra manasā api na kalpayet

original: yadi vā sthāpyate mohāddaṇḍyo vadhyaḥsa pāpabhāk /
analyzed: yadi vā sthāpyate mohāt daṇḍyaḥ vadhyaḥ sa pāpa bhāj

original: sa kartā saṃkarasyāpi rājño rāṣṭrasya tasya hi // Vis_39.300 //
analyzed: sa kartā saṃkarasya api rājñaḥ rāṣṭrasya tasya hi
pañca rātram tu śaivam vai vaikhānasa vidhānakam
teṣām vāstu ādi sāṃkaryāt kiñcid eva viśeṣakam
sāttvatam sarva vṛddhi artham śaivam sarva vināśa kṛt
vaikhānasam anartha artham tasmāt tat parivarjayet
asthāna sthāpitāḥ kecid sva sthāna parivarjitāḥ
devatā dvaya kopena sarvam naśyati asaṃśayaḥ
saṃkaraḥ dvividhaḥ proktaḥ sarva prāṇi vināśanaḥ
jāti saṃkaraṇam ca eva tantra saṃkaraṇam tathā
jāti saṃkaraṇena eva jagat caṇḍāla tām vrajet

original: rāṣṭraṃ śarīraṃ rājastu rājā jīvaḥ sa ucyate /

original: rāṣṭrakṣaye kṣayo rājñaḥ tasmādrakṣyaṃ dvayaṃ budhaiḥ // Vis_39.306 //
analyzed: rāṣṭra kṣaye kṣayaḥ rājñaḥ tasmāt rakṣyam dvayam budhaiḥ

original: caṇḍālatvaṃ gate loke vedāḥ sarve tirohitāḥ /
analyzed: caṇḍāla tvam gate loke vedāḥ sarve tirohitāḥ
tirohiteṣu vedeṣu yajña ādi kratavaḥ tathā
eka varṇam jagat sarvam vastu niśceṣṭakam bhavet
jāti saṃkara doṣeṇa dvijānām maraṇam bhavet
tasmāt sarva prayatnena sāṃkaryam parivarjayet
devadevāt param nā anyat tad āyattāḥ hi siddhayaḥ
iti cintya eva bhūtānām vayam devam upāsmahe
sarva deva mayaḥ viṣṇuḥ bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ

original: brahmā rudraśca śakraśca vasavo varuṇastathā // Vis_39.311 //
analyzed: brahmā rudraḥ ca śakraḥ ca vasavaḥ varuṇaḥ tathā

original: śaktayaśca tathā cānyāḥ sarvāḥ viṣṇuvibhūtayaḥ // Vis_39.312 //
analyzed: śaktayaḥ ca tathā ca anyāḥ sarvāḥ viṣṇu vibhūtayaḥ

original: tāśca sarvāḥ prasīdanti purā cārthārthināṃ nṛṇām /
analyzed: tāḥ ca sarvāḥ prasīdanti purā ca artha arthinām nṛṇām
pūjyamāne tu satatam tad tad pūjā vidhānataḥ
sarva prāṇi hita arthāya munibhiḥ karuṇa ātmabhiḥ

vaidikam tāntrikam ca eva tathā vaidika tāntrikam

original: tāntrikaṃ vaiśyaśūdrāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ tāntrikaṃ tu vā // Vis_39.316 //
analyzed: tāntrikam vaiśya śūdrāṇām sarveṣām tāntrikam tu vā
bhārgaveṇa ukta dharmeṇa pratiloma ādi kārayet
a śrī karam asaumyam tat a brāhmaṇa parigraham
avaidika tvāt tat tantram vaikhānasam atha adhamam
saṃkaraḥ parihartavyaḥ brāhmaṇaiḥ ca jagat hitaiḥ

original: vāstau bimbasya pūjāyāṃ pūjakasya ca saṃkaraḥ /
analyzed: vāstau bimbasya pūjāyām pūjakasya ca saṃkaraḥ
sarvathā parihartavyaḥ prāyaścittaiḥ
nāradaḥ
prāyaścittam samācakṣva bimba saṃkaraṇa ādiṣu
yat kṛtvā sarva doṣāḥ ca naśyanti aśubha hetavaḥ
viṣvaksenaḥ

original: na tithirna ca nakṣatraṃ kālavelā na vidyate /
analyzed: na tithiḥ na ca nakṣatram kālavelā na vidyate

original: saṃkaraṃ tayajyate kṣipraṃ sarvaprāṇihitāya vai // Vis_39.321 //
analyzed: saṃkaram tayā ajyate kṣipram sarva prāṇi hitāya vai

original: sadya eva tu kartavyā saṃkarasya tu niṣkṛtiḥ /
analyzed: sadyas eva tu kartavyā saṃkarasya tu niṣkṛtiḥ
niṣkṛtya aharahar
paścāt rāja rāṣṭra su vṛddhi kṛt
grāmasya nagarasya api sarva saṃpad sukha āvaham

original: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena kṣipraṃ śāntiṃ samācaret // Vis_39.323 //
analyzed: tasmāt sarva prayatnena kṣipram śāntim samācaret
yad tantreṇa samārabdham tat tantreṇa eva kārayet
anyathā ced mahā doṣaḥ rāja rāṣṭra vināśa kṛt
tasmāt sarva prayatnena na kuryāt tantra saṃkaram
eka aham arcanā hīne sva kalpa ukta vidhānataḥ
ekāśīti kramāt kṛtvā snapanam sādhaka uttamaḥ

original: śāntihomaṃ kramāt kṛtvā snapanaṃ sādhakottamaḥ // Vis_39.326 //
analyzed: śānti homam kramāt kṛtvā snapanam sādhaka uttamaḥ

original: śāntihomaṃ kramāt kṛtvā vāstuhomaṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: śānti homam kramāt kṛtvā vāstu homam tathā eva ca
brāhmaṇān bhojayet paścāt aṣṭottaraśatam kramāt
tasya ardham vā tad ardham vā yathā vitta anusārataḥ
caturmūrti vidhim smṛtvā pañcamūrti vidhi tyajet
parivārāṇi sarvāṇi pūrvavat sthāpayet kramāt

original: tattvanyāsaṃ kramāt kṛtvā sṛṣṭinyāsaṃ tathaiva ca // Vis_39.329 //
analyzed: tattva nyāsam kramāt kṛtvā sṛṣṭi nyāsam tathā eva ca
mūlamantreṇa matimān mūlamūrtim anusmaran

original: pūjayet satataṃ paścāt pūrvoktena vidhānataḥ // Vis_39.330 //
analyzed: pūjayet satatam paścāt pūrva uktena vidhānataḥ
mahā haviḥ nivedya atha kārayet guru pūjanam
pūjā lope ced tatra punar tena eva pūjayet
tatra sāttvata mārgeṇa pūjyamāne dine dine

original: tantrāntareṇa deveśaṃ kadācinna tu pūjayet // Vis_39.332 //
analyzed: tantra antareṇa deveśam kadācid na tu pūjayet
pūjayet yadi saṃmohāt niṣphalam syāt nam saṃśayaḥ
tad pūjā aharahar paścāt tad grāmasya vināśa kṛt
tasmāt sarva prayatnena pūjayet tat dvijottama

original: pūrvaṃ karmārcanādīnāṃ śuddhasnānaṃ tu kārayet // Vis_39.334 //
analyzed: pūrvam karma arcana ādīnām śuddhasnānam tu kārayet
jala saṃprokṣaṇa ādīni mūla arcāyām niyojayet
snapana ādīni karmāṇi karma arcāyām niyojayet
utsavam kārayet tasmin bali homa puraḥsaram

original: ekāhaṃ vā tryahaṃ vātha saptāhaṃ vā munīśvara // Vis_39.336 //
analyzed: eka aham vā tri aham vā atha sapta aham vā muni īśvara
kārayet utsavam tatra yathāśaktyā anurūpatas

original: etat krameṇa kartavyaṃ dvādaśābdāntameva ca // Vis_39.337 //
analyzed: etat krameṇa kartavyam dvādaśa abda antam eva ca
eka abde rakṣasām sthānam vāsaḥ
tasmāt śāntim tu kāreyat

original: dvyabde ca yakṣavāsastu tryabde bhūtasaṃkulam // Vis_39.338 //
analyzed: dvi abde ca yakṣa vāsaḥ tu tri abde bhūta saṃkulam
catur abde piśācānām pañca abde dānava ālayam
pañca varṣam atīte tu nivāsaḥ brahmarakṣasām

original: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena kṣipraṃ śāntiṃ tu kārayet /
analyzed: tasmāt sarva prayatnena kṣipram śāntim tu kārayet

original: dvādaśābdāt purā kuryāt jalasaṃprokṣaṇena tu // Vis_39.340 //
analyzed: dvādaśa abdāt purā kuryāt jala saṃprokṣaṇena tu
evam eva tu kartavyam viṃśat varṣa antam eva tu

original: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi prāyaścittaṃ tu nārada // Vis_39.341 //
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi prāyaścittam tu nārada
jala saṃprokṣaṇam kuryāt jala vāsa puraḥsaram
brāhmaṇān bhojayet paścāt mahāhavi puraḥsaram
ṣaṭtriṃśat vatsarāt arvāk tāvat tena eva kārayet
ṣaṭtriṃśat vatsarāt ūrdhvam prāyaścittam vidhīyate
pañcagavyam kramāt kṛtvā garbhāgāram viśodhayet
puṇyāham vācayitvā tu brāhmaṇānām anujñayā
jala adhivāsana ādīni pūrva uktena eva kārayet

original: godānaṃ bhūmidānaṃ ca hiraṇyaṃ vastrameva ca // Vis_39.345 //
analyzed: go dānam bhūmi dānam ca hiraṇyam vastram eva ca
sarva dānam tatas kuryāt brāhmaṇebhyaḥ yathākramam
evam tat vardhayitvā tu pañcāśat vatsara antakam
pañcāśat vatsarāt ūrdhvām prāyaścittam vidhīyate
jala adhivāsana ādīni punar sthāpanam ārabhet
brāhmaṇān bhojayet tatra śeṣam pūrvavat ācaret

original: etat krameṇa kartavyaṃ śatavarṣāntameva ca // Vis_39.348 //
analyzed: etat krameṇa kartavyam śata varṣa antam eva ca
saṃvatsara śatāt ūrdhvam śūnya sthānam bhavet dhruvam

original: tadgrāmaṃ nidhanaṃ yāti tatrasthā narakaṃ vrajet(?) // Vis_39.349 //
analyzed: tad grāmam nidhanam yāti tatrasthā narakam vrajet

original: tadgrāmaṃ nidhanaṃ yāti tasmācchāntiṃ tu kārayet /
analyzed: tat grāmam nidhanam yāti tasmāt śāntim tu kārayet

original: śāntiṃ kṛtvā vidhānena pañcarātreṇa pūjayet // Vis_39.350 //
analyzed: śāntim kṛtvā vidhānena pañca rātreṇa pūjayet
pūjā lope ced tasmin punar tena eva pūjayet

original: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena kṣipraṃ śāntiṃ samācaret // Vis_39.351 //
analyzed: tasmāt sarva prayatnena kṣipram śāntim samācaret
iti śrī pāñcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyām prāyaścittavidhiḥ nāma ekonacatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
